name: Bright functional apartment for 2
summary: Classic and fully remodelled apartment close to major transport connections in trendy Prenzlauerberg. Easy 5 minutes walk restaurants, bars, cafes, parks, markets and more. Close to all major parts of the city, and quiet enough to rest for the night.
space: Recently renovated building in the historic Gleimkiez, close to the old wall. The major U2 and U8 lines are a short walk, along with the critical ringbahn, and M1 tram line. A short trip, or a longer scenic walk, takes you straight into the centre of the city in Mitte to the Berliner Dom, Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt and more.  The flat boasts a fully equipped kitchen and living area. Supermarkets, food stores and specialist dietary stores are all within a five minute walk. The spacious bathroom gives you the choice of shower or bathtub. Wifi access is included.

name: #508 Be my guest
summary: APARTMENTLY bietet eine moderne Stadtwohnung im Hotspot-Viertel von Berlin. Das Apartment befindet sich im ehemaligen Ostberliner Stadtteil Friedrichshain, der für seine pulsierende Atmosphäre bekannt ist, in dem sich historische Bedeutung mit Kreativität und alternativer Flair verbindet.
space: Das Apartment ist im 5. OG (Dachgeschoss) gelegen mit Lift. Ausgestattet mit einem bequemen Queen Size Bett, einer Sitzecke mit Sofa – das auch gleichzeitig als Schlafsofa dient, Schreibtisch, Kleiderschrank, Flachbildfernseher sowie einem kleinen Kühlschrank. Das eigene Bad ist mit einer Dusche, WC, Waschbecken, Haartrockner und einigen kostenfreie Pflegeprodukten ausgestattet.
description: APARTMENTLY bietet eine moderne Stadtwohnung im Hotspot-Viertel von Berlin. Das Apartment befindet sich im ehemaligen Ostberliner Stadtteil Friedrichshain, der für seine pulsierende Atmosphäre bekannt ist, in dem sich historische Bedeutung mit Kreativität und alternativer Flair verbindet. Das Apartment ist im 5. OG (Dachgeschoss) gelegen mit Lift. Ausgestattet mit einem bequemen Queen Size Bett, einer Sitzecke mit Sofa – das auch gleichzeitig als Schlafsofa dient, Schreibtisch, Kleiderschrank, Flachbildfernseher sowie einem kleinen Kühlschrank. Das eigene Bad ist mit einer Dusche, WC, Waschbecken, Haartrockner und einigen kostenfreie Pflegeprodukten ausgestattet. Es gibt keinen Mangel an Cafés und Restaurants, die eine Vielzahl von Gerichten für jeden Geschmack und Geldbeutel anbieten. In Laufdistanz befinden sich die East Side Gallery (Berliner Mauer), RAW-Gelände, Mercedes Benz Arena, Spree, der sozialistische Boulevard Karl-Marx-Allee oder Samstags einer der berühmteste Flohmärket a
neighborhood_overview: Es gibt keinen Mangel an Cafés und Restaurants, die eine Vielzahl von Gerichten für jeden Geschmack und Geldbeutel anbieten. In Laufdistanz befinden sich die East Side Gallery (Berliner Mauer), RAW-Gelände, Mercedes Benz Arena, Spree, der sozialistische Boulevard Karl-Marx-Allee oder Samstags einer der berühmteste Flohmärket am Boxhagener Platz. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln können Sie aber auch den Volkspark (Ältester Park Berlins), Fernsehturm, Gendarmenmarkt, Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel sowie andere Stadteile von Berlin einfach und schnell erreichen. Für diejenigen, die Berlin wegen seines berühmten Nachtlebens besuchen, finden Sie Bars, Pubs und Clubs in unmittelbarer Nähe wie zum Beispiel Berghain, Panorama Bar, Watergate um nur einige zu nennen von der großen Vielfalt die es zu entdecken gibt.
notes: Seit 2014 existiert für die ersten nicht berufsbedingten (also Private) Übernachtungen eine Übernachtungssteuer von 5% vom Mietbetrag, diese ist im Preis inkludiert.
transit: S-Bahn Warschauer Strasse ist 5 Min Fußweg U-Bahn Frankfurter Tor ist 8 Min Fußweg Berlin Hauptbahnhof 20 Min Fahrt Berlin Tegel Flughafen 30 Min Fahrt Berlin Schönefeld 30 Min Fahrt
house_rules: Partys oder Übernachtungen von nicht registrierten Gästen sind nicht gestattet. Rauchverbot in der Wohnung. Bitte treffen Sie Ihre eigenen Sicherheitsmaßnahmen. Bei vergessenen Artikeln arrangieren wir auf Anfrage gerne den Versand auf Ihre Kosten. Bitte seid respektvoll. Parties or overnight stays of non-registered guest are not allowed. The apartment is strictly non-smoking. In case of a lost key the following charges apply: Monday to Saturday 9am until 7 pm - €15 Any hours outside of this, there will be a charge of €30 We do not hold ANY responsibility for lost property, money, valuables, jewelry etc. which you leave in the apartment. neighborhood_overview: 7 Gehminuten entfernt, gibt es das Gesundbrunnencenter mit Shops wie Saturn, H&M, Hunkemöller, Jack&Jones, Intersport, T-K-Maxx und viele mehr.  Lidl/Rewe/Drogeriemarkt 4 Gehminuten, Dennis Biomarkt 7 Gehminuten, Kaufland 10 Gehminuten. Unmittelbar vor der Haustür befindet sich die deutsche Post, eine Bibliothek, der Bäcker Coffee&Vino (auch vegan), so wie diverse Apotheken, Ärzte, Döner, Friseure, Nagelstudios, Solarium, Fitnessstudio, Pizzerien. Besonders zu empfehlen das Restaurant Uferlos und das Malör, die Bar Wilma und das Dujardin, die Fruchtbar mit frischen Smoothies, das Café Pförtner, das Bistro Kater&Goldfisch... alles was das Herz begehrt (und noch vieeel mehr) befindet sich in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. :) Eine schöne Joggingstrecke gibt es ebenfalls direkt vor der Haustür, entlang dem kleinen Panke Flüsschen.

name: Comfortable Apartment with great connectivity
summary: Hello, we - Domi and Tim - are renting our two rooms of our flat in old building style during our holiday. It is located in the Weitlingkiez, two minutes from the S-and B-Bahn station Lichtenberg. There are several stores, restaurants, bars and parks nearby. By bus you need 10 minutes to Friedrichshain, to the Spree (Rummelsburger Bucht) and in 12 minutes by S- or U-Bahn to the  Alexanderplatz. If you have more questions, just let us know ;-)
space: It is a beutiful 65sm large old style apartment with own garden. As it is located in the groundfloor, it is even during summer quite cool. It contains two bedrooms, bathroom and a kitchen. the third bedroom is not beeing rented, so you have the apartment for your own.

host_about: I am 22 years old and I live in Berlin, Germany. I finished high school 2 years ago with the Abitur (A levels). In September i Start an apprenticeship to become a carpenter and after that I want to study architecture. I like to travel, doing sports, making and listening to music and to spent time with my friends. I am an animal lover but sadly I have non because I don’t have the time an animal deserves. Last summer I traveled via New York trough Latin America. I hope to start my next journey in two or three years (after I finished my apprenticeship) the destination will be Central America.

name: Berlin Neukoelln Shared Apartment (WG)
summary: We are three women living in a wonderful sunny appartment in Berlin Neukoelln, close to the Metro U7 Karl Marx Strasse (2min walking distance).  We are looking forward to meeting you!
space: We have a beautiful sunny balcony, a wonderful bright kitchen and a big bathroom. It is a spacious and warm place with nice neighbors in a beautiful little street in the historic part of Berlin called Rixdorf. The neighborhood is very beautiful with parks, bars, different shops (ecological, turkish supermarket and everything you might need) nearby. The Tempelhof airfield also is close by.
description: We are three women living in a wonderful sunny appartment in Berlin Neukoelln, close to the Metro U7 Karl Marx Strasse (2min walking distance).  We are looking forward to meeting you! We have a beautiful sunny balcony, a wonderful bright kitchen and a big bathroom. It is a spacious and warm place with nice neighbors in a beautiful little street in the historic part of Berlin called Rixdorf. The neighborhood is very beautiful with parks, bars, different shops (ecological, turkish supermarket and everything you might need) nearby. The Tempelhof airfield also is close by. All our big rooms (that we rent out when someone is travelling/ gone for work) have a double bed (1,40meter), a couch, a desk and are nice, bright. We rent out one room at a time, so you will have 1 big room for yourself and 1 or 2 roommates, who share the kitchen, bathroom and the balcony. Wonderful diverse, a bit of everything - calm, energy, shopping, relaxing, transport (!!). Very close to Metro U7 Karl Marx Strasse
neighborhood_overview: Wonderful diverse, a bit of everything - calm, energy, shopping, relaxing, transport (!!).
notes: If you want, we could rent you a bike also.
transit: Very close to Metro U7 Karl Marx Strasse - 2 min walking. 10 min walking to Circle Line (Neukoelln), 35 min from main Station (Hauptbahnhof), 30 min. by transport to Schoenefeld Airport, 40 min to Tegel Airport.

name: Unique 1.5 Rooms for Explorers & Long-Term Stay
summary: Enjoy your visit to Berlin at my place, located the city's greenest central neighbourhood. You are booking two uniquely asymmetric  rooms adjacent to another - one furnished and equipped as living room, the other smaller side-room with a kitchen corner and the loft bed). Berlin's biggest park area is just across the street, perfect if the bustling crowds of Neukölln and Mitte are not your thing or if you want to dive deep into the many alternative Berlin nightlife locations nearby.
space: I love doing AirBNB but of course if a guest just clicks with you and is actually looking for long-term accommodation, I am open to discuss that as well. So, if you are planning to move to Berlin and are now facing the challenge of finding a place for you stay, what better way to find out if we are roommate-compatible than booking some time at my place for your first days/weeks in town? The accommodation you are renting is part of the apartment I live in and consists of two rooms. The first is furnished as living area, has window view and access to the balcony facing the park and is equipped with a small Beamer and Speakers, so you can use for playing your music or movies. The second is a small room adjacent to the first and contains a little kitchen corner with toaster, capsule coffee machine (type "Dolce Gusto") and water cooker perfect for lazy mornings, and the full-size loft bed.
description: Enjoy your visit to Berlin at my place, located the city's greenest central neighbourhood. You are booking two uniquely asymmetric  rooms adjacent to another - one furnished and equipped as living room, the other smaller side-room with a kitchen corner and the loft bed). Berlin's biggest park area is just across the street, perfect if the bustling crowds of Neukölln and Mitte are not your thing or if you want to dive deep into the many alternative Berlin nightlife locations nearby. I love doing AirBNB but of course if a guest just clicks with you and is actually looking for long-term accommodation, I am open to discuss that as well. So, if you are planning to move to Berlin and are now facing the challenge of finding a place for you stay, what better way to find out if we are roommate-compatible than booking some time at my place for your first days/weeks in town? The accommodation you are renting is part of the apartment I live in and consists of two rooms. The first is furnished as l
notes: I live in an apartment building with you only a few neighbors, that I know for several years. Among them are older people and Families with young children and I would appreciate it if you respect their peace just as you would with your neighbors when moving through the hallway.  Also, let me mention the loft bed again. As it is typical for these constructs, you will need to climb a short ladder - which is pretty challenge-free and has plushy stairs, so no worries :)  Last note: In contrast to most of the competition in my area, I don't want to be a fully automated guesthouse machine. AirBNB helps me to cover the rent share of a permanent roommate, but most of all I have a heck of a lot fun to get to know and host my guest-roomies. And as the latter, you live in the apartment just like I do, and while that means I won't spoil you with roomservice, you can be upfront with me about anything you have problems (scratchy towels?) or need help with! :)
transit: You can park your car for free just accross the street on the park's border where you usually find a spot at any time of the day - a true absurdity considering the fierce parking war Berliners passionately wage in the rest of the town. The S-Bahn station (Ringbahn) and bus stops leading to all parts of the city are just around the corner.
access: You can fully make use of all rooms of the apartment except mine ;)  The actual kitchen of the apartment is fully equipped (dish washer, oven, water cooker, rice cooker, microwave, etc.) and would surely be happy if someone actually cooks in it as I am not the biggest chef. The bath got a bathtub with shower and washing machine you can use for your clothes as well.  The hallway features my latest DIY-Project: A display running Nintendo Classic, ready to challenge me to a match of Mario Bros.! :)
interaction: I really like my neighborhood and to talk about it. If you are interested and time permits it, have a walk with me through Treptower Park and I give you the scoop about the area. And no worries: If you prefer solitude for your trip you will rarely even notice me when being at my place.

name: Design loft appartment in the heart of Berlin
summary: Big maisonette apartment (160 sqm) with sunny terrace in the absolute center of Berlin, 8 minutes walking distance to Alexanderplatz. Although in the center it is still not crowded or noisy here due to bicycle street. I live here with my little dog Polka :) You will have your own private room and also your own little bathroom with shower.
space: Absolute center of Berlin but still quiet, spacious apartment on two floors. Big sunny terrace, living-room with piano and table-soccer, nice sunny kitchen place with view onto the terrace (with hammock!).

summary: Private I rent the 22 qm-room (Zi 5), with 14qm downstairs & 8qm above,   on big high-sleepers with 2 mattresses as beds (1,6x2m+0,9x2m) & downstairs 1 sofa (1,5x2m) for max. 4 pers. & 9 shared rooms with 61qm: kitchen, pantry, bath- & shower-room, Extra-WC, 3 floors, washingroom with handbasin. People, who like it rustic, tweedy, alive in the kitchen, but quiet in their private room & also  sportive for to climb up &  down the ladder for to reach the high-sleepers, they are right here.
space: Hello, thank you very much for your interest in this room (nr. 5) in my big flat. This is a flat with high walls. So I built in nearly all rooms loft-beds/high-sleepers in the same room. I live together with 7 more people and I am the leader of the WG.  I spoke with all members of my WG and they are also your hosts and will help you as much as possible.  So you have many possibilities of support. Perhaps you don't understand this word "WG" what means in german "Wohngemeinschaft". notes: 1.) Please remember that you are booking here a non-smoking WG.        Smoking is forbidden in all rooms at this flat.       You can smoke outside on the street whenever you need. access: Additionally to the 22qm-room (room-nr. 5=Zi 5) with totally 22qm,  14qm downstairs + 8qm upstairs in the same room you can use  - the elevator (lift) for to reach the flat in the 1. floor, - the big TV (120cm diagonal), - the radio with CD-Player, - 1 cupboard for your things (in the backside right hand), - 2 tables for your laptops. Then you can use together with us: - the big kitchen (19qm), - the small pantry (1,7qm), - the bathroom (3,6qm),  - the Extra-WC/toilet (1,1qm),  - the balcony (7,5qm),  - the 3 floors (23qm),  - the washingmachine-room with  Extra-handbasin (11qm) and  - the wonderful space outside the flat and the house with chairs (ca. 20 x 30m). You have WiFi (WLAN) in the whole flat.  The WLAN-nr. you get at Check In. You can use the elevator (lift).
interaction: 1.) We can meet us personally. 2.) You can reach me if you have any problem.         I'll give you my mobile-number, ok? 3.) Many members of my WG are open for your questions and problems         at your stay in our flat. 4.) Please remember:       Attention, this is no professional hotel or hostel !!! It is a private shared apartment. This is the original idea from airbnb:  you share your private home with other people in the world and perhaps you go on your next trip into the private home of your guests. So they share their home then with you also. If I would have a hotel, then the prices would be very much higher. So, people, who like it rustic, tweedy, alive in the kitchen, but quiet in their private room, they are right here. They also must be sportive for to climb up and to go down the small ladder (study the foto) for to reach the big high-plateau, high-sleepers, loft-beds for to sleep in the same room. Please study the many fotos!
house_rules: Dies ist eine Nichtraucher-WG.  Das Rauchen ist daher in allen Zimmern streng verboten. Zuwiderhandlungen können die Stornierung der Unterbringung für die gesamte Restzeit zur Folge haben. Rauchen ist möglich 1.) auf dem schön begrünten Innenhof, 2.) auf der Straße, 3.) auf dem Balkon oder 4.) bei unzumutbar kalten Temperaturen ausnahmsweise im Wendeltreppenhausflur.  Bitte sämtliche Spuren des Rauchens stets gründlich sofort entfernen. Im 4-stöckigen Haus wohnen viele Familien mit Kindern. Große Lärmbelästigungen sollten bitte unbedingt vermieden werden. In der näheren Umgebung gibt es viele Möglichkeiten um ausgiebig und lautstark zu feiern, dafür sollte das Zimmer und die WG bitte nach 22 Uhr nicht verwendet werden. Zuwiderhandlungen können die Stornierung der Unterbringung für die gesamte restliche Zeit zur Folge haben. Haustiere sind nur nach vorheriger Absprache erlaubt. Ich habe eine Katzenallergie, wenn auch nicht auf alle Katzen. Die momentane WG-Zusammensetzung ist tolerant u
host_about:
Ich, Claudio K. N. (geb. 1954) bin in Schwerin geboren, aber lebe seit meinem 1. Lebensjahr in Berlin (West). Ich habe Sport und Musik für das Lehramt studiert und bin nun auch Lehrer für Musik und Sport an einer Grundschule in Spandau. Nebenberuflich bin ich Flamenco-Musiker. Dies war mein erster Beruf, den ich vorher 10 Jahre lang sehr gern und mit viel Leidenschaft ausgeübt hatte. Daher spreche ich außer Englisch und ein bisschen Französisch auch ganz gut Spanisch.
Außerdem habe ich innerhalb meiner Schultätigkeit eine 90-stündige Fortbildung als Mediator (2012) erfolgreich absolviert. Ich bin auch ausgebildet in klassische Massagen, in Ying-Yang- und auch Tantra-Massagen (1999).
Während meines Sportstudium abolvierte ich eine Ausbildung als Skilehrer (1978) und fahre jedes Jahr als Skilehrer auf eine Skifahrt mit der Schule (ins Allgäu) und dem Berliner Skiverein "Berliner Schneehasen" (nach Brixen, Italien auf die Plose, wo wir alle für 8 Tage in 2500m über dem Meeresspiegel, auf dem Gipfel wohnen).
Zu meinen Hobbies zählen Flamencomusik ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) & Sport machen: Volleyball, Skifahren, Tischtennis, Federball, Radfahren, Schach, weiterhin: 
schöne Zeit mit meiner Freundin in Spandau verbringen: Sauna, Massagen, Tischtennis, Federball, schöne Gespräche, Reisen. 
Ich habe mich viel mit Selbsterfahrung beschäftigt z.B. bei Art Reade, Burkhard Kiegeland, Tantra bei Andro, Familienaufstellungen bei Marlies Grzymik-Laule, weiterhin: Paul Lowe, Advaita Maria Bach (Tantra), Thomas Hübl.
Als in der Wohnung lebender Wohnungs-Eigentümer leite ich die WG und habe mit allen meinen WG-Mitgliedern ein Einverständnis zur Anbietung der Zimmer für Gäste erreicht, wobei 
a) einige WG-Mitglieder auch ihr Zimmer anbieten und
b) alle WG-Mitglieder an den Einnahmen auch beteiligt werden.

Was sind die 5 Dinge, ohne die ich nicht mehr leben kann:
1.) Luft zum Atmen, möglichst gern möglichst saubere Luft;
2.) Trinken, ungern Alkohol, weil er mich nicht lustig, sondern müde macht;
3.) Essen, möglichst gern unvergiftetes Essen, möglichst kein  
     Genmanipuliertes Essen, möglichst Bio, gern Vegetarisches, 
     lecker gewürzt;
4.) friedfertige, liebevolle Menschen;
5.) Fällt mir jetzt gerade nicht ein, vielleicht später.

Meine Lieblingsreiseziele waren jahrzehntelang Spanien, vor allem Andalusien, hauptsächlich wegen des Studiums der Flamencomusik.
Aber ich bin auch gern zum Skifahren in Süd-Deutschland (Allgäu), Österreich, Frankreich und vor allem Italien.
Das Meer liebe ich auch und war deshalb schon oft in Norddeutschland (Nordsee und vor allem sehr oft an der Ostsee) und Europa an vielen Küsten.

Mit den Delphinen und Fischen schwimmen war ich auf der Karibik-Insel Bimini, auf der Insel Zanzibar und auf den Seychellen. 

Auf der Insel Zanzibar kann ich das Hotel Spice Island Hotel & Resort an der Ostküste empfehlen, welches im Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis zu den besten Hotels der Insel zählt. Mit den Delphinen schwimmen kann man am besten am Südostzipfel der Insel, in Kizim Kazi. Leider währt die Begegnung mit den Delphinen nicht so lang wie z.B. auf Bimini, weil die Bootsfahrer ziemlich respektlos gegenüber den Delphinen sind. Wenn ein Bootsfahrer Delphine gesichtet hat,  dann gibt er es den Kollegen bekannt und dann sind binnen 30 Sekunden 3-5 weitere Boote mit laut aufheulenden Motor ebenfalls an der Stelle. Die Delphine tauchen dann häufig sofort ab.

Als Gast bin ich ziemlich anspruchslos und flexibel und vor allem respektvoll, daher für den Gastgeber höchst unkompliziert.

Als Gastgeber bin ich freundlich, flexibel und hilfsbereit. Dies ist aus den Bewertungen auch herauslesbar.

Als Lebensmottos fallen mir ein:
Leben und leben lassen! Und
Helfen und helfen lassen!

name: Wendt-Apartment, 2nd floor, quiet
summary: Im sanierten Seitenflügel eines Altbau-Wohnhauses im Friedrichshainer Kiez, mit kurzen Wegen zur S-Bahn, DB-Bahn, Flughafen, zum Alexanderplatz, Park oder zur Spree
space: Stylish accommodation with high quality furniture and interiors in central location. Situated in a newly renovated wing of an old apartment building in the Friedrichshain neighborhood, in close proximity to the overground trains (S-Bahn), DB-Bahn (main railway lines), the Alexanderplatz square, park or to the river Spree ..  The living area features a large, comfortable sofa, an 80 inch LCD flat screen TV, DVD, CD radio with MP3 player connection and DVD selection (10 films) are included. The kitchen is equipped with a cooker, a microwave oven and grill and convection oven function suitable (for example) for making pizza / casseroles, a coffee maker, kettle, toaster, and many other utensils. The modern bathroom fitted with showe / bathtub and hairdryer and offers plenty of storage space. Against an extra fee you have the option to choose: Bikes (5€ / day) UMTS-Stick / Internet (3 / day), crib (4 € / day incl. bed-linen) and towels and bed-linen und Bettwäsche/ Handtücher (4 € / stay) T
description: Stylish accommodation with high quality furniture and interiors in central location. Situated in a newly renovated wing of an old apartment building in the Friedrichshain neighborhood, in close proximity to the overground trains (S-Bahn), DB-Bahn (main railway lines), the Alexanderplatz square, park or to the river Spree ..  The living area features a large, comfortable sofa, an 80 inch LCD flat screen TV, DVD, CD radio with MP3 player connection and DVD selection (10 films) are included. The kitchen is equipped with a cooker, a microwave oven and grill and convection oven function suitable (for example) for making pizza / casseroles, a coffee maker, kettle, toaster, and many other utensils. The modern bathroom fitted with showe / bathtub and hairdryer and offers plenty of storage space. Against an extra fee you have the option to choose: Bikes (5€ / day) UMTS-Stick / Internet (3 / day), crib (4 € / day incl. bed-linen) and towels and bed-linen und Bettwäsche/ Handtücher (4 € / stay) T

notes: Im 2. Stock ohne Fahrstuhl

name: Beautiful 78m² Large Flat - in Best Area!
summary: Our cozy, bright and spacious apartment is banging in the middle of vibrant Friedrichshain!  Outside, an incredible variety of restaurants, bars and shops are right at the door step. Inside, There are four seperate rooms: livingroom, bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. Balcony, large couch, dining table, equipped kitchen, corner bath tub, WiFi, office desk and HDTV are at your use! Because we normally live here ourselves, our with love decorated flat will offer a homelike taste of Berlin to you.
space: You have the great opportunity to rent our very dear appartment in which we put a lot of love! So you will get an authentical experience of living in a very beautiful Berlin flat :-) We furnished the place with a lot of love and it is very cosy. The ceilings are huge (3.5 m) and decorated with classy stucco. Our place is a spacious 75 square meters large and consists of two large rooms, a great kitchen and a bathroom. The cozy living room has a comfortably large corner couch, a new HDTV flat screen (with HDMI cable so you can plug in your own device) and a large wooden dining table. You have access to a balcony where you can enjoy coffee freshly brewed from the espresso machine in the morning sun! There is also a sound system where you can plug in your mp3 player. Of course you will have access to wireless internet.  The large bedroom provides a comfortable bed for two people. There is also a large desk to your use. neighborhood_overview: The recently fully renovated apartment is located very close to the trendy Simon-Dach-Kiez and the Boxi square in Friedrichshain.  There are lots of cafes, bars, restaurants, designer shops and the coolest clubs of Berlin. Everything right infront of the door! It is probably one of the best locations you get to stay in Berlin!
transit: Access to public transport is in walking distance and Alexanderplatz is just a few stops away.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment and no pets, please. You can of course smoke on the balcony. You're expected to leave the apartment in the same state as you found it in upon arrival. It will have been cleaned before your arrival. Do not download illegal material via the wireless here. Germany is very strict about this. Please respect the neighbours, which means keeping music at a reasonable level and not having parties in the flat. In the kitchen you are welcome to use tea, salt & pepper and various herbs, spices & oil etc for cooking, but please replace any larger items you use.
host_about:
I grew up in Germany and am half Greek but I feel more European. I like doing all kinds of sports and am currently a PhD student. I speak English, German, French, Greek and Spanish. 

I like travelling around the world, getting to know people and most of all I love food and cooking.

name: Relaxed apartment in the hearth of Kreuzberg
summary: I moved in my dream apartment in the beginning of April. It's located in the hearth of Kreuzberg but is surrounded by parks and nature.  It's a completely renovated "Altbaut" (Old building) with high ceilings and a lot of big windows. The place is 20 meters away Oranienstraße which is a street full of nice bars and nice restaurants.  The U8 and the U1 are 200-300 m away
space: I have a big living room which I use as a guest room. It has 3 couches that can turn into double beds where my guests can stay. The kitchen and the bathroom are renovated. The guest room has access to the balcony and to the kitchen directly.

neighborhood_overview: The people in this building are settled in Berlin (whether they are German or not) so they have a lot of love and respect for the building and their homes.  The Kreuzberg area is filled with cool cafes, food spots and bars in all varieties so my advice is just to walk out the door and try things out!
transit: You can park your car for free around here. The U1 and U8 which are two of the main Tubes in Berlin run near by (200-300m) and there is a bus (M29) in front of the door. It is very common in Berlin to rent bikes, e-scooters and cars and they are available near by you just need to download the Apps.
interaction: I work full time but I am mostly reachable via SMS/ (Hidden by Airbnb) or Email.  I am happy to make my guestroom available but I don't intend on being a tourist guide.  I am happy to give good advice when it comes to bars restaurants and especially good parties but I would rather it all happen organically and not on a generic brochure.
host_about:
I am half Irish half Italian and I was born in Germany then moved to France as a child and after a couple of years I went back to Germany.
I studied in Brussels and I then moved to Berlin.

I am passionate about my friends and family, I love traveling and doing physical activity.

I love music especially the electronic music scene and I am quite involved in it.

name: Nice Apartment with Vintage-Charme
summary: Primarily FOR WOMEN  I rent 1 room in a - during your stay - free apartment with balcony and a big bed. The apartment is located in the quiet back house of a beautiful old building in a very pleasant neighborhood. In the small eat-in kitchen you can also cook well yourself and make yourself comfortable on the sofa.
space: I offer a charmy old-berlin-apartment with 2 rooms (a 20qm2 room with a little balcony and a smaller with a bed - 1,40m wide). The flat is cosy with an old wooden floor and a high ceiling. It lies in the quiet rear part of an beautiful old building with pleasant neighbors and a little gourmet restaurant just in the front house. Of course you can also cook on your own in the big living-kitchen...or just curl up on the sofa. In there everything for sleeping and living, towels and sheets included. Of course there's free Internet in the flat. In the kitchen there's a washing machine and a dishwasher. The flat is located in the "Drei-Länder-Eck" Kreuzberg/ Neukölln und Alt Treptow, next to the former border at Görlitzer Park and right between the underground stations U-Bahnhof Schlesisches Tor and Treptower Park.  From here you have to take the bus, but the station is directly in front of the house. If you have a car, you will always find a parking lot right in the street. There are also tw

interaction: I won´t be in the apartment, while you are there, but we have to find a time for check in, because I want to show you my private apartment.
host_about:
Liebe Zimmersuchenden, ich vermiete mein kleines WG Zimmer. Die Wohnung liegt in einem wunderschönen Berliner Altbauhaus an der Grenze zu Neukölln und Kreuzberg, direkt neben dem Görlitzer Park in Alt-Treptow. Einen Parkplatz findet man hier immer, dafür ist die nächste U Bahn und S Bahn Station jeweils eine Viertelstunde zu Fuß entfernt, aber mit dem Bus gehts auch, der hält direkt vor der Tür. 

Dear Guests, I offer the little room of my apartment for nice guests from all over the world. The apartment is in an old berlin house directly on the old border between east and west germany. Neukölln and Kreuzberg have there westborder here. A parking place is no problem here, a bus station is directly in front of the house. The next subway or railway is 15minutes to walk. (Schlesisches Tor, Treptower Park)

name: *OPEN-CONCEPT LOFT Bohemian NEUKÖLLN -Richardplatz
summary: Welcome home to our spacious, open-concept Neukölln loft! 2 bed, 2 bath are available for you. Rixdorf is a quaint, historical village in trendy Neukölln- equally local as hipster, you won't miss out on quirky Berlin... We are happy to host you here! We have hammocks, sunshine, lots of natural light & a nice vibe in the house... Our Brazilian island flat in Neukölln♥. Great base in the city, re: major transit lines. Little cafes, modern/locals' bars, the best parks in the city & plenty of shops.
space: My apartment is very light, quiet, spacious, and surrounded by green space in a typical and atmospheric Berliner neighbourhood. Equipped with everything you'll need: soft sheets, fluffy towels; plenty of art work (added after the photos were taken); a fully-equipped modern kitchen; a large private bedroom; one massive luxurious bathroom and a smaller separate one; WiFi; and plenty of comfortable lounging space packed with antiques from all around the world. The building is a recent project by a Berlin architectural firm. The living situation is ideal for an individual, couple, or group of up to three or four depending on the weekend. You will be staying in my extra-cozy room - bright in the day, dark curtains for sleeping in. A large-sized double bed is included there (for 2-3 people), as well as space to hang and store folded clothes, and a work desk facing the window. The second sleeping space is in the far end of the main space, on a large sofa bed (all bedclothes naturally provided

The building is a recent project by a
neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the newly trendy Berlin Neukölln district. This neighbourhood is highly sought-after by foreigners and visitors for it's small, independent art galleries and ateliers; atmospheric bars and restaurants; eclectic shops; and trendy scene. This part of Neukölln is particularly cool because it is still a locals' neighbourhood with very laid-back vibe. The historical neighborhood around Richardplatz is full of quaint, winding cobblestone streets, greenspace, cafes, shops and German and international restaurants. It lies within the historical village of Rixdorf, that is most famous for it's Christmas market in the beginning of December. Getting to the apartment from either airport couldn't be easier - you can take the train or bus and the bus / S-Bahn / U-Bahn stop is just around the corner. I'll send you directions when you book. Enjoy your stay!
notes: Laundry upon special request.
transit: Did I mention it is in a great location? It's only a:  2 min. walk to the historic Richardplatz 2 min. walk to the Neukölln S-Bahn AND U-Bahn station 5 min. walk to beautiful Körnerpark (hidden local favorite!) 10 min. walk/5 min. bike ride to the famous TEMPELHOF AIRPORT PARK 10 min. bike or U-Bahn or a 30 min. walk to KREUZBERG & Kreuzkölln 20 min. bike or U-Bahn to Mitte/Friedrichshain/Prenzlauerberg shops, restaurants & nightlife!
access: Guests are free to use the entire loft, bathrooms and terrace. The only door closed is to our personal storage, so it would be nice if that could please be respected :-) Please kindly avoid opening my private drawers and shelves, in my room that are obviously covered up. And please remember to bring your own food, cosmetics, etc. What is currently in the house belongs to my roommates and is not included in the reservation! Other arrangements can gladly be made.
interaction: Check in is after 12 noon and check out is before 12 noon. I'm happy to accommodate early check in and late check out as long as well as I can! Please feel free to take advantage of my SHOPPING SERVICE as well! I am happy to have you set up upon ARRIVAL with all of "the basics" for BREAKFAST (coffee, milk, juice, cereals, fruits, nuts, eggs, bread, etc.), snacks, BEER, WINE and COCKTAILS. Special requests are of course welcome. For this service I ask for 35/50 euros (food/food+drinks) over your booking; plus the cost of the groceries which, as a local, I keep extremely low (20-30 for food + wine). Please advise me upon your reservation request at least 24 hours in advance and, if you like, I can send you a list of items to choose from. Just ask and I am pleased to advise you on the most incredible things to do, eat, drink and explore throughout and near to Berlin, as well as in our own neighbourhood.
house_rules: You are free to enjoy the space as you please - Just no parties please without my specific approval, nor non-guests without my specific approval.  Smokers: Feel free to enjoy a smoke on the balcony, only never inside please!
host_about: I'm a 30 year-old Canadian writer and photographer who's been moving around & travelling the world for more than a decade now! I've finally found a base in Berlin - a city close to my heart - and I'm setting up here for a little while. I love meeting travellers, and I'm looking forward to hosting you in my gorgeous, brand new and cozy Neukölln loft! Two years ago, I’ve started my own international fashion business, and it quite often takes me away from home. I’m looking forward to sharing my room with some gracious and interesting travellers! You will stay with my two roommates from Recife, Brazil while I’m away... they are simply the best, and your room is of course private

name: Bed in 4 bed dorm - Grand Hostel Berlin Classic
summary: Das Grand Hostel Berlin Classic liegt zentral im Trendbezirk Berlin Kreuzberg. Unser herrschaftliches Gebäude aus dem 19. Jahrhundert vereint historische Atmosphäre mit modernem Komfort. Du hast die Wahl zwischen schönen Privatzimmern oder günstiger Übernachtung in unseren luxuriösen Mehrbettzimmern. An unserer Hostelbar triffst Du andere Reisende und kannst viele neue Freundschaften schließen. Zahlreiche Preise und Auszeichnungen machen das Grand Hostel zu einem der besten Hostels der Stadt.
space: Unsere Rezeption ist täglich 24 Stunden für Dich verfügbar. Der Check-In ist ab 15 Uhr möglich, Check-out Zeit ist 11 Uhr. Du kannst jedoch jederzeit Dein Gepäck bei uns unterstellen. Erreichbar sind wir jederzeit telefonisch und per email - rund um die Uhr

neighborhood_overview: Die Unterkunft von Grand Hostel Berlin liegt in Berlin, Deutschland. Berlin Kreuzberg gehört zu einem der Hotspots der Stadt Berlin. Unzählige Bars, Cafés, Restaurant und Sehenswürdigkeiten umgeben uns. Kurze Entfernungen und mehrere U-Bahn Linien in unmittelbarer Nähe zeichnen unsere Lage aus. Das Brandenburger Tor, der Checkpoint Charly oder der Potsdamer Platz sind innerhalb weniger Minuten vom Hostel zu erreichen.

name: Big classy design apartment at subway U2+Messe/ICC
summary: 230 m² apartment (2nd floor, elevator, free parking) directly at the station Kaiserdamm (U2) and station Messe Nord/ICC (circle line). Easy access to city centre and all Berlin sights. Within walking distance: Fair (7 min.), many restaurants, bars, cafes, supermarkets and lake with park and playground. 3 bedrooms with 180 cm double bed + comfortable sofa bed. Each room is separatly accessable from the entrance area. The apartment is fully equipped and suitable for holiday and business trips.
space: This spacious 230 m² apartment has a total of 6 bedrooms, which are separately accessible from the entrance area. So you can enter each room without disturbing the privacy of the others. You rent 3 large bedrooms. One other room might be rented out to someone. Your rooms can be locked from the inside with a bolt. Your 2 hosts sleep in the remaining 2 bedrooms. Your and our bedrooms are separately accessible, so that no one will disturb the privacy of the other. The following rooms are shared: - First daylight bathroom with rain shower and WC - Second daylight bathroom with rain shower and sauna - Extra toilet - Spacious, fully equipped kitchen with guest fridge, fully automatic coffee machine, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer We have hosted many large groups from 4 to 11 people. The apartment is very large and we are on the road a lot, so that we will hardly see each other. But if you have any questions we are here for you.

interaction: We were both born and raised in Berlin and are happy to advise you on any questions you may have about this beautiful city.
house_rules: - You are not allowed to have guests in the apartment. - No open fire (smoking, candles etc.) in the entire apartment incl. balcony to ensure everyone's safety and comfort. A violation will be fined with 500 EUR.
host_about:
IT-Spezialist mit Begeisterung für Gitarrenmusik und Fußballspielen. 

Ich bin in Berlin geboren und aufgewachsen. In meiner Freizeit liebe ich es zu reisen und Berlin zu genießen.

name: Oase im Bözow-Viertel
summary: Gemütliches WG Zimmer in super Lage. Erster Stock :) Mitten im beliebten und belebten Bözow-Viertel, Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg.  Bars, Restaurants, Nahverkehr und der große Volkspark mit seinem verwunschenen Märchenbrunnen sind in wenigen Minuten fußläufig erreichbar. Der Alexanderplatz ist drei Tram-Haltestellen entfernt und ebenfalls fußläufig erreichbar.
space: Es steht neben dem eigenen Zimmer mit Balkon auch die Küche mit allen Gegenständen und natürlich auch das Badezimmer jederzeit zur Verfügung.
description: Gemütliches WG Zimmer in super Lage. Erster Stock :) Mitten im beliebten und belebten Bözow-Viertel, Bezirk Prenzlauer Berg.  Bars, Restaurants, Nahverkehr und der große Volkspark mit seinem verwunschenen Märchenbrunnen sind in wenigen Minuten fußläufig erreichbar. Der Alexanderplatz ist drei Tram-Haltestellen entfernt und ebenfalls fußläufig erreichbar. Es steht neben dem eigenen Zimmer mit Balkon auch die Küche mit allen Gegenständen und natürlich auch das Badezimmer jederzeit zur Verfügung. Meine Mitbewohner freuen sich, wenn sie helfen können.  Ich bin natürlich auch immer erreichbar. In der Nähe ist quasi alles.  Restaurants, Einkauf, Nahverkehr, Parks etc. Der Alexanderplatz ist ca. 1,6km entfernt. Die M4, M10 und der Bus 200 halten ganz in der Nähe.  Parken kann man in 10Min. Fußweg umsonst zum Ein- und Ausladen und Nachts auch vor der Haustür.

name: Lichtdurchflutetes Appartment mitten in Mitte
summary: In diesem lichtdurchfluteten Zweizimmer-Appartment werdet ihr über den Dächern Berlins mit der aufgehenden Sonne geweckt! Möchtet ihr stilvoll, modern und zentral in Berlin übernachten, ist unsere Wohnung definitiv die richtige Wahl!
description: In diesem lichtdurchfluteten Zweizimmer-Appartment werdet ihr über den Dächern Berlins mit der aufgehenden Sonne geweckt! Möchtet ihr stilvoll, modern und zentral in Berlin übernachten, ist unsere Wohnung definitiv die richtige Wahl! Zentraler lässt sich in Berlin nicht übernachten. Die Wohnung liegt fünf Gehminuten vom S-Bahnhof Friedrichstraße, von dem man überall in Berlin im Nu hinkommt. Dort findet man auch einen stets offenen Supermarkt. In zehn Gehminuten Entfernung liegen Bundestag & Bundeskanzleramt sowie die Museumsinsel. In 15 Gehminuten ist man am Bundesrat oder am Stadtschloss.

name: Berlin Apartament
summary: The flat has a big kitchen with lots of stuff in combination with a living room. In between is a big cool bar. It has a very nice atmosphere is very close to the trainstation with very good connections to the center. There is a straight train to Alexanderplatz or Friedrichstr. I have two roommates. One is not at home from Monday morning to Thursday evening. The other one can help you with lots of stuff.  You would sleep in my room. I am travelling a lot so that’s why I rent my room sometimes.
space: Our living room is amazing. We have a bar, a big kitchen and a projector with lots of DVDs.
description: The flat has a big kitchen with lots of stuff in combination with a living room. In between is a big cool bar. It has a very nice atmosphere is very close to the trainstation with very good connections to the center. There is a straight train to Alexanderplatz or Friedrichstr. I have two roommates. One is not at home from Monday morning to Thursday evening. The other one can help you with lots of stuff.  You would sleep in my room. I am travelling a lot so that’s why I rent my room sometimes. Our living room is amazing. We have a bar, a big kitchen and a projector with lots of DVDs. You can use all stuff need for cooking in the kitchen as plates, pots etc. you will also have an access to the fridge to leave your food there. You can contact me by (Hidden by Airbnb) or Email.

name: Familienwohnung in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Wir vermieten unsere 105 qm, 4-Zimmer-Altbau-Wohnung im schönen und familienfreundlichen Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. 1 Wohnzimmer, 1 Esszimmer, 1 kleines Schlafzimmer, 1 Kinderzimmer,  1 kleines Bad. Mindestmietdauer: 3 Tage.
space: Schöne, sonnendurchflutete 105 qm, 4-Zimmer-Altbau-Wohnung in der 4. Etage im Vorderhaus mit Balkon nach Süden. Wir vermieten unsere Wohnung in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg. Ideal für eine Familie mit bis zu 3 Kindern. Die Wohnung ist komplett ausgestattet. Badezimmer mit Badewanne,  Waschbecken und WC. Voll ausgestattete Küche (Gasherd, Elektroofen) mit Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine, Essecke Küche mit Tisch für bis 3 Personen+ Esszimmer mit Tisch für bis zu 6 Personen (2 hohe Stühle für Kinder vorhanden). Ein Elternschlafzimmer (Doppelbett 1,80 x 2,00m), ein Kinderzimmer mit 2 Einzelbetten (0,90x1,90m). Es ist eine zusätzliche Matratze (0,90m x 2,00m) vorhanden. Handtücher werden zur Verfügung gestellt. Die Wohnung ist gepflegt und sauber. Das Haus ist ein saniertes Gründerzeitgebäude, gelegen im Winsviertel mit sehr guter Verkehrsanbindung. Das Elternschlafzimmer und Kinderzimmer gehen zum leisen Innenhof hinaus. Wohn- und Esszimmer mit Balkon gehen zur Straße hinaus. Mindest Mietdauer: 4 Ta

neighborhood_overview: Die Umgebung ist extrem familienfreundlich. Es gibt sehr viele Spielplätze, Cafés, Restaurants, individuelle Geschäfte, Bars, Kino, Kindermuseum, Parks. Donnerstags und Samstags gibt es einen schönen (Bio-)Markt auf dem Kollwitzplatz. In der Nähe gibt es gute Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Bio-Supermarkt). Der Mauerpark (Flohmarkt am Sonntag) ist in 10 Minuten mit der Tram zu erreichen, der Volkspark Friedrichshain ist 10 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt.
notes: Es gibt einen Schlüssel. Mindest Mietdauer: 3 Tage
transit: Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral im Winskiez gelegen. Zwischen Hufeland/Bötzowkiez und Kollwitzplatz. Zum Alexanderplatz in 5 Minuten mit der Tram (Tram M2/M4),(S-Ring) Greifswalderstr. oder Prenzlauer Allee, 2 Minuten zur M10 Richtung Eberswalder Straße/Warschauerstr.
access: Handtücher, Bettwäsche, Toilettenpapier... eigentlich alles, was man so braucht! Gerne auch Benutzung von allltäglichen Küchenzutaten (Öl, Zucker, Gewürze etc) Kinderspielzeug und Bücher...
interaction: Wir sind zum angegebenen Zeitpunkt nicht da, aber jemand kümmert sich, um die Schlüsselübergabe und gibt euch gern Tips und Hilfe.
house_rules: Wir vermieten die Wohnung nur an Familien oder ruhige Paare. Keine Party-Touristen! - die Schuhe ausziehen - Keine Partys in der Wohnung - Nichtraucher, keine Haustiere - Keine illegalen Downloads oder Streaming! - Check-out am Tag der Abreise ist spätestens 12:00 Uhr. - max. 5 Personen - Blumen auf dem Balkon gießen wäre toll ;) - mindest Mietdauer 3 Tage!
host_about: working mother of two lovely kids...:)

name: BEAUTIFUL flat in Kreuzkölln near the canal!
summary: BEAUTIFUL custom designed and newly renovated "Altbau" flat in Kreuzberg! Ground floor apt is centrally located on a quiet and safe tree lined street next to the Landwehrkanal. Open floor plan with fully equipped kitchen, living room, bathroom, bedroom and office area. 3 min walk to the M29 Bus and 10 min walk to Schonlein Str (U8) and Kottbusser Tor (U8, U1) Ubahn stations. Close to numerous cafes, restaurants, bars and clubs.

name: Big room with sunny balcony !
summary: 25 sqm room with balcony, enjoy the sun for breakfast in the morning! The room is in a flatshare with my nice flatmate Paul or myself. Free use of the kitchen. Many Cafés, bars, Restaurants and Clubs in the neighborhood
space: Simon Dach Strasse - Friedrichshain The flat is located in the very lively Simon Dach Strasse in Friedrichshain, which offers a large choice of Restaurants, Cafés, Clubs, and bars.  You are 1 to 3 Metro stations far from Kreuzberg, which is also a very trendy area.  Also very easy Access to Mitte with the S bahn to Alexander Platz. To get here from SCHÖNEFELD Airport Take S9 until OSTKREUZ and walk or take another Sbahn dowstairs direction Spandau or Potsdam for one stop until WARSCHAUERSTRASSE. To get here from TEGEL Airport  Take the bus TXL until Beusselstrasse and then the ring bahn S41 until OSTKREUZ and take the other S Bahn downstairs until WARSCHAUERSTRASSE When you are in Warschauerstrasse go on the right over the Bridge , and first street on the right (Revaler strasse). Then, 2nd street on the left is my street.

neighborhood_overview: Le quartier offre de nombreuses possibilités pour sortir, restaurants, cafés pour petit-déjeuner, bars. A deux pas se trouve la Boxhagener Platz, où s installe un marché le samedi et un marché aux puces le dimanche. Super Pizzeria Il Ritrovo dans la Wühlichstrasse à 3 minutes de l appartement Super cupcakes dans la Krossener Strasse, également à 3 min Le métro le plus proche est à 5 minutes à pieds, ligne 1, Warschauer Strasse, où il y a également le S Bahn (RER) qui amène à Alexander Platz en moins de 5 minutes. Le quartier de Kreuzberg est à seulement entre 1 et 3 stations de métro sur la ligne 1.
transit: Warschauerstrasse S Bahn Warschauerstrasse U Bahn Tram M10
interaction: Dont hesitate to contact me during your stay if you have questions!
house_rules: You are living with someone else int he flat so please respect the usual rules of noise, and Keep the bathroom / toilets clean.
host_about:
Hi!

I am Camille, I am 33 and I have been living in Berlin 2011 til 2016 in this nice flat in Friedrichshain aera in Berlin. Now I am in Dublin and cant wait to be able to host again!
I speak German, English, a bit of spanish and of course French, as I come from Paris originally.
I am working in Berlin but I like to travel. So I am often away and that's why I can rent my room!
I love travels, music and meeting people, and basically I am not the last one to party so if you need advices about Berlin night life, I am your man!
Also I love food so I will try to point you some good spots to have nice brunch or dinner in the city!!
Voilà!

name: Berlin Neukölln nice & central - no kitchen
summary: Situated in vibrant Neukölln but still calm, close to Kreuzberg and central. The next metro station is located just 3 min by feet from the apartment. The neighbourhood is full of little nice cafés, restaurants, bars and (organic) shops. We have been focusing on an ecological renovation using healthy and best organic materials as lime plaster, silicate paint, oiled floorboards and doors. You are sleeping on a luxurious natural latex matress and we believe your karma will appreciate it!
space: There is no better place to stay, if you are looking for an unique accomodation in a historical Berlin neighbourhood. Situated in a 100-year-old building, the apartment has a lot of original details as stucco, doors and beautiful wooden floorboards. You are sleeping on a  big bed with an organic latex matress (1.60 x 2.00m) and you use your own shower and toilet. Start your day in one of the nice coffee houses nearby, you will find a lot of nice places directly down in our street or in the very close neigbourhood.  We can help out with our washing machine, if you are in need of a laundry!
description: Situated in vibrant Neukölln but still calm, close to Kreuzberg and central. The next metro station is located just 3 min by feet from the apartment. Start your day in one of the nice coffee houses nearby, you will find a lot of nice places directly down in our street or in the very close neig
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is international and - despite situated right in the center of Berlin - it keeps a warm, friendly and familiar atmosphere which you can feel. The very popular "Schiller-Kiez" (Berliners call their neighbourhood "Kiez") is surrounded by three big parks, one of them Hasenheide with a miniature zoo and the amazing Tempelhofer field - the former city airport turned into a great park with urban gardening, open airs, longboarding / wind skating on the former runways etc. ... Shopping possibilities are nearby as well as nice coffee places, restaurants and bars to explore. Cultural life is happening directly here. With a german/ turkish Bookstore called "BuchHafen", three art house cinemas nearby, interesting art spaces and gallerys, the KINDL - centre for contemporary art,  and the theatre "Neuköllner Oper" you can't be wrong here. On saturdays a true local market provides you with best and fresh organic food and pastrys. Join and be part of the "Kiez"!
notes: 100 % official! We have the legal permission to rent our apartment and you will not have any difficulties with the authorities by renting it.  But please notice - respect our neighbors and keep calm.
transit: Just 3 minutes to Metro-Station U8 "Leinestraße" - connects you for example within 15 min to the center "Alexanderplatz". Access to suburban trains and long-distance trains departing at train station "Südkreuz" within 20 min. 45 min to Airport Berlin-Schönefeld. There are many bike rentals in the neighbourhood, if you want to explore the city on wheels.
interaction: We are on site. If you have any questions we will be happy to help you!  If you like we can give you some good advice regarding our favourite places in the neighbourhood.
house_rules: nach 22:00 Uhr  bis 07:00 Uhr bitte rücksichtsvoll im Treppenhaus verhalten
host_about: Hi my name is Ingrid, I was studying Photography and I love my apartment and my neighbourhood because it feels great to live in the city of Berlin.

name: 2-Zimmer Design-Penthouse auf der Insel Eiswerder
summary: Die Apartments sind nach neustem Komfort-Standard eingerichtet. Dazu gehört eine voll ausgestattete Küche, Tageslichtbad m. Regendusche & Fußbodenheizung. Zudem verfügt jedes Apartment über eine Terrasse. Die Möblierung ist hochwertig und zeitlos, eingerichtet mit Design-Klassikern von Vitra, HAY und USM Haller. Internet, Smart-TV und Soundsystem sind selbstverständlich. Technisch ist es ebenfalls „State of the Art“ mit Smart-Home Lösungen von Digital-Strom, Loewe TV und Sonos Soundsystem.

host_about:
Suite.030 hat sich auf die Vermietung von möblierten High-Class Apartments in Berlin spezialisiert, für kurz und mittelfristige Aufenthalte. Jedes Apartment ist handverlesen, erfüllt die höchsten Ansprüche und offiziellen Sterne-Kritieren und wird von uns rundum betreut.

Das Serviceteam
Unser Serviceteam kümmert sich persönlich um Ihren Check-in und Check-out und alles was das Apartment und die Planung Ihres Aufenthalts betrifft. Zudem steht Ihnen für die Zeit des Aufenthalts unser Concierge Service zur Verfügung.

name: A cozy, sunny room in the heart of Friedrichshain
summary: A cozy, sunny room in the heart of the trendy Friedrichshain district. Wooden floors, a 4th floor view to the lively Simon-Dach-Straße with lots of cafés, restaurants, bars and boutique shops. Good connectivity with U- and S-bahns, you can reach Alexanderplatz in under 20min. Great night life options too! The queen size bed is perfect for couples, and the comfy sofa can also be used for sleeping. There's a huge kitchen and 2 bathrooms.
space: The apartment is built in Altbau style with wooden floors and tall rooms. There's a spacious kitchen with all the necessities, and 2 bathrooms each with a toilet and a shower or a bath. Elevator takes you to the 4th floor apartment. Although there's a lot of people enjoying the neighborhood day and night, you will not hear the noise with windows closed.

neighborhood_overview: Lots of restaurants, cafés, bars, and shops nearby. Boxhagener Platz is right around the corner, hosting farmer's markets on Saturdays, and a fleamarket on Sundays. There's also clubs (Berghain, RAW area) within a walking distance.
notes: This is a shared apartment (WG), but all the residents are slowly moving out. This means that you will most likely have little interaction with the other residents, and have the apartment mostly to yourself!
transit: There's a bus (240) going right outside the front door. There's a 4 min walk to the tram (M10), going through Prenzlauer Berg to e.g. Mauerpark. Metro (U5) is an 8 min walk away, S-bahn 11 min. Plenty of taxis around too.

summary: Das Einzimmer-Studio-Appartement Eisenacher Str. 11 /Ecke Nollendorfstraße ist eine kleine, helle Wohnung mite eigenem Bad und Küche im 2.OG mit Aufzug. Vom Appartement aus schaut man auf die kleine ruhige Kreuzung Eisenacher Str. 11 /Ecke Nollendorfstraße einer ruhigen Anliegerstraße mit einigen Antiquitätengeschäften.
space: Komfortabel eingerichtetes Einzimmerappartement zwischen den U-Bahn-Stationen Wittenberg- und Nollendorfplatz gelegen. Die kleine Küche mit einem Kühlschrank, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster und Herdplatten lädt zur Selbstverpflegung ein. neighborhood_overview: Im Haus gibt es einen Bäcker. Es sind nur 150-250 Meter bis zu verschiedenen Supermärkten. Direkt um die Straßenecke sind einige bekannte Restaurants, Imbisse, kleine Geschäfte. Man wohnt zwischen dem Kurfürstendamm und dem Potsdamer Platz, der Mitte West und der Mitte Ost in der Nähe des Tiergartens mit seinen Erholungsmöglichkeiten und dem Botschaftsviertel. Mittwochs und Samstags ist auf dem nahe gelegenem Winterfeldtplatz ein über die Grenzen Berlins hinaus bekannter Markt.
notes: Bettwäsche und Handtücher sind im Preis inbegriffen. Es gibt ein Bügeleisen und einen Föhn. Kostenlose Internetverbindung vía Wifi/WLAN. Bitte beachten Sie, dass das Land Berlin seit 2014 für die ersten nicht berufsbedingten (also privaten) 21 Übernachtungen eine Übernachtungsteuer von 5% vom Mietbetrag erhebt, zusätzlich zahlbar bei Anreise. Bei Mietaufenthalten von mehr als 2 Monaten besteht die Verpflichtung sich bei der Meldebehörde anzumelden.
transit: Durch die nahe gelegene U-Bahn-Station Nollendorfplatz ist das Appartement exzellent an das Berliner Nahverkehrssystem (BVG) angebunden. An diesem zentralen Verkehrsknotenpunkt kreuzen sich die U-Bahnlinien U1, U2, U3 und U4. Außerdem lässt sich von hier aus die Berliner City binnen weniger Minuten über die Busverbindungen M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) und 187 erschließen. Auch die Nachtbusverbindungen N1, N2 und N26 treffen sich genau hier.  Auf Anfrage können wir auch einen Parkplatz gegen Gebühr zur Verfügung stellen.
access: Sie mieten die gesamte Wohnung. Niemand anderes hat Zugang. Sie haben in eigenes Bad mit Dusche, Toilette und Waschbecken.
interaction: Wir sind immer gut telefonisch erreichbar. Der Check-In erfolgt persönlich, so dass alle relevanten Fragen direkt an den Vermieter gestellt, beantwortet und geklärt werden können.

name: Neukölln is Berlin | My room
summary: We are renting the best room from our nice-kitsh apartment
space: We are renting our best room in our nice and kitsch apartment in the neighborhood we love: Neukölln! The room has one bed and one sofa-bed, both big and comfortable. The room has also one table for 4 people and one desk. The room is light, big and nice decorated!...you will find yourself at home, we are also relax people.
description: We are renting the best room from our nice-kitsh apartment  We are renting our best room in our nice and kitsch apartment in the neighborhood we love: Neukölln! The room has one bed and one sofa-bed, both big and comfortable. The room has also one table for 4 people and one desk. The room is light, big and nice decorated!...you will find yourself at home, we are also relax people. The kitchen isn't huge but you have space enough to cook and a table for two people. We have a fridge, microwave, oven and diverse kitchen utensils...everything you need to have a nice dinner with the people you like. The toilette is fully appointed as well. I'm gonna be sleeping in the next room from my beautiful flatmate while she's visiting her family in Italy so everything you need I'll at home and I'll be pleased to help you! (I'm a nice guy). After seven years living in Berlin, Neukölln is the place to be and to live, the streets and people, the noise and colours make this neighborhood unique and fun. Y
neighborhood_overview: After seven years living in Berlin, Neukölln is the place to be and to live, the streets and people, the noise and colours make this neighborhood unique and fun. You can reach in 3 minutes walking the quiet from two amazing parks (Hasenheide or Tempelhof) or be in the center of the city when you get out of our door. You have all kind of restaurants (from really cheap to kinda expensive), bars and the nightlife is also very (very!) interesting.
notes: The decoration from our place is fun!
transit: Just 4 minutes walking you have two different subway stations (Rathaus Neukölln and Boddinstr.), from Schönefeld airport you can take direct a bus that leaves you just one station before our place and from tegel the conection is very easy as well, just the subway and one bus.
access: The kitchen isn't huge but you have space enough to cook and a table for two people. We have a fridge, microwave, oven and diverse kitchen utensils...everything you need to have a nice dinner with the people you like. The toilette is fully appointed as well.
interaction: I'm gonna be sleeping in the next room from my beautiful flatmate while she's visiting her family in Italy so everything you need I'll at home and I'll be pleased to help you! (I'm a nice guy).
house_rules: You can smoke in the room or in the kitchen, no problem. For sure you can't make a party at home but to have some beers, talk and listen to music is more than fine. Like in every place we care about leaving everythign clean after you use something. We don't have pets, we don't wanna have pets and we don't want people with pets.
host_about: Ick bin ein bärliner! I was born in Chile but have spent the last seven years of my life in the city I love, Berlin. I'm an architect but work as a furniture designer (upcycling and recycling), love to talk with a beer in the hand and a cigarette in the mouth.
amenities: {Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,Heating,Washer,Essentials}

name: F17 elPilar FRIEDRICHS
summary: This comfortable apartment has 60 m² and capacity for 6 people. The accommodation offers: garden, internet access (wifi), central heating. The American kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, microwave, washing machine, kitchen utensils, coffee maker, toaster and kettle. Located in the heart of Friedrichshain, this area is characterized by a lively urban life and for having become the fashionable district of Berlin, much sought after by tourists but also by the artists of Berlin. Groups under 25 years old are not allowed. There is automatic online check in. You have to send us your ID and sign our good behaviour contract (also credit card depending on the portal) through our platform and the day before check in, we will send you the codes to enter.  A damage deposit of EUR 150 is required, except Airbnb and TripAdvisor. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full by credit card, subject to an inspect

A funky kitchen and floor with old walls. Your room, kitchen, floor, bathroom. (Balcony only when you ask for my roommate) You can reach me on my phone or can ask my politely roommate. space: English below ______________________________________ 25qm großes Schlafzimmer mit 1,40m breitem Bett mit neuer Matratze und Memoryschaum-Matratzentopper, ausklappbarem Bettsofa und wunderschönem Erker. Das Zimmer liegt in einer Wohnung in Berlin-Rummelsburg. Die Lage ist für jede Altersklasse ideal. Die Wohnung selbst ist ruhig gelegen, den riesigen Treptower Park erreichst du innerhalb weniger Minuten mit dem Bus. Durch die super Anbindung ist sie jedoch auch ideal für junge Leute, die das Szene- und Nachtleben in Berlin entdecken wollen. Der Bus, der direkt vor der Haustür hält, bringt dich in wenigen Minuten in das beliebte Friedrichshain mit unzähligen Restaurants, Cafés, Bars und Clubs. Mit einem weiteren Bus, der um die Ecke fährt, erreichst du, ohne umsteigen zu müssen, das Kreuzberger und Neuköllner Kiez. Wenn du auf elektronische Musik und Party stehst, bringt dich der Bus innerhalb drei Stationen zum "about blank" und, da er die ganze Nacht fährt, auch jederzeit wieder zurück
description: 25qm großes Schlafzimmer mit Bett, Bettsofa, wunderschönem Erker und gemeinsam genutze Küche und Badezimmer. Die Wohnung ist ruhig gelegen, die super Anbindung bringt dich aber schnell in das Szene- und Nachtleben und zentrale Spots Berlins, ohne umsteigen zu müssen.  25sqm bedroom with bed, davenport, beautiful oriel and shared kitchen and bathroom in a quiet area. With public transport you can quickly reach nightlife  and the central spots in Berlin withought having to change trains. interaction: Ich bin die meiste Zeit des Jahres unterwegs, habe aber ein Servivebüro vor Ort, daß sich vor Ort befindet und 7 Tage die Woche zwischen 09.00 am bis 18.00 pm geöffnet ist und sich um meine Gäste kümmert...
house_rules: Ruhezeit ab 22.00 Uhr, Ihr lebt unter Locals! Es ist jeweils die maximale Bettenanzahl für Personen angegeben. Gäste daruber hinaus nur nach Absprache
host_about:
Ich bin ein geborener Stadtmensch, der aber auch das Land und die See liebt. Wenn du in Berlin wohnst, kannst du Alles haben. Das ist Berlin. Man sagt, daß die Ostee die Badewanne der Berliner sei und das stimmt auch. In nur 2 Stunden bin ich da, pack meine Surfsachen aus und genieße den Sonnenuntergang am Meer.

Berlin hat viele Gesichter, fast so viele, wie es Bezirke hat. Mich erstaunt es immer wieder. London und New York sind coole Städte aber warum kommen alle nach Berlin und wollen hier leben?!  Wer Mainstream will, findet den auch in Berlin aber man findet auch ´ne menge anderer Dinge, die weitab vom Mainstream sind, wenn man dazu bereit ist auch einmal die Touristenpfade zu verlassen aber dafür ist bei einem Kurztrip kaum Zeit, es sei denn, man setzt sich die entsprechenden Ziele. Ansonsten, einfach wieder kommen, so wie die Meisten :) 

Ich bin Fotograf und viel unterwegs aber ich freue mich immer wieder, wenn ich nach Hause komme. Auf nette, interessante Gäste freue ich mich besonders. So wird die Welt immer kleiner...

I am the typical city people but also loves the land and the sea. the best is, if you live in Berlin, you can have it all. This Is Berlin. It is said that the Baltic Sea is the bathtub of the Berliners and that is really true. In just 2 hours I'm on the beach and pack my surfing stuff  and enjoy the sunset on the sea.

Berlin has many faces, almost as many as it has districts. It always amazes me. London and New York City are cool cities to, but why all the people come to Berlin and want to live here? Who wants mainstream, finds that in Berlin but you will also have lots of other things that are far away from the mainstream ...

I am a photographer and I travel a lot and am always happy when I come home. I'm looking forward to nice guests. the world is getting smaller ...

name: low priced apartment for 2-7 pers.
summary: lately renovated modern apartment in Berlin Tempelhof. The apartment has much place (100 Qm). There are 3 sleeping rooms, a kitchen, a bath and a dining room for up to 8 persons. cable TV in each room and in the dining room.
space: This lately renovated modern apartment is located in the outskirts of Berlin in the district of TEMPELHOF (a very beloved living place with mostly small houses) - exactly in the Saentisstreet. The apartment is very comfortable and has enough room for up to 7 persons. There are three bedrooms which are as follows : room 1 : 1 double bed; room 2 : 1 double bed; room 3 : 3 single beds (from which 2 can be put together as double bed). The dining room has enough place for up to 8 persons. The bathroom has a shower and also a bathtub. There is also a terrace which can be used the whole year through.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment  is located in the outskirts of Berlin in the district of TEMPELHOF - exactly in the Saentisstreet, a side street of the "Mariendorfer Damm". Nearby (approx. 500 meters) there are severeal restaurants and also supermarkets. If you want to you can also visit the BUGA (Bundesgartenschaugelände) as well as a swimming bath at Angkogelweg. You can stay comfortably in the green and can reach nevertheless within a short driving time the center of Berlin  (Alexanderplatz , Kurfürstendamm, Friedrichstrasse, Potsdamer Platz, etc....).
notes: There is a minimum stay of 3 days. House cleaning fee is 75€ and there's also 9,- Euros each guest for bed linen (a tourist tax of 5% is included). Children are free up to 2 years. 2+ count as normal guests.
transit: The way to Berlin's centre is approx. 10 km and can be reached very well with public transport (bus; underground (U-Bahn); S-Bahn,etc...).

If you book the room, you are right at the center of the party and you will practically get anything you ask for. ;) The apartmentprovides a bathroom and a kitchen which you can use. The kitchen has all necessities like a fridge, oven and a washing machine. In the bathroom you have a bathtub and a shower, toillet and washing basin. You also get fresh towels, if you need some. I´m looking forward to meet interesting people who have a lot to share and nice stories to tell. neighborhood_overview: There are endless bars, restaurants, supermarkets, "Spätis", food markts, etc. in the neighbourhood a few meters away from my place. Friedrichshain is well known for its atmosphere: the best example is the Simon-Dach-Straße-Area and the Boxhagener Platz with its weekly flea markt which attracts thousands of Berlin's people every sunday. And of course, here you can find the BEST night clubs in the whole city, especially if you're a techno fan (f.e. Berghain).
transit: In 5-7 minutes walking distance you reach the S-Bahn station Storkower Straße from where you can get the Ringbahn (41 or 42) which goes in both directions all the way around the city, so you can basically get anywhere you need that way. Also 5 minutes from here you have the U-Bahn (metro) station Samariterstraße which is part of the line U5 getting you directly to Alexanderplatz in about 8 minutes! There's also a tram station near the street.
access: There's WiFi in the whole place, which you can use. The kitchen has all necessities like a fridge, oven and a washing machine. In the bathroom you have a bathtub and a shower, toillet and washing basin. You also get fresh towels, if you need some.
interaction: I´m looking forward to meet interesting people who have a lot to share and nice stories to tell. That's why my place is perfect for young international people or travellers/backpackers, who are looking to explore the one and only Berlin, the "Kiez" and the unique scene.  I would be also glad to give you any tips you need about the city, sightseeing, the nightlife, or just anything what comes to your mind!
host_about: I'm Johannes from Berlin and a host myself. I'm pretty easy going and I love traveling. See you soon! ;)

name: Spacious, nice room in Friedrichshain
summary: A huge bedroom in a non-touristic part of Friedrichshain, close to a park and close to Alexanderplatz. You can still reach the going out area - Warschauerstrasse by 15 minutes walk and Berghain even by 10 minutes walk.  There are shops near by, a theater, an open air cinema etc. I am there to help you feeling safe and sound and entertained in Berlin :)
space: The whole flat is 115 square meters and the room you are staying is 30 m2. You see, you have a lot of space.  It is located very central - just a few minutes walk to the metro station or several trams and a bus and 10 min by bike to Alexanderplatz. Also you can reach the bar and restaurant street Warschauerstraße in 10 minutes by walk. The most beautiful Park is 7 minutes away. A supermarket is a few minutes away. So is the post office and other useful shops. The flat and the room has everything that you need. From a washing machine and an iron to a hair dryer.

Private room, large bathroom, large kitchen, boxroom I won’t have much time t
neighborhood_overview: The area is quiet leaned back, even though it’s Friedrichshain. The neighbours are super nice and never loud. Everytime we are making noice or having a sit in with loud music, nobody complains.  Even though it’s central and close to a main street, it’s green because of small parks in the neighborhood. You also get everything you need in this area.
transit: From the Airport Schönefeld you take the train to "Frankfurter Allee" and then switch to the metro, which is going to "Alexanderplatz". You get of at "Weberwiese". From there you walk a few minutes. That’s it. From the Airport Tegel you take a bus to "Alexanderplatz" and switch then to the U5 which is also going to "Weberwiese". From the Central Station you take the tram 5/6/8 or the bus 142 and go to "Platz der vereinigten Nationen". From there you walk a few minutes. From the Bus Central Station (ZOB) you take the S41 or S42 and go to "Frankfurter Allee". From there - see above.  If you're getting here by car, you can park in front of the house - for free. There are usually a lot of free parking slots.
access: Private room, large bathroom, large kitchen, boxroom
interaction: I won’t have much time to spend with you guys, since I am working a lot. But I will help you as much as I can to feel at home in this amazing city and your temporal home :)))

name: Room in family flat
summary: We'll be travelling a lot in August and offer a room in our flat for the whole month. Sometimes we'll live there together (we're a couple and a 19 months old baby), but most of the time you'd have the flat with a nice living room with couch and dining table and a big sunny balcony, kitchen and bathroom to yourself. While we're gone we'd like you to water the plants :)
space: We usually live here together with our baby daughter. The big bed in the sleeping room has a baby bed connected to it, there's a baby chair and a changing table available and a small playground area that belongs to the house. The living room has a big dining table, a comfy couch and a stereo with record player you can use. But the apartment of course also fits travellers without kids since it's close to the hip areas of Neukölln and Kreuzberg  with lots of bars and restaurants.

The living room has a big dining table, a comfy couch and a stereo with record player you can use. But the apartment of course also fits travellers without kids since it's close to the hip areas of Neukölln and Kreuzberg  with lots of bars and restaurants. We won't be around but friends of us close by will give you the key and can help you if you have questions. So many great places in walking distan
neighborhood_overview: So many great places in walking distance: - Lots of Bars and Restaurants in Neukölln and Kreuzberg - clubs in Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg - Nice nature in Treptower Park, Görlitzer Park and at the Schifffahrtskanal - Flea Markets on Sundays - lots of shops or supermarkets (also an organic supermarket)
transit: Subway and S-Bahn can be reached with a 10 min walk, but there's also lots of busses (i.e. to Schönefeld Airport) just around the corner. We do mostly everything by foot, cause the area here is so nice - there's no reason to go far :)
interaction: We won't be around but friends of us close by will give you the key and can help you if you have questions.
house_rules: We would like you to leave the place as tidy as you find it. There's organic herbs, salad, chilis and maybe tomatoes on the balcony - feel free to eat them and it would be nice if you would water them.

name: Comfortable quiet place in lively Kreuzberg
summary: I live in a typical old Berlin apartment building, so expect everything clean and homely, but not a modern polishedhotel room. It's a great place to reside back to and relax after exploring the city, which is just on thedoorstep. The famous Kreuzberg charm is right outside, along with bars, restaurants, galleries, farmers marketsand much more to enjoy and discover. Being only a 10-minute U-bahn journey away from all the major sights of Berlin, the room is the perfect base for a berlin holiday.
space: The apartment is one bedroom, a large living room, a bathroom and a kitchen. What I do is transform the living room into a comfortable space for guests. It is all yours for the duration of the stay and I am usually home, so available if you have questions or any complications come up.

neighborhood_overview: With its bars, restaurants, concert venues, music, clubs, museums, arts scene and urban gardening, Berlin Kreuzberg is a magnet for creatives and tourist.
transit: The next bus stop is right at the corner.  The Appartement is located right in the middle between U1 Stations Görlitzer Park and Schlesisches Tor, so just a few minutes walk to either.
access: You have access to your private room, the bathroom and kitchen. In the summer months there is also a small private garden outside that is a perfect place to have a cold beer in the sun.
interaction: I grew up in Berlin and I am more than happy to help you navigate around the city and recommend places for you to eat and visit during your stay.   I manage a very unique berlin underground dive bar in the area, about a 15 minute walk from the apartment, so I am usually available for questions and help during late hours as well. Also you're more then welcome to drop by for a drink on the house.
host_about: I grew up in Berlin. Friendly, relaxed. I'm renting out my second room here. So available pretty much around the clock and happy to help out and make sure you enjoy your stay here.

neighborhood_overview: KREUZBERG is the most popular  and central district is the hub of Berlin’s unique style and culture. With its impressive array of street art and its eclectic mix of international cuisine, coffeeshops, night clubs and trendy bars, Kreuzberg attracts the hippest of the hip. The former West Berlin borough leads somewhat of a double life, with years of gentrification, having now apparently split it into half shabby chic hipster paradise, half stylish and upper class. Below, the ultimate guide to Kreuzberg and its main hotspots to get to know the essence of Berlin.
