name: Sunny 1-Room Apartment
summary: Dear Globetrotters, I'm going on vacation (15May-2June), so I want to rent my 1 Room Apartment, a nice sunny flat in the heart of Wedding, the neighborhood with sprawling creative spaces, beautiful parks, quirky characters and cheap drinks.
space: The apartment is fully furnished, there is internet, washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, stove with gas and bathtub, so you just can feel comfortable. The apartment is very well located with a large room and large kitchen, where you can drink a nice glass of wine or watch TV.
description: Dear Globetrotters, I'm going on vacation (15May-2June), so I want to rent my 1 Room Apartment, a nice sunny flat in the heart of Wedding, the neighborhood with sprawling creative spaces, beautiful parks, quirky characters and cheap drinks. The apartment is fully furnished, there is internet, washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, stove with gas and bathtub, so you just can feel comfortable. The apartment is very well located with a large room and large kitchen, where you can drink a nice glass of wine or watch TV. It is just 20 min away by subway from Tegel Airport if you come by plane and 20 min by bus from Berlin Central Station if you come by train. There are also free parking lots in front of the building. Unfortunately I will be on vacation during this period, but you will be delighted to discover Wedding neighborhood. I'll deliver you lots of tips and the "Exberliner" Magazine, Issue Welcome to Wedding from June 2015 to be inspired :) "It's been hailed as up-and-coming for t
neighborhood_overview: "It's been hailed as up-and-coming for the last decade, but will it ever arrive? Who cares? Wedding's unique Cold War history - a Western outpost surrounded by East Berlin  - helped the working-class immigrant neighborhood retain it's unique flair and social diversity. Wedding is proof that the mythical Berlin still exists." Exberliner Magazine, Issue Welcome to Wedding, June 2015.
notes: You are welcome to use the home as your own. Since I will be away I prefer nice people who would stay ideally the whole period I'm gone. So basically, the longer you stay the better chance you have to stay at my place ;)
transit: The house is situated on a side street, so you do not hear any of the major traffic.  The bus stop 120 is right on the street corner and U6 Seestrasse subway station is located 5 min away. Until Berlin Mitte you only have 10 minutes to travel by subway. Just around the corner there are many shopping opportunities, as Real (open Mo-Sat until 00:00), Edeka, Lidl and Turkish Super Markets. At the end of the road there is Schiller Park, where you can go for a run, and only 10 minutes walk there is Rehberge Park, which is like a small forest :)
access: It is just 20 min away by subway from Tegel Airport if you come by plane and 20 min by bus from Berlin Central Station if you come by train. There are also free parking lots in front of the building.
interaction: Unfortunately I will be on vacation during this period, but you will be delighted to discover Wedding neighborhood. I'll deliver you lots of tips and the "Exberliner" Magazine, Issue Welcome to Wedding from June 2015 to be inspired :)
house_rules: Keep it tidy and clean, as I don't rent the place to make money. I provide clean bed sheets, but please bring our own towels and shower gel&shampoo. As I don't have a balcony, smoking is allowed only in the kitchen.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Ana from Bucharest.
I'm a film editor who loves to travel

name: Beautifully furnished , light-flooded apartment
summary: You will enjoy an amazing bedroom and balcony view onto Berlins landmark, the Alex, in this light flooded apartment. The flat is located in a less busy street and therefore absolutely quiet. The tasteful furnishing creates a premium living experience and homy atmosphere. From here, you are well connected to many public trransport options and the next supermarket is just 5min away. You are in short walking distance to all the cute shops, cafés and restaurants of beautiful Prenzlauer Berg.
space: The apartment consists of the following rooms: •	one bedrooms with a 1,80m double bed and a small study corner •	Spacious and very bright living room with kitchen (with an additional sleeping couch for 2 people) •	Bathroom with a shower and toilet Other features include: •	high windows that let a lot of light in  •	Dining area and fully equipped kitchen •	Flat screen TV available •	Wifi available •	Balcony with a view on the Alex •	Parking is mostly easy in this street as it is not so crowded The apartment is in absolute prime location in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg: •	20 min tram ride to main station •	25 min bus to airport Berlin Tegel •	Bio Company supermarket around the corner •	5 min walk to M10 and M2 that brings you directly to Alexander Platz in 11 min  •	5 min walk to beautiful Friedrichshain Park for a run or picknick •	10 min walk to Kulturbrauerei for movie nights and concerts •	10 min walk to the beautiful Kollwitz market on saturdays Equipment you find in the kitchen: •	Cutler

name: New & Stylish in Friedrichshain
summary: Don’t miss this opportunity to discover the real Berlin while staying in a newly renovated, stylish apartment, designed to make you feel home! Only 5 minutes to the subway and 10 minutes from the city center!
space: Don’t miss this opportunity to discover the real Berlin while living in a newly renovated, stylish apartment, designed to make you feel home!  Live in a comfortable, renovated original Friedrichshain building from the 1900s with many details to discover.

Only 5 minutes to the subway and 10 minutes from the city center! Live in a comfortable, renovated original Friedrichshain building from the 1900s with many details to discover. ★ SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM ★ - King size bed  - Sofa, dining table  - Cozy balcony  - Flat panel Smart TV, Blu-ray, Wifi - English and German movies, books, travel guides, board and card games … and more! ★ COMFORTABLE KITCHEN ★ - Stove, toaster - Refrigerator - Dishwasher - Kettle, moka pot and French press ★ BATHROOM ★ - Shower - Hairdryer Located in one of the most vibrant neighborhoods – the Simon Dach Kiez – and only 10 minutes away from the pulse of the city center. Enjoy Berlin from this amazing location where even the local Be
neighborhood_overview: Located in one of the most vibrant neighborhoods – the Simon Dach Kiez – and only 10 minutes away from the pulse of the city center. Enjoy Berlin from this amazing location where even the local Berliners like to hang out! You couldn’t ask for a better opportunity to experience all that Berlin has to offer. Dozens of authentic restaurants, bars and the best clubs of the city are just around the corner, for example the world famous Berghain Club, Magnet Club, Yaam, Cassiopeia and the O2 World. It will be hard miss the likes of Berlin Wall, also known as the East Side Gallery, Boxhagener Platz, Volkspark Friedrichshain, Oberbaum Bridge and many more! Supermarkets, bike rentals, delicious bakeries and cozy coffee shops are just a few steps away.
notes: ECO FRIENDLY: Green electricity and intelligent heating control.
transit: Subway, trains, metro and bus stations are all within walking distance. 10 minutes to the city center such as Alexanderplatz, 25 minutes to Brandenburg Gate, Government District, Potsdamer Platz and more.
access: ★ SPACIOUS LIVING ROOM ★ - King size bed  - Sofa, dining table  - Cozy balcony  - Flat panel Smart TV, Blu-ray, Wifi - English and German movies, books, travel guides, board and card games … and more! ★ COMFORTABLE KITCHEN ★ - Stove, toaster - Refrigerator - Dishwasher - Kettle, moka pot and French press ★ BATHROOM ★ - Shower - Hairdryer
house_rules: Bitte respektiere die Nachbarn. Fühle dich wie zuhause, aber benimm dich auch so. NACH 22 UHR BITTE - Leise unterhalten - Musik nur in Zimmerlautstärke - Nicht mit Straßenschuhen auf dem Dielenfußboden laufen - Türen leise schließen - Bitte reduziert eure Aktivitäten auf ein Minimum, wenn ihr spät nachts zurückkommt. RAUCHEN IST NICHT ERLAUBT. KEINE HAUSTIERE, BITTE.
host_about:
Meine Frau Julia und ich sind in Brandenburg groß geworden und Anfang der 2000er-Jahre nach Berlin gezogen. 

Die Leidenschaft, Gastlichkeit und Hingabe, die wir während unserer Reisen durch die ganze Welt erfahren durften, haben uns inspiriert, selbst Gastgeber zu werden. Zuerst in Berlin, unserer neuen Heimat. Und als die Geburt unserer Kinder den Blick aufs Leben änderte, die Reisen in die Ferne weniger wurden, da lernten wir Brandenburg neu kennen.

Wir haben viel darüber gelernt, was Urlaub mit Kindern bedeutet und dass es oft die kleinen Dinge sind, die den Unterschied zwischen Urlaubsstress und echter Erholung ausmachen.

name: The quiet side of Kreuzberg
summary: Large 105sqm 2 bedroom apartment with study ideal for a family with 2/3 children. Spacious rooms and an open plan kitchen. There is a large balcony with floor to ceiling windows which overlooks a small park. The bathroom has a large shower, washing machine/dryer, there is a separate toilet too.  The bedrooms have doors, also the toilets which  both have child secure locks(can be opened from outside).
space: There's an open plan kitchen so it's great to be in the midst of things whilst cooking, this makes life a lot more sociable. The view from the sofa looks straight out through the large glass doored balcony onto the green park area next door.
description: Large 105sqm 2 bedroom apartment with study ideal for a family with 2/3 children. Spacious rooms and an open plan kitchen. There is a large balcony with floor to ceiling windows which overlooks a small park. The bathroom has a large shower, washing machine/dryer, there is a separate toilet too.  The bedrooms have doors, also the toilets which  both have child secure locks(can be opened from outside). There's an open plan kitchen so it's great to be in the midst of things whilst cooking, this makes life a lot more sociable. The view from the sofa looks straight out through the large glass doored balcony onto the green park area next door. Everything except the storage room. Very quite cobbled and tree lined street which is not so easy to access from either side with a car, thus little traffic. It has 4 really good restaurants, a bar and a vegan cafe! The U7 and the U8 are both within 10 minutes walking distance.

name: Cozy room in central Kreuzberg
summary: Bright, comfortable and fully furnitured room - right at Kottbusser Tor in Berlin Kreuzberg! 12m² room with private balcony in our maisonette flat, including 2 bathroom, 1 huge living room, spacious kitchen, garden and terrace.
description: Bright, comfortable and fully furnitured room - right at Kottbusser Tor in Berlin Kreuzberg! 12m² room with private balcony in our maisonette flat, including 2 bathroom, 1 huge living room, spacious kitchen, garden and terrace. Feel free to use our kitchen, shared living room and garden. Multiple cafés, restaurants, shops, Maybach Ufer with weekly Turkish markets and pretty much everything else you need is in 2min walking distance. Görlitzer Park you can reach by foot in 10min. Train station (U1 & U8) as well as bus and taxi stop are 1min from the apartment.

host_about:
Hello everyone.

I would describe myself as an open-minded, relaxed person. Always seeking new experiences and enjoying life. My taste in music is the typical Berlin electronic music combined with any type of trance, rock and a bit of pop. Also I like to eat healthy and stay fit. My coffee addiction is in my past, but I still love really good coffee more than anything.

For travelling I like to see as much as possible of the world. And while travelling I like to do all kinds of activities. For hosting in Berlin it depends on the time you visit, I might have not have a lot of time because of my work and studying, or I might have some more free time and maybe we can do things together, if you feel like it, let me know. ;)

name: Modern riverside apartment
summary: A very modern and confortable apartment full of sun light located in a quiet and green area of Friedrichshain neighbourhood, in front of the Spree river.  It is 20 minutes from Alexanderplatz (Mitte) by train and also well connected to other places of the city as Kreuzberg.  In the other side of the river is Treptower Park, that you can reach it by 5 minutes walking. Berlin Wall is 20 minutes by foot in a  straight line from the house.
space: It is an ideal place for couples.  The house has been design to make each space very useful. Is a ground floor apartment with a balcony that faces the river and a spacious garden with hammocks. Also a bike is available to make more confortable your stay.  The kitchen island includes all the necessary appliances such as an electric oven.  The dining room has a lot of light due to big windows and have a table for 6 people and a smart TV. The main double bed it is 115cm from the floor and it has a stair to get on it. The sofa (the grey coach that is shown in pictures) turns into a double 150cm width bed.

The sofa (the grey coach that is shown i
neighborhood_overview: The house is located on the peninsula of Alt-Stralau, a peaceful area full of nature. If you enjoy walking or running this is a great area for outdoor sports, there is a path around the peninsula just a few metres from the balcony. Also the huge Treptower Park is just in front of the apartment, making it a good place for pets. With the S-Bhan trains you'll be also very well connected with all the city attractions. Most of the main points can be reached by 20 or 30 minutes by public transport.  Entering the Friedrichshain east neighborhood there are many important techno nightclubs and a lot of bars and restaurantes because of the alternative culture of this zone, this is also 10 or 20 minutes by foot from the house. By bike you can move easily all around (we have one at home!) and you can park the car on Alt-Stralau street without problem.
transit: Train station of Treptower Park: 8 minutes walking Alexanderplatz: 20 min by S-Bahn Train Berlin Wall: 20 min walking, 10 min by S-Bahn Train  Bars & Clubs area: 15 min walking, 10 min by S-Bahn Train
access: Laundry and dryer in the basement of the building.
host_about: Im Matias, an internet entrepreneur living in Munich (Germany) father of 2 children and a huge fan of traveling!

name: Ruhiges CityApartment 6 for Two
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in unmittelbarer Nähe vom legendären Checkpoint Charlie, ansonsten in der Nähe vom Leipziger Platz LP12 Mall of Berlin, vom CinemaxX Berlin Potsdamer Platz, vom Brandenburger Tor Pariser Platz und Fernsehturm Alexanderplatz. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der zentralen Lage, der eigenen Küche und dem Zimmer mit den 2 komfortablen Betten - frei nach dem Motto "Klein aber fein". Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paare oder auch für zwei Einzelpersonen.
space: Das Zimmer ist, den anderen Gästezimmern und der Strasse abgewandt sowie mit seinem Ausblick in den grünen Innenhof, sehr ruhig. Der gemütliche Wohnraum ist übersichtlich und zweckmäßig ausgestattet. Er bietet alles was man für wenige Tage braucht. Er ist ausgestattet mit einem Doppelbett (2 Einzelbetten), einem Tisch mit 2 Polsterstühlen, mit einem Kleiderschrank, einer komplett ausgestatteten Küchenzeile, einem privaten Bad mit Dusche/WC und Haartrockner, 32" LED Kabel -TV und Internetzugang. Der Teppichboden unterstreicht das wohnliche Gefühl. Die große Fensterfront gewährleistet ein helles und angenehmes Raumklima sowie den Kontakt zur Außenwelt.

Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der zentralen Lage, der eigenen Küche und dem Zimmer mit den 2 komfortablen Betten - frei nach dem Motto "Klein aber fein". Der Teppichboden unte
neighborhood_overview: Das Apartment befindet sich in Top City Lage, welche ein absolutes Gäste- und Touristenmagnet darstellt. Du triffst hier viele Einheimische und noch mehr internationales Publikum. Der sich in unmittelbarer Nähe (3 Gehminuten) befindliche und legendäre "Checkpoint Charlie" mit seinem Museum und Souvenirshops steht bei allen Besuchern dabei im Focus. Auch sonst bietet die Gegend erlebnismäßig, kulturell und kulinarisch alles was das Herz begehrt. Dabei sei nur noch der 7 Gehminuten entfernte historische "Gendarmenmarkt" mit dem ehemaligen königlichen Schauspielhaus, dem deutschen und französischen Dom erwähnt. Der Gendarmenmarkt ist ein Platz in der historischen Mitte von Berlin und gilt gemeinhin als „schönster Platz Berlins“. Komm einfach her und laß Dich verführen.
notes: Bisher gab es keine regelmäßigen und nennenswerten Dinge, die Deinen Aufenthalt negativ beeinflussen könnten. Es könnte lediglich sein, dass Du auf dem gemeinsamen Flur andere nette Gäste triffst und ihr einen kleinen Erfahrungsaustausch machen könnt.
transit: Das Apartment befindet sich in der Krausenstraße, in unmittelbarer Nähe zur U-Bahnstation "Stadtmitte" der U-Bahnlinie U6. Der Übergang zur U-Bahnlinie U2 befindet sich nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt, in der Mohrenstraße. Auch eine unterirdische Verbindung ist gegeben. Eine Busverbindung der Linie 265 und eine "DEEZER Nextbike" Fahrradstation befinden sich direkt gegenüber dem Apartment. Es gibt keinen hauseigenen Parkplatz. Parken kann man im öffentlichen Straßenland oder in einem der umliegenden Parkhäuser. Das günstigste Parkhaus (Q205) befindet sich in der Taubenstrasse 14, am Gandarmen Markt mit 15,- €/Tag. In der Innenstadt ist das Parken überall gebührenpflichtig. Bei uns in der Parkzone 2 von Mo bis Sa von 9.00 bis 22.00 Uhr. Die Feier- und Sonntage sind gebührenfrei. Die Autovermietung "Hertz" befindet sich direkt an der Ecke Krausenstrasse/Friedrichstrasse (nichtmal 1 Minute entfernt). Stand Ende 2018 - Änderungen vorbehalten
access: Der Eingang zum Apartment befindet sich auf einem gemeinsamen Flur mit 3 weiteren Apartments.
interaction: Ich werde Dich/Euch persönlich empfangen und in alle nötigen und empfehlenswerten Dinge einweihen. Während des Aufenthalts werden wir uns nur bedingt über den Weg laufen. Sollten im Nachhinein noch Fragen sein, stehe ich entweder persönlich, telefonisch oder auch per E-Mail zur Verfügung.
house_rules: Die Berliner City Tax für Privatreisende wird separat berechnet, am geplanten Anreisetag fällig und vom Gastgeber in Bar gewünscht. Bei Küchennutzung ist der ursprüngliche Zustand wieder herzustellen (nicht Bestandteil der Endreinigungsgebühr) Eventuelle Beschädigungen, Verschmutzungen, Verluste u.a. Defekte, in oder an der Unterkunft, sind dem Vermieter unverzüglich zu melden. Bitte beachte bei Deiner Buchungsanfrage die reale Anzahl der Personen. Es gibt keine altersbedingten Einschränkungen im Preis/Nacht. Eine egebenenfalls benötigte Kinderausstattung ist gegen Aufpreis möglich.  Ruhezeit von 20.00 bis 08.00 Uhr Keine Gegenstände im Flur abstellen Offenes Feuer und Feuerwerkskörper verboten Der Vermieter behält sich bei Verdacht auf Mißachtung der Hausregeln die Überprüfung der Räumlichkeiten vor.
host_about:
Hey zusammen,

Ich freue mich zahlreiche tolle Gäste an diesem historischen und so kulturreichen Ort empfangen zu können.

name: Sunny/Spacious Room Near Alexanderplatz
summary: Sunny, minimalist and spacious room for rent on the monumental socialist boulevard, Karl Marx Allee in Friedrichshain. Located 7 mins walk from Alexanderplatz.
space: You will share the apartment with me and another friend. Apart from the bedroom you will rent, there are 2 other bedrooms in the apartment, a salon, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom. The kitchen has a stove, a microwave, an oven, a dishwasher and enough cutlery to feed a small army at a time.  The salon has a TV, a music system and a seating area. The bathroom has a bath-tub, a shower and a washing machine - which you are free to use as well.
description: Sunny, minimalist and spacious room for rent on the monumental socialist boulevard, Karl Marx Allee in Friedrichshain. Located 7 mins walk from Alexanderplatz. You will share the apartment with me and another friend. Apart from the bedroom you will rent, there are 2 other bedrooms in the apartment, a salon, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom. The kitchen has a stove, a microwave, an oven, a dishwasher and enough cutlery to feed a small army at a time.  The salon has a TV, a music system and a seating area. The bathroom has a bath-tub, a shower and a washing machine - which you are free to use as well. Both of us have been sharing an apartment for over a year and we are good friends. In this house, everything is available for your use. We only expect that a degree of mutual respect and hygiene be maintained in the common spaces. You will live with two well traveled guys who have been living in Berlin for over a year. We love meeting new people and exploring new cultures. We are not
neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain lies on the border of the much vaulted districts of Kreuzberg & Prenzlauerberg. Within walking distance is Volkspark Friedrichshain, the East Side Gallery, Alexanderplatz and many other tourist attractions.
notes: The apartment is in a residential building and some of our neighbors are pretty old. You are welcome to enter and exit the apartment at any time, but we request that you be considerate about loud noises post 11pm.  The bedroom has a single bed + an air-mattress, so this is essentially suitable for friends or couples, but not necessarily families.
transit: A subway station is right outside the apartment, by which you are at Alexanderplatz in 5 mins. From here, you can find connections to virtually all parts of the city.
access: Both of us have been sharing an apartment for over a year and we are good friends. In this house, everything is available for your use. We only expect that a degree of mutual respect and hygiene be maintained in the common spaces.
interaction: You will live with two well traveled guys who have been living in Berlin for over a year. We love meeting new people and exploring new cultures. We are not big fans of sight-seeing but can still offer you some insights about this lovely city. One of us will welcome you when you arrive and we are always available for some beer/wine and nice conversations.
host_about:
Twenty-something Indian dude trying to see the funny side of harboring a thirst for global travel on a third-world passport. I work for a major ad-tech company that pays the bills, and I write a travel blog in an attempt to satiate a strong major creative urge. I travel to meet people, explore cultures, taste local brews and dig into local libraries, hoping to discover the next WB Yeats. 

I'm always up for exchanging stories while we polish a six pack, and you can always lure me in with offers of discovering local music.

name: Spacious, Sunny 1-BD Friedrichshain
summary: Staying at this beautiful, spacious, bright and clean 1 bedroom will make you feel right at home in Berlin's fun neighborhood of Friedrichshain with tons of coffee shops, restaurants, bars and everything else you need right outside your door.
space: The apartment is located in the rear building of an authentic Berlin-style Altbau from the early 20th century. Facing a big open space, you will enjoy complete quietness although the hussle and bussle is right outside your door, once you step out onto the street. The apartment itself is on the fourth floor (pls note that there's no elevator). It is completely remodeled, featuring beautiful hardwood flooring, high ceilings, modern windows and central heating. In the apartment, you'll find anything you need - kitchen appliances, towels, linen, bedsheets, a washing machine, etc. The bedroom of the apartment features a double bed, comfortably fitting two people. There also is a 3-meter clothes rail which will provide you with enough space to comfortably store all your belongings. In the living room, you will find a big, ultra comfy couch that can be pulled out to accommodate two additional people. There also is a working station and a TV with Netflix access, which you are welcome to use.
description: Staying at this beautiful, spacious, bright and clean 1 bedroom will make you feel right at home in Berlin's fun neighborhood of Friedrichshain with tons of coffee shops, restaurants, bars and everything else you need right outside your door. The apartment is located in the rear building of an authentic Berlin-style Altbau from the early 20th century. Facing a big open space, you will enjoy complete quietness although the hussle and bussle is right outside your door, once you step out onto the street. The apartment itself is on the fourth floor (pls note that there's no elevator). It is completely remodeled, featuring beautiful hardwood flooring, high ceilings, modern windows and central heating. In the apartment, you'll find anything you need - kitchen appliances, towels, linen, bedsheets, a washing machine, etc. The bedroom of the apartment features a double bed, comfortably fitting two people. There also is a 3-meter clothes rail which will provide you with enough space to comfortab
neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is a popular, young and safe going-out area with one coffee shop and restaurant after another, lots of shopping opportunities and very well-connected transport wise.  It only takes you 8 minutes to get to Berlin's Alexanderplatz and about the same time to reach hip Kreuzberg with all its pubs.
transit: The closest underground stop is Frankfurter Tor (only a short 3 minute walk), but train and underground stop Warschauer Strasse are also really close-by. Right in front of your door, there's a cable car line and getting around really isn't an issue at all, you are located very centrally and will reach everything inside Berlin's center within less than 30 minutes. Please note that it is VERY difficult to find parking and that you will have to pay for parking in this neighborhood. If you can, try to avoid coming by car, as public transport or bikes will literally get you anywhere you want and often much faster so. ;)
access: You will have access to the entire apartment (kitchen, bathroom, bed room, living room).
house_rules: This is a strictly non-smoking and no-party house and there's no tolerance on that - violating those terms will cost you. Please be considerate of the neighbors and in general treat this house with as much care as you would treat your own.
host_location: New York, New York, United States

name: Quiet comfortable apartment close to  centre
summary: You live a little bit out of the huzzle of Berlin but close enough to get to every hotspot within 20 - 40 minutes by public transport or you can go by bike or scooter. There are nice neighbours and you can enjoy some cafes, pubs and restaurants around.
space: The property is about 4 km from the center (Kudamm or KaDeWe), quiet and safe. It´s in the garden house that means in Berlin it´s not directly at the street - there is a yard between. The environment has a lot of green. In front of the building a bus rides into town, the train station S Friedenau is 400 meters away. Super markets are nearby, shopping centres in Schlossstr. are only 15 minutes walk. The apartment is located on the ground floor and has a living room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Another room can be used as study room with a desk at the window and a nice view. The bedroom has a king-size bed, a folding sofa is in the living room. In the back you have a little garden on your own and when the weather is fine you have breakfast there or you can chill in a hammock, listening to the birds.... It´s really true Berlin is not always loud and busy. In winter you can use the logfire beside the central heating. But you have to pay extra for the wood. If I do not rent out, I myself

name: Beautiful Sunny Room in Kreuzberg
summary: Beautiful, quiet and sunny room in 70sq meter 2bedroom apartment located in the heart of the best neighborhood in Berlin Kreuzberg-  Graefekiez - lively, safe & central.
space: I am renting out large beautiful room in the heart of Graefekiez, between lovely districts Kreuzberg and Neukolln  You will share the house with me-  chill, easy-going, living in Berlin since 10 years and VERY IMPORTANT- A CAT. This really is only an option for cat-loving guests.  My apartment is a typical beloved Alt-Bau with high ceilings, wooden floors, spacious bathroom with bathtub, fully equipped kitchen, dish washer, washing machine with a dryer, Wi-Fi internet. Backyard guarantees a good night sleep, although Graefekiez (bar/caffee/restaurant area) or Weserstrasse (popular late-night bar street) are only step away.  Wonderful Lunch / Dinner Spot Le Bon literally on the doorstep!  Refined Wine Store across the street.  The bedroom has a queen size mattress, lovely vintage closet and a desk. Sheets and towels provided.

neighborhood_overview: Located on the border of Kreuzberg & Neukolln, The Graefekiez is simply the best area in Berlin- with plenty of restaurants & bars, nearby canal, beautiful Hasenheide park (you can walk through it to get to Tempelhof Park in the ex-airport) the neighborhood feels very safe and exciting at the same time.    Very central & well connected, but I doubt you would want to leave to other parts of town.
notes: THERE IS A CAT LIVING IN THE HOUSE! Please check for cat allergies.
transit: 3mins walking to Ubahn U8 Schonleinstr.  6mins walking to U7 & U8 Hermannplatz 2min walking to M41 bus stop Jahnstrasse 6mins walking to the canal 5mins walking to Neukolln 8mins train ride to Mitte
access: Wifi, Washing Machine, Dishwasher, Fully equipped kitchen with tea, coffee, spices & oils you can use
interaction: I can give you tips for the area and beyond.
house_rules: No Smoking in the apartment
host_about:
Hi there :) 

I made Berlin Kreuzberg my home 10 years ago and couldn't make it if it wasn't for regular wandering around the globe. Love music, cooking, coffee, pets, food and sports. What actually matters for you: Non smoker. Clean. Easy going. 

Thanks for reading!

name: Christmas in Berlin!
summary: Renting out my flat for a few days!Wunderschöne, vollständig eingerichtete 56m² Altbau-Wohnung mit Liebe zum Detail und schnuckeligem Garten.  Ruhige Lage, dennoch zentral gelegen mit sehr guter Anbindung( Tram vor der Tür, S-bahnstation 2 Min zu Fuß)
space: -Großes Wohnzimmer mit offener Küche und Essbereich -Separates Schlafzimmer -Tageslichtbad mit Dusche -in jedem Zimmer hohe, große Fenster mit Ausblick in den Garten Die Unterkunft bietet Platz für 2-4 Personen da sich zudem noch im Wohnzimmer ein ausziehbares Schlafsofa befindet. Direkt vor der Haustür gibt es zahlreiche Supermärkte,  einen großen Bioladen, Apotheken, Drogeriemärkte, Arztpraxen eine Tram und S-bahnsation. Die Wohnung befindet sich im Hinterhaus mit Blick in einen idyllischen Garten, somit sehr ruhig gelegen und dennoch Mitten in der Großstadt Berlin. Im Garten pflanze ich diverses Gemüse und Kräuter an, wenn Ihr so lieb seid würde ich es sehr schätzen wenn ihr diese ab und an gießen könntet. Natürlich dürft ihr Euch als Gegenleistung bedienen ;)

name: Quiet&Cozy 70sqm, 2 bedroom apartment near airport
summary: Quiet and cozy 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Berlin Rudow near airport Schönefeld with good access to downtown by metro (approx. 50min to all sightseeings). Fully equiped with your own bathroom and kitchen. With fast and free Wi-Fi. Tropical Island is by car only 1 hour away.
space: The apartment includes a living room, two double bedrooms, kitchen and a bathroom. One of the bedrooms is reached via a wooden staircase to the attic with a beautiful view over the detached houses. The solid couch in the living room is extensible, so that 4-6 people can sleep comfortably in the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped with basic kitchenware (fridge-freezer, coffee maker, water kettle, microwave, dishwasher including tablets, toaster, dishes, cutlery, pots, etc.). The bathroom with a shower and a large sink was just newly renovated. A washing machine is also available. The living room has a large TV (42 inches) and the internet connection is very fast, so that you can surf without any problems. The apartment also has a small balcony overlooking the countryside. Parking is right outside in the alley. There are always enough spaces available. The nearest metro station is 10 minutes to walk (U-Rudow). From here you come within 40 minutes to all the sights in downtown. To t
description: Quiet and cozy 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Berlin Rudow near airport Schönefeld with good access to downtown by metro (approx. 50min to all sightseeings). Fully equiped with your own bathroom and kitchen. With fast and free Wi-Fi. Tropical Island is by car only 1 hour away. The apartment includes a living room, two double bedrooms, kitchen and a bathroom. One of the bedrooms is reached via a wooden staircase to the attic with a beautiful view over the detached houses. The solid couch in the living room is extensible, so that 4-6 people can sleep comfortably in the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped with basic kitchenware (fridge-freezer, coffee maker, water kettle, microwave, dishwasher including tablets, toaster, dishes, cutlery, pots, etc.). The bathroom with a shower and a large sink was just newly renovated. A washing machine is also available. The living room has a large TV (42 inches) and the internet connection is very fast, so that you can surf without any problems.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in a very small and quiet street in the southeast of Berlin. Due to the proximity to the airport and the metro station U-Rudow (which goes trough the whole city) it is perfect for travellers who want to have a quite surrounding and no long way to all the great sights of Berlin. The science center Adlershof is very close as well, therefore the apartment is ideal for commuters, technicians and workers too, who prefer a short trip to work.  Despite proximity to the airport, there is no aircraft noise.
notes: There are no additional costs on site. The new prohibition in Berlin for holiday apartments does not apply to our offered apartment. We can offer this officially to vacationers therefore. In Germany it is strictly forbidden to download illegal content like music and movies from the internet, therefore don't do that because I have to forward the monetary penalty.
transit: Within 10 minutes to walk you reach the cute little centre of Berlin Rudow with its shops, ice cream parlors, supermarkets, restaurants and cafés. To park infront of the apartment in the little street is not a problem, there are plenty parking spaces.  To the nearest train station it is ten minutes to walk. From thereon you reach all the great sights of Berlin within 30-40min.  To the airport Schoenefeld (SXF) you need 20 minutes by public transport or 7 minutes by car (by taxi you pay around 13€). To the airport Tegel (TXL) you need about one hour by public transport and 35 minutes by taxi (around 45€ by taxi).
access: You get access via a pin code of the front door of the detached house. From there you go to the first floor and reach the apartment.
interaction: Since we live on the ground floor and our parents live just a few meters away, you have always somebody around to help out. And if it occurs that nobody is there I am easily accessible via my mobile phone. My phonenumber is saved within my profile as well, you’ll get access to the number after your booking.
house_rules: Wir freuen uns über Gäste die mit der Wohnung so umgehen wie Sie auch mit ihrer eigenen umgehen würden. Rauchen, Haustiere und Partys sind in der Wohnung nicht gestattet. Es dürfen keine illegalen Daten über das Internet geladen werden da dies in Deutschland streng verboten ist und mit Geldstrafen geahndet wird.
host_about:
Meine Frau und meine drei Söhne Lukas (7), Louis (4) und Philipp (1) sind das schönste der Welt für mich. Wir verbringen viel Zeit zusammen im Garten, grillen gerne und sammeln Würmer ;) Neue verrückte Leute kennenzulernen ist spannend und voller Geheimnisse - daher bin ich immer wieder neugierig wer uns besuchen kommt. 
Sonst spiele ich mein ganzes Leben schon Basketball und liebe es mich mit Freunden zu treffen.

name: Lovely bedroom full of plants in shared flat
summary: Nice room in centrally located and well connected area (Friedrichshain). Close to many popular clubs in Berlin — Berghain, suicide Circus, about blank. The room is in a shared flat with two lovely flat mates, I'm subletting my room while I am away in Portugal. Many restaurants, bars, shopping opportunities just minutes away by foot.
space: The room is big and spacious with a balcony. Shared flat with two really awesome people who are mostly busy with their own lives so will leave you be but always up for a nice chat in the roomy kitchen. The whole apartment is very spacious with a large 'hallway' / living room space you enter in through with a large kitchen which is more so used as the living room space and big bathroom with bathtub.
description: Nice room in centrally located and well connected area (Friedrichshain). Close to many popular clubs in Berlin — Berghain, suicide Circus, about blank. The room is in a shared flat with two lovely flat mates, I'm subletting my room while I am away in Portugal. Many restaurants, bars, shopping opportunities just minutes away by foot. The room is big and spacious with a balcony. Shared flat with two really awesome people who are mostly busy with their own lives so will leave you be but always up for a nice chat in the roomy kitchen. The whole apartment is very spacious with a large 'hallway' / living room space you enter in through with a large kitchen which is more so used as the living room space and big bathroom with bathtub. Access to the bedroom, and balcony (although a bit cold at the moment). The shared spaces: kitchen, bathroom, and living room are free to be used by guests. This is a shared living flat, so normal everyday living situation. Flat mates are around and would be happ
neighborhood_overview: Just minutes away by foot to Berlins infamous Berghain, and many other clubs including Suicide Circus, Urban Spree, etc. Also very close and well connected to About Blank, Tresor, Wilde Renate.  There are also so many nice restaurants and bars in the area, including one of Berlins best Döner Kebab at Mustafas.
notes: Sometimes there is smoking of a cigarette or so in the kitchen when having friends over. But it isn’t a place to smoke all day.  — This is a sublet in a normal everyday wg flat. Flat mates have combination of working at home and in office. Both are in the music business. Sometimes practicing mixing in the bedroom. Always welcome to say if it is too loud. A culture of respecting of needs and communication is all it takes.
transit: So easy to walk to any restaurants and bars or shopping for groceries or late night shops. To get around in the city I recommend to take the public transportation system that is very well connected! Trams, buses, U-Bahn (the underground system) and S-Bahn the railway system for the ring that goes around the main part of the city.
access: Access to the bedroom, and balcony (although a bit cold at the moment). The shared spaces: kitchen, bathroom, and living room are free to be used by guests.
interaction: This is a shared living flat, so normal everyday living situation. Flat mates are around and would be happy to answer questions where they can help. Don’t hesitate to ask! Of course privacy is also respected. What ever is most comfortable for the guest and house mates. Always there for open communication :)
house_rules: Clean up after yourself. Respect the house.
host_about:
I am a 27 year old graphic designer from San Francisco, living in Berlin. During the week I am freelancing in design, and on the weekends I'm adventuring in photography, or dancing the days and/or nights away at open airs/festivals/cubs.

I love traveling and have traveled a good amount throughout Europe and the US, as well as a few places in Asia, although a good portion of it was while I was much younger so I'd like to revisit a lot of those places, as well as explore all the places I have not yet seen. 

I've hosted many times before at my families house in San Francisco and have received many positive reviews. I'm very familiar with the dynamics of airbnb so you can expect a great experience  ;)

name: Appartment in Berlin-Kreuzkölln close to the canal
summary: Guarda il cielo di Berlino dalle grandi finestre! L´atmosfera Multikulti, il mercato settimanale lungo il vicino canale, il verde del Parco Hesenheide, i locali sulla Weserstrasse come quelli della non lontana Oranienstraße ti faranno sentire davvero nel cuore pulsante di Berlino.
space: Il mio luminoso e accogliente appartamento e´nel cuore della città! Posso ospitare comodamente una o due persone. La casa  è posizionata tra i quartieri di Kreuzberg e Neukoelln a sole poche fermate da Alexanderplatz. Si trova al quarto e ultimo piano di un edificio del 1929..non c'è l´ascensore.. un buon motivo per fare un po´di movimento! L´edificio e´stato rinnovato ma e´comunque un edificio in tipico stile berlinese!
description: Guarda il cielo di Berlino dalle grandi finestre! L´atmosfera Multikulti, il mercato settimanale lungo il vicino canale, il verde del Parco Hesenheide, i locali sulla Weserstrasse come quelli della non lontana Oranienstraße ti faranno sentire davvero nel cuore pulsante di Berlino. Il mio luminoso e accogliente appartamento e´nel cuore della città! Posso ospitare comodamente una o due persone. La casa  è posizionata tra i quartieri di Kreuzberg e Neukoelln a sole poche fermate da Alexanderplatz. Si trova al quarto e ultimo piano di un edificio del (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) non c'è l´ascensore.. un buon motivo per fare un po´di movimento! L´edificio e´stato rinnovato ma e´comunque un edificio in tipico stile berlinese! Dormirete nello spazioso living room dotato di un comodo divano letto matrimoniale. Lenzuoli coperte e asciugamani a disposizione. Avrete a disposizione la cucina, il bagno con la vasca e uno stand appendiabiti. Inoltre potrete usare la scrivania e Internet-wireless.
neighborhood_overview: Il quartiere viene chiamato anche Kreuzkölln. Si trova in una zona centralissima, c´e´gente in giro a tutte le ore quindi, specialmente nel wek-end non e´troppo silenziosa...we are in to the city! Troverete sotto casa il mercato rionale, supermercati ristoranti di vario genere, caffè, panifici, negozi street-ware e atelier di vario tipo, gallerie d'arte, e i mitici "spätkauf" aperti 24h. dove comprare bibite e altro. In 10 minuti a piedi arrivate sul Landwehrkanal, il canale navigabile che attraversa la città: potete passeggiare tra gli alberi lungo il canale, sedervi su una panchina o fermarvi a bere qualcosa sul Kottbusserbruecke da "Ankerklause". Hasenheide è il parco pubblico più vicino, che ospita anche un piccolo giardino zoologico con capre, asini, cavalli, pony e altri animali..
notes: A Neukoelln e Kreuzberg  ci hanno vissuto David Bowie, Iggy Pop, Quentin Tarantino.
transit: Metro: U8-U7  Bus: 171 , M (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: Dormirete nello spazioso living room dotato di un comodo divano letto matrimoniale. Lenzuoli coperte e asciugamani a disposizione. Avrete a disposizione la cucina, il bagno con la vasca e uno stand appendiabiti. Inoltre potrete usare la scrivania e Internet-wireless. Se volete lavare la vostra biancheria potete usare la mia lavatrice o un pratico Waschsalon (lavanderia a gettoni) a circa 300 m da casa. Se avete un ospite puo´dormire  pagando un extra.
interaction: Compatibilmente con i reciproci orari d´arrivo e partenza saremo felici di conoscere i nostri ospiti! In ogni caso ci sarà una persona fidata ad accogliervi e darvi le chiavi di casa. Inoltre vi lascero´delle indicazioni scritte. Abbiamo delle mappe e molti depliant interessanti a disposizione. Vi aspettiamo!
house_rules: Durante la vostra permanenza cercate di essere non rumorosi, i nostri vicini sono per la maggior parte persone giovani e gentili,ma amano la loro privacy e le persone non troppo rumorose. Quindi perfavore, siate discreti! Nel week-end siamo tutti più malleabili.. musica fino alle 23. Qui si ha l'abitudine di togliersi le scarpe appena si arriva in casa per non sporcare e sciupare il pavimento, siete pregati di farlo anche voi! Quando usate la cucina (a gas) assicuratevi di aver spento i fornelli. Raccolta differenziata dei rifiuti. Non fumare!  Purtroppo non possiamo ospitare animali.
host_about:
Fiorentina di siciliane origini vivo a Berlino da qualche anno... amo l'arte in tutte le sue sfaccettature, musica, la natura e le persone oneste e sincere! 
I'm from Florence but currently   in Berlin-Germany ..i love Art, Music, Nature and friendly and honestly people!

The flat has two bedrooms with double beds and a big living room and kitchen area to spend nice nights with friends or family. We also have a balcony to enjoy the view! Very close to public transports!  The flat is fully furnished, as we live here, there is even a popcorn machine! Registration number: 07/Z/RA/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

If you're coming from the airport Berlin Schönefeld: Take the S-Bahn S9 until Berlin-Schöneweide, then the S-Bahn S46 until Innsbruckerplatz. When you come out of the S-Bahn, cross the big street and our street (Innsbruckerstraße) is in front of you (look for the Deutsche Bank). If you're coming from the airport Berlin Tegel: Take the bus TXL form the airport to Beusselstraße, then take the S-Bahn S41 or S46 to Innsbruckerplatz. When you come out of the S-Bahn, cross the big street and our street (Innsbruckerstraße) is in front of you (look for the Deutsche Bank).

interaction: I will be available for all questions during your whole stay!
house_rules: 1.	Please do not smoke in the flat but only on the balcony 2.	Welcome to Germany! We have a strict garbage sorting system. Next to the fridge you see three boxes. The bin on top is for everything but paper, plastic and glass (if you want you can also separate the compost but if you don’t we won’t be mad). The second bin is for pa-per and cardboard (incl. milk/juice container). Glass is separate as well, we usually just let it next to the bins. You’ll find plastic bags for the bin next to the oven, first drawer. To put the garbage out: you’ll see a door next to the mailboxes that goes to the garden. There you will see all the big bins. Blue is for paper/cardboard, black is for the residual waste (every-thing but paper/plastic/glass), brown is for brown glass, green for green glass, yellow for plastics, “bio” for compost.  Do not forget the keys when you go in the garden! The door closes itself and you won’t be able to go back in if you don’t have the keys. We know it is a lot but one ge
host_about: We are happy travelers loving to share our experience of a city with others, come visit us in Berlin!

name: Berliner Vintage Altbau mit 2 Katzen
summary: Sei willkommen in meinem Zuhause, im 100 qm großen Berliner Vintage Altbau. Alle Zimmer sind für Dich zugänglich und frei nutzbar (Ausnahme: mein Schlafzimmer) . Und klar, du hast dein eigenes Schlafzimmer. Der Balkon ist ein willkommener Ort für Raucher und Sonnenanbeter. In der Küche stehen alle Lebensmittel und Gerätschaften zu deiner freien Verfügung. Koche und iss soviel, wie dein Magen es gern hat. Wenn du Gäste einlädst, bitte Lebensmittel nachkaufen.
space: Die Wohnung ist großzügig und hell, riecht gut und ist sehr gemütlich. Ich bin kaum zu Hause, sodass die Wohnung meist Dir allein zur Verfügung steht. Für mehr Besuch kann noch ein weiteres Zimmer genommen werden, für 20€ die Nacht für max. 2 Personen + einmalige Reinigungskosten in Höhe von 20€ .

neighborhood_overview: Vom Balkon aus siehst Du die Dächer der berühmten Arminius Markthalle- perfekt für kleinen oder großen Hunger. Öfters kannst Du spannende Veranstaltungen erwischen.  Es gibt drum herum viele knuffige Cafés, zahlreiche Spielplätze und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Fitness Studios, der Fluss Spree und noch viel mehr, z. B. Kochschule, die Verkostungen anbietet oder paar Bus-Haltestellen weiter ein AlternstivKino mit in- und out door Vorführungen...
notes: Die Wohnung befindet sich sehr Zentral und sehr gut erschlossen: nur 2 U-Bahn Stationen zum Zoo oder Ku'damm, 10 min zum Park Tiergarten und 5 min zur Spree. Es gibt zahlreiche Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und viele Altenativlokale für den neugierigen Geist.
transit: U9 in 5 Min. Fußweg, direkter Anschluss mit dem Bus TXL zum Flughafen  (12 Min. Fahrt) bzw. Hauptbahnhof (6 Min Fahrt), zahlreiche Busanbinden in div. Richtungen

name: Schönes Zimmer in Mitte
summary: Das Zimmer, was wir anbieten, liegt in unserer schönen Wohnung im Wedding. Es ist ca. 25 ² groß und ist sehr hell und freundlich eingerichtet. In dem Zimmer befindet sich ein Doppelbett, ein Sofa mit Tisch, ein Schrank und einen Schreibtisch. In nächster Nähe der Wohnung befinden sich vielfältige Möglichkeiten lecker zu essen, Bier und Wein zu genießen und sich wohlzufühlen. Schnell zu erreichen sind z.B. Friedrichstr., Zoologische Garten oder auch der Mauerpark.

name: Room almost in Berlin center
summary: One room very close to the city center with great public transport connection.   The furnishing is simple but functional: there is everything you would need in the room: 55" Smart TV with HDMI, double mattress (140x200) (comfy, easily fits two people), desk and chair for working on your laptop. 100 mbps Wi-Fi, very good quality, fast You will have only one flatmate (a nice guy from Ireland) The apartment is very calm and quiet, you will enjoy privacy in your room.
space: You will have only one flatmate. There is a washing machine, a microwave, 100mbps WiFi, 55" Smart TV  in your room (you can watch Netflix, сonnect your laptop via HDMI and play games). PLEASE NOTE that the apartment is old and unrenovated, the standards are pretty low and the furniture is old and not in the best shape. That's why it's so cheap.

host_about:
Hey, I'm Chris from Berlin
Traveling is my passion and my main activity in life. I love meeting people from different cultures and backgrounds. 
I also love learning languages, currently learning Spanish.

I prefer Airbnb to hotels because it's more flexible, often cheaper and more personal. Hotels are more or less all the same

name: ROOFTOPFLAT // Dachwohnung
summary: ROOFTOPFLAT / Dachterasse  80 m2/ 3Zimmer, 1Küche, 1Bad alles vorhanden (Handtücher, Bettwäsche, Fön, WLAN etc. Haushalt komplett) grosse Terrasse für Joga & Wein (alle Räume hell & gross geschnitten) 5 min. vom Bhf (6 min bis Mitte/Alex), viele Cafes und Kultur um die Ecke im lebendigen Wedding, welcher sich noch den natürlichen  - multikulturellen, alle Schichten vereinenden - entspannten Berliner Charme / Architektur bewahrt hat, Naturschutzgebiet mit Fluss 5-10 Fußmin.
space: Die zentrale Lage ermöglicht Wege in alle Bezirke der Stadt. Von der Mitte, z.B. Alexanderplatz o. Hackesche Höfe und Ku'damm sind es nur max. 10 min. mit der Bahn. Moabit, Friedrichshain, Pankow und Kreuzberg sind von hier auch super zu erreichen: direkter Tram, Bus und U & S Bahnanbindung (das ist einmalig). Auch mit dem Auto kommt man schnell überall hin. Hier gibt es tolle Cafes auch zum Frühstücken und Abendessen sowie tolle kulturelle Einrichtungen wie z.b. das Stadtbad Wedding etc. in der Nähe.  Die Panke läd zum spazieren und verweilen ein, auch Badelustige hat man dort schon angetroffen. Das Franzosenbecken um die Ecke ist sogar an ein Naturschutzgebiet angebunden. Zum Märkischen Viertel kommt man auch schnell. Gourmet-Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind 3 min. in Gehweite (Kaufland, Lidl, Norma) und decken jede Budgetverfügung ab.  Ansonsten gibt es noch den EATBERLIN-SHOP in den Hackeschen Höfen, da kann man dann Geschenke für Freunde und Familie mitbringen.  In der Strasse gibt ein

access: Option 1 Der Preis gilt für eine komplette Wohnungsübernahme für den gebuchten Zeitraum. Ich wäre dann für alle Fragen & Hilfe kontaktierbar, aber eben nicht in der Wohnung zu gegen. Für Couchsurfer gibt es die Option (allein) den hinteren Raum (mit mehr Privatsphäre zu besetzen = 1 couch stehen zur Verfügung, zusätzlich hätten noch Schlafsäcke Platz etc.)  oder den Wohnraum, welcher ein wenig mehr Durchgangscharakter, aber eben auch mehr Loftfeeling aufweist - zu buchen.  Beide Räume laufen in Blickrichtung zur Terrasse raus, wenn man sich am Verlauf der Sonne orientiert und sind sehr hell. Hinten kann man die Fenster gut verdunkeln, um dem eigenen Rhythmus treu zu bleiben.  Grosses abschliessbares Bad mit Badewanne und Duschvorhang, WC, Waschbecken, Handtüchern und allem anderen was man so braucht, befindet sich gegenüber der Küche die auch sehr gross daher kommt: mit hellen Fenstern und Sitzmöglichkeit und Tisch fürs Frühstück. name: Bright Business Apartment in Central Location
summary: With its south-facing and spacious bedroom, living room and balcony, the calm 65 m2 apartment is bright all day, has a fully equipped kitchen, a cozy balcony, and enough place for six to sleep. It is located very centrally at Leopoldplatz where you'll find lots of great and inexpensive places for food & drinks and will easily get to the city center.  Especially for business travelers, e.g. during fairs at ICC, it is the ideal place to stay due to the great connection to ICC and Tegel airport.
space: You will stay in a cozy 65 m2 apartment with high ceilings and beautiful floor boards which you can mainly find in Berlin (in a pre-WW2 residential building, in German “Altbau”).  The bedroom has a 140x200 bed and an additional 140x200 mattress. The living room is quite spacious and has a large table to eat or work. In addition to the sofa which can be converted to a comfortable bed, there is another mattress. Both the bedroom and living room have Sonos speakers which let you enjoy your music all over the apartment. Both rooms are south-facing and therefore very bright all day. In the evenings it’s quite nice to hang out on the balcony from where you can even see the TV tower.  You will have a very good internet connection (up to 100 MBit/s) and a TV with an Amazon TV Stick where you can watch Netflix with your account.

neighborhood_overview: Basically you can find anything you need near the apartment: many places to eat and drink, supermarkets, cafes and places to grab a coffee or have breakfast, drug stores, banks, public transport...  I can give you some tips once you’re here...
transit: Parking is free around the apartment and it is not difficult to find a near parking spot. As for public transport, the closest subway station is U Leopoldplatz (few minutes walk) where you can take the lines U6 and U9. You can also take several busses at Leopoldplatz.  A quick walk brings you to "S Wedding" from where you can take the S Bahn (S41/S42, “Ringbahn”).
access: Bedroom:  - 140x200 bed - 140x200 mattress Living room: - 140x200 sofabed - 100x200 mattress - large table with space for 6-8 people to sit - sofas to chill - TV with HDMI cable and Amazon TV Stick, e.g. for Netflix (can be used with your own account) - access to balcony with small table and chairs Kitchen: - Nespresso coffee machine - cooking stove - fridge and freezer - dish washer - washing machine - electric kettle - smoothie maker - full equipment of cutlery, dishes, coffee cups, wine glasses, etc. as well as everything for cooking (pans, pots, flipper, etc.) - feel free to use all spices, oils, etc. Bathroom: - standard shower - toiletries (shampoo is available) - hairdryer If you need any extra utensil or so, please text me and I will check whether I can make it available for you.
interaction: I am happy to help you and answer any questions while you're here. You can reach me best via phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) /text message or Airbnb message.
house_rules: - Please take off your shoes in the apartment. - Please close all windows when leaving the apartment (bathroom window can stay open)  - Please do not leave the apartment while the washing machine or dish washer is running - Please respect the neighbors and try not to be too loud at night - It is not allowed to visit illegal websites or stream illegal content while being in my WIFI network

This is a new building, everything is brand new, the house has 2 floors, 2.5 bath, huge kitchen, garden and your room is located on the second floor. space: 1 bright room in a very modern 4 room shared flat, with 2 floors (150 sqm total). 2 1/2 baths, 1 storage, cellar and a bike storage. The kitchen is large, open and modern with a calming view to our garden with a nice terrace. In the district there are 4 supermarkets ( EDEKA, Denn’s, Biomarkt, Aldi). The M4 is only 3mins walking distance from the house (Alexanderplatz is only 15 minutes away by train) and by foot the ringbahn is only 10 minutes away.

name: Storchennest  Cosy Apartment Neukölln/Kiehlufer
summary: A wonderful refuge in the big city buzz - quiet, sunny and so much home! Located in the colourful, quirky and alive district of Neukölln, this apartment will guarantee the perfect homebase.  Located at the Kielufer Canal (famous spot for a beer at sunset) you can easily reach the Götlitzer Park, Tempelhofer Feld, Maybachufermarkt and lots of sweet Cafes, Bars and the whole range from fancy Secondhand to exclusive Designers shops, all in walking distance. Feel free to come and enjoy!

It has a balcony attached to it that you're welcome to use of course - and please definitely use it whenever you feel like smoking.

There are plenty of little shops, galleries, coffee
neighborhood_overview: We live very close to the former airport field Tempelhof which is now just a huge park where you can skate, run, barbecue, kite- & windsurf or just have a picnic. There are plenty of little shops, galleries, coffee places and restaurants in walking distance:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  There is an organic supermarket right next to our apartment, and two regular supermarkets across the street. There is a market on Herrfurthplatz on Saturdays between 10am and 4pm. Neukölln is a multicultural part of Berlin with loads of young people who moved here within the past years. It's very vivid and there is always something nice happening outside.
transit: The U8 stop U-Leinestr. is a one minute walk away. The circletrain is one train stop or a 12 minute walk away.  Trains run all night on weekends, busses stop basically in front of the door on weeknights.

The south part of Friedrichshain is a good party location. There a couple of famous Electro-clubs around ("Wilde Renate" and "AboutBlank) and some nice Bars. Close to Ostkreuz you find many restaurants and Bars. There is one supermarkt right on the corner and a small cinema right down the street. Bus and Sbahn connections are also very good. The Bus direction Neukölln (15 min. to Hermannplatz) is on the parallel street. You can find Ringbahn (Treptowerpark) and trains to the city center in Ostkreuz.

name: Family friendly apartment in Berlin
summary: Berlin with kids? Then welcome in Schöneberg! Sightseeing is very close by (aprox. 15 minutes by train and bus) and parks and indoor swimmingpool for kids entertainment are just around the corner.
space: Hello! We live in an old typical Berlin style apartment in Berlin-Schöneberg. You'll enjoy wooden floors and high ceilings in an large family friendly apartment. Our apartment is located in the fourth floor so even in wintertime our place is sunny and warm. Supermarkets, bakeries, farmacies, restaurants, a park and an indoor swimming pool are in walking distance, so you absolutly wont need a car! Local trains and buses stop close by. Ten minutes by train to Potsdamer Platz and 15 minutes to Kurfürstendamm by Bus. We have beds in almost every room, so four up to six people fit in here easily. We also have a large dinner table for up to eight people. We dont have a large TV but W-Lan, lots of books, art and music. Wellcome to vivid Berlin-Schöneberg!

The very typical berlin-style neighborhood Akazienstraße is just a twelf minute walk away. Parks and playgrounds for kids are within walking distance.
notes: Leider haben wir keinen Fahrstuhl, der vierte Stock muss also zu Fuß erklommen werden.
transit: Bus and local trainstation are very close by. You can move around in Berlin easy with public Transportation. No car needed!

The flat is ideal for a couple or a family with one kid. There are two terraces so there is always an abundance of sunlight in the apartment.

name: Authentic Charming Space in Prenz'lBerg
space: This space is ideal for visitors to Berlin. The apartment is located in the absolutely hippest and very CENTRAL parts of town, Prenzlauer Berg and has a lot of the charm of former East Berlin.  The apartment consists of 2 large, sunlit rooms, a balcony, a spacious bathroom (with shower/ bath) and a mid-sized kitchen, with refrigerator, gas stove, and essentials you'd need to cook, microwave, or just sit and enjoy a hot cup of coffee or tea.  There is free wireless high-speed internet (WLAN), A large-screen TV and BlueRay player for home entertainment. You can also directly connect your telephone via headphone jack to the sound system.  The building is beautiful, historic and only a 3 MINUTE WALK FROM the train station Schönhauser Allee, where you'll find numerous Cafe's, bars, and restaurants, a shopping mall, a movie theater, as well as other cool places to shop or take part in cultural activities.  With the trains S41 and S42, you have quick transportation around the entire city of B

notes: Please note that this listing is for an entire flat insuring your privacy.  However there is one room not shown in the listing which is my space/office, and it remains locked while I'm away.
house_rules: Although I'm not super picky, there are some general guidelines to be met. 1. Enjoy your stay here and please let me know of anything I can do to make it better (don't be shy- I'm an easy going guy :) 2. Please refrain from wearing shoes in the apartment at all times.  3. Smoking is not permitted inside the apartment. You make smoke on the balcony, however, if you are sure to use an ash tray and not my plants :) 4. Clean up after yourselves regularly, especially after taking a shower/bath or using the kitchen. 5. Please ask me how the TV, Blue Ray, and Internet work before trying it alone. I will be happy to instruct you.  6. There is plenty of space in the refrigerator if you would like to buy groceries. Please only eat food you have purchased or brought with you. If you need certain spices, etcetera, feel free to ask.  7. Do not attempt to use the gas heaters or coal oven. They are off limits unless I turn them on or have instructed you on how to do so.  8. Please only eat in the kit
host_about:
Hey there Everyone! (Deutsche Übersetzung Unten:)

My name is Daniel, and I am an American artist living in Berlin. I have lived and worked professionally in Germany for 15 years. Before that, I studied in Texas and in New York City.

I travel a lot due to my job, but I always love coming back to this city! When I am abroad, I often find it best to stay at an apartment rather than in a hotel because I like the feeling of being in a home. And I am always glad to be able to get the inside scoop on the place I am visiting and not just a map pushed into my hand. 

I appreciate all kinds of music and am an avid theater and movie-goer. I also am interested in artistic happenings in and around the city I visit. I don't always get to see much due to work, but I always try. I am also in to good food! Yes, I love food, so any restaurant tips will be gladly followed! I also am a pretty good cook, and maybe I'll get a chance to cook for you at some point! 

I believe that respect and generosity are the most important factors for making the most out of AirBnB! I never impose myself on people who stay at my place, but am always glad to offer a piece of advice and answer any questions. Regarding cleanliness, I always run a tidy ship and consider it a crucial part of a good experience. Where I come from in Texas, hospitality is king! I've been known to show folks around town from time to time, too. 
I SPEAK GERMAN FLUENTLY AND SOME SPANISH ALSO, SO I'LL BE ABLE TO HELP YOU OUT in the event that you don't speak German or prefer to write in German.

When traveling, I like to take in as much as possible, time permitting, and also enjoy nights on the town. (Not as a wild party-animal!) :)

I'm looking forward to all the people I'll meet via AirBnB and to all the new experiences. 

Happy travels!
Daniel

DEUTSCH /GERMAN:

Hallo Allerseits!

Ich heiße Daniel und bin ein amerikanischer Künstler hier in Berlin. Ich wohne und arbeite in Deutschland insgesamt seit 16 Jahren. Ich habe in Texas und New York City mein Studium absolviert.

Ich reise viel wegen meines Jobs aber ich komme immer gerne zurück nach Berlin! Wenn im Ausland unterwegs, finde ich es immer besser in einer Wohnung zu leben statt in einem Hotel, denn es mir das Gefühl von Zuhause vermittelt. 

Ich liebe viele Arten von Musik, Theater, und gute Filme. Ich gehe auch gerne auf Vernissagen und andere "Happenings" und Festivals. Wegen meiner Arbeit habe ich nicht oft die Möglichkeit vieles zu erleben aber ich versuche es. Ich bin auch ein Fan von lecker Essen gehen und ein guter Koch (falls es mal dazu kommt )…

Respekt und Großzügigkeit sind für mich sehr wichtige Faktoren für eine positive Erlebnis bei AirBnB. Ich bin nicht aufdringlich und freue mich gute Tipps geben zu dürfen und bei Fragen zu helfen. In meiner Heimat Texas steht Gastfreundlichkeit ganz oben. Ich spreche Deutsch, Englisch und etwas Spanisch.

Ich freue mich auf die nette Begegnungen, die ich hier machen werde!

Gute Reise!
Daniel

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is just 200 meters from the infamous Kurfürstendamm (KuDamm) which is known as the center of West Berlin. Its prestigious location offers everything from shopping, restaurants, cafes and tourist attractions.  The subway ring stop Halensee is just a 3 minute walk away and gets you around the city quickly.  Neben dem Kurfürstendamm ist die Westfälische Straße, sowie die Wilmersdorfer Straße mit zahlreichen kleinen Einzelhandelsgeschäften und Gastronomiebetrieben die beliebteste Einkaufsstraße in der City West. Zentral gelegen und gut angebunden verlaufen durch den Ortsteil die Ringbahn mit den Linien S41, S42 und S46 mit den Bahnhöfen Halensee und Hohenzollerndamm. Die U-Bahnhöfe Wilmersdorfer Straße, Adenauerplatz und Fehrbelliner Platz der U-Bahn-Linie 7, sowie zahlreiche Buslinien befinden sich ebenfalls in unmittelbarer Nähe.
transit: The subway ring stop Halensee is just a 3 minute walk away and gets you around the city quickly.

name: BIG 3ROOMS City Center Apt. MITTE Alexanderplatz
summary: Diese Wohnung eignet sich für Familien. Meine gemütliche Wohnung liegt in Herzen des historischen Centers von Berlin Mitte. Direkt am Hackeschen Markt, die Wohnung ist hell und Licht durchflutet. In der Fußgänger Promenade direkt am Haus gibt es viele internationale Restaurants , Kaffees und Shops. Zur Spree und Bootanlegestelle sind es 100 Meter, zur Museumsinsel sind es 200 Meter. Es gibt ein grossen Balkon zur Promenade. Wenige Schritte zur S-Bahn Haltestelle „Hackescher Markt“
space: Die Wohnung ist hell und sehr freizügig mit viel Platz. Es gibt zwei ruhige Schlafzimmer und ein Wohnzimmer zur Promenade, wo sich auch der grosse Balkon befindet. Die offene Küche bietet viele Möglichkeiten zum Kochen . Es gibt ein Masterbad und Zusatz Gäste WC. Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet mit Ceran Herd, grossen Kühlschrank mit Tiefkühlfach, Waschmaschine, Microwelle, Wasserkocher, Kaffee Maschine und Toaster

name: Room in a cosy flat at Checkpoint Charlie
summary: I offer a room in my central and cosy flat at Checkpoint Charlie. Flat is on the 2nd floor (there is a lift) of a ''neubau'' building. It has a double bedroom, a bright living space with a comfy couch and a dining table, as well as a very small single bedroom (my room). Kitchen's fully equipped and there is a shower in the bathroom. WiFi, landline phone and tv included.
description: I offer a room in my central and cosy flat at Checkpoint Charlie. Flat is on the 2nd floor (there is a lift) of a ''neubau'' building. It has a double bedroom, a bright living space with a comfy couch and a dining table, as well as a very small single bedroom (my room). Kitchen's fully equipped and there is a shower in the bathroom. WiFi, landline phone and tv included. Checkpoint Charlie is an area very close to the city center (Stadtmitte) with a lot of museums (Berlin Wall Panorama, Jewish Museum, Berlinische Gallerie, Martin-Gropius-Bau, Topografies des Terrors etc.) and shopping opportunities (Friedrichstrasse, Potsadem Platz). Flat is situated at Check-Point Charlie, a few meters away from ''Kochstrasse / Checkpoint Charlie'' metro station so there is a perfect connection to many different areas in Berlin. M29 Bus is very frequent and takes you easily either to west Berlin or Kreuzberg.

name: Centrally located apartment near Kastanienallee
summary: Welcome to my centrally and very quiet studio apartment. Since I am currently traveling a lot, I rent my apartment in the heart of Berlin. My apartment offers business travellers and tourists a cozy retreat. Not only a cozy double bed, but also a balcony on sunny days, make the apartment something very special. The photos show it best, take a look!
space: The charmingly furnished studio apartment consists of a light-flooded living area and a beautiful balcony. Whether on a business trip or on a touristic tour, the apartment offers you a pleasant environment to feel right at home. The cozy living room not only has a large double bed, which is covered with fresh linens, but also comfortable seating to feel good. After a long, busy day, you can watch an exciting movie or read an interesting book. My apartment offers you a fully equipped kitchen that includes everything you need for a home-cooked meal. It also has a small cozy seating area where you can enjoy your home-cooked meal. The charming bathroom has a shower that invites you to linger. During your stay, you will be provided high-quality linen, towels and toiletries.

neighborhood_overview: Despite the central location, the apartment offers a unique and peaceful retreat. Just a few minutes from the apartment there is the flea market on Mauerpark, which opens its doors every Sunday. Around the apartment are a variety of restaurants, cafes and shops. The Kastanienallee, as well as the Oderberger Straße reached in just 2 minutes walk.
transit: The studio apartment is not only in a nice neighborhood, but is also very well connected to the transport network. In just a few minutes you can reach the U-Bahn station Bernauer Straße (U8) from which you can reach Alexanderplatz, Kreuzberg and Neukölln. From the stop Eberswalder Straße (U2), you come to Potsdamer Platz and the city center. By tram M10 from Wolliner Straße, you can reach the main station in just a few minutes.
access: During your stay, you'll have the whole apartment to yourself.
interaction: Since I will be traveling myself during your stay, my friends at Airgreets will take care of your booking and help you with any questions you might have. Feel free to reach out to them at any time via the messenger, they are happy to help :)
house_rules: - Most important is a respectful behavior towards the apartment and neighbors. Please treat my furniture and personal belongings with care and respect the neighbors by keeping noise levels low. I expect to find the apartment in the same state as handed over to you. Please respect the non-smoking policy inside the entire building. No guests, pets or parties allowed! Due to organizational reasons we can only give you one set of keys. German law on illegal downloads, streaming and file sharing activities is very strict, and also enforced very effectively. It is therefore forbidden to engage in any such activities using our internet connection during your stay. We will ask you to cover any legal costs that might arise, should you ignore this rule. Therefore, please use the Wifi carefully on legal sites only and do not stream! You will need to sign an internet agreement specifying the above mentioned information as well as a registration form upon arrival, which is required by German law.

name: Cozy room in the City Center (Berlin Mitte)
summary: Das Zimmer ist in einer 5er WG im Herzen Berlins. Wir sind alle sehr offen und jeder ist Willkommen. A home for everyone :) Die Wohnung liegt in Moabit, grenzt an Mitte. Es sind ca. 200 Meter bis zur Spree, im Erdgeschoss ein italienisches Restaurant und Cafés zum Frühstücken in unmittelbarer Nähe. Ein Spaziergang an der Spree bringt einen zum Brandenburger Tor, Reichstag und Siegessäule.  Zum Flughafen-Tegel sind es nur 10 Min mit dem Bus.
space: Ihr habt ein eigenes Zimmer und in der WG gibt es ein großes Badezimmer mit Dusche und Badewanne & zusätzlich gibt es noch eine Gästetoilette. Die große Küche kann von allen genutzt werden. An einem Zimmer befindet sich auch ein Balkon. Die Wohngegend ist sehr ruhig, perfekt für ruhigen Schlaf. Es gibt schöne Cafés, Bars und Restaurants. Die Spree befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe und ist an Sommerabenden Treffpunkt für junge Leute. Direkt vor dem Haus befindet sich ein schöner Platz mit Bänken, 2-3 Restaurants, ein Kiosk und eine super gute Eisdiele Eisbox :)  U- und S-Bahn befinden sich ca. 10 Gehminuten entfernt und bringen dich an alle Plätze in Berlin.  Der Tiergarten ist direkt in der Nähe, mit einem schönen Café am neuen See, wo man sich im Sommer auch Paddelbote ausleihen kann und danach im Biergarten den Tag ausklingen lassen kann. Sehr entspannt und idyllisch.  Wir leben alle ganz locker zusammen, arbeiten und studieren. Du kannst dich wie zu Hause fühlen, jeder ist willkom

neighborhood_overview: ruhig und familiär
transit: Man kommt innerhalb von 5 Minuten Fußweg zu zwei verschiedenen U-Bahnen, es fährt ein Bus direkt um die Ecke und eine S-Bahn, die dich schnell ans andere Ende der Stadt bringt ist ca. 10-15 Minuten Fußweg an der Spree entlang entfernt.
access: Ihr habt ein Schlafzimmer, ein großes Badezimmer und ein Gästebad mit Toilette. Die neue Küche mit großer Kochfläche und Sitzecke ist nutzbar und ihr könnt alles benutzen an Utensilien, was ihr braucht.
interaction: Ich werde während eures Aufenthalts nicht in der Stadt sein, da ich mein Zimmer nur manchmal vermiete wenn ich selbst im Urlaub bin :) Allerdings wird mindestens ein Mitbewohner zu der Zeit zu Hause sein und ich bin auch jederzeit per Telefon oder Mail erreichbar.
house_rules: - Geraucht werden kann auf dem Balkon, wenn Ivo (dem das Balkonzimmer gehört) nicht da ist :) - Check-In ab 9:00 Uhr morgens

name: Modernes, ruhiges 1 Zimmer-Apartment in Köpenick
summary: Modernes, ruhiges 1 Zimmer-Apartment mit guter Anbindung für Feriengäste und beruflich bedingten Aufenthalt in Berlin.
space: Sie mieten ein frisch renoviertes, helles, ruhiges 1 Zimmer-Apartment für 2 Personen in Berlin-Köpenick, nahe der Altstadt und dem Stadion des 1. FC Union Berlin. Die Wohnung umfasst ein großes Zimmer mit Wohn- und Schlafbereich, eine komplett ausgestattete Küche und ein Bad mit Badewanne.
description: Modernes, ruhiges 1 Zimmer-Apartment mit guter Anbindung für Feriengäste und beruflich bedingten Aufenthalt in Berlin. Sie mieten ein frisch renoviertes, helles, ruhiges 1 Zimmer-Apartment für 2 Personen in Berlin-Köpenick, nahe der Altstadt und dem Stadion des 1. FC Union Berlin. Die Wohnung umfasst ein großes Zimmer mit Wohn- und Schlafbereich, eine komplett ausgestattete Küche und ein Bad mit Badewanne. Ihnen steht die ganze Wohnung zur Verfügung. Der Kontakt ist jederzeit telefonisch möglich. Zur Anmietzeit sind die Gäste stets allein in dem Apartment. Die Schlüsselübergabe erfolgt persönlich. Erholung finden sie im nahe gelegenen Wald oder bei Spaziergängen an der Dahme entlang. Zum Dahme-Ufer sind es nur wenige Schritte. In unmittelbarer Nähe sind auch Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurants, Apotheken und eine Tankstelle. Das Stadion des 1. FC Union ist in nur 30 min Fußweg zu erreichen. Die Altstadt Köpenick, mit dem Hauptmann von Köpenick ist zu Fuß oder mit der Straßenbahn in unmi
neighborhood_overview: Erholung finden sie im nahe gelegenen Wald oder bei Spaziergängen an der Dahme entlang. Zum Dahme-Ufer sind es nur wenige Schritte. In unmittelbarer Nähe sind auch Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurants, Apotheken und eine Tankstelle. Das Stadion des 1. FC Union ist in nur 30 min Fußweg zu erreichen. Die Altstadt Köpenick, mit dem Hauptmann von Köpenick ist zu Fuß oder mit der Straßenbahn in unmittelbarer Nähe.
notes: Für die Endreinigung berechnen wir pauschal 35 €. Fragen Sie nach den Preisen, wenn Sie als einzelne Person das Apartment mieten möchten. Wir bieten Ihnen einen Parkplatz vor dem Haus für 3 € pro Tag an. Sie können gerne vor Ort entscheiden.
transit: Die Straßenbahnhaltestelle ist in 2 min zu Fuß zu erreichen und bringt sie bequem in die Altstadt, zum S-Bahnhof oder zum Stadion des 1. FC Union Berlin. Sie haben somit auch eine gute Anbindung in die Innenstadt. Oder sie nutzen den vorhandenen kostenpflichtigen privaten Parkplatz vor dem Haus für ihr Auto.

transit: Von beiden Flughäfen ist die Wohnung wunderbar mit der S-Bahn zu erreichen. Gebührenpflichtige Parkplätze sind vorhanden. (Innerhalb des S-Bahn Rings).  Zu Fuss kannst du den Friedrichshain erkunden. Zum Alexanderplatz bringt dich die S-Bahn  oder wahlweise U-Bahn. Die ganze Stadt ist von hier sehr gut zu erkunden und liegt Dir sozusagen zu Füßen. Man kann wunderbar in der Umgebung zu jeder Tageszeit essen gehen. Shoppen und Sightseeing, aber auch chillen in der Strandbar oder stöbern auf dem Flohmarkt - alles ist möglich. Welcome  to Berlin!

name: Balkonzimmer mit Fernsehturmblick - Stierbrunnen
summary: Ich vergebe mein liebevoll eingerichtetes 25qm Berliner Zimmer mit Balkon, in meiner Wohnung im Prenzlauer Berg – Das berühmte Bötzoviertel, noch wie zu Ostzeiten mit dem  Thälmann Park. Mein Zimmer mit Balkon ist möbliert und sehr sauber. Meinen Gästen biete ich die Nutzung von Bad & WohnKüche an.  Die Wohnung ist Zentral gelegen und man bracht 10 Minuten mit der Tram M-4  zum Alexanderplatz. Mit hohen Decken, ein schöner Ort um Berlin zu entdecken. Die Ringbahn ist 5 min von Zuhause entfernt.
space: Ein 25 qm großes Zimmer in meiner 150 qm großen 4 Zimmer WG Altbauwohnung im Prenzlauer Berg. Helles Zimmer mit 3,60 Meter hohen Wänden sowie Laminatboden und einem Doppel Sofa Bett mit Matratze & Balkon. Zur Ausstattung gehören: WLAN (kostenlos) Bettwäsche Handtücher Bügeleisen, Bügelbrett, Föhn Komplette Küche mit: Gasherd und Ofen, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine, Kühlschrank Wasserkocher, Töpfe, Pfannen, Geschirr, Besteck, Toaster, Mixer

Mein Zimmer mit Balkon ist möbliert und sehr sauber. Meinen Gästen biete ich die Nutzung von Bad & WohnKüche an.  Die Wohnung ist Zentral gelegen und man bracht 10 Minuten mit der Tram M-4  zum Alexanderplatz. Mit hohen Decken, ein schöner Ort um Berlin zu entdecken. Die Ringbahn ist 5 min von Zuhause entfernt. Ein 25 qm großes Zimmer in meiner 150 qm großen 4 Zimmer WG Altbauwohnung im Prenzlauer Berg.
