name: Cozy room in the heart of Neukölln!
summary: Hi Everyone! This is my cozy room in the heart of Neukölln.  You will share the flat with my two (Hidden by Airbnb) .Your right in between Hermannplatz and Rathaus Neukölln. If your up for adventures, Warschauer Straße is 10 minutes away by bike! There is everything you need around. Yoga, Cafés, Food, Bars etc.  My bed is big enough for two People!
space: There is a backyard garden which you can use, in case your lucky and the sun greets Berlin! Enjoy your coffee while listening to the birds in the backyard :-)
description: Hi Everyone! This is my cozy room in the heart of Neukölln.  You will share the flat with my two (Hidden by Airbnb) .Your right in between Hermannplatz and Rathaus Neukölln. If your up for adventures, Warschauer Straße is 10 minutes away by bike! There is everything you need around. Yoga, Cafés, Food, Bars etc.  My bed is big enough for two People! There is a backyard garden which you can use, in case your lucky and the sun greets Berlin! Enjoy your coffee while listening to the birds in the backyard :-) I will visit my father and be gone for the time you are here. You can reach me in case you have any questions! I'll give you my phone number and E-Mail address. For urgent questions you can ask my roomies. Neukölln is still as Berlin used to be!  Just enjoy this chill neighbourhood. Explore what's around! Parcs, Cafés... take a walk down Weserstraße and Sonnenallee! U Rathaus Neukölln is 5 minutes away , U Hermannplatz 10 minutes. Everything is easily reachable. Busses are around the c
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is still as Berlin used to be!  Just enjoy this chill neighbourhood. Explore what's around! Parcs, Cafés... take a walk down Weserstraße and Sonnenallee!
transit: U Rathaus Neukölln is 5 minutes away , U Hermannplatz 10 minutes. Everything is easily reachable. Busses are around the corner too. I highly recommend to explore the city by bike especially when its sunny!
interaction: I will visit my father and be gone for the time you are here. You can reach me in case you have any questions! I'll give you my phone number and E-Mail address. For urgent questions you can ask my roomies.
host_about:
Ich bin Berlinerin und nachdem ich ein Jahr in Wien gelebt habe, bin ich zurück um Psychologie zu studieren.
Ich bin viel unterwegs, fahre Fahrrad und mache Yoga. Manchmal bin ich auf reisen und kann mein gemütliches Zimmer vermieten :-) 
Ich gebe gerne Tipps für diese wilde Stadt!
Ich spreche deutsch,englisch und italienisch.

name: 2-Zimmerwohnung im Sprengelkiez
summary: Wir bieten Euch unsere 2-Zimmerwohnung im sehr schönen Sprengelkiez an. Die Wohnung liegt im Hinterhaus, 1. OG. Da die Fenster zum Seitenflügel zeigen, bekommt ihr trotzdem genug Sonne ab. Ihr bekämt 50 m2 voll möbliert mit TV, Internet, Bad, Waschmaschine. Im Wohnzimmer gibt es zusätzliche eine Schlafcouch für 2 Personen.  Die Wohnung liegt wunderbar zentral, perfekt für den Berlinurlaub. 1 Minute entfernt vom Spandauer Schifffahrt

name: Helles Zimmer mit Balkon im Sprengelkiez
summary: Das Zimmer ist Teil einer freundlichen und gepflegten Dreier-WG, ca. 19qm groß und verfügt über einen eigenen Balkon zum eher ruhigen Innenhof. Die Lage bietet eine gute Verkehrsanbindung sowie die Nähe zum Sprengelkiez und Plötzensee.
space: Die helle Wohnung ist geräumig und besticht durch ihre großzügige Wohnküche, die mit allem ausgestattet ist, was man sich nur wünschen kann. Das Zimmer selber ist ebenso hell, gemütlich und verfügt unter anderem über ein Doppelbett.

Die Mitbewohner, die allerdings tagsüber beruflich Haus sind, sind freundlich und helfen gerne mit Tips aus. Man kommt ebenso gerne mal in der Wohnküche zusammen wie man sich auch mal in sein Zimmer verkriecht. Die Wohnung liegt ideal zwischen der trubeligen Müller Str. und dem ruhigen Nordufer. Und auch der Sprengelkiez nebenan bietet einige Auswahl an Bars und Restaurants. Die S- und U-Bahn-Anbindung ist durch den Leopoldplatz und dem Bahnhof Wedding sehr gut. In ca. 10 Minuten ist man von dort aus in Mitte. Zudem gibt es k

transit: Die S- und U-Bahn-Anbindung ist durch den Leopoldplatz und dem Bahnhof Wedding sehr gut. In ca. 10 Minuten ist man von dort aus in Mitte. Zudem gibt es kostenlose, öffentliche Parkplätze vor dem Haus.
interaction: Die Mitbewohner, die allerdings tagsüber beruflich Haus sind, sind freundlich und helfen gerne mit Tips aus. Man kommt ebenso gerne mal in der Wohnküche zusammen wie man sich auch mal in sein Zimmer verkriecht.

name: Cozy, charming & bright studio in center of MITTE
summary: The apartment is very bright and peaceful with a view on a quiet and green backyard. You will find all the confort you need for your stay.  Located in one of the best streets of Berlin (and Mitte), you will be in the Art Galeries area, close (5 min walking) from Rosenthaler U-bhan or Oranienburgerstrasse S-bhan stations. In the area you will find lot's of nice restaurants and bars (if you need adresses, do not hesitate ^^) but also lots of green areas where it feels good to chill.

name: Design Hostel P182 Four Bed Room
summary: Our four bed-room has four comfortable beds that stand apart. There are fresh linens, a closet for Store of garments as well as an aesthetic table,  which can be used for work but also serves for storage.  The comfortable sofa also invites you to Relax.  In the shared bathroom on the floor, you will find Soap & shampoo.  Soft towels and an excellent hairdryer complete the facilities. In addition, each room is equipped with both sockets and Internet.
space: Design meets innovation culture EXPERIENCE THE FUTURE OF LIVING You had a long, busy meeting marathon? Relax extensively in one of our cozy rooms or exchange ideas with like-minded people over a drink at the bar. Stay as long as you want. We welcome you to our rent24 Family. ABOUT RENT24 Our selected locations take you worldwide into the creative and startup scene of the big cities.  With our coworking and coliving spaces we create the rent24 Campus, where you can shape the future and become part of the community of innovation drivers. LOCATION Located in the diverse Schöneberg district, this coliving space is one of the most sought after residential areas in Berlin. It is geographically situated between the trendy district of Kreuzberg and the elegant Wilmersdorf. The monumental building on one of the most famous streets in the city offers on 3,500 square meters high-quality equipped rooms and common areas in urban design. name: Bright Neukölln Apartment
summary: Situated on the border of the lively Neukölln and Kreuzberg districts, our light, cozy one bedroom Berlin apartment is perfectly placed. Comfortably sleeps 3 and is located on a quiet street. Plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars around the corner!
space: - Sixth floor, 60m2 apartment with elevator access - Perfect for a couple - Large, comfortable sofa bed means an extra person can stay in living room - One double bedroom with private balcony - Open plan kitchen living and dining room - Second balcony connects with living room - Bathroom including bath, shower, toilet and sink
description: Situated on the border of the lively Neukölln and Kreuzberg districts, our light, cozy one bedroom Berlin apartment is perfectly placed. Comfortably sleeps 3 and is located on a quiet street. Plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars around the corner! - Sixth floor, 60m2 apartment with elevator access - Perfect for a couple - Large, comfortable sofa bed means an extra person can stay in living room - One double bedroom with private balcony - Open plan kitchen living and dining room - Second balcony connects with living room - Bathroom including bath, shower, toilet and sink - WiFi included - Washing machine in kitchen and drying rack - Fan oven with 4 electric hobs - Kettle, toaster and stove-top coffee maker - Pots, pans, kitchen utensils and basic supplies (oil, rice, spices etc) - Bedroom cupboard and rack for hanging clothes We will be out of Berlin but our good friend will be on hand to give the keys and in case of emergencies. This area of Neukölln is great. Easily accessible by pub
neighborhood_overview: This area of Neukölln is great. Easily accessible by public transport and loads of nice places to eat and drink within a very short walk. Pannierstrasse and Weserstrasse are a nice place to start. There are a number of local shops to buy groceries as well as plenty of supermarkets (big and small) within walking distance. Kreuzberg is just a few minutes away - you can reach many of the more popular areas in 20 minutes by foot or travel 2 stops on the U8.
transit: 5 minutes walk from Hermannplatz U-Bahn Station. You can catch the U7 or U8 trains from here taking you to central Berlin in under 20 minutes. There are also several bus routes very close by.
access: - WiFi included - Washing machine in kitchen and drying rack - Fan oven with 4 electric hobs - Kettle, toaster and stove-top coffee maker - Pots, pans, kitchen utensils and basic supplies (oil, rice, spices etc) - Bedroom cupboard and rack for hanging clothes
interaction: We will be out of Berlin but our good friend will be on hand to give the keys and in case of emergencies.
house_rules: This is our personal apartment and ask that you treat it with respect. We have nice neighbours (some elderly) and would hate to upset them. This is a no smoking apartment - please use the balconies to smoke and dispose of cigarettes responsibly.

neighborhood_overview: Welcome Traveler. The Singer Hostel and  Apartment is located right in the center of Berlin. All major attractions are easily accessible and there are plenty of opportunities to have fun in the most trendy suburbs of Berlin - Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg (East Side Gallery, Bars, Clubs, Mercedes Benz Arena, subculture), Prenzlauer Berg (coffee shops, restaurants, shopping streets) and Mitte (tourist attractions).
notes: Since 01.01.2014 the city of Berlin had to adopt the so-called city tax of 5%. This is to be paid when you arrive! In addition, 2.00 EUR. per person is also to be paid as a  deposit on the key card. neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in Berlin-Kreuzberg in the popular Bergmannkiez. It offers a lot of cozy places to have breakfast, drinks, dinner or whatever your heart might be craving for. You stumble directly out of the house and into Berlin's day-to-day life. As Kreuzberg is quite in the center of Berlin you can reach all places you want to visite easily and fast.
transit: You have several subways going here (u7- 1minute maximum), u6 (5-10 minutes) and u1 (10 minutes) that bring you all around Berlin. Plus, there are also a lot of Buses going to different directions. But I would really recommend you to take the bike (you can rent them everywhere) because it usually takes exact the same time as the subway does and you have the advantage of getting a more extensive picture of Berlin.

neighborhood_overview: Welcome to our classical Berlin top floor apartment. It is situated in the heart of Berlin in the district Wedding/Mitte.  The area reminds of the infamous Kreuzberg district during the 80´s.  Besides the Turkish grocery stores, shisha bars and Döner stores, a variety of artist, students and little shops have found their place here. It is a quintessential part of Berlin with its working class people and multicultural flavour.  It will offer a variety of culinary selections and the neighbourhood has everything needed for a comfortable stay.
transit: The subway line U9 is only a 10 minute walk away and gets you quickly to many of the most popular spots in town. The tram also stops about a 7 minute walk away and will take you straight in 5 minutes to the popular Prenzlauer Berg district.
interaction: Guests rent the entire apartment, but we are available for questions.

space: Our 120m2 rooftop maisonette on the fourth and fifth floor is located in Neukölln, in a very nice and vibrant district called Schillerkiez. Here you will find the coexistence of Germans and Internationals, smoky corner pubs and very good restaurants and cocktail bars. The flat is located near the amazing old Tempelhof airport where you can do sports, BBQ or just relax. We love it to live here! Our very modern and cosy flat is 120 qm, here you will find: - 1 large and bright living room with big windows on both sides and with access to a large rooftop terrace with barbecue grill. In the living room you will find a huge tv, hi-fi equipment & DVD Player and two comfortable leather couches.  - 1 large bed room with a very comfortable double bed, two huges clothes cupboards, a leather couch and a dressing table - Our big kitchen is well equipped with dishes, glasses, a very good coffee maschine, dishwasher, juicer, smoothie mixer, radio and so on - 1 bad with bath tub, shower, 2 washbowls a

neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood ..... My neighborhood is a jumble of people passing at all hours: on the morning that begins the day together with who returns home, recreational parks for children and leisure for adults. Just a few meters from the house is East Side Gallery, a tourist area, and Alexander Platz is just a few metro stops away. There are many second hand shops and many first-hand clothing stores, comics and bookstores, cafes with incredible cakes, icecream- shops, varied restaurants with diversity of prices and flavours, organic stores, organic bakery, supermarkets ... everything, everything just a few steps from this fantastic house. Terribly comfortable and adorable. In plus:  metro stop is a few meters away and very well connected with other neighborhoods

host_about: Migrante residiendo en Berlín. La hospitalidad es una cualidad que aprecio y que cultivo. Me gusta el trato humano, amable y sincero. Para mí, recibir personas en mi casa es un placer. Me alegro si se encuentran a gusto, llegando una casa que será suya, limpia,con un baño desinfectado y sábanas perfumadas en su cama, con algo de comer en la nevera (o incluso recién cocinado).  Así es como me gusta ser recibida, y lo que me gusta dar. Antes de cualquier queja o disgusto, comunicar es una gran herramienta, ya que así resolvemos lo que sea necesario. La independencia basada en el respeto, es otro de mis fuertes. Trata como quisieras ser tratada, esa es la brújula que me guía el camino. Abrazos y bienvenidas :)

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the popular and vibrant neighborhood „Kreuzkölln“. This area has in the in last years blossomed, the atmosphere in the streets is cozy and friendly. The area is full of restaurants, galleries, bars, design shops, book stores, cinemas etc. There are many super markets in the area.
notes: Please read the house rules! You need your identity card or passport for the check in and you acknowledge with your signature that you will respect the house rules and that you will pay for any damage (including loss of apartment key) caused by you in the apartment.
transit: The closest metro station is Hermannplatz (2 min walk) where the U8 and U7 will take you quickly to other neighborhoods like Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. The bus M29 and M41 are just 4 min from the house and will take you directly to the Jewish Museum, Potsdamer Platz, Sony Center, Hauptbahnof, the New National Gallery etc.
access: The apartment is one of 9 apartments in our house. Please note that you will stay here in the middle of an ordinary berlin apartment house with normal people living next door. Please no parties in my apartment or additional friends allowed over.
interaction: Please take the time and read the description carefully and check whether the apartment suits your needs to avoid disappointment. We do our best to describe the apartment at best and we add many photos and an apartment plan. If you are not sure I am happy to answer all your questions prior to your booking.
house_rules: Most important things you should know:  - max. Guests: 6 ! (Children under 12 cannot be accommodated at this flat)  - Check-in: from 3pm to 9pm  - Late Check-in: after 9pm = 30 Euro extra / after 11pm = 50 Euro extra (This is not included in the booking price and is an additional cost!) - Check-out: until 10am  - Check-in before 15:00 and check-out after 10:00 as well as luggage storage is unfortunately not possible. The apartment must vacated by you by 10:00 on the day of departure. - Bed linen and towels (2 per person) are included  - Inside the building including on the terrace is strictly NO SMOKING. If you smoke you will be charged up to €200 and is a cause for an immediately termination of the rental contract. - Partying is not allowed in the apartment and is a cause for an immediately termination of the rental contract. - The apartment may only be used by the named guests. The usage by a third party or any other additional occupancy is not permitted. Check-in Please send me all
host_about:
I am an Australian Berliner! I have been living in Berlin for almost 20 years + having studied Architecture in Perth W.A took to the great apartments Berlin has to offer.

I have great people working for me, I have a 'thing' about good beds so if you want a good comfy bed on your travels I have only great ones!

I have a complete house full of apartments and hence have people to help me have everything run smoothly. I don't live in the apartments myself. I have renovated them all thou and they are my personal property. 
My apartments are of a hotel style with empty wardrobes etc. and no cosmetic collections filling the bathrooms. We have white hotel linen and towels freshly delivered and professional cleaning :)
I design my places all with you in mind. Travellers away from home wanting clean, comfortable, private bedrooms together with gorgeous big spaces to be together, eat, cook, chill on the couch.

name: Lichtdurchflutetes 24m2 Zimmer in gepflegter WG
summary: Privates Schlafzimmer in einer 3-er WG in Lichtenberg, Berlin. Exzellenter Anschluss an öffentliche Verkehrsmittel und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sowie Zugang zu einem großen Garten und Natur in der Umgebung.
space: Das Zimmer ist lichtdurchflutet; Pflanzen, Beleuchtung und Einrichtung sorgen für eine entspannte Atmosphäre.  Das Bett ist 180x200 cm groß und es gibt eine weitere Doppelmatratze die unter dem Bett verstaut ist. Haustiere sind nicht nur erlaubt sondern herzlich Willkommen und können sich auch in dem großen Garten austoben (mit Feuerstelle, Beleuchtung und einem Kühlschrank für Zusammenkünfte der ein oder anderen Art). Das Schlafzimmer ist privat (und abschließbar), der Rest der Wohnung (Bad und Küche) wird mit meinem Mitbewohnern (26 und 30 Jahre alt) geteilt (beide Vollzeit berufstätig und somit nur am Abend Zuhause). Es wird viel Wert auf einen rücksichtsvollen Umgang und Ordentlichkeit gelegt. Die gesamte Einrichtung der Wohnung kann genutzt werden, d.h. Wifi, Waschmaschine, Föhn, Bügeleisen etc.

neighborhood_overview: Lichtenberg ist ein eher ruhiges Eckchen in Berlin, trotzdem gibt es Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (siehe unten), Spätis, Cafés und Bars in unmittelbarer Nähe.
transit: Zu Fuß sind es 3-5 Minuten zur S-und U-bahnhaltestelle Lichtenberg (2 Stationen von der Ringbahn entfernt) Anbindung:  Alexanderplatz (direkt, U5): 15 Minuten Hauptbahnhof (direkt, S5/S7): 20 Minuten Warschauerstraße (direkt, S5/S7): 10 Minuten Es gibt verschiedene Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Aldi, Penny, Rewe, Edeka) in nächster Nähe (5-15 Minuten zu Fuß).  Wenn man Lust hat ein bisschen aus der Stadt raus zukommen gelangt man in 20-30 Minuten Fußweg in den Wald (wunderbar zum Joggen geeignet).
access: Privates Schlafzimmer, gemeinsame Küche und Bad + Garten der mit Nachbarn geteilt wird
interaction: Ich selbst werde nicht in Berlin, telefonisch jedoch immer erreichbar sein und bei Fragen selbstverständlich zur Verfügung stehen.

name: Bright spacious room in Neukölln Altbau
summary: Bright, sunny 25sq/m altbau room in a 140sq/m apartment, right in the heart of Neukölln (Flughafenstraße/Rathaus Neukölln). We have huge shared spaces for you to relax in, feel at home in our large living room and kitchen. There are lots of excellent bars & restaurants in this neighbourhood, 10mins away from all of the nightlife on Weserstraße and only 10-15mins from the open vistas of Tempelhof park. All bedding and towels provided.
space: The space is very homely and presented with your comfort in mind. The apartment is decorated with a lovely collection of Danish mid century furniture,
description: Bright, sunny 25sq/m altbau room in a 140sq/m apartment, right in the heart of Neukölln (Flughafenstraße/Rathaus Neukölln). We have huge shared spaces for you to relax in, feel at home in our large living room and kitchen. There are lots of excellent bars & restaurants in this neighbourhood, 10mins away from all of the nightlife on Weserstraße and only 10-15mins from the open vistas of Tempelhof park. All bedding and towels provided. The space is very homely and presented with your comfort in mind. The apartment is decorated with a lovely collection of Danish mid century furniture, You will have your own room to yourself, and shared use of the living room, kitchen and bathroom. There are 3 roommates which live in this apartment, but due to it's large size, you will have plenty of space to yourself. Come and go as you please, and if you need any advice on the surrounding areas, feel free to ask, we are more than happy to help! The neighbourhood is a bustling hotbed of creativity, nightl
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a bustling hotbed of creativity, nightlife and cultures from around the globe. Neukölln is one of Berlin's brightest stars in terms of up and coming bars, cafes and restaurants, but without the price tags of Berlin's older or more well established areas. Just a short walk away is Tempelhof, a former WWII inner city airport which has been converted into a  public park for recreation and leisure. It's a reinterpreted space incomparable to anything, and one very special aspect of this neighbourhood.  The surrounding Schillerkiez has become home to a lot of new creative and culinary ventures, it's a great place to find dinner and enjoy the summertime hours.
notes: Since there are 3 other people living and working full time in the apartment, we make the best effort to keep things clean and tidy, but it's not a hotel with daily cleaners, and therefore will show signs of being lived in. This is part of the charm of shared living, so bear that in mind before your stay.
transit: We are fortunately very well connected transport-wise, with closest Ubahn station U7 Rathaus Neukölln, visible from the front door, and 5 mins walk up the street is U8 Boddinstraße.
access: You will have your own room to yourself, and shared use of the living room, kitchen and bathroom.
interaction: There are 3 roommates which live in this apartment, but due to it's large size, you will have plenty of space to yourself. Come and go as you please, and if you need any advice on the surrounding areas, feel free to ask, we are more than happy to help!
house_rules: - Shut the apartment door properly when leaving (it requires slamming or using the key to move the lock while closing). Don't worry about the noise, it's just the way it is :) Lock the door with a key when you're the last one out of the house. - ABSOLUTELY NO TORRENTING or downloading music/films while staying. Germany has very strict anti-piracy laws and is very active about penalising this, I know several people who did this by mistake and were hit with €1000+ fines. - Please take your shoes off at the door - Non additional guests - No smoking inside  -Since it's a shared house, all the normal considerations apply, such as tidying up after using the kitchen  -No loud music in the evenings, and keep volume down if arriving home after midnight. - Just common courtesy and politeness with other housemates is appreciated.
host_about: New Zealander graphic designer living in Berlin Germany, wanting to see more of Europe.

name: Grüne Oase im pulsierenden Berlin - Dreibettzimmer
summary: Mitten im trendigen Prenzlauer Berg gelegen, ein aufgeschlossenes Team, ein familiäres Ambiente und ein ruhiger, grüner Innenhof. Hier können Sie das turbulente Berlin und den hektischen Alltag bei einem typisch berlinerischen Getränk hinter sich lassen. Stimmig und gemütlich eingerichtete Zimmer mit schallisolierten Fenstern sorgen für einen erholsamen Schlaf.
space: Der Aufenthalt ist ohne Frühstück. Frühstück kann gerne vor Ort hinzugebucht werden.
description: Mitten im trendigen Prenzlauer Berg gelegen, ein aufgeschlossenes Team, ein familiäres Ambiente und ein ruhiger, grüner Innenhof. Hier können Sie das turbulente Berlin und den hektischen Alltag bei einem typisch berlinerischen Getränk hinter sich lassen. Stimmig und gemütlich eingerichtete Zimmer mit schallisolierten Fenstern sorgen für einen erholsamen Schlaf. Der Aufenthalt ist ohne Frühstück. Frühstück kann gerne vor Ort hinzugebucht werden. Von hier sind sowohl der Alexanderplatz, die Bernauer Straße als auch die Museumsinsel fußläufig erreichbar. Straßenbahn und U-Bahn sind unmittelbar ums Eck und machen Sie in Berlin mobil, sodass auch alle anderen Stadtteile in kurzer Zeit erreichbar sind. Direkt um das Hotel finden Sie zahlreiche ausgezeichnete Restaurants und charmante Cafés, die zum Verweilen einladen. Straßenbahn und U-Bahn sind unmittelbar ums Eck und machen Sie in Berlin mobil, sodass auch alle anderen Stadtteile in kurzer Zeit erreichbar sind.

name: Krollis Zimmer
summary: Die Wohnung ist ein Altbau im Erdgeschoß. Die Einrichtung ist einfach, aber gemütlich. In nur 3 Minuten sind die S-Bahnen S41, S42, S8 und S85, sowie die Tram M4 zu erreichen. Man ist in 10 Min am Alexanderplatz, Schönhauser Allee, Ostkreuz.  Diverse Einkaufsmärkte sind in unmittelbarer Nähe: EDEKA, Aldi, DM.

name: Idyllisches Haus mitten in Berlin
summary: Unser Apartmenthaus bietet mitten in Berlin eine der letzten grünen Idyllen der Stadt.  Das Haus mit kompletter Ausstattung von Badewanne über die private Terrasse bis zum Grill liegt auf einem großen eingezäunten Grundstück mit viel Grün und noch mehr Platz. Die nächste Bahn erreicht man in zwei Minuten und ohne Umsteigen zu müssen kann man am Fernsehturm aussteigen. Die unmittelbare Umgebung ist geprägt von authentischen Berliner Kiezbewohnern. Genieß die Nähe zum Zentrum im Kiez.

host_about:
Hi, ich bin Jan. Ich arbeite in der Medizin und bin beruflich ziemlich oft unterwegs, daher weiß ich wie schön es sein kann gut zu wohnen.
Ich selbst liebe laufen über alles, aber ohne Theater, Ballett und kochen wäre das Leben wirklich nicht schön...also wenn du Tipps brauchst...frag mich :-) 
Berlin hat wirklich wundervolle Möglichkeiten.

name: Spacious, sunny, charming, private room
summary: Stylish, spacious, and clean Neukölln apartment, full of character. Perfect space for guests wanting a comfortable and well-located base to explore this vibrant city. Charming wooden floors, modern bathroom and full kitchen facilities. Available space is a large divided living area/bedroom with queen bed, sofa bed and air mattresses available on request. The room is lockable, privacy guaranteed, with your own balcony! This is our home, not an austere IKEA showroom. We love it, hope u do too
space: Newly renovated, spacious and light filled Neukölln apartment. The large room available for rent can easily accommodate 4 people, with one half of the room divided and used as a bedroom, equipped with a queen-size bed, and the other half is the living space with a fold-out sofa available if needed. Perfect for vistors who want a comfortable and well-located space, in the heart of a bustling and diverse neighbourhood, from which to explore the city. Full kitchen facilities if you want to cook. Huge windows fill the apartment with sun and the well preserved cherry wooden floorboards maintain the charm of the old building. A modern bathroom with marble floors, new basin, shower and toilet. Washing machine is available for your use. The open plan living area has ample table space for 6 or more, leading to a balcony, perfect for a morning coffee. Everything you might need is right in the neighbourhood; a 23 hour späti / off licence, supermarket, great take-out, bars, playgrounds, restaurant

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is close to many facilities: bars, restaurants, supermarkets, playgrounds, 23-hour off-licence, bakery, pharmacies et cetera.
notes: This is a lived-in home. Please don't expect a hotel with brand new furnishings etc. Everything is clean and well-decorated, we promise! It is also located on a busy street and can be noisy, especially if you are not used to city living. We can provide earplugs on request.
transit: Public transport is excellent in Berlin, the bus stops right outside the apartment, the u-bahn (metro) is one block away (we'll leave you a map). Parking is free on the street just outside. If you're coming from Schonefeld Airport the place is directly on the 171 bus route (Geygerstrasse stop).
interaction: We will make ourselves scarce or available as you wish. After letting you in, we are always contactable by phone or email.
house_rules: Shoes off indoors and smoking only on the balcony please.
host_about: Hi, I'm Daniela. I was born in New Zealand but I am half Italian and since 2013 I live in Berlin. I love travel, books,  music and cooking.

name: modern loft apartment Berlin Rummelsburger Bucht
summary: Our 97 sqm loft has a small cosy garden with terrace, which invites you to relax and can be used by you. The entire equipment in our accommodation is high quality and combines the charm of modern and individually designed pieces of furniture with each other. The loft is open plan, with a large window front and 5 metre high ceilings.
space: On the ground floor is a fully equipped kitchen with a  dishwasher, induction cooker, kitchen table, living area and the bathroom with shower, rain shower & bathtub. At the generous living area is a spatially offset sleeping area for one person. Furthermore, the loft is equipped with a fireplace, which we do not make available for use for safety reasons. In the upper floor is the bedroom with a double bed and a great view into the garden. The loft is located in a quiet area in the Rummelsburger Bucht, near Ostkreuz. Our accommodation is suitable for 3 persons. In only approx. 5 minutes by foot there is a supermarket and the next tram stop (M 21), with connection to Ostkreuz. If you arrive by car, you are welcome to use the private car park belonging to the accommodation.

The loft is open plan, with a large window front and 5 metre high ceilings. On the ground floor is a fully equipped kitchen with a  dishwasher, induction cooker, kitchen table, living area and the bathroom with shower, rain shower & bathtub. name: Big bright room in Neukölln with balcony
summary: Very charming, big, bright room with a balcony in the heart of Neukölln. It is just between the canal on the one hand side and the famous Weserstraße on the other.  The area is great for going out for a beer, or just chilling in the sun by the canal....
space: The space is open and light and located on the top floor of the building.  The top facility must be the balcony, where we normally spend a lot of time in the summer. There is as well a bathtub in the bathroom (perfect for relaxation). The room is suitable for one person or a couple.
description: Very charming, big, bright room with a balcony in the heart of Neukölln. It is just between the canal on the one hand side and the famous Weserstraße on the other.  The area is great for going out for a beer, or just chilling in the sun by the canal.... The space is open and light and located on the top floor of the building.  The top facility must be the balcony, where we normally spend a lot of time in the summer. There is as well a bathtub in the bathroom (perfect for relaxation). The room is suitable for one person or a couple. In the flat there is access to wi-fi and a washingmaschine. The supermarket is a few minutes away, as well as the bus that drives to the center. There are plenty of café's, bars, nightclubs, galleries and much more in the area.   I will be at home, but I am normally gone a lot. Leave eraliy and often go out in the evening. I am very respectful of others privacy and I am sure that I won't bother you :) I really like the neighborhood a lot, first of all becaus
neighborhood_overview: I really like the neighborhood a lot, first of all because it is a relaxed and beautiful area! There are a lot of small parks  and the canal is very close by. Having said that the famous Weserstraße is also just 200 meters away, which is where you can find the largest amount of bars and café´s in Neukölln. - So all in all there should be everything you need  :)

summary: Lichtdurchflutete 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in einem wunderbar-charmanten Backsteinhaus im Herzen Treptows. 1. OG, idyllische Lage. Optimal für zwei bis max. drei Personen. S-Bahn & Bus um die Ecke! neighborhood_overview: Nach Kreuzberg und Neukölln fängt nun auch Bumschulenweg (Treptow) an sich zu wandeln. Club- und Partyszene werdet ihr zwar noch keine finden, aber die erreicht man aber in 2-3 S-Bahnstationen von der S-Bahnstation Baumschulenweg weg. Um die Ecke befindet sich gleich ein Lidl, dahinter ein Kaiser's (tägl. bis 00:00 offen), Drogerie, Apotheken, Bäckereien, Spätis, Restaurants etc. findest du an der Hauptstraße - alles schnell und einfach zu Fuß zu erreichen. Ein sehr gemütliches Cafe befindet sich in der Parallelstraße.
transit: Die Whg liegt 5 Gehminuten von der S-Bahnstation 'Baumschulenweg' (S (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) entfernt. Eine Busstation (M41) ist in 3 Gehminuten zu erreichen. Der Bus fährt über den 'Hermannplatz' direkt zum Berliner Hauptbahnhof. Wenn du mit dem Auto kommst, ist die Ausfahrt 'Späthstrasse' der Stadtautobahn A100 fünf Minuten von der Whg entfernt.
access: WLAN, Handtücher, Bettwäsche, alle Küchenutensilien
interaction: Da ich die Whg hpts. vermiete, wenn ich selbst vereise, kann ich dir vor deiner Anreise Tipps & Kontakte geben. Im Vorfeld sollten wir alles Wichtige geklärt haben (Ankunftszeit usw...)

name: Very nice apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Nice, comfortable and quiet 3 room apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg. A double bed and a sofa, but suitable rather for 2 than for 4.
space: Very nice, comfortable and quiet apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg. 1st floor in the back (so no noise from the street), with one bed room, a central living room, kitchen and bathroom, around 65m² in total. The bedroom is to be reached through the living room. There is no extra dining table, just a small one with space for 2 in the kitchen (see photo). Space for rather 2 than 4 people on a double bed in the bedroom and a sofa in the living-room. Internet, TV (beamer) washing machine etc. are all at your disposal. There are 2 very friendly cats in the apartment while you are there. Everything they need will be provided, but some care for them is part of the stay - no big deal, they are easy to satisfy. Don´t hesitate to ask if you are unsure.

name: 1a Verkersanbindung, Ostkreuz, Kühl
summary: Schöne kühle Wohnung mit Balkon. Die Wohnküche lädt zum gemeinsamen Kochen und Zeit verbringen ein. Das größere Zimmer hat direkt eine Tür zum Balkon. Neben dem Badezimmer gibt es ein Gäste WC. Das kleinere Zimmer besitzt einen Französischen Balkon. Spätis, unterschiedlichste Restaurants, das Victoria Center, Penny und Edeka, die Berliner Sparkasse, Spielplätze und einen Fussballplatz gibt es in unmittelbarer Nähe. 2minuten dauert es zur Tram und zum Bus. Bis nach Ostkreuz dauert es ca 8minuten.
space: Die Kühle der Wohnung ist bei diesen Temperaturen ein Segen. Die Wohnküche verbindet den Wohnbereich mit der Küche und lädt zum gemeinsamen Austausch ein. In der kleinen Anlage können Platten,CD's und Mp3 abgespielt oder es kann das Radio angestellt werden. Wer nicht gerne abwäscht benutzt einfach den Geschirrspüler. Mit der Mikrowelle und dem Herd können Gerichte schnell erwärmt oder erzeugt werden. Dank der Filterkaffeemaschine sind auch durchzechte Nächte kein Problem  Auch Bügeleisen,Toaster, Lockenstab und Fön helfen den Alltag zu durchstehen.
description: Schöne kühle Wohnung mit Balkon. Die Wohnküche lädt zum gemeinsamen Kochen und Zeit verbringen ein. Das größere Zimmer hat direkt eine Tür zum Balkon. neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarn sind sehr freundlich und umgänglich. Zudem ist die Nachbarschaft sehr vielfältig.
transit: Da es 2 Minuten zur Tram und Bus, 8 Minuten zur SBahn und dem Fernverkehr geht, ist alles nicht so weit entfernt.
interaction: Ich bin einige Kilometer entfernt weshalb viel Freiraum bleibt, jedoch bin ich jederzeit von 10 bis 22 Uhr per Telefon erreichbar. Bei Notfällen natürlich auch in der Nacht.
house_rules: Bitte keine Pakete annehmen.  Rauchen ist auf dem Balkon erlaubt. Bitte den Müll runterbringen, wenn sie mehrere Tage  in der Wohnung verbringen. Der Müllraum befindet sich im Hinterhof.
host_about:
Ich bin offen, freundlich und humorvoll, jedoch wird man von mir nicht viel sehen, da ich nur zur Schlüsselübergabe da sein werde. Natürlich stehe ich für Infos und Fragen gerne zur Verfügung, aber du und deine Begleitungen sollt euch nicht weiter gestört fühlen.

Wer eine Wohnung im angesagten Friedrichshain möchte, ist hier richtig. Die Verbindung zu überall in und außerhalb der Stadt ist sehr gut. Straßenbahn und Bus sind zwei Minuten entfernt und die S-und Regionalbahn ca. 8 Minuten Laufweg.

Zudem gibt es hier jede Menge Spätis und die unterschiedlichsten Restaurants sodass jeder Gaumen befriedigt werden kann und das in nur ein paar wenigen Gehminuten (Mexikanisch, Indisch, Venezuelisch, Italienisch, vietnamesisch, Sudanesisch, Russisch etc.). Auch ist ein Kaufland, Edeka und Penny in unmittelbarer Nähe, sodass auch für alles andere gesorgt ist.

name: Eine kleine ruhige Wohnung (Studio)

space: Our cozy apartment is suitable for two persons. It is near the west center of Berlin. There is a very good connection to the metro stations, bus stop and supermarket. There is a bus going directly to the Tegel airport.

name: Cozy Studio in Berlin-Mitte
summary: Close to Zoo Bahnhof, Kurfürstendamm, KaDeWe, and Wittenbergplatz, my studio is very well situated in the centre of West Berlin. 6th Floor, 2 elevators. Only one room but big enough for all the furniture (+wardrobe), oriented to a courtyard in the south with a lot of light through a big, double window. There is only one bed, with a mattress for the second person underneath. Bathroom big enough with shower. The kitchen is tiny but sufficient, with a small refrigerator underneath.

name: Wohnen im Neukölln; Schillerkietz/Tempelhoferpark
summary: Mein ein Zimmer Studiowohnung in 1.Etage ist in Neukölln am Schillerpromenade und am West Tempelhofpark ,es ist gemühtlich,schön,hell,ruhig,central und Tag und Nacht lebendig.
space: Die Wohnung in 1.Etage ist in einen wunderschönen grossen Hof. Das Zimmer ist hell, freundlich und ruhig. . Ihr könnt Euch einfach entspannen.  Von Sofa aus können Sie Ausblick zum Hof, die Sonne und vielles mehr genießen. Das gemütliche Matratze 140 x 200 gross in den man gemütlich zu zweit schlaffen kann. In der Küche gibt es neben Geschirr,Töpfen,Kühlschrank,Herd,Backofen,Mikrowelle,Wasserkocher.......... Kaffee,Tee...alles was man zum leben braucht.  Der Esstisch ist gleichzeitig der Coutschtische wo man auch gemühtlich essen und sitzen kann.

name: Wohnen im Weddinger KIEZ: Berlin
summary: Willkommen! Ich wohne in einem sehr schönen Teil vom Wedding -  im sogenannten Sprengelkiez. Die  Wohnung befindet sich ruhig gelegen im Hinterhof in der 4ten Etage. Im Kiez findet ihr Cafés, Restaurants, Spätes, Imbissbuden und nicht zu vergessen den Westhafen. 4 min entfernt erreicht ihr direkt das Wasser. Die Verkehrsanbindungen sind optimal.  Ihr seit mit der U9, 2 Minuten zu Fuß von hier, in 10 Minuten am zoologischem Garten oder in 12 Minuten am Kurfürstendamm. Freu mich auf euch!
space: WICHTIG!! Es ist ein Zimmer mit einem Doppelbett für eine Person oder wahlweise für eine zweite Person. In der Wohnung wohnt noch ein Mitbewohner, mit dem ihr euch Küche und Bad teilt.

name: Zimmer mit eigenem Bad - Nähe Brandenburger Tor
summary: Schönes Privatzimmer in einer großen Loft-artigen Wohnung in Berlin Mitte, direkt beim Reichstag, Brandenburger Tor und Hauptbahnhof. Zum Zimmer gehört ein eigenes Bad, das die ausschließlich für Euch zur Verfügung steht. Das Zimmer befindet sich direkt am Eingang zur Wohnung, das Wohn- und Esszimmer, die Küche und bei schönem Wetter die große Dachterrasse nutzen wir gemeinsam.

Das Zimmer befindet sich direkt am Eingang zur Wohnung, das Wohn- und Esszimmer, die Küche und bei schönem Wetter die große Dachterrasse nutzen wir gemeinsam. Ich bin berufstätig und tagsüber in der Regel nicht in der Wohnung. Wenn Ihr das wollt, können wir nach Absprache abends gemeinsam kochen, aber das ist keine Erwartung. Die Umgebung ist abends ruhig, man kann mit offenem Fenster schlafen. Das Haus liegt im alten Park der Charité, dort sind im Sommer jede Menge Studenten und man kann unter alten Bäumen und zwischen den Backsteingebäuden die Sonne genießen. Auf der anderen Seite des Parks (ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuß) beginnt die Oranienburger Straße, eine der Partymeilen Berlins. Auch die Torstraße, das Galerieviertel, Unter den Linden, die Friedrichstraße und der Haupt

name: Bright, renovated 2-bedroom apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Bright & renovated 70m2 "altbau" apartment in central Kreuzberg, perfect to serve as a base for you to explore this vibrant city. The apartment finishings are of nice quality, with some nice touches such as areas on the wall where the bricks are exposed. It is located in a very charming area of the city with a very "real Berlin" feeling to it, with several local restaurants, cafes and shops in the vicinity as well as being right next to a park. Public transportation is just around the corner.
space: The apartment itself has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen and one bathroom.  Both bedrooms are comfortable and have a large storage space, with one of them having a double bed and the other a large single bed. The living room has a couch and a table that can be used for eating or to work from, whereas the kitchen is equipped with modern appliances and has all the required amenities for guests to prepare meals. The apartment is on the 4th floor (no elevator), so it has a lot of light even in Winter, and it has central heating.

name: Sunny private room in vibrant Neukolln
summary: Stumbling distance to the bars and cafes of lively Weserstraße, 5 to 7min to U-bahn station Rathaus Neukolln, and just a few minutes to the canal and all its loveliness. Tempelhofer Feld is a just a short bus or bike ride away. It's really a perfect location. The apartment itself is spacious, simply but beautifully fitted out, and filled with natural light. A truly lovely place in the heart of Neukolln.
space: You'll have a big, light-filled, courtyard-facing room all to yourself and share the rest of the apartment with my lovely housemate. The apartment is very quiet and peaceful. The street-facing balcony is a nice place to catch the rays (if they happen to be shining).

notes: This isn't a party home. Berlin offers plenty of that out on the street :)

name: 100m2 rooftop apartment in heartof BerlinKreuzberg
summary: These two flatrooms are located in  heart of Kreuzberg in a 100m2 rooftop apartment with an incredible view on the city. You have two private bedrooms with a shared bathroom but at daytime you can use the living area and kitchen as well. There you have Netflix. Supermarkets (Lidl Edeka) and a lot of restaurants are 2min walk from the house. Its also easy to get to almost any place in Berlin. The famous Potsdamer Platz, checkpoint Charlie, Brandenburger Tor and Mitte are only 5-10min with bus.

summary: Sonniges Zimmer (ca 20 m²) im 5. Stock, mit Doppelbett,  Couch, Tisch und Stühlen. Der Balkon bietet Blick über die Dächer Neuköllns. Bad und Küche werden geteilt. space: ENGLISH BELOW Ich vermiete ein Zimmer meiner Zwei-Zimmer-Wohnung, bis ich einen neuen Mitbewohner finde. Das Zimmer ist groß und hell, mit gemütlicher Sitzecke und Doppelbett. Man könnte alleine oder zu zweit darin schlafen. Da ihr euch (oder du dir) die Wohnung mit mir teilt, würden wir Badezimmer und Küche teilen. Meine Wohnung liegt im vierten Stock, sodass der sonnige Balkon einen wunderschönem Blick über die Dächer Neuköllns bietet. Die Wohnung liegt nah am S- und U-Bahnhof Hermannstraße und ist damit hervorragend an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr angebunden (allerdings hört man die Sbahnen bis spät nachts und an den Wochenenden die ganze Nacht; wenn man sehr lärmempfindlich ist, könnte das beim Schlafen stören). neighborhood_overview: ENGLISH BELOW Neukölln ist ein multikultureller Berliner Bezirk mit einigen typisch-berlinerischen Ecken und Kanten. Es ist ein etwas rauerer Bezirk, das muss gesagt werden - aber trotzdem mit echter Freundlichkeit, vielen Bars, Clubs, Shisha-Cafes, verschiedenste internationale Restaurants (z.B. vietnamesisch, deutsch, arabisch, türkisch, libanesisch, chinesisch, und natürlich gibt es hier überall den berühmt-berüchtigten Berliner Döner), Imbissen und Cafés - ich gebe euch gerne ein paar Tipps. Einen Block entfernt gibt es einen großen türkischen Supermarkt mit frischem Obst und Gemüse, ein bis spät nachts geöffnetes Rewe und viele Bäckereien. Zehn Minuten entfernt liegt das Tempelhofer Feld, Berlins geschichtsträchtiger stillgelegter Flughafen, der mittlerweile zum größten und beliebtesten Park der Stadt avanchiert ist. ENGLISH  My city district, Neukölln, is well-known for being multicultural and open, with typical Berlin style grit and flair. It is a bit rough around the edges, the
transit: ENGLISH BELOW Mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln: Die Wohnung liegt nah am S- und U-Bahnhof Hermannstraße (U8, Ringbahn, S45 & S9 zum FLughaden SFX Schönefeld) und ist damit hervorragend an den öffentlichen Nahverkehr angebunden (allerdings hört man die Sbahnen bis spät nachts und an den Wochenenden die ganze Nacht; wenn man sehr lärmempfindlich ist, könnte das beim Schlafen stören). Einige Buslinien verlaufen hier ebenfalls, und an der Hermanstraße fahren viele Taxen. Mit dem Auto:  Autobahn und eine der wichtigsten Hauptstraßen Berlins liegen nur ein paar Minuten entfernt. Meine Straße direkt ist allerdings eine Einbahnstraße (d.h. man kann nicht direkt von der Hermanstraße einfahren), und man findet nicht immer einen Parkplatz direkt vor der Haustür, sondern muss manchmal eine Querstraße weiter parken. ENGLISH By public transports: The train station Hermanstraße  (U8, Ringbahn, S45 & S9 zum FLughaden SFX Schönefeld) lies within five minutes walking distance, connecting you to two of t

name: Beautiful, sunny flat in the heart of Berlin
summary: Beautiful, newly renovated flat in Kreuzberg, centrally located, perfect for young families or couples. It comes with high chairs, baby beds, a rocking horse, and a range of toys. Both the kitchen and the bookcase have been built using the flat's original floorboards and most of the plates, bowls, and cups were hand-made here in the house. The open concept makes it a very sunny, relaxing flat, and it comes with everything you need to cook with in style (spices, olive oil, appliances, etc).
space: Good coffee beans will be available, along with quality loose teas - there's also a good coffee grinder in case you find beans of your own in the city you'd like to try.  The kitchen comes with a full range of appliances, including a blender, juicer, oven, etc. and the lights throughout the house are dimmable.

neighborhood_overview: Central, close to Bergmannstr. and to Südstern -  lovely weekend market on Saturdays, great location from which to explore Berlin.
notes: One additional note: we have a cat who lives with us. However, she will be staying with friends while we are away. That said, this could be important in case anyone in your group is severely allergic to cats!
transit: Close metro connections to the U7, the U1, as well as the U6 and U3. The nearest bus stop is 50 meters away at Tempelherrenstr., which goes to the main train station (HBf).
interaction: We will provide you with information regarding keys, access, etc. directly once the booking is confirmed.
host_about: From Canada; Living in Berlin. I work in renewable energy. Father, husband, writer, potter.

name: Singel Appartment - Schillerkiez - Tempelhoferfeld
summary: Schicke 2- Zimmerwohnung, mit allem was der Altag so bedarf ausgestattet. Sie ist nur 1  1/2 Gehminuten vom Tempelhofer Feld entfernt und liegt im bezaubernden Schillerkiez. Sie liegt im Erdegeschoss und hat einen Balkon im Hochparterre, ist schön groß und genießt viel Ruhe. Die Nachbarn sind sehr human und freundlich, es sei denn die Mutti von nebenan schimpft mal ihren Sohn aus. Ist aber eher selten der Fall.

description: Wunderschöne, helle Altbauwohnung in der familiengeprägten Viktoriastadt nahe Ostkreuz. Wir mögen es schlicht und klar, wenn es zu Einrichtung kommt, jedoch nicht kühl, dabei wird Neues mit Altem kombiniert. Südausrichtung mit kleinem Balkon. Hier habt Zugang zu dem gebuchten Privatzimmer, wie in der Anzeige beschrieben, sowie natürlich zu Gemeinschaftsräumen wie Bad und Küche. Die anderen zwei Schlafzimmer sind leider tabu für euch! Ich stehe natürlich während eures Aufenthalts per SMS und (Hidden by Airbnb) für euch zu verfügung. Jedoch kann es sein, dass ich nicht immer erreichbar bin. Ihr bekommt jedoch auch einen Kontakt Vorort. Jedoch ist eigentlich immer jemand von uns zuhause, in den seltensten Fällen seid ihr in der Wohnung ganz auf euch gestellt ;) Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr ruhig und familiär. Es ist einfach sich in dieser Gemeinschaft, schnell zuhause zu fühlen! Die öffentlichen Anbindungen sind sehr gut!! Mit der S-Bahn bist du in 10Min am Alex. 2Min bis S-Bahnhof Nöldnerp

access: Hier habt Zugang zu dem gebuchten Privatzimmer, wie in der Anzeige beschrieben, sowie natürlich zu Gemeinschaftsräumen wie Bad und Küche. Die anderen zwei Schlafzimmer sind leider tabu für euch!
interaction: Ich stehe natürlich während eures Aufenthalts per SMS und (Hidden by Airbnb) für euch zu verfügung. Jedoch kann es sein, dass ich nicht immer erreichbar bin. Ihr bekommt jedoch auch einen Kontakt Vorort. Jedoch ist eigentlich immer jemand von uns zuhause, in den seltensten Fällen seid ihr in der Wohnung ganz auf euch gestellt ;)
house_rules: Bitte benutze die gestellten WC-Artikel und Handtücher. Wir räumen dir Platz für private Dinge und Lebensmitteln, bitte benutze die hierfür vorgesehenen Orte. Rauchen in der Wohnung ist nicht erlaubt aber auf dem Balkon. Generell sind wir eine sehr offenen WG und nutzen den Balkon gemeinschaftlich, solltest du ein Problem damit haben, dass andere WG Mitglieder durch das Zimmer laufen, während du auf Erkundungstour durch Berlin bist lass es sie wissen. Private Dinge verbleiben im Zimmer, bitte gehe respektvoll hiermit um und respektiere Privatsphäre, öffne keine Kisten, Schränke usw. , wenn du diese nicht als Stauraum zugewiesen bekommen hast. Dies gilt natürlich nicht für die Küche, mache dich ruhig mit den Inhalten der Schränke vertraut!
host_about:
Hallo ihr Lieben,

mein Name ist Denise, 27Jahre jung, wohne in Berlin. Ich bin gerade in den Endzügen meines Masters of Science in Architektur. Wenn ich nicht gerade studiere bereise ich als Monteurin die sieben Weltmeere oder arbeite hier und da bei Filmproduktionen in Szenenbild und Ausstattung. Ich liebe Film und Musik und bin passionierte Festivalgängerin. 

Stets Fernweh und Hummeln im Hintern, liebe ich es unterwegs zu sein, neue Leute zu treffen und ihre Heimat, Kulturen und Gebräuche kennenzulernen. 
Privat bei Leuten unterzukommen ist mir das liebste Mittel zu reisen.
Genauso herzlich Willkommen ist jeder Reisende bei uns. Ich möchte, dass ihr euch  in unseren vier Wänden wohl und zu Hause fühlt. Ich bringe das selbe Vertrauen entgegen, welches ich schon so zahlreich genießen durfte und freu mich auf jeden Reisenden, den wir in unserer wunderschönen Hauptstadt willkommen heißen dürfen!
amenities: {TV,Wifi,Kitchen,"Family/kid friendly",Washer,Essentials,Shampoo}

name: Sunny rooftop apt in Berlin Friedrichshain
summary: We are going away for Christmas and are renting out our beautiful private apartment in Friedrichshain. The quiet and spacious flat is very sunny with a big rooftop facing an urban skyline.  It is centrally located on the border of Friedrichshain/Prenzlauer Berg. The building is a very well kept 19th century typical Berlin "Altbau", but the flat itself  is quite modern since the roof top was only added recently. Apartment can be booked between 22 Dec and 1 January
description: We are going away for Christmas and are renting out our beautiful private apartment in Friedrichshain. The quiet and spacious flat is very sunny with a big rooftop facing an urban skyline.  It is centrally located on the border of Friedrichshain/Prenzlauer Berg. The building is a very well kept 19th century typical Berlin "Altbau", but the flat itself  is quite modern since the roof top was only added recently. Apartment can be booked between 22 Dec and 1 January You will have access to the sleeping room, the guest room, the living and kitchen area, the entrance, the bathrooms and the terrace. Our study is not accessible.  Please note: The apartment is on the 5th floor and has no elevator. We will not be in the apartment The Richard-Sorge-Kiez is a very nice and quiet area in lively Friedrichshain district. You will find good restaurants in both Richard-Sorge and Straßmannstraße, including a beautiful old retro cinema with its own brewery, a hip burger place (Rembrandt Burger), one of
neighborhood_overview: The Richard-Sorge-Kiez is a very nice and quiet area in lively Friedrichshain district. You will find good restaurants in both Richard-Sorge and Straßmannstraße, including a beautiful old retro cinema with its own brewery, a hip burger place (Rembrandt Burger), one of the best Italian restaurants in town (Saporito and pizza place Pomodorino next to each other in Straßmannstraße) and many more. Tourist attraction Boxhagener Platz (Boxi)with its flea market, bars and restaurants are in a walking distance. Even closer is the big and green park  Volkspark Friedrichshain where you can take a walk, go for a run or feed the ducks in the lake. Also the Berghain is not too far, in case you are a party animal.
transit: Richard-Sorge-Straße is very well connected to both metro line U5 (station Weberwiese) and to several Trams: Metro U5 as well asTrams M5 and M6 will take you to Alexanderplatz within 7 minutes and to Hackescher Markt in 10 minutes. Ring station "Landsberger Allee" can also be reached within one Tram stop. Tram M10 takes you directly to the central train station and to the Mauerpark flea market.

name: Sunny apartment Kreuzberg central
summary: My 2 room fully equipped apartment is in the heart of Kreuzberg right in the middle of gräfekiez with charming cafes,  bars and restaurants.
space: The perfect home away from home! The apartment is located in the heart Berlin Kreuzberg, right in between the lovely neighborhoods ´Gräfekiez´ and ´Kreuzkölln/Reuterkiez´ which boast lots of nice cafés, restaurants, bars and shops. The impressive former airport Tempelhof, various parks and the Landwehr canal can be reached in 5-10 minutes by foot. Public transport (subway and busses) is a 2-7 minutes walk away.
description: My 2 room fully equipped apartment is in the heart of Kreuzberg right in the middle of gräfekiez with charming cafes,  bars and restaurants. The perfect home away from home! The apartment is located in the heart Berlin Kreuzberg, right in between the lovely neighborhoods ´Gräfekiez´ and ´Kreuzkölln/Reuterkiez´ which boast lots of nice cafés, restaurants, bars and shops. The impressive former airport Tempelhof, various parks and the Landwehr canal can be reached in 5-10 minutes by foot. Public transport (subway and busses) is a 2-7 minutes walk away. all amenities of the apartment incl. linen, towels, wifi highspeed internet and washing machine you will have the whole appartment for yourself. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me! I'm happy to help! The apartment is located in a very beautiful, charming and relaxed neighbourhood in the heart of Kreuzberg ("Graefekiez") with everything you need in walking distance: super markets, bakeries, small shops and cafes, resta
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a very beautiful, charming and relaxed neighbourhood in the heart of Kreuzberg ("Graefekiez") with everything you need in walking distance: super markets, bakeries, small shops and cafes, restaurants, bars, cinemas, clubs and galleries. The Landwehrkanal is just down the street, there you find a fresh food market every Tuesday and Friday, a beautiful arts and crafts market every Saturday and a big flea market every other Sunday.  Hip and upcoming Neukölln is just around the corner too!  I'm happy to give you advices on the area and nice places to go eat, drink, party or visit.
notes: - A fully equipped modern kitchen is at your disposal, with everything you need for cooking, a washing machine is also there for your use.  You can use everything. If something runs out please write me a note. -Wifi internet included.  - Linen and Towels are included as well. - you can use my big monitor (adapter for macbook) - 42 inches samsung smart tv with cable
transit: The apartment is very well connected to the U8 (Schönleinstraße ), which takes you directly to Alexanderplatz and Weinmeisterstraße or Rosenthaler Platz (Hackescher Markt / Mitte), the U7 (Hermannsplatz) and the bus M41 (Jahnstr), which takes you directly to Potsdamer Platz and Hauptbahnhof. Distance to both airports and centralstation is about 30 minutes with public transportation.
access: all amenities of the apartment incl. linen, towels, wifi highspeed internet and washing machine
interaction: you will have the whole appartment for yourself. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me! I'm happy to help!
house_rules: - No smoking inside  - No parties (please respect the neighbours and reduce the noise level between 10pm and 8am) - no internet downloads/torrents/filesharing - whatsoever.
host_about:
Originally from bavaria I have come to Berlin 6 years ago. 
I work as an Art director in the creative industry, and have lived in our beautiful  flat in Kreuzberg since 2014. 
Always happy to help you out in any way and give you tips and recommendations how to best spend your time in this great city.

There are galleries and theaters in the immediate vicinity.

name: Cosy private room in green surroundings
summary: We are a young at heart couple offering a quiet 14 sqm room with separate bath in our house in Berlin. The room is ideal for people looking to explore Berlin, but still stay in green surroundings. The house is within walking distance from lakes (Krumme Lanke and Schlachtensee), which are a popular hangout among young people and families for swimming, picnics and sports. The city center is easily reachable within 20-30 minutes by U-Bahn. U-Bahn Krumme Lanke is 3 minutes walking distance.
space: Our house is decorated tastefully with things from our travels around the world. The house has a garden at the back and at the front where one can enjoy a beautiful view with a glass of wine and food.

name: Wunderschöne 3-Zimmer Altbauwohnung
summary: Wunderschöne sanierte Altbauwohnung mit Stuck und Dielenböden. 3 grosszügige Zimmer (Wohnzimmer, Esszimmer, Schlafzimmer), 2 Bäder, 2 Balkone,  Küche bieten ausreichend Platz für 4 Personen. Perfekt für eine Familie oder ruhiges Päarchen geeignet
space: Es handelt sich um eine wunderschöne und sanierte AltbauWohnung in der Belletage in einem Mehrfamilienaltbau mit sehr netten Nachbarn. Die Wohnung umfasst insgesamt 125 qm - wir vermieten davon 3 großzügige Zimmer, jeweils mit Stuck (Wohnzimmer, Esszimmer, Schlafzimmer), 2 Badezimmer mit Dusche, Wanne und Tageslicht, 1 Küche und 2 Balkone ( 1 WestBalkon zum ruhigen Innnenhof, 1 Nordbalkon zur Florastraße) Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet mit Kühlschrank, Herd und Backofen, Mikrowelle, Spülmaschine, Geschirr und einer kleinen Sitzecke. Wohnzimmer und Esszimmer sind mit einer Flügeltür verbunden. Von beiden Zimmern ist der Nordbalkon begehbar.  Die Couch im Wohnzimmer ist ausziehbar und bietet weitere Schlafmöglichkeiten für 2 Personen. Der Kachelofen im Esszimmer ist voll funktionsfähig und kreiert eine gemütliche und warme Atmosphäre an kalten Wintertagen. Im Schlafzimmer befindet sich ein 140cm breites Doppelbett - hier grenzt auch der sonnige Westbalkon an. Falls erforderlich, können

neighborhood_overview: Sehr kinderfreundliche und lebendige Gegend - der schöne Bürgerpark mit angrenzender Schönholzer Heide und der Schlosspark sind fussläufig zu erreichen. Die Florastraße bietet viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Rewe, Edeka, DM, Bioladen, Rathaus Center), kleine Cafes, Bäcker und Restaurants.
notes: Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind im Preis enthalten, die Endreinigung beträgt € 70. Mindestaufenthaltsdauer sind 60 Tage ohne Frühstück / Selbstverpflegung.
transit: Die Station der U2 Pankow ist innerhalb von 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Der S Bahnhof Wollankstraße liegt ca. 400 m von uns entfernt. Ein Bus in unmittelbarer Nähe bringt Sie auch innerhalb weniger Minuten zu beiden Stationen. Der Bus M27 fährt direkt zur Jungfernheide, von wo aus man mit dem BUS TXL direkt zum Flughafen Tegel kommt. Sowohl Alexanderplatz als auch Friedrichsstraße sind  innerhalb von 15 Minuten mit U-/bzw. S-Bahn zu erreichen.

space: Equipment Elevator, heated bathroom floor, washing machine with dryer, great rain shower in the bath, very bright and beautiful rooms. The sleeping area in the living room can separated if necessary by a thick curtain. Iron and ironing board, fully equipped kitchen (including dishwasher, gas stove with convection heating, espresso machine, coffee maker, blender, etc.). Also many different lights for bright to cosy. AROUND Only 3 minutes to the S-Bahn ring and only 3 minutes to the tram, which brings one in eight minutes to Alexanderplatz. notes: Berlin takes a 5% city tax on the total price of staying. Except for stays longer than 21 days or business travel or if you are in Berlin on business. In case you are on a business trip please let me know asap.

name: Typical Berlin oldstlye room & view over Berlin
summary: Hei guys, the room (20 square meters) is part of my nice apartment, located in the famous area Neukölln - one of the hottest/coolest districts in Berlin right now.  There is a comfortable double bed (1,60 x 2 meter) inside the room, a big table, 2 cozy chairs and a balkony with a view over the roofs of Berlin. The aparment has a full equiped shared kitchen, a shared bathroom (with bathtube) and a floor.
space: Meine Wohnung ist im Bezirk Neukölln,  in der Nähe des 'Tempelhofer Felds und des wunderschönen Körnerparks. Ein Region in Neukölln, die noch weitestgehend verschont ist von Tourismus und gleichzeitig doch den Reiz dieses Stadtteils sehr gut wiedergibt. Ich wohne derzeit alleine in einer relativ großen 2,5 Zimmer Wohnung und vermiete mein großes Wohnzimmer für Menschen aller couleur, die für 1-3 Tage in dieser Stadt eine Unterkunft brauchen. Das Zimmer hat eine ausziehbare Couch und wird dann so zu einem sehr bequemen 1,60 mal 2,00 Meter Bett. Außerdem hat man direkt Zugang zum Balkon, mit Blick über die Dächer Berlins. Ich selber bin berufstätig und tagsüber unter der Woche nicht da; mein Zimmer ist separat vom Wohnzimmer und somit kommt man sich überhaupt nicht in die Quere.
description: Hei guys, the room (20 square meters) is part of my nice apartment, located in the famous area Neukölln - one of the hottest/coolest districts in Berlin right now.  There is a comfortable double bed (1,60 x 2 meter) inside the room, a big table, 2 cozy chairs and a balkony with a view over the roofs of Berlin. The aparment has a full equiped shared kitchen, a shared bathroom (with bathtube) and a floor. Myself will be in the flat. But I am at work from 9-19/20 o clock, during the week. The unique and famous Tempelhofer Field is very close (5-10 min walking distance). There are plenty of cool (vintage-) cafes, bars and resteraunt around the corner. Beside that, supermarkets and the so called "Spätis" (little shops, open 24/7) are everywhere. The apartment is located very close (2 min walking distance) to S and U Bahn (Hermannstraße). You are within 5-10 min. at places like Kottbusser Tor, Hermannplatz or Alexanderpatz.

interaction: I'm usually at the next door, so whatever you need, just tell me, I enjoy having people around :)
house_rules: As in any flat  I have neighbors  in all directions, so please try to keep quiet. You're more than welcome to use the common areas as kitchen and bathroom,  but please don't forget that I also need it, so I appreciate if you don't take too long and keep in the same way you found it. Please don't invite anybody else to the flat, the room is only available for Airbnb guests, not for external guests and maximum for 2 people.  Please don't make use of any of my personal objects, if you need something please ask before.
host_about: I moved to Berlin a couple of years ago and totally felt in love with the city. I try to give my view of the city, which includes biking at least a little bit in order to have a better picture of Berlin's diversity. I'm an informal and relaxed person, and as I already traveled a lot myself, I know how valuable help and tips are for travelers, so, if there's anything I can do  for helping, I'm here for landing a hand :)

name: SPACIOUS APARTMENT IN CREATIVE KREUZKOELLN
summary: Hi All, we sublet a very spacious apartment with beautiful stucco, floorboards etc. The apt is ca. 95 square meter big. Located in a picturesque 19th-century-house in a romantic street in Berlin-Kreuzkoelln (Kreuzberg/Neukölln) this three-bedroom holiday home is the perfect base for a relaxing and rewarding vacation in Berlin. Please feel free to ask further questions and we are happy to give my guests recommendations on what to do while visiting Berlin! Herzlichst, Markus
description: Hi All, we sublet a very spacious apartment with beautiful stucco, floorboards etc. The apt is ca. 95 square meter big. Located in a picturesque 19th-century-house in a romantic street in Berlin-Kreuzkoelln (Kreuzberg/Neukölln) this three-bedroom holiday home is the perfect base for a relaxing and rewarding vacation in Berlin. Please feel free to ask further questions and we are happy to give my guests recommendations on what to do while visiting Berlin! Herzlichst, Markus There is free parking anywhere in the area.
notes: There is free parking anywhere in the area.
house_rules: There are no significant rules. Mutual respect goes a long way. If you smoke, please do so on the window. If something wears out or breaks, please let us know so we can fix it for future guests. Guests are not allowed besides the ones who are paying. Please no illegal filesharing, it is extremely expensive in Germany (5000 Euros!) If you use the internet, you are consenting that you take responsibility for the cost of your uploads. Other than that, have fun and make the most of your days in this wonderful city!!!
host_about:
We are sister and brother, 32 and 35 of age and have lived in different parts of Berlin over the last years.
Anne lives in the heart of Kreuzberg and got many different favorite places, such as Goerlitzer Park, the shore of the Spree at Eastside gallery, little cozy cafés that serve high-end espresso. She is a upcoming movie maker and script writer. Authors she enjoys reading are: Jonathan Safran Foer, David Foster Wallace and Don De Lillo.
Mark likes to ride around Berlin on his bike, especially around the Neukölln-Kreuzberg area. He is an artist of live and studies Social Event Manangement at the University of the Arts in his last year. He likes to spend his time meeting friends in one of these countless nice venues around. He also loves to "waste" his time watching series, such as Breaking Bad, House of Cards, Mad Men, Dexter, Misfits etc. Music, especially broken music (D&B, Dubstep, Drumfunk, Garage) is a significant fact in his life.

We are communicative hosts and always open for a chat about places to go and things to explore in this city of endless opportunities. We'd love to invite you to come and enjoy our space! So. See you
around...

name: Dream house in Checkpoint Charlie
summary: The house is a quiet apartment located in a very well served area in the historic center of the Berlin city, the district Mitte, just 150m from the subway station U-Bahn Kochstrasse "(U6) and 15 minutes ' walk from Potsdamer Platz, the Holocaust Memorial, the Brandenburg Gate, Unter den Linden, and the Museum Island. Very close to the modern Jewish Museum and Checkpoint Charlie. The charm of this lovely apartment and its excellent location guarantee a wonderful and unforgettable stay in Berlin!
space: The apartment, located on the 4th floor of a building with elevator, is very welcoming and furnished in a modern style with a very refined taste.  It has a separated bedroom with queen-size bed and with wardrobe and a spacious living room with LCD TV and comfortable sofa bed.  The living room overlooks on the open kitchen, fully equipped, also equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine, a microwave, oven, toaster and kettle.  The pretty bathroom, covered with mosaic nuanced lilac, has a large shower and hairdryer.   The living room leads into a lovely and cosy terrace/loggia on which to enjoy the Berlin atmosphere. Equipped with bed linen and towels.  For its exposition, housing receives natural light all day and is very bright.  In the immediate vicinity you will find excellent restaurants, bars, cafes and the famous shopping and of elegant  boutique street, Friedrichstraße, from being accessed in the Gendarmenmarkt, one of the most beautiful squares of the city, in Italian Renaissance

name: cozy calm light room in Mitte/Wedding at park area
summary: You reach the center of the city with the bicycle in 20-30 min or 4-6 station by subway. Within walking distance you find the Bürgerpark and Schlosspark Pankow, in which you might jog or have a good walk. Close to us in Florastraße you have nice restaurants and cafés. The Wifi furnished room features a solid wood bed (140x200), a long sofa (60x167), a wardrobe, corner cupboard. The sofa is not so comfortable. The place is good for couples or a single person, animals are allowed.

name: schöne helle 1-2 Zimmer in privater
summary: Ich vermiete meine von mir belebte Wohnung mit Arbeitsraum und viel Platz. Da ich selbst in der Wohnung lebe ist alles nötige vorhanden. Mir ist es wichtig, das ihr mit meinen Sachen und der Wohnung so umgeht, als wäre es eure eigene! Keine Party's und keine Sauereien. Wer lieb ist wird sich hier sehr wohl fühlen. Große helle Wohnung mit viel zu entdecken, ein Balkon, ein Garten und hilfsbereite Nachbarn. Das Hochbett im Atelierraum ist immer verfügbar, Schlafzimmer muss abgesprochen werden.

name: Cosy room with private bathroom in Kreuzberg '65
summary: The room is on the ground floor of a maisonette apartment located near the popular Bergmannstrasse area of Kreuzberg. The room is a good size for couples, friends, or solo travellers, whether for business or leisure. We can even accommodate one or two kids in a travel cot or floor mattresses.
space: The room is very peaceful and in a separate part of the apartment to most of the flat's living area. The neighbourhood is also perfect, with something for everyone - whether shops, bars, cafes & restaurants, weekend markets, playgrounds, and parks.
description: The room is on the ground floor of a maisonette apartment located near the popular Bergmannstrasse area of Kreuzberg. The room is a good size for couples, friends, or solo travellers, whether for business or leisure. We can even accommodate one or two kids in a travel cot or floor mattresses. The room is very peaceful and in a separate part of the apartment to most of the flat's living area. The neighbourhood is also perfect, with something for everyone - whether shops, bars, cafes & restaurants, weekend markets, playgrounds, and parks. - You have your own bathroom/wet room with shower, sink, toilet, and hair dryer. - There is a large communal park which can be accessed via the main house corridor.  - Access to kitchen & private terrace, and use of washing machine by individual agreement. We're always here to offer advice on places to go in the neighbourhood or the rest of the city, or to help with anything else you might need during your stay. Our apartment is ideally located, between
neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is ideally located, between Bergmannstrasse and the Tempelhof Airfield, and close to two subway lines. Our area is fantastic for cafes, restaurants, shopping, markets, parks and playgrounds.
notes: - We have 2 cats (not suitable for those with allergies) - Wheelchair accessible (bathroom door is accessible only to certain types of wheelchairs - please check before booking) - We have two small children (age 4 & 6)
transit: Buses104,248 U-Bahn/Metro:  U6 (north-south) and U7 (east-west) Street parking available
access: - You have your own bathroom/wet room with shower, sink, toilet, and hair dryer. - There is a large communal park which can be accessed via the main house corridor.  - Access to kitchen & private terrace, and use of washing machine by individual agreement.
interaction: We're always here to offer advice on places to go in the neighbourhood or the rest of the city, or to help with anything else you might need during your stay.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Charlotte. I'm originally from London but for almost 13 years I've been living in the same neighbourhood in Berlin. For our family it's been an absolute joy to host people from all parts of the world, who have (via Airbnb) chanced upon this delightful corner of Kreuzberg. 

I also really enjoy meeting new people as a traveller, and I have been lucky enough to visit a lot of places in my life so far, especially in Europe and East Asia.

name: Vintage Design Apartment Berlin Prenzlauer Berg
summary: The apartment is perfectly situated in an original pre-war Berlin, Altbau ( old ) style building.  Freshly renovated in 2018, the 131 m² - 4 rooms apartment has enough place for 8 people to sleep. The flat with balcony has a modern fully-equiped kitchen with dishwasher, a bathroom with bathtub and a hairdryer. Sheets and towels are included. Get ready for a truly Berlin experience with high ceilings and original wooden floorboards.
description: The apartment is perfectly situated in an original pre-war Berlin, Altbau ( old ) style building.  Freshly renovated in 2018, the 131 m² - 4 rooms apartment has enough place for 8 people to sleep. The flat with balcony has a modern fully-equiped kitchen with dishwasher, a bathroom with bathtub and a hairdryer. Sheets and towels are included. Get ready for a truly Berlin experience with high ceilings and original wooden floorboards. You'll have access to the entire apartment: 4 bedrooms , kitchen/living room, bathroom and hall way. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any more questions! Located in the heart of the beautiful and historical Prenzlauer Berg at Helmholtzplatz, just off Kastanienallee (Berlin's most fashionable street) and on the edge of Mauerpark, home of Berlin's legendary Sunday flea market. Surrounded by chilled out bohemian coffee houses, affordable restaurants, dishing up tasty meals from all over the globe, vibrant bars, independent shops, second-hand clothing, a
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of the beautiful and historical Prenzlauer Berg at Helmholtzplatz, just off Kastanienallee (Berlin's most fashionable street) and on the edge of Mauerpark, home of Berlin's legendary Sunday flea market. Surrounded by chilled out bohemian coffee houses, affordable restaurants, dishing up tasty meals from all over the globe, vibrant bars, independent shops, second-hand clothing, art galleries and a great variety of young beautiful personalities. The apartment is a walking distance to Alexanderplatz and the nearest S-Bahn station is 400 m away.
notes: Information for visitors on Berlin’s hotel occupancy tax (excl. in the rate) What is being taxed? As of 1 January 2014, the federal state of Berlin will collect a Occupancy Tax on all overnight stays in hotels in Berlin. A “hotel” includes any type of short-term, paid accommodation, and the tax is due whether or not the hotel guest actually spends the night in the room. If the guest is in Berlin on business, the Occupancy Tax is not charged. In this case, the guest must give the hotel satisfactory proof that his or her stay is for business reasons. This proof must be provided at the latest by the time the guest leaves the hotel. How much is the tax? The Occupancy Tax is 5% of the price of the hotel room (without extras, such as meals, items from the minibar, the use of hotel services and facilities not included in the room price, etc.). Please find more details on the respective website. (Website hidden by Airbnb)  You'll find the detailed instructions for visitors as well as formulars
transit: Parking only with parking fee from Schönefeld:  A taxi ride from there is quite expensive (around 40 € ) and there are trains directly at the station. If you are arriving from Schönefeld, it is best to use public transportation. The best connection (S9) only runs about every half hour. Get off at Prenzlauer Allee S-Bahn station. From there you walk towards Helmholtzplatz where the apartment is.  from Tegel:  A taxi will cost around 20€. Public transportation is also a good option. If you take the TXL bus to Beusselstr. S-Bahn (Ring) and then take the train heading in the clockwise direction (S41) until you reach Prenzlauer Allee. From there you walk towards Helmholtzplatz where the apartment is.  from Main Train Station (Hauptbahnhof)  Take the tram M10 going east towards Warschauer Strasse and get out at Husemanstrasse. As soon as you get off the tram, walk towards Helmholtzplatz through Dunckerstrasse until you cross Raumstrasse where the apartment is.
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment: 4 bedrooms , kitchen/living room, bathroom and hall way.
interaction: Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any more questions!
house_rules: Bezahlung der City Tax in Berlin. 5% der Gesangbuchung
host_about:
WE LOVE INTERIOR DESIGN & A SUSTAINABLE WAY OF LIFE! We'll be more than happy to welcome you in our homes mixing emerging interior designer and mid century vintage gems. And we would like to share with you our environmentally friendly way of life this is why we use exclusively ecological
laundry detergents and cleaning agents. And if you enjoy your stay, shop our selected items for your home or locally sourced food in our shop just next door! For further info and news follow us on (Hidden by Airbnb) @dasgoodshaus!
