name: Cozy room with balcony for a short stay
summary: My flatmate Jonas and I (Jiu) are looking for calm and orderly guests for our beautiful living room, who leave the room as well as the kitchen and bathroom as found when moving in. :)
space: The apartment is on the beautiful Kaiserdamm street. There is a subway station on the U2 line right outside the front door. The living room has a balcony with a view of the garden and a fitted kitchen.
description: My flatmate Jonas and I (Jiu) are looking for calm and orderly guests for our beautiful living room, who leave the room as well as the kitchen and bathroom as found when moving in. :) The apartment is on the beautiful Kaiserdamm street. There is a subway station on the U2 line right outside the front door. The living room has a balcony with a view of the garden and a fitted kitchen. The living room with the sofa bed for sleeping The bathroom with toilet and shower The laundry room with washer dryer The kitchen if necessary Please always read the description first. And I prefer guests who book directly. Because the room looks exactly like the pictures. The U2 station is right outside the front door. To the left of the front door are REWE and an organic supermarket, the Lietzensee and some Italian restaurants. To the right of the front door are the beautiful Charlottenburg Palace, a Chinese restaurant (Ming Jia), Turkish restaurants, as well as Deutsche Bank and Commerzbank. There are nu
neighborhood_overview: The U2 station is right outside the front door. To the left of the front door are REWE and an organic supermarket, the Lietzensee and some Italian restaurants. To the right of the front door are the beautiful Charlottenburg Palace, a Chinese restaurant (Ming Jia), Turkish restaurants, as well as Deutsche Bank and Commerzbank.
notes: It is our living room. During the day, please pack the bedding and store it in the sofa bed. :) The walls are relatively thin, so please don't speak too loud in the apartment, especially in the bathroom and in the hallway. It is best not to shower or wash after 10 p.m. or at least very quietly. In the living room where you stay, it is quiet and you do not have to worry. :) If you use the kitchen, please clean it immediately afterwards - u. a. also because of the smell.
transit: There are numerous free parking spaces right on the doorstep in the middle of the street, next to the house and by the lake. There is a U2 station in front of the door, with which you can travel without changing: 1 min to Messe Nord / ICC and Zentraler Omnibusbahnhof Berlin 3 min to Deutsche Oper 6 minutes to Zoological Garden 9 min to KADEWE 15 minutes to Potsdamer Platz 19 min to city center 25 minutes to Alexanderplatz Tegel Airport can be reached in 15 minutes by bus 109. Unfortunately, it takes 1 hour to Schönefeld Airport. :)

name: Sunny Living Room in Neukölln
summary: Apartment consists of a sleeping room where i live, living room with a big sleeping sofa, kitchen and a small bathroom. The sun penetrates the interiors through the big windows. Minimalist design gives you the feeling of the arty, vibrant Neukölln.
description: Apartment consists of a sleeping room where i live, living room with a big sleeping sofa, kitchen and a small bathroom. The sun penetrates the interiors through the big windows. Minimalist design gives you the feeling of the arty, vibrant Neukölln. You have got access to the living room with a big sleeping sofa for two, there is a long corridor with a place for jackets and shoes.  There is also a kitchen that we share with a space that's big and comfortable enough for those who love to cook as myself :) In the kitchen you can also find a washing machine that is ready for use if needed.  There is also a small and cozy bathroom (we share it) with a shower that's big enough for two people to fit in :) There is also one small bedroom in the apartment - that's the room where i stay. If I am here in Berlin at the time of your stay - you can ask me anything :D and I will help you :)  if u ask me before, i can also provide u with some useful information about nice places, events and so on :) T
neighborhood_overview: The apartment located in the middle of the most rapidly evolving district in Berlin nowadays. Neukölln is full of little bars, cafes, restaurants and little antique shops that you will love.  It is located 5 minuets walk from Schiller Kiez, Hasenheide Park and 10 minutes walk from famous Tempelhofer Feld  and Reuter Kiez.
notes: You will get the set of your keys - but you need to be careful with all of them,  because in case if the key is lost - u will need to cover the cost of a lock change.
transit: The apartment is easily accesible with public transport as it is located directly next to  U-Bahn station Boddinstrasse (one minute walk - from the house door to U-Bahn elevator).  With U8 you can directly go to famous Kreuzberg and Mitte within 10, 15 minutes of ride.
access: You have got access to the living room with a big sleeping sofa for two, there is a long corridor with a place for jackets and shoes.  There is also a kitchen that we share with a space that's big and comfortable enough for those who love to cook as myself :) In the kitchen you can also find a washing machine that is ready for use if needed.  There is also a small and cozy bathroom (we share it) with a shower that's big enough for two people to fit in :) There is also one small bedroom in the apartment - that's the room where i stay.
interaction: If I am here in Berlin at the time of your stay - you can ask me anything :D and I will help you :)  if u ask me before, i can also provide u with some useful information about nice places, events and so on :)
house_rules: The only important thing is to treat the apartment with respect, as I also live here :) most of the furniture I built on my own - so it is very important to me that it stays undamaged :) I am occasional smoker, but I never do it at home - so it's important that you won't do it as well :P The apartment is gay and straight friendly :D and it is important that you are gay and straight friendly as well ;) When using the Internet WIFI you cannot use any P2P programs like torrents etc. , you cannot download any illegal music, films or programs.  If you feel like watching the movie you must use the websites with online streaming.
host_about: Hi, I am an architect living in Berlin. I love traveling, both backpacking and urban exploring. Sometimes I travel with my friends and sometimes alone. I enjoy being a guest and a host as well :)

name: cozy aptmnt in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: My freshly renovated and charming apartment is located in one of the most pleasant and relaxed neighborhoods within Prenzlauer Berg: Helmholzkiez. It is walking distance to vibrant Mitte with its many restaurants, cafes and clubs around Torstrasse!
space: Dear future guest,  You can feel totally at home in my apartment during your stay in pulsatile Berlin. Hope to welcome you in the near future in my spacious, style fully renovated apartment.  The apartment is suitable for two guests. It includes a kitchen, a bathroom, followed by a living room and a beautiful bedroom. The kitchen has all the machinery, including a washing machine, dish washer and utensils you will be needing to fix yourself a nice diner + a table for a dinner for two.  The bathroom is styleful and simple including a spacious shower, fresh towels and a hair dryer. The living room comes with a comfortable sofa allowing you to watch a movie on the flat screen with DVD, and next to that it also provides you with a dining area and access to the internet. The bedroom consists out of a king-size bed with enough space to store and hang your clothing. I  have placed a nice desk in front of the bedroom window which allows you to complete some work - if required.
description: My freshly renovated and charming apartment is located in one of the most pleasant and relaxed neighborhoods within Prenzlauer Berg: Helmholzkiez. neighborhood_overview: The location of the house couldn't be better! It’s at the heart Helmholzkiez, a pleasant and relaxed area full of nice cafes to have a beautiful breakfast eg at lovely “Le Midi “ next door. At the same time ist super close and well connected to vibrant Mitte with its Restaurants, Bars, Clubs,  Galleries, Museums, Theaters and Opera houses.
notes: + 10 Euro per night for a second guest. The apartement is perfect for couples! Discounts for Long termed stays upon request.  Minium stay: three nights
transit: Everything is in walking distance, but if you need to go a bit further: subway U2, which stops super Close by, provides fast track through town- for instance non stop to the West to Kurfürstendamm. Next public transports are Eberswalder Strasse (U2), Schönerhauser Allee ( S-Bahn Ringbahn to Airports Tegel and Schönefeld, Tempelhof) + various trams  (M2+M10)
access: The entire apartement is yours during the period of your stay!
interaction: I will be around upon check in and if requested happy to assist with up latest recommendations for places to eat, drinks, exhibitions, venues, etcetera.
house_rules: Please don't smoke and treat the apartment nice :-)
host_about: I am Berlin based design-enthusiast. After having used AirBnb for years as a guest, I am finally renting my apartment for the first time here in Berlin. I am a passionate traveller, enthusiast for arts, cooking and cycling!

Obwohl man sich mitten im pulsierenden Teil Prenzlauer Bergs befindet, ist die Wohnung, welche sich im Hinterhof befindet sehr ruhig. name: 142 m² Historical Arty Loft - Flat
summary: Entire Dream Altbau flat of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ft² in Friedrichshain , the heart of night life in Berlin (Berghain, Watergate Katerblau at 500m), but quiet with restaurants and bio/flea markets nearby.  Warm heatings, Oak floor, Original Vintage-DDR style, 6 suspension points for Shibari, Yoga Matts, decorated with original art works, Wifi, Dishwasher, Coffee!   Ideal for who wants an amazing stay,  ABSOLUTELY NO PARTY & NO LOUD MUSIC ! For Professional Photo/Video shoots, a different deal must be agreed
space: This is my real home (NOT a holiday flat) and when I travel you may stay in this 142m² original Altbau (Old Building) apartment in the heart of Berlin, with high ceilings 3.5m, oak floors, huge rooms, lots of lights with big wood windows, with double frames.  Even if is an old flat, everything is fully functional !!! the heatings are VERY powerfull and hot water has strong pressure for comfortable showers ! Please read carefully the distribution of beds and materasses. The apartment consist of * 1 Big bedroom, with a  Queen size bed (180x200cm). * 1 Small room with a bed of 140x200 and a built in loft bed for 2. * 1 Huge Salon , where there will be materasses (90x200) on the floor (up to 6)  * 1 huge kitchen (38sqm) *1 bathroom with bathtub and separate shower cabinet, bidet (yes :) *The all place is a NO SMOKING place, but there are two balconies. *Any form of PARTY or VERY LOUD MUSIC and NOISE is Absolutely FORBIDDEN ! *No Shoes in the flat, clean slippers are provided !

neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, the heart of night life in Berlin. The flat is located at walkable distance from famous night clubs as Berghain, Watergate, Katerblau.  Also Mercedes Arena and Universal Studios are at 5 minutes walk. The East side Gallery with its famous murales are around the corner, as well as the famous RAW area of revaler strasse.  However the area is also quiet with restaurants and bio markets nearby. Boxi flea market on sunday is a not to be missed for the lovers of vintage and antiquites that dont want to suffer in the overcrowed mauer park (still nice and reachable with 15 minutes of m10 tram).
notes: there is only one bathroom in the all flat.
transit: If you want to move, you have 3 directions 0) Berghain, Watergate, KaterBlau etc are all at walkable distance (5-10mins). 1) m10 brings you north to prenzlauer berg in 15 minutes 2) u5 brings you to Alexandre platz and mitte (Centre) in 10 minutes 3) Walking or U1 bring you to Kreuzberg (South) in 10 minutes Maps and more infos are provided in the flat !
access: You can rent the entire flat ONLY when I am travelling. You will be alone in the flat and have access to all its parts : You can use my equipment and basic food for cooking, and everything in the flat is ready for you. You will also find Shampoo, Shower gels, Toothpaste and all the basics need for travelling. Towels and Bed-linen are provided of course !
interaction: I will be travelling, therefore I will not be in the flat and you are renting the all flat for yourself !
house_rules: THESE RULES MUST BE RESPECTED BY ALL THE GUESTS AND ARE NOT NEGOTIABLE : - NO PARTY, NO LOUD MUSIC at ANY time,; Between 23pm and 8am Place must be quiet (also no screaming, slamming doors etc) -NO SMOKE INDOOR ( Use the 2 balconies). A fine of 500 Euros will be applied if you smoke inside the flat: -NO EXTERNAL GUESTS -NO SHOES (slippers provided) -COPY of an ID must be taken at check in for each guest if you are not ok with these rules, please book another place, if you disturb my neighbors, your staying will be terminated
host_about:
I live in a huge old flat (100% original berliner altbau) and travel a lot for work and holidays.
When I travel you have the chance to rent the all flat for yourself, when I am  here I love to host and meet new people from all over the world.

I am a photographer and a tango dancer. I am very open minded, I have been living and working in Rome, London, Paris, New York.
My girlfriend often helps me in the flat.
We are very calm and quiet and silent, and I like that atmosphere in the flat.
Please only book these rooms if you are able to enter and respect someone's else home and being able to interact with strangers.
Those who are looking only for a cheap accommodation during their crazy weekends in Berlin, please go to a youth hostel.

name: Apartment with view to TV-Tower in Heart of Berlin
summary: This beautiful apartment is located in the most central point of Berlin Mitte near Friedrichstraße.  This 2 room apartment have 72 sqm and has one bedroom and a spacious living room with a dinette and a excellent view over the Torstraße and the Berlin TV tower. A fully equipped kitchen and a nice bathroom are also included. The apartment is in the 4rd floor of a nice authentic old building (Altbau), beautiful from outside and inside.
space: This beautiful apartment is located in the most central point of Berlin Mitte near Friedrichstraße.  This 2 room apartment have 72 sqm and has one bedroom and a spacious living room with a dinette and a excellent view over the Torstraße and the Berlin TV tower. A fully equipped kitchen and a nice bathroom are also included. The apartment is in the 4rd floor of a nice authentic old building (Altbau), beautiful from outside and inside. There is a double bed in the bed room. In the living room is a big couch.  This apartment is available for long term lettings. If you're searching for a place for 3 month and more, please let me know. I'm sure we'll find a nice place for you! The prices depends to the length of your stay. From 6 month and more I give a discount. Please ask me regarding the prices.

neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect for a visit and stay in Berlin as it is centrally located in Mitte, therefore close to all attractions but also to the bohemian city life of Berlin, so you can really blend in. Shops, cafes, restaurants and trendy bars are around and public transport is very accessible. Late night kiosk and 24 hours pharmacy is less then 10 minutes away.
notes: On a request for a rental period less then 6 month we add 7% VAT to the monthly rent. On a long term rental we also sign a lease with the guests.
transit: Walking Distances - Trains: U-Bahn Oranienburger Tor - 6 min walk U-Bahn + S-Bahn Friedrichstrasse - 10 min walk U-Bahn Rosenthalerplatz - 6 min walk Taxi stand 24 hours: 6 min walk
house_rules: - Dear guests, Please pay attention to the house rules. First of all smoking is not allowed. Please take your shoes off when you come in. Be also very respectful with your neighbors. This is not a hostel. This is a inhabited house full of people, which always lives here. They don't want to be disturbed by noise or loud music, especially at night. After 10 pm you have to behave yourself quiet. Please treat the people around you in the same way, you would expect it from your neighbors at home. Last but not least please treat the apartment and the furniture also with respect and leave the apartment in clean conditions.
host_about: Hello Guys, welcome in Berlin. I love travelling around the world. In combination to meet new peoples from all over makes Airbnb very interesting for me. I hope to see you soon in my apartment and would like also to visit yours.

name: Bright 2-bedroom-apartment in trendy Kreuzberg
summary: Kreuzberg von seiner besten Seite - Ruhige, sehr helle und zentrale 2-Zimmer-Wohnung.  Alle Zimmer haben eine Klimaanlage. Genieße Deinen Morgenkaffee auf dem Ost-Balkon und Deinen Sundowner auf der West-Terrasse. Praktisch gelegen: 5 min bis zur U-Bahn, direkt am Viktoriapark mit seinem Wasserfall und Blick auf ganz Berlin,  zahlreiche charmante Cafés und Restaurants in der Nähe (Bergmannstraße) Schnelles Internet und Fernsehen mit Netflix stehen zur Verfügung
space: 1 Wohnzimmer mit halboffener Küche, 1 Schlafzimmer, Bad, Terrasse und Balkon. Es gibt ein großes Doppelbett im Schlafzimmer und ein bequemes Schlafsofa.

name: TAUTS HOME Hufeisensiedlung Berlin
summary: Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Hufeisensiedlung (Horseshoe Estate) by famous architect Bruno Taut. Rentable house of the 1920s with garden for design lovers: restored true to the original, frequently awarded and mentioned in press and media.
space: Suitable for up to four guests, "Taut’s Home" is a real-life experience of design history with the character of a museum.  For outstanding contributions and excellence in monument preservation Taut's Home received the "European Union Prize for Cultural Heritage / Europa Nostra Award 2013", which is considered as the "Oscar" for monument preservation. The house is located in the famous "Horseshoe Estate" designed by Bruno Taut in 1925-30 - probably the most outstanding example of innovative German town planning. In 2008 the estate in the south of vibrant Berlin was awarded UNESCO World Heritage status.  "Taut's Home" was frequently appreciated by the press, since it gives architecture lovers from all over the world a chance to enjoy and experience the genuine interior colors, clever room layouts and numerous originals of this famous German architect. Although the vacation home is completely restored and furnished in the style of the 1930s, it is equipped with all the modern amenities, t
description: Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Hufeisensiedlung (Horseshoe Estate) by famous architect Bruno Taut. Rentable house of the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s with garden for design lovers: restored true to the original, frequently awarded and mentioned in press and media. For outstanding contributions and excellence in monument preservation Taut's Home received the "European Union Prize for Cultural Heritage / Europa Nostra Award (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ", which is considered as the "Oscar" for monument preservation. In (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) the estate in the south of vibrant Berlin was awarded UNESCO World Heritage status.  "Taut's Home" was frequently apprecia
neighborhood_overview: Only a few hundred meters from Taut’s Home and the famous Horseshoe Estate stands Schloss Britz, a handsome classicist building in leafy surrounds with a manor and farm converted for cultural events. In the one-time stables you’ll now find two recommendable fine restaurants and two museums. What is more, is that the hip districts of Neukölln and Kreuzberg are just a few subway stations away. To go to the Centre (i.e. to Bahnhof Friedrichstraße or Alexanderplatz) takes about 20-25 minutes. For more info please see:  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (about the environs)
notes: For further infos please see our website - i.e.:  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (booking calender)  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (provided equipment)  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (FAQ)
transit: subway line U7, one of the main routes passing all the important lines, is just 100 metres away and takes you everywhere. It runs very 3-10 minutes far until midnight and on weekends even 24 hours/day. Please see:  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (about public transport)
access: No limitations - full access to house and garden
interaction: We live nearby and have very good knowledge about the surrounding UNESCO World heritage and its history. Therefore we also offer guided tours in German or English, which can be booked for a reduced rate of €50. For all those, who want to read first, we also published a specific architectural guide book, entitled "Bruno Tauts Hufeisensiedlung" (ISBN (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ). The book is available in a bilingual edition featuring German and English. It can be obtained at us directly or via Amazon & Co.:For further infos please see:  (Website hidden by Airbnb) (about guided tours)   (Website hidden by Airbnb) (about the book)
house_rules: Alle Einrichtungsstände und Möbel können komplett benutzt werden. Bei Originalen der 20er Jahre und den Wandfarben bitten wir lediglich um pflegliche Behandlung. Auch die historischen Kachelöfen können im Winter gerne in Betrieb genommen werden - dies jedoch nur nach kurzer Einführung. Im Sommer ist Obst- und Beerenpflücken natürlich erlaubt. Gästeinformationen liegen vor Ort aus. Zusatzschlüssel, Geschenkgutscheine, ortskundige Führungen o.ä. sind möglich. Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch.
host_about:
Das Taute Heim ist ein Projekt von Liebhabern für Liebhaber: Katrin und ich sind privat und beruflich stark im Bereich Architektur und Denkmalschutz engagiert und wurde für Tautes Heim mehrfach ausgezeichnet. Wir haben bei Renovierung und Ausstattung unseres Kleinods selbst viel Hand angelegt und hoffen durch die Vermietung diese Arbeit irgendwann refinanzieren zu können. Wir wohnen einige Straßen weiter und kennen uns vor Ort hervorragend, aber auch vielen anderen interessanten Ecken Berlins ganz gut aus. Wenn Du/Sie/ihr im Tauten Heim zu Gast sein wollt – Wir freuen uns immer, interessante Menschen oder auch neue Orte kennen zu lernen ...

Taut‘s Home is a place especially designed for architecture lovers. This is our personal and professional passion, too. And it was our motivation for creating this very unique place that has been frequently awarded. The rent helps us to refund our expenses for something that comes quite close to a type of museum that was still missing in Berlin. Katrin and I are living just a few blocks away and have very good knowledge about the estates history and a bunch of other places worth seeing in Berlin. We would be glad to have you as our guests and are always eager to meet new interesting people or discover special places ourselves ...

name: EXPERIENCE BERLIN:  In Vibrant Kreuzkölln.
summary: Stunning one-bedroom apartment in a classic Berlin Altbau on the border of Hasenheide and Templehof. Raw & industrial meets Weimar grandeur in Berlin's most trendy and vibrant district. Wood floors, high ceilings and a private balcony make our place the perfect base for your stay in Berlin. Kreuzkölln is the district of Berlin between Kreuzberg and Neukölln, and is the new, up-and-coming neighborhood in Berlin right now.
space: Beautiful one bedroom flat with a separate living room, bathroom, and kitchen, and of course your very own balcony.
description: Stunning one-bedroom apartment in a classic Berlin Altbau on the border of Hasenheide and Templehof. Raw & industrial meets Weimar grandeur in Berlin's most trendy and vibrant district. Wood floors, high ceilings and a private balcony make our place the perfect base for your stay in Berlin. Kreuzkölln is the district of Berlin between Kreuzberg and Neukölln, and is the new, up-and-coming neighborhood in Berlin right now. Beautiful one bedroom flat with a separate living room, bathroom, and kitchen, and of course your very own balcony. Access to the building is through a safe, shared entrance that is looked after 7 days a week by our building manager. Your new apartment lies in the leafy crossover of trendy Kreuzberg and edgier Neukölln (Kreuzkölln!) Both areas are well known for their hip bars, world class eateries, vibrant nightlife, and flourishing art-scene.  Walk out the door and straight ahead is the gorgeous Hasenheide Park, look left and the unique Templehof Park (once a cold wa
neighborhood_overview: Your new apartment lies in the leafy crossover of trendy Kreuzberg and edgier Neukölln (Kreuzkölln!) Both areas are well known for their hip bars, world class eateries, vibrant nightlife, and flourishing art-scene.  Walk out the door and straight ahead is the gorgeous Hasenheide Park, look left and the unique Templehof Park (once a cold war airport) awaits on the border of Schillerkiez. One of Berlin's best kept secrets, the Schillerkiez is dotted with independent cafes, bars, and craft shops and is the gateway to Templehof!
notes: Contact me by (Hidden by Airbnb) or message anytime!
transit: The apartment is 2 minutes walk to U-Bahn Boddinstrasse - Line U8  (11 minutes by train to city centre) and 5 minutes walk to U-Bahn Rathouse Neukolln - Line U7. With frequent buses on Colombia Damm and Hermannstrasse.
access: Access to the building is through a safe, shared entrance that is looked after 7 days a week by our building manager.

name: Sehr schön in Neukölln! Female Friendly <3
summary: Perfect location! Weserstrasse: the pulse of Neukölln with loads of great bars & restaurants. Located on a quiet block, you won't be kept awake by partyers, but can people-watch from the balcony. Just a 5 min walk from the canal, perfect for jogging.
space: Bright and airy 23qm room with a comfy single bed. There's a lovely old piano, which you are free to play. You can breakfast on the balcony or in the cosy chairs at the coffee table. Our bathroom is fully equipped with both a shower and a bathtub.
description: Perfect location! Weserstrasse: the pulse of Neukölln with loads of great bars & restaurants. Located on a quiet block, you won't be kept awake by partyers, but can people-watch from the balcony. Just a 5 min walk from the canal, perfect for jogging. Bright and airy 23qm room with a comfy single bed. There's a lovely old piano, which you are free to play. You can breakfast on the balcony or in the cosy chairs at the coffee table. Our bathroom is fully equipped with both a shower and a bathtub. You are free to use the kitchen as long as you clean up after yourself. Kristin (my flatmate) will be at the house this week in the room opposite. She works full-time, but is happy to have a coffee with you and give you tips for what to see. Good food, interesting&quirky bars, clubs, open air Turkish market on Tuesdays and Fridays, beautiful canal to walk or jog along, lots of trees along the canal, urban and nature all at once ! Neukölln is currently the quarter for artists and musicians. Come a
neighborhood_overview: Good food, interesting&quirky bars, clubs, open air Turkish market on Tuesdays and Fridays, beautiful canal to walk or jog along, lots of trees along the canal, urban and nature all at once ! Neukölln is currently the quarter for artists and musicians. Come and be inspired. :D
notes: If you are looking for a restful, artsy home base with an authentic taste of life in Berlin, then this is the flat for you! If you are coming here to party for a week straight, then this is not the place for you. :)
transit: 5 minute walk from the bus-stop, 10 minute walk from the U-Bahn. Loads of bars, restaurants, parks and markets to experience within walking distance. Supermarket is a 5 minutes walk away.
access: You are free to use the kitchen as long as you clean up after yourself.
interaction: Kristin (my flatmate) will be at the house this week in the room opposite. She works full-time, but is happy to have a coffee with you and give you tips for what to see.
house_rules: Smoking is only allowed on the balcony.
host_about:
I am a US-born photographer who grew up in Ireland and Germany. I trained in photography and literature in the USA and relocated to Europe in 2009, spending four years in Prague, CZ. Currently, I live and work in Berlin, a city alive with creative energy and a fascinating history.
 (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Charming Ap with Yard and Balconies
summary: A freshly renovated apartment in an old building with wooden floors and a fully equippt kitchen. The building has a huge private shared garden with a playground.
space: The nearby area is crowded with small boutiques, coffe-shops, and restaurants. there are two supermarkets less than 100 meter away. By foot you can easily reach Kastanienallee, Helmholzplatz, Kollwitzplatz, Mauerpark (where the famous flee market is), Kulturbrauerei and more. The Tram and S-Bahn station Prenzlauer Allee is just 3 min. walk. From there you have a quick and direct connection to Alexanderplatz, Hackescher markt, Messe Nord/ICC and Schoenefeld Airport.   Bike rentals are also close by.

name: Quiet, Convenient City Escape
summary: Friedrichshain Gem: Quiet, Cozy, Convenient
space: Sie finden uns im Norden Friedrichshains, weniger als 10 Gehminuten vom Boxhangener Platz, öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln wie U5, Ringbahn und Straßenbahn sowie einer Vielzahl von Cafés, Restaurants, Bars und Supermärkten. Auf unseren Straßen gibt es kostenpflichtige Parkplätze, und die Gäste können zwei Blocks entfernt kostenlos parken. Wir haben einen Gemeinschaftsgarten mit Spielplatz und Sandkasten für Kinder.  We are situated in northern Friedrichshain, less than 10 minutes walking distance from Boxhangener Platz, public transport including the U5, Ringbahn, and Straßenbahn, and a variety of different cafes, restaurants, bars, and supermarkets. There is paid parking on our streets, and guests can park for free two blocks away. We have a shared garden equipped with a playground and sandbox for children.

name: Newly renovated apartment with a great view
summary: Newly renovated apartment on the top floor of a quiet and respectful building. The cosy apartment has a balcony with an excellent view of the surrounding area and a view of Berlin. A peaceful neighbourhood with all the shops you need for a good stay, these include Rewe, Edika, Kaufland, Lidl, Aldi, and Norma all within a 10 minute walking distance. You are also surrounded by lakes and parks with opportunities for many recreational sports such as table tennis, basketball and football.
description: Newly renovated apartment on the top floor of a quiet and respectful building. The cosy apartment has a balcony with an excellent view of the surrounding area and a view of Berlin. A peaceful neighbourhood with all the shops you need for a good stay, these include Rewe, Edika, Kaufland, Lidl, Aldi, and Norma all within a 10 minute walking distance. You are also surrounded by lakes and parks with opportunities for many recreational sports such as table tennis, basketball and football. Guest will have access to their own room, which is usually my room. You can also use the livingroom and kitchen, feel free to hangout with my other 2 housemates. We are a friendly household. The bathroom is obviously available to guests along with a balcony with a great view. Feel free to contact me at anytime during your stay if you have any questions.  We're an international household so we like meeting and socialising with people from different cultures. However do not feel obligated to socialise as we
transit: Transportation: It's easy getting around and getting into the city takes 25 minutes. There are many transport methods: 1. S-bahn Walk 5 minutes to the S-bahn station Storkower Strasse and take the ring-bahn S41, take 2 stops to Ostkreaz and change to any of the S3, S5, S7 or S9 which takes you directly to Alexanderplatz. This takes 20 minutes. 2.  Tram Once you exit the building turn left and walk 5 minutes towards the trams. Take the M8 which takes you directly to into Mitte in 20 minutes. 3. Bus station There is a bus station at Storkower Strasse which allows multiple transport links to various locations around Berlin.
access: Guest will have access to their own room, which is usually my room. You can also use the livingroom and kitchen, feel free to hangout with my other 2 housemates. We are a friendly household. The bathroom is obviously available to guests along with a balcony with a great view.
interaction: Feel free to contact me at anytime during your stay if you have any questions.  We're an international household so we like meeting and socialising with people from different cultures. However do not feel obligated to socialise as we also respect each others space.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house - Quiet after 19:00 - Smoking only on the balcony - Keep it clean

name: 7 Bed Community Crash Pad
summary: The Kater apartments are an ideal destination for groups and city travellers who want to live in one of the most inspiring and creative parts of Berlin. Its located on Warschauer Straße in the Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg district next to the legendary remainder of the Berlin Wall, the East Side Gallery, and nightlife institutions like the Berghain and the Kater Blau. The Individual houses of Warschauer Straße have been listed as historical monuments since the 1980s.
space: Built in the 1910's, the Kater apartments are located in a towering brick building on the hectic Warschauer strasse, across 3 separate entries. The building houses a mixture of restaurants, local shops and residential living. The options range from an Intimate Crash Pad of 25 square meters sleeping two in a double bed, up to several multi-room multi-bed apartments sleeping up to seven people. The Crash Pads are ideal for group travellers and those who enjoy Berlin's busy day and nightlife.

neighborhood_overview: The Kater apartments are located on the legendary Warschauer Straße, which begins at Frankfurter Tor to the North and spans 1.6km South to the intersection of the Oberbaumbrücke, Mühlenstraße and Stralauer Allee. The street holds a high pulse both in terms of people, traffic and activity. Within minutes by foot you will be at historical landmarks such as the Berlin wall, the Wall Museum, and the East Side Gallery. Night clubs within walking distance include institutions such as Watergate, IPSE, Salon zur wilden Renate, the Berghain, the Kater Blau and many more. Please ask for our in-house curated recommendations.

name: Stylische Wohnung zwischen Kudamm und Messe
summary: Biete stylische, ruhige Wohnung mit Bad und Küchenutzung in Berlin-Charlottenburg in Ku'Damm-Nähe. U- und S-Bahn in Laufweite. Fahrradnutzung möglich. Stylish apartment between Kurfürstendamm and fairground. Close to public transport
space: Die Altbauwohnung besteht aus einem kleineren Schlafzimmer, einem wunderschönen, neuem Bad mit freistehender Badewanne und hohem Waschtisch, sowie einem grossem Zimmer(33qm)mit Küche und Bartisch und sehr grosser Couch. Die Wohnung befindet sich im Seitenflügel und ist ruhig. The apartment consists of a smaller bedroom, a beautiful new bathroom with freestanding bathtub and high washstand, as well as a large room (33 sqm) with kitchen and bar table and very large couch. The apartment is located in the side wing and is quiet.

Nur 5 Minuten bis zum Kurfürstendamm, S- Bahn Charlottenburg ist auch in 5 Minuten erreichbar. Die nächste U - Bahn ist der Adenauerplatz,bis dort sind es ca. 10 Minuten. Bis zur Messe ist es eine S - Bahn Station. Wer sich erholen möchte, geht zum Lietzensee , in 15 Minuten ist man dort zu Fuß
transit: S-Bahnhof Charlottenburg  5 Min.entfernt U-Bahnhof Adnauer Plat (Website hidden by Airbnb) Min.entfernt Kudammbusse   Lehniner Platz   4 Min.entfernt

host_about:
Hallo,ich heiße Regina,wohne mitten in Charlottenburg,2 Minuten vom Kurfürstendamm,trotzdem total ruhig.
Mit der S- Bahn seid ihr ganz schnell und bequem in Berlin - Mitte.
Ich kenne mich natürlich gut aus in Berlin,gebe euch viele Tipps,egal was ihr sucht- ich kann euch helfen!
Ich finde es total spannend Menschen aus der ganzen Welt bei mir begrüßen zu dürfen!
Also,herzlich willkommen!

name: Luxus pur in Berlin - nah zu Sehenswürdigkeiten
summary: Hier trifft Charlottenburg auf Tradition, Naturnähe durch den schönen Lietzenseepark kombiniert mit Charlottenburger Kiezalltag. In der Nähe liegt der Theodor-Heuss-Platz, mit der Einkaufsstraße Reichsstraße.
space: Bei dieser ansprechenden Immobilie handelt es sich um einen Erstbezug in eine Wohnung im fünften Stock, die durch eine luxuriöse Innenausstattung (Küche mit Miele Geräten, Parkett, Fussbodenheizung, Be-/Entlüftungsautomatik, Waschtrockner, sehr hochwertige Designer-Inneneinrichtung usw.) besticht und kurzfristig bezogen werden kann. Zu der Wohnung zählen zwei attraktive Zimmer. Die letzte Modernisierung fand erst vor Kurzem, im Jahr 2019, statt. Das Objekt ist barrierefrei und bequem über einen Fahrstuhl zu erreichen. Beachten Sie auch, dass sich auf dem Balkon wunderbar vom Alltag erholen lässt. Zur Verfügung steht Ihnen auch ein Stellplatz für Ihr Auto. In der Nähe befinden sich viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Restaurants und Naherholungsgebiete wie der Lietzenseepark oder das Schloss Charlottenburg. Die Wohnung wird wöchentlich gereinigt. Diese Reinigung ist im Preis enthalten.  Ausstattung: Parkett, Luxusküche, Miele (Induktionsherd, Mikrowelle, Kühl-/Gefrierschrank, Ofen), Hoover Was

name: Minimal/Mid-Century inspired room in Prenzlberg
summary: Das Zimmer (ca. 23 qm) in einer 2 Zimmerwohnung verfügt über ein Bett (140x200 cm), einem kleinen Sessel sowie Kleiderstange und Sideboard für die Lagerung von Kleidung. Das Zimmer liegt zur Straßenseite, dennoch ist es ruhig, da es eine ruhige Seitenstraße ist.
space: Die Wohnung liegt im Prenzlauer Berg in der Nähe von der Ringbahn. Wichtig zu erwähnen ist, dass sie im 4. OG liegt und es keinen Fahrstuhl gibt.  Man kann alle verschiedenen Verkehrsmittel wie U-Bahn (Schönhauser Allee), S-Bahn (Bornholmer Str.) und Tram kurz zu Fuß erreichen, deswegen kann man relativ schnell an den gewünschten Ort gelangen.

space: We're offering 2 rooms in our 3-bedroom flat with 2 bathrooms and a kitchen available to guests. Our flatmate will be staying in the 3rd room and be available to give any tips on what to do in Berlin.

Our flatmate will be staying in the 3rd room and be available to give any tips on what to do in Berlin. Guests can access the 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms and kitchen. My boyfriend or I will be available via text messaging throughout the time you are staying at our place and our 3rd flatmate will also be available in Berlin while you're there if anything goes wrong. neighborhood_overview: The Schillerkiez is one of the nicest neighbourhoods in Berlin. Right beside Tempelhof park with loads of amazing food places, cafes and restaurants. There's a great pizza place around the corner as well as an amazing burger spot. Also several great hangover breakfast options. Just ask and I can point you in the right direction.
transit: The flat is less than 5 minutes from Boddinstrasse U-Bahn station which is on the U8 line. It takes less than 10 minutes to get Kotti and around 15 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz.

name: Künstlerzimmerchen / tiny artist's bedroom
summary: Vermiete ein gemütliches, aber 5qm-winziges, aber gut aufgeteiltes Zimmerchen (von insg. 4 Zimmern) mit bequemem Loft Bed für 1 Person (!) im Gründerzeitaltbau von 1906 mit reichlich Streetart an der Facade. Gemeinsames: Wohnzimmer (mit Klavier), Wohnküche und Badezimmer. Grüner, ruhiger Szene-Kiez: Cafés, Geschäfte, gegenüber Mauerpark. Ein Video darüber gibt's auf (Website hidden by Airbnb)
space: Wir wohnen als Wohngemeinschaft zu sechst auf 2 Etagen, teilen uns eine Küche und 2 Bäder, sowie eine Werkstatt, die wir gemeinsam zum Kulturcafé ausbauen. Auf weltoffene Gäste, die auf unseren teilweise sehr auf Umweltfreundlichkeit und Nachhaltigkeit orientierten Lebensstil neugierig sind, freuen wir uns immer am meisten. Aber jeder ist herzlich willkommen und wir sind gespannt, Euch ein bißchen kennenzulernen!

Auf weltoffene Gäste, die auf unseren teilweise sehr auf Umweltfreundlichkeit und Nachhaltigkeit orientierten Lebensstil neugierig sind, freuen wir uns immer am meisten. Aber jeder ist herzlich willkommen und wir sind gespannt, Euch ein bißchen kennenzulernen! Das Badezimmer wird mit zwei weiteren Personen, die teilweise berufstätig sind, und die Küche werden mit 5 weiteren Personen geteilt. Direkt neben dem Gästezimmer gibt es ein gemütliches
neighborhood_overview: An der ehemaligen Berliner Mauer ruhig gelegene Wohngemeinschaft mit vielen Cafés, Supermärkten und 2 Flohmärkten, Strassenbahnen und 2 U-Bahnlinien ganz in der Nähe (~5 Min.). Eins von 2 kleinen Zimmern mit gemeinsamem Wohnzimmer zu vermieten. Freigeister und Kosmopoliten willkommen!
transit: 2 Gehminuten zur Strassenbahn M10, Haltestelle Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn-Sportpark, fährt 24/7, verbindet in 12 Minuten mit Berlin-Hauptbahnhof und dadurch mit den beiden Flughäfen (Regionalbahn & Bus TXL). Die M10 kreuzt auch S1/S2/S25 Nordbahnhof und U6-Naturkundemuseum. Fußläufig in jeweils 5 Minuten auch U2-Eberswalder Strasse und U8-Bernauer Strasse, die jeweils 3 Stationen nördlich von Alexanderplatz liegen. Auch die Strassenbahn M1 liegt 5 Minuten südlich vom Haus und verbindet uns mit den S-Bahnhöfen Hackescher Markt und Friedrichstrasse.
access: Das Badezimmer wird mit zwei weiteren Personen, die teilweise berufstätig sind, und die Küche werden mit 5 weiteren Personen geteilt. Direkt neben dem Gästezimmer gibt es ein gemütliches Wohnzimmer, das nur mit einer weiteren Person geteilt wird, darin befindet sich der Schreibtisch und ein bequemes Sofa.
house_rules: - Ruhezeiten zwischen 22 und 6 Uhr morgens. Strassenschuhe dürfen in der Wohnung nicht getragen und am Eingang abgestellt werden.

Die Hütte ist klein aber Oho mit einer Kinder Schlafhöhle und der Garten groß und Oho...mit Hängematte, Fußballtor, Pool (aufblasbar) Riesen Trampolin und viele Spielsachen  vor allem für kleine Artisten:-)
house_rules: - Ankommen, runter kommen, Spaß haben, genießen und sich zu Hause fühlen.
host_about:
Ich liebe das Leben, schön wohnen, bunt verreisen, lecker essen und lautes Kinderlachen. Unser Garten ist das bunte Schmuckstück unseres kinderreichen Lebens, indem wir schon viele tolle Feste gefeiert haben und ab diesem Jahr auch anderen Menschen die Möglichkeit geben wollen wahres Gartenglück mitten in Berlin zu erleben. 

Wer zu uns kommt hat es schön, wird herzlich empfangen und bekommt tolle Insider Tips.

Meine Lebensmotto: Man kann einem Menschen nichts lehren. Man kann ihm nur helfen, es in sich selbst zu entdecken. (Galileo Galilei)

name: Beautiful flat in Schillerkiez
summary: Clean, stylish, comfortable and functional flat in the best area of Berlin.
space: The flat which is situated on  the 3rd floor is refurbished with love and encompasses a small but fully-equiped kitchen, a bathroom, a bedroom, a nursery, a livingroom and a balcony. The total surface is 67m2. The bedroom has a 160x200 which can be used by a single person or a couple. Due to the nursery including one bed for a child the flat is very suitable for families.
description: Clean, stylish, comfortable and functional flat in the best area of Berlin. The flat which is situated on  the 3rd floor is refurbished with love and encompasses a small but fully-equiped kitchen, a bathroom, a bedroom, a nursery, a livingroom and a balcony. The total surface is 67m2. The bedroom has a 160x200 which can be used by a single person or a couple. Due to the nursery including one bed for a child the flat is very suitable for families. During your stay I will be on holidays but we can stay in touch via Mail or Whats App. The flat is situated in a quiet street on the third floor. The neighbourhood is young and full of artists from all over the world. Schillerkiez has experienced an upsurge in cafes, bars, restaurants, second-hand shops and galleries whilst remaining authentic and not touristy. Every Saturday there's a little market just around the corner with organic and regional products which should definitely be visited. A supermarket is only a minute away and commercial H
neighborhood_overview: The flat is situated in a quiet street on the third floor. The neighbourhood is young and full of artists from all over the world. Schillerkiez has experienced an upsurge in cafes, bars, restaurants, second-hand shops and galleries whilst remaining authentic and not touristy. Every Saturday there's a little market just around the corner with organic and regional products which should definitely be visited. A supermarket is only a minute away and commercial Hermannstraße with all amenities only 50m. The mixture of urbanism and nature in this hood is just perfect. Famous Tempelhofer Feld and a big Park Hasenheide are literally only a stone throw away.
transit: Underground Boddinstr. and Bus 104, 166 are only 5 Minutes away. You have very good connection to all parts of Berlin.
interaction: During your stay I will be on holidays but we can stay in touch via Mail or Whats App.
house_rules: Please bring your own towels. Please clean the flat before you are leaving

I'm Kathi and I'm working in the tourism industry and therefore I'm travelling a lot. Whilst I'm away I'm subletting my flat:)

name: ROOM in stunning 6th-floor Neukölln loft apartment
summary: Spacious private room with a comfortable bed for two in a stylish loft apt in Neukölln, the trendiest neighbourhood in town. With own balcony terrace. The apt. is quiet and calm with plenty of windows, two terraces and skylights: it couldn't be brighter and fresher. The kitchen is fully equipped and rooms are tastefully furnished. Located in the middle of up-and-coming bars, restaurants, and cinemas and is a short walk away from Tempelhofer Feld, Berlin's famous airport-turned-park.
space: I'm sharing with you a private room in my very own home: a newly refurbished and fully-furnished loft flat in the very heart of Neukölln, the trendiest neighbourhood in Berlin. The apartment is bright and spacious. With floor-to-ceiling windows and skylights, the flat couldn't be brighter nor fresher. You'll also enjoy two balconies: a west-facing balcony with a view over the main street and the park, and a quiet east-facing terrace overlooking the backyard and more parks! Living- and bedrooms are tastefully furnished and the kitchen is fully equipped. The apartment reflects my frequent travels, my own books, feels homely, and is fully-equipped with all amenities to make your stay comfortable: washing machine, TV, stereo system, coffee machine, and other kitchen amenities. Basically, if you're looking for a comfortable stay at home and a great experience in Berlin's coolest Kiez, you're in for a treat.
description: Spacious private room with a comfortable bed for two in a stylish loft apt in Neukölln, the trendiest neighbourhood in town. With own balcony terrace. The apt. is quiet and calm with plenty of windows, two terraces and skylights: it couldn't be brighter and fresher. The kitchen is fully equipped and rooms are tastefully furnished. Located in the middle of up-and-coming bars, restaurants, and cinemas and is a short walk away from Tempelhofer Feld, Berlin's famous airport-turned-park. I'm sharing with you a private room in my very own home: a newly refurbished and fully-furnished loft flat in the very heart of Neukölln, the trendiest neighbourhood in Berlin. The apartment is bright and spacious. With floor-to-ceiling windows and skylights, the flat couldn't be brighter nor fresher. You'll also enjoy two balconies: a west-facing balcony with a view over the main street and the park, and a quiet east-facing terrace overlooking the backyard and more parks! Living- and bedrooms are tastefull
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly located. You'll be staying only a short walk away from Berlin's famous Tempelhofer Feld (airport-turned-park). The neighbourhood itself is home to many up-and-coming bars and restaurants. Neukölln is home to some of Berlin's newest trendy bars and cafés. Lots of homely places tucked away offering gourmet breakfasts, brunches. In addition to this, there's a trendy bar or a local Kneipe on practically every corner! There's something for every taste! The neighbourhood is home to a very diverse population: lots of students, artists, Germans, Turks, Spanish, Italian, Arab, and Jewish. You can imagine what that means in terms of good food, good vibes, and good nightlife. The apartment's also one minute away from the underground station and only one stop away from the Ringbahn. Kreuzberg and Mitte are a short and direct commute on the underground, while Friedrichshain is a short trip away on the Ringbahn!
notes: I'm sharing with you my very own home: please enjoy it and respect my privacy and personal belongings. Don't break things. Don't take things. Don't leave things. Enjoy the place and treat it like your own.
transit: The apartment is directly at an underground (U8) station and a short walk away (one stop) to the S-/Ringbahn station (Hermannstr).  Two stops away on the underground and you're in the heart of trendy Kreuzberg. A few stops further and you're at Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel and Mitte! The Ringbahn makes Friedrichshain reachable within 20 minutes too. Both Berlin airports are easy to reach by Ringbahn, U8/U7, or by taxi from the main street.
access: You'll have a private room all to yourself, spacious and well suited for up to two guests. We'll share access to the kitchen and all amenities (e.g. washing machine, coffee machine, stove etc) as well as the bathroom. The apartment has two terraces, each accessible through one of the rooms. I generously share with you my personal space, expecting you to enjoy your stay and make yourself at home while respecting my personal belongings. Enjoy it and treat it like it yours.
interaction: I'm always happy to meet and share my space and my city with visitors. While hosting you, I'd be happy to socialise if we both have time and want to do so. I value your and my privacy and space. However, if I'm not busy, I'm happy to socialise and to share some tips or experiences of bars, cafés, events in the Kiez, city walks and parties.
house_rules: *  Smoking allowed only on the two terraces. *  No loud music after 22h (10 P.M.), especially on weekdays. *  Street shoes off at the door, please. *  No peer-to-peer downloads on home WiFi! *  Please leave the apartment clean and tidy. *  Bedsheets and some towels are available.
host_about:
I'm an easygoing guy, friendly and approachable. Well-traveled and opinionated person. Passionate about travel, being in new places, meeting new people, and languages.

I'm always happy to be out hiking, on the beach or camping, but big cities are my natural habitat.

Been living in and in love with Berlin for a few years. I love to share it with visitors. I travel frequently, and I like to stay as much like a local as I can. I'd much rather an AirBnB apartment over a hotel room, and I'm always happy to lend my apartment to visitors.

neighborhood_overview: Located between Bellevue, Spree and Schlosspark you live in a quiet, safe neighborhood and absolutely central. If you are traveling by train, plane or car to get to your location quickly and easily. Due to its central location, you will save enough time to reach the hot spots of the city, either to the East or West. You are 10 minutes from Kurfürstendamm, the Central train station or Tegel airport. Just a little more and you can visit the museum island on Friedrichstrasse, the Brandenburg Gate, Alexanderplatz or the Sony Center. Even the rides a little more distant as the Park Sanssouci / Potsdam can be reached quickly by public transport in about 40 minutes and by car even faster.
notes: We will be happy to communicate in German, English, Italian, Spanish and Portuguese.

name: Apartment close to Bergmann hood
summary: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof.
space: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof, in der man auch mal vor der Großstadthektik entfliehen kann.
description: Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof.  Im Herzen von Kreuzberg, nur einen Katzensprung von der berühmt berüchtigten Bergmannstraße entfernt, befindet sich das gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Apartment. Es handelt sich um eine Souterrain-Wohnung in einem ruhigen Hinterhof, in der man auch mal vor der Großstadthektik entfliehen kann. An kalten Tagen kann man es sich vor dem Kamin gemütlich machen oder man genießt den Komfort einer Fußbodenheizung. Auch an warmen Tagen lässt es sich gut in der Wohnung aushalten, da sie aufgrund der Tiefparterrlage angenehm kühl bleibt. Der Bergmannkiez ist einer der schönsten Berlins und hat allerhand zu bieten. Ob es die alte Markthalle ist, in der man täglich frische Leckereien bekommt oder die vielen kleinen Cafe's und Geschäfte in denen man durchaus mehrere Stunden verbringen kann.
neighborhood_overview: Der Bergmannkiez ist einer der schönsten Berlins und hat allerhand zu bieten. Ob es die alte Markthalle ist, in der man täglich frische Leckereien bekommt oder die vielen kleinen Cafe's und Geschäfte in denen man durchaus mehrere Stunden verbringen kann.
notes: Bitte die An- und Abreisezeit im Vorhinein mit mir besprechen.
transit: Neben vielen Buslinien, verkehrt auch die U-Bahn in unmittelbarer Nähe. Bis zur U-Gneisenaustrasse sind es nur wenige Gehminuten.

Graefe-Kiez gives you access to all the trendy spots as well as the old-school German and Turkish spots. I'm happy to give any recommendations, I have loads!
notes: Please remember this is our home and we appreciate it when guests keep living areas clean and tidy by washing up after themselves when using the kitchen and bathroom. No illegal downloading/torrenting please. Germany has massively strict laws and mental fines for this shit. Thanks!

name: warm, central & stylish space
summary: Light and airy nineteenth-century apartment in a peaceful garden house. The bathroom and kitchen have been recently renovated, and you will have everything you need.
space: Our apartment is warm and carefully decorated. The bed is comfortable, and instead of a couch we have a tatami mat area where you can sit, lie down, meditate... If you have booked the spare bed, this will be a light single mattress that goes over one of the tatami mats in the living room, and it is super comfortable. Just please, especially if you are two guests, please let me know when booking if you will need one bed or two! As in the pictures, there are no curtains.

Just please, especially if you are two guests, please let me know when booking if you will need one bed or two! As in the pictures, there are no curtains. You will be using the bedroom while we're away for work/holiday trips, so you'll have the whole place to yourself/selves. Hopefully we'll get to meet you at the start or end Charlottenburg is great base for any stay in Berlin as it's connected to so many different parts of the city—with many train lines, buses, cycling lanes and major roads—as well as destin
neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg is great base for any stay in Berlin as it's connected to so many different parts of the city—with many train lines, buses, cycling lanes and major roads—as well as destinations outside of the city centre like Potsdam. Shopping, palaces, universities, theatres, museums and so on are packed into the area.
notes: We happily welcome all people from around the world. Unfortunately, the apartment is not accessible for wheelchairs. The furniture and artworks are not child-proofed, and the apartment might not be very good fit for guests with children. Also the apartment can not accommodate pets, sorry! Update: the espresso machine in the photos is no longer there, but there’s a French press and kettle :)
transit: We are 5 mins from a major public transport hub with S-Bahn, Regional trains and the U7 underground line, as well as 5 mins from the U2 line. For example, you can get to Berlin Central Station in just 13 minutes from the house door. Express direct connections to/from both Berlin airports running every 10 mins or so.
access: You will be using the bedroom while we're away for work/holiday trips, so you'll have the whole place to yourself/selves. Hopefully we'll get to meet you at the start or end
house_rules: - Quiet hours must be followed - Smoking only in kitchen with window open
host_about: I use airbnb for travelling and usually let out our place if we're away. Have travelled widely and enjoy meeting people from all over.

name: Cozy room in Berlin Wedding
summary: We call it a nap room - the best room to relax in our apartment ideally located at line U8, U9. It's very cosy and has everything you need to rest well after a long day (or night) of discovering what Berlin has to offer. We'd be happy to give you tips on how to get around Berlin and our neighbourhood. Wedding is full of nice bars (Oh, Calcutta!, Gedeih & Verderb), cafes ( Kater & Goldfisch) and night clubs (Anita Berber), parks and art galleries, vintage clothing shops (Grus Grus).

Chill in the Park-Aue, discover Berlin history or experience  experience urban buzz, vibrancy and diversity Berlin lifestyle. Easily accessible by public transport (U (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) Besides your bedroom you have access to the living room and balcony.  Smoking is only allowed on the balcony. I work during daytime, but am via mobilephone always easily to reach. The former East German neighborhood has a lot to keep history buffs engaged. Lichtenberg itself keeps a low-key profile, but living in Lichtenberg is what you make of it. It sits just next to the wild side of Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg but the innocent joys of Tierpark (Europe’s biggest Zoo). The flat is easily accessible by public transport. Undeground U5 Magdalenenstraße (within a minute wal

transit: The flat is easily accessible by public transport. Undeground U5 Magdalenenstraße (within a minute walk), overground S41/S42 Frankfurter Allee as tram lines M13, M16 (within less than 5 minutes walk). To Alexanderplatz it is about 10 minute ride U5. Guest arriving by airport can go to Frankfurter Allee station. You will receive further instruction after booking.

name: Schönes Doppelzimmer in geplegtem Altbau
summary: Jugenstilhaus im schönen Wilmersdorf/City West, der Kudamm ist fußläufig zu erreichen. 3 U-Bahnen wie ein Bus sind in unmittelbarer Nähe. Cafés, Restaurants, Geschäfte und Boutiquen laden zum Flanieren ein. Die Bar jeder Vernunft ist fußläufig zu erreichen, ebenso das Literaturhaus Fasanenstraße. 5 Kinos, u.a. das Cinema Paris, das Delphi Lux und die Astoria Filmlounge, Theater, kleine und Große Bühnen erreichen Sie wie das KADEWE zu Fuß. Die Bus- Linie 100 bringt Sie zum Brandenburger Tor.
space: Sie haben ein Zimmer innerhalb einer Büroétage. Lediglich ein Büroraum wird nur wochentags zwischen 11 und 18 Uhr genutzt, abends und am Wochenende steht Ihnen alles allein zur Verfügung. Tips zu Sehenswertem sind im Preis mit inbegriffen. Gegen Aufpreis auch ein echter Berliner, der Ihnen das zeigt, was Sie interessiert.

Eigenes Zimmer, Bad, Küche und Flur immer, abends und am Wochenende dürfen Sie bei Bedarf gern noch einen Raum mit großem Tisch und Stühlen dazu nutzen. Ich bin von 11-18 Uhr im Bü
neighborhood_overview: Frische Brötchen können Sie im Haus direkt beim Bäcker kaufen. Non solo Vini ist direkt gegenüber, ein Spitzenitaliener für tagsüber. Der Volkspark lädt zum Spaziergangein und abends können Sie mit etwas Glück VIPs sehen in der Paris Bar am Kudamm. Jede Menge Bars und alte Westberliner Kneipen, fußläufig auch originelle (meist Raucher)kneipen wo Sie Originale mit Berliner Schnauze erleben. Wie auch vegane und vegetarische Küche von einfach bis gehoben.
transit: U 9 Güntzelstr. fährt in 3 Stationen zum Bahnhof Zoo. Von dort mit der S-Bahn zum Alexanderplatz. U 7 Blissestr. fährt nach und durch Kreuzberg bis hin nach Klein-Istanbul (Neukölln) U 3 Hohenzollerndamm fährt nach Schöneberg/Nollendorfplatz, wo Sie jede Menge Ledergays und einschlägige Bars vorfinden bis hin ins tiefste Kreuzberg. Die andere Richtung bietet Gegensatzprogramm. Ins feine Zehlendorf zu Toms Hütte. und zahlreichen Seen. Der Bus 249 hält direkt an der Ecke.
access: Eigenes Zimmer, Bad, Küche und Flur immer, abends und am Wochenende dürfen Sie bei Bedarf gern noch einen Raum mit großem Tisch und Stühlen dazu nutzen.
interaction: Ich bin von 11-18 Uhr im Büro zu erreichen, morgens und abends per Handy. Ich wohne in unmittelbarer Nähe und kann in 5 Minuten vor Ort sein.

name: Stylish & Clean 2 Rooms Apartment
summary: This stylish and very spacious apartment is situated in Kollwitzkitz - the heart of Prenzlauer Berg and at the border to Berlin Mitte. I recently moved into this place and immediately fell in love with it. The apartment is very quiet. It is situated in the garden house of a beautiful old building.
space: Fast facts: - 1 beautiful furnished living room, 2 sofas, 1 big dining table  - heigh ceilings (3 meters)  - original wooden floor  - fully equipped kitchen  - clean bathroom with bathtub and shower (two in one)  - 1 double bed (1,80m x 2m) - towels, bedclothes, hairdryer etc are provided  - fast WiFi  - 2 TVs  - flexible check-in / check-out time  You will love the neighbourhood with its huge selection of bars, restaurants, cafes, fabulous boutiques, great art galleries and unique food/flea markets. Check out my favourite places: Umami, Kulturbrauerei, Betty & Catty, Café Anna Blume, & Kollwitzplatz Street Food Market

host_about:
Hi, I am Lisa. I am originally from Munich and moved to Berlin in Oct 2017. I spent the last few years working, living and studying abroad in different places including, New York, Dublin, and Shanghai. After finishing my masters degree I decided to go back to Germany to start my first real job :) 
I love to travel, to meet people and to always discover new things and places!

name: Beautiful, cosy apartment in creative environment
summary: A spacious room is waiting for you to rest and get energy to explore the exciting city of Berlin. Everything you need is closeby; a bakery, little late night stores, a great Vietnamese place ( I eat there every second day as my fav meal is not only very delicious but just 3,90€ which is way cheaper than anywhere else), an organic store, grocery store are closeby, too (3 minutes).
space: The well equipped kitchen is ready to be used. It is connected to a spacious, cozy living room.  You will have the huge beautiful bathroom with shower and bathtub next to your room and of course you can use the other little bathroom as well.  We have a colorful balcony where you can smoke or just watch the birds and relax.

neighborhood_overview: I love my neighbourhood and the charming little cosmos of Straßmannstraße. You have everything you need in one little street which is well located and connected though very quiet. If you decide to stay with us, you will understand end experience the charm of this area very fast.
transit: Cars can be parked for free on the street right in front of the house- rare in Berlin!  The Tram M10 is reached in 1 minute, the S41/S42 Ringbahn is a 8 minute walk away.
interaction: Whenever you need tips for the city or what to do and where to eat, you can hit me up.
host_about:
My name is Jessie, I am a 32 year flight attendant and musician from Berlin. 

I love to travel, build furniture and care a lot about the environment and sustainability. Being aware of consumption is important to me. 

I like to swim, do yoga and take my bike everywhere I go. In general i love outdoor activities as much as being cozy at home. 

Furthermore I love to collect things on my travels that i find, i am into cooking and eat mostly plant based food.

summary: In dieser Wohnung findet man alles was man zum leben braucht. Wenn ihr was vermisst sagt mir bescheid ich werde es versuchen zu besorgen. Die Lage ist hervoragend, da sie nur 11 min mit der TRAM vom Alexanderplatz entfernt ist und auch nicht weit vom Brandenburger Tor. Am Alexander Platz könnt ihr Shoppen , was das Herz begehrt. Hier sind etliche Supermärkte in der Nähend natürlich auch Restaurant.  Viel Grün ist in der Umgebung auch.

name: Luxury 120m2 artists loft/ center Berlin/
summary: 120m2 Wohnraum. Gestaltet mit Lehmputz, Eichen Parkett, Holzmöbeln. Mit der U-Bahn gelangt man nach nur 10 Min zum berühmten Bahnhof Friedrichstraße, dem Herzen Berlins mit Staatsoper, Boulez-Saal, komischer Oper, Gendarmen Markt u.a.  Die Umgebung ist volkstümlich. Es gibt jede Menge kleine Restaurants und street food Stände aus aller Herren Länder.
space: Mein Loft ist ein Paradis zum ruhigen Arbeiten, zum Lesen, zum Filme schauen, zum Reden und zum Kuscheln. Es hat eine wunderbare Akustik. Meine Stimme und meine Bratsche haben Raum zum Klingen. Wer gerne Musik machen möchte während seines Berlin Aufenthalts, ist hier richtig. Man lebt in nur einem Raum. Wenn einer kocht, ist der andere nah.  Man kann sich während dessen unterhalten und sehn. Es gibt mehr Nähe, mehr Vertrautheit als in einer Wohnung mit abgeschlossenen Zimmern. Die natürlichen Materialien tragen zu einer außergewöhnlichen Atmosphäre bei. Es gibt kein krasses Weiß, keine harten Gegensätze, keine schneidenden Strukturen. Natürlichkeit ist meine Devise, Harmonie mein Ziel. Ratan, Holz, ein Nussbaum Tisch, ein Nussbaum Schreibtisch- beides antike Möbel- tragen wesentlich bei. Die Küche in dezentem Grau passt sich nahtlos in das Konzept ein. Es gibt nur Originale von Künstlern an meinen Wänden. Ich lege Wert auf Echtheit.  Einen dem menschlichen Wesen grundlegend entsprechen
description: 120m2 Wohnraum. Gestaltet mit Lehmputz, Eichen Parkett, Holzmöbeln. Mit der U-Bahn gelangt man nach nur 10 Min zum berühmten Bahnhof Friedrichstraße, dem Herzen Berlins mit Staatsoper, Boulez-Saal, komischer Oper, Gendarmen Markt u.a.  Die Umgebung ist volkstümlich. neighborhood_overview: Mein Loft ist eines von insgesamt 12. Die Nachbarn sind international bekannte Künstler. Vor allem Maler. Es wohnt eine Pop Sängerin in einem der Lofts, es gibt unter uns eine sehr bekannte, Malerin, es wohnt gegenüber ein italienischer Maler und ein Schweizer Maler hat seine Heimat in unserer Künstlerkolonie gefunden.
notes: Ich habe mein Loft sehr bewußt mit natürlichen Materialien gestaltet. Die Wände sind nicht mit chemischen Farben, sondern mit Lehmfarbe, mit echtem italienischen Ocker gestrichen. Das Parkett ist eine Eichen Landhaus Diele. Ich habe auf Lackierung verzichtet. Es ist nur geölt. Insofern wünsche ich mir Gäste, die das zu schätzen wissen und respektieren.
transit: Die U6 ist zwei Minuten entfernt. Mit ihr gelangt man in Richtung Alt Mariendorf in 10 Minuten an den legendären Bahnhof Friedrichstraße, und nur eine Station weiter, an der Französischen Straße,  befindet sich die komischer Oper, das Konzert Haus, der traumhafte neue Boulez Saal, der schönste Platz von Berlin, der Gendarmen Markt und vieles mehr.   Vom Bahnhof Friedrichstraße sind nur 5 Minuten mit der S-Bahn (zwei Stationen) zum den zentralen Alexanderplatz, wobei die erste der beiden die "Hackeschen Höfe" sind, die ebenfalls ein Magnet sind für jeden, der Berlin kennen lernen möchte.
access: Es gibt eine Infrarot Kabine (ähnlich Sauna), die nicht lange vorgeheizt werden muss. Aus dem winterlichen Berlin kommend  stellt man sie an und setzt sich sofort hinein, um sich herrlich angenehm aufzuwärmen und auch noch etwas für die Gesundheit zu tun. 2 Bademäntel, Badeslipper, Duschgel, Haarshampoo, Fön, TV, HIFI, WLAN, Klimaanlage, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine, Dampfgarer, Infrarot Kabine stehen zur Verfügung.  Tee, Kaffe, Öl, Essig, Salz..., das was auf der Küchnzeile bereit steht. Das Klavier darf gespielt werden. Das Loft ist im ersten Stock.
interaction: Leider kann ich meine Gäste nicht persönlich empfangen, da ich ihnen  meinem Lebensraum zur Verfügung stelle.
house_rules: There is coffee and tee, sugar and salt as well as some vinegar and oil at your disposal. On the kitchen unit. I would not like that my guests use something else than that. I don't feel responsible for your food !!!!!
host_about:
Ich bin von Kopf bis Fuß auf Musik eingestellt. Mein Loft ist Klangraum für meine Stimme und meine Bratsche erfreut sich ebenfalls an der schönen Akustik. Wer eintauchen will in die künstlerische Athmosphäre einer Berliner Musikerin, ist in meinem Loft richtig. Wer Klavier spielen kann, darf das liebend gerne tun!
 Ich koche leidenschaftlich gerne und probiere ständig neue Rezepte aus. Gerne gehe ich in Konzerte. Der Boulez Saal in Berlin ist mein Lieblings Konzert Saal. Ich gehe auch in die Staatsoper, die Philharmonie usw. 
Meine Reisen gehen nach Frankreich. Ich liebe den Süd-Westen Frankreichs besonders. Wenn es meine Zeit erlaubt, lese ich gerne. Gerne französisch, gerne Sachbücher über die Rolle der Frau in diversen Gesellschaften, gerne auch Literatur. 
Ich würde Gäste - ganz Anhängerin der französischen Sitte des Aperitifs - mit einem Glas Champagner begrüßen mit selbst gemachten Parmesan Chips oder mit einer Foccacia.  Leider wird draus nichts werden, da ich nicht da bin beim Eintreffen meiner Gäste.

name: Berlin am Kanal
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich im Bezirk Neukölln/Alt-Treptow und ist unmittelbar am Kanal, der zu schönen Spaziergängen einlädt. In der Umgebung sind diverse und gute Möglichkeiten, Essen zu gehen sowie Cafés und Bars. Ihr habt hier eine gute Anbindung, um die Stadt zu erkunden oder zu Fuß den Bezirk erkunden. Für eine grüne Auszeit befindet sich der Treptower Park in 20- minütiger Fußwegnähe.

name: Nice private Apt in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: The 40 msq.m. apartment is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods in Berlin. Just 5 minutes walk to the subway
space: The apartment is a typical historic residential building in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Just 2 Minutes walk to the subway station Greifswalder Str. where you can take any subways or tram to every direction and places of interests.  The apartment's great location allows visitors to be close to the places of interest in a short time by public transportation or by walking around the neighborhood. The grocery is just 2 minutes walk around the corner. It takes you a 10 minutes walk to the places with a lot of bars, restaurants, small shops and galleries.  There is a direct connection to the airport Berlin Schönefeld and Berlin Tegel is just 35 Minutes by the subway away.
description: The 40 msq.m. apartment is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods in Berlin. Just 5 minutes walk to the subway
access: The kitchen is fully fitted in order to cook as well as coffee machine, water warmer, fridge, etc. The double-sized bed (140x200 cm) is really confortable so it's ideal to rest after a long day of tourism.  In the event that you come by car, there is plenty of space to park your car all around the apartment.
interaction: You can call me during your stay whenever you need. Even if I am not in the city a good friend of mine is always available to welcome you or to answer questions and help you whenever you need.
house_rules: Smoking is strictly not permitted in the apartment.

And for me includes a cozy evening good food, good music and nice wine but I also like parties. Music is a important part of my live, and I love to go to concerts in lovely small clubs in Berlin.

name: Charming Apartment in Neukölln
summary: My beloved apartment for one or two people in the middle of artsy and multiethnic neukölln for rent!
space: The Apartment is bright with high ceilings, huge windows and beautiful floorboards. It offers a cozy, little east balcony with sunbeams in the morning, a nice bathtub for relaxing time and a full sized bed for magic dreams.  Due to the single bed the flat is perfect for hosting a couple or a single person. It is located on the fourth floor and therefore pleasingly private.
description: My beloved apartment for one or two people in the middle of artsy and multiethnic neukölln for rent! The Apartment is bright with high ceilings, huge windows and beautiful floorboards. It offers a cozy, little east balcony with sunbeams in the morning, a nice bathtub for relaxing time and a full sized bed for magic dreams.  Due to the single bed the flat is perfect for hosting a couple or a single person. It is located on the fourth floor and therefore pleasingly private. You can enjoy the whole Apartment, kitchen and neccessary cooking utilities are fully available during your stay. I probably won´t be in town during your stay.  During my absence a lovely friend will be there for Check- In/Out and in case of emergency concerning the apartment, be your contact-person. The Apartment is located in the artsy and multiethnic area of Neukölln, called Körnerkiez. The enchanted Körnerpark and former Airport Tempelhof which was turned into an unique, open space a few years ago are right on the
neighborhood_overview: The Apartment is located in the artsy and multiethnic area of Neukölln, called Körnerkiez. The enchanted Körnerpark and former Airport Tempelhof which was turned into an unique, open space a few years ago are right on the doorstep. Nowadays Tempelhof is a fancied park area which hosts numerous fairs and events, but also enables inline skating, cycling, kitesurfing, gardening and barbecuing. The area offers a heady mix of cultures, people, shops and bars.  Italian, asian, arabic, many turkish and german contemporary food-places can be explored in the neighbourhood. Schillerkiez area is also very close, where you can find nice bars and brunch places in an old bohemian neighbourhood.
notes: + Please bring a copy of your identity card for the Check-in. + I´m sorry to inform you that the washing machine is out of order. But if you need to wash your cloths there are plenty of washhouses just around the corner. It´s actually an interesting place where you can get in contact with locals easily,  read or just study the surrounding more closely. + It would be very nice if you could water my plants and herbs during your stay. Especially the papyrus plants need to stand among water.
transit: The excellent access to public transport such as tube (U8) and the circle-line of the city train (Ringbahn 41/42),  is a big advantage of the place. The popular district Kreuzberg is also reachable within a maximum of 15 minutes.
access: You can enjoy the whole Apartment, kitchen and neccessary cooking utilities are fully available during your stay.
interaction: I probably won´t be in town during your stay.  During my absence a lovely friend will be there for Check- In/Out and in case of emergency concerning the apartment, be your contact-person.
house_rules: + I would like you to enjoy and respect the apartment as if it was yours.  It is not a hotel, it is a home - for me and for you during your stay. + It´s a nice gesture if you take off your shoes in the apartment, but it´s no obligation. + Please respect the neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum after 10 pm. + Please take care to not damage any of the amenities that are available. + Please note that this is a non-smoking apartment. Smoking is allowed on the balcony! + Pets are not allowed in the apartment due to animal hair allergy + Please don´t download any illegal material from the internet, such as copyright movies - or music during your stay, the german law is very strict and the fines can be highly expensive.

name: Spacious lovely flat, 3 bedrooms, Green Zehlendorf
summary: It's a lovely old house with a very good energy and nice neighbors. We have a nice garden in the yard which has amazing sunlight in the mornings. If you come with you kids, you can also use our Bullitt Cargo bike to get around (see photos)
space: It's a lovely old house - not perfect and perfectly renovated but with a very good spirit, I'd say :) But very cozy with nice furniture and lot's of places to sleep I have hosted dozens of people in my house and people really like the energy of the house. Beds: 200x200 Futon, Futon Sofa (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Mattresses + Pillows and Duvets  My landlord is an old artist and lives in the house for more than 40 years and is doing everything by himself - very personal relationships in the house. We have 2 balconies up in the front with amazing sunlight in the evenings.

neighborhood_overview: Zehlendorf is one of the nicest and greenest areas in Berlin, with the forest (10min) and lakes (15min) close by and a very fast connection to the centre (25min) or to Kudamm/Charlottenburg (20min). There are some lovely cafes and nice restaurants close by. The high street is just a 5 minutes walk away, with all shops you need. From conventional supermarkets to organic supermarket, banks, book shops, butcher, wine shop - you name it. There is also a  super nice farmers market, just around the corner at the S-Bahn station on Saturdays with music and good street food
notes: My neighboors on the same floor are a bit sensitive to noise - So please no loud music after 10pm and no crazy actions in the night - most of the people in the house live here for decades.
transit: Very good connection to the city. The S-Bahn station is a 3-5 min walk with trains (s-bahn), buses etc. Potsdamer Platz (23min), Charlottenburg/Kudamm (20min), Wannsee (10min). Just check it on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps :)
access: You can use everything in the house - please just feel like home - don't expect a hotel :)
interaction: I help you with everything in the house and happy to give you some tips about Berlin. I have hosted many guests in the past and it was always more like having friends visiting :)
house_rules: - No noise after 10pm - No shoes on the carpets please :) - Just be respectful with the house and the people
host_about: Hey everybody, I love traveling and when I am not able to I love to host people which also feels like traveling to me :) I am very off-beat and all that counts for me is good energy and respect. I have a lovely flat in the greenest district called Zehlendorf, which is super close to the lakes and the forest. It's still the mindset of Berlin, but feels more like a smaller city and within 30min you are back in the jungle :)
