name: Your calm space in trending neighborhood
summary: The bedroom is part of a wonderful spacious flat with a great light-flooded kitchen with balcony. Kitchen and bathroom are shared. The room is comfortable and homely furnished.
description: The bedroom is part of a wonderful spacious flat with a great light-flooded kitchen with balcony. Kitchen and bathroom are shared. The room is comfortable and homely furnished. The apartment is situated in between the "Kiez" Prenzlauer Berg and trendy Mitte. Stay here and feel home in Berlin, you'll have a good time. In close walking distance you have various options of public transportation as subway U2 and U8, Tram M1 and 12.

name: Apartment in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paare, Alleinreisende Abenteurer, Geschäftsreisende und Familien (mit Kindern). Unsere Nachbarn freuen sich drüber, wenn es nicht zu laut ist späten Abend oder Nachts.  Bitte keine Anfragen von Gästen die nur in Berlin sind um zu Feiern.  Es sind alle herzlich Willkommen!
space: Der Wohnraum befindet sich in unserer Küche. Es ist eine wunderschöne große Wohnküche. Mit einer Küchenzeile, einem Sofa und Tisch für bis zu 6 Personen (ausziehbar).  In der Nähe befindet sich das Ring-Center und der Boxhagener Platz mit sehr vielen Einkaufs- und Ausgehmöglichkeiten.
description: Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paare, Alleinreisende Abenteurer, Geschäftsreisende und Familien (mit Kindern). Unsere Nachbarn freuen sich drüber, wenn es nicht zu laut ist späten Abend oder Nachts.  Bitte keine Anfragen von Gästen die nur in Berlin sind um zu Feiern.  Es sind alle herzlich Willkommen! Der Wohnraum befindet sich in unserer Küche. Es ist eine wunderschöne große Wohnküche. Mit einer Küchenzeile, einem Sofa und Tisch für bis zu 6 Personen (ausziehbar).  In der Nähe befindet sich das Ring-Center und der Boxhagener Platz mit sehr vielen Einkaufs- und Ausgehmöglichkeiten. Es gibt einen gemeinsamen Zugang zum Garten. Es handelt sich hierbei um einen gemeinsamen Garten aller Mieter. Es wird eine Ansprechpartnerin immer zur Verfügung stehen (da es sich um Weihnachten handelt, kann es sein, dass sie nicht vor Ort ist) telefonisch aber immer zu erreichen. Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr lebendig. Meine Wohnung befindet sich direkt an der Frankfurter Allee in der Nähe von der S + U Bahn,
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr lebendig. Meine Wohnung befindet sich direkt an der Frankfurter Allee in der Nähe von der S + U Bahn, ihr seid innerhalb von 15 Minuten am Alexanderplatz und am Hackeschen Markt. Zu Fuß kann man den Boxhagener Platz erreichen, da gibt es viele kleine Boutiquen und Restaurants wo man gut essen kann. Um die Ecke ist eine Salzgrotte in der man entspannen kann und auch verschiedene Studios sind in der Nähe (Fitness, Crossfit, Schwimmbad)
notes: Die Wohnung ist im Erdgeschoss, jedoch ist sie sehr gemütlich und warm - perfekt für die Weihnachtstage!
transit: In der Nähe befindet sich die Straßenbahn M13 und die U-Bahn (U5) die innerhalb von 10 Min. am Alexanderplatz ist. Sowie die S Bahn Haltestelle Frankfurter Allee.

name: Prenzlauer Berg cushy room
summary: The room is spacious and inundated by light even during the winter, as it disposes of 3 big windows. There´s a desk where you can sit down and write your notes and/or sketch after a long day of touring Berlin. The bed is very comfortable with very resistant wood slats and cloudy pillows. It is perfect for responsible guests on a budget who are willing to share the spaces with a nice American girl.
description: The room is spacious and inundated by light even during the winter, as it disposes of 3 big windows. There´s a desk where you can sit down and write your notes and/or sketch after a long day of touring Berlin. The bed is very comfortable with very resistant wood slats and cloudy pillows. It is perfect for responsible guests on a budget who are willing to share the spaces with a nice American girl. The neighborhood is full of shops and restaurants, and I would not suggest the staying to very sensitive people as there are trains running by. Mauerpark with its Sunday´s Flea Market is at only 15 minutes walk from here and U2, M1 and Ring-Bahn  will take you quickly anywhere in the city!

I love travelling and everytime I am on the road I am looking for a cheap and nice room somewhere in the centre of the city. Now that I am living in one and as I have to travel a lot, I thought I could offer what I am always looking for while travelling when I'm not home.

name: Beautiful Studio for up to 2 Guests, top location
summary: One minute away from the wonderful Bürgerpark our beautiful studio in a quiet backyard in Berlin/Pankow will be a cozy and comfortable place for you to rest and sleep during your stay in Berlin. You have the entire apartment for yourself during your stay. There is also the beautiful Café Meana where we invite you every day from 2-10 pm. S-Bahn Wollankstr. is 5 minutes to walk, from there you can reach Friedrichstr. in only 10 Minutes and Potsdamer Platz or Alexanderplatz in only 15 Minutes .
space: The studio is a one-room-apartment with 20 qm , completely equipped with everything you need for both a short trip or a longer lasting vacation. There is a double bed of 1.4 x 2 m for up to 2 person. The bathroom is small but functional.  You can take your meals on the balcony or chill there while at home. Supermarkets and several restaurants are close by, 2-5 minutes to walk

house_rules: DE: Liebe Gäste, Bitte entsorgen Sie bei Ihrem Auszug den Müll in den vorgesehenen Containern im Hof.  Wir wären Ihren sehr dankbar, wenn Sie Ihr benutztes Geschirr abwaschen würden. Sollten spontan mehr Gäste als zuvor gebucht in dem Apartment übernachten, berechnen wir für jeden weiteren Gast 40,00€ pro Nacht, anstatt dem regulären Preis von 30,00€. Für einen früheren Check in oder späteren Check out berechnen wir 20,00€. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis EN: Dear guests, We kindly ask you to wash the dishes you have used.  Please throw away your garbage and leave the apartment as you have found it.  If there are more guests staying in the apartment, as booked before, it will cost 40,00€ per guest, per night, instead of 30,00€. For an early check in or late check out, we charge 20,00€. Thank you for your understanding.
host_about:
Wir haben ein zauberhaftes Refugium in der Stadt geschaffen. Für unsere Gäste stehen 4 unterschiedliche Unterkünfte zur Verfügung.

Eine Freundin der Familie steht Ihnen als Ansprechpartnerin zur Verfügung.

name: Easy living in Pankow
summary: Who wouldn't like to live in Berlin! But sometimes I travel too. Then, somebody else can stay at my wonderful apartment. You'll feel easily accommodated, you'll enjoy the neighbourhood's parks, cafés, shops, and how easy it is to get around.
space: Nice building from the 1900, wooden floor, small kitchen, big dinner table, furniture chosen with love, antique and new, drawings, paintings, a leather couch to hang out, a cd/dvd-player, a big TV. There are all kinds fo kitchen tools available as I love to cook. You can choose from a great varity of books what to read when you're tired of exploring the city. Get out to the Bürgerpark nearby for a stroll or a run. Enjoy the local market for fresh ecologically produced vegetables grown in Brandenburg.
description: Who wouldn't like to live in Berlin! But sometimes I travel too. Then, somebody else can stay at my wonderful apartment. You'll feel easily accommodated, you'll enjoy the neighbourhood's parks, cafés, shops, and how easy it is to get around. Nice building from the 1900, wooden floor, small kitchen, big dinner table, furniture chosen with love, antique and new, drawings, paintings, a leather couch to hang out, a cd/dvd-player, a big TV. There are all kinds fo kitchen tools available as I love to cook. You can choose from a great varity of books what to read when you're tired of exploring the city. Get out to the Bürgerpark nearby for a stroll or a run. Enjoy the local market for fresh ecologically produced vegetables grown in Brandenburg. You'll have access to the whole apartment. As I'm living there myself, there will be my private things too. I'll make some room for you belongings as well. My daughter speaks German, English, Spanish, French and Russian. She'll let you in and help you
neighborhood_overview: My neighbourhood is a very special one: close to the center, but already quieter, parks nearby, but easy access to the buzz of Berlin, a lot of open minded locals that often have lived in the area for a long time and feel dedicated to it. Less tourists, more authenticity. Not entirely gentrified, but it has nice cafés, some interesting shops, and supermarkets too. It is easy to catch a S-Bahn to get out to the country side. You'll find some interesting cultural events in the area.
notes: There is a bus stop right next to the building.
transit: S, tram and U Bahnhof Pankow is 5 minutes from the apartment. There are buses too. Also, you'll find several tramlines nearby. There are night buses too. You could also hire a bike: it takes you about 25 minutes to ride to Alexanderplatz, 25-30 to Friedrichhain, 50 to Zoo and 35-40 to Kreuzberg.
access: You'll have access to the whole apartment. As I'm living there myself, there will be my private things too. I'll make some room for you belongings as well.
interaction: My daughter speaks German, English, Spanish, French and Russian. She'll let you in and help you with everything.
house_rules: Please do not smoke inside the apartment.
host_about:
Ich liebe es, in Berlin zu leben. All diese Möglichkeiten, ins Theater, Konzert, Museen, Ausstellungen, zu Veranstaltungen der schrägsten Art zu gehen, die es haufenweise gibt! Kinos für jeden Geschmack, Sportstätten jeglicher Art, der Park zum Joggen um die Ecke, raus ins Grüne mit der S-Bahn im Minutentakt, an tausende Seen, in Wälder und zu Veranstaltungen des Musiksommers an den unglaublichsten Stätten ... Das alles zu moderaten Preisen. Und im nächsten Biergarten kommt man bestimmt ganz schnell in ein nettes Gespräch!
Meine Bücher laden zum Lesen ein. Es gibt garantiert nur solche, die ich empfehlen kann, versuchts doch mal.

I love living in Berlin. All these opportunities to visit theatres, concerts, museums, exhibitions, and events of all kind - that is truly amazing. There are cinemas and sports grounds for everyone, not to mention the beautiful parks around the corner. You can get to the countryside by public transportation like the S-Bahn to jump into one of the many lakes sourrounding Berlin, or walk in the forests, or go to one of the summer festivals of music... All of this for a moderate price. And it is easy to get in touch with people at the next beer garden!
You're invited to read all my books, I garantee they're all worth reading, just try them out.
amenities: {TV,"Cable TV",Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,"Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,Washer,"First aid kit",Essentials}

name: Cozy bright room with balcony
summary: I am renting out my room while I am traveling, so you will find my personal belongings there. I think you will like my room! It is a nice and cozy, bright big 22 sq m  room in a big shared apartment for 3 people. You will share the apartment with other two girls. You can use the kitchen and two bathrooms. The house is on Reichenberger Straße, a pretty hip but still calm street in Kreuzberg, close to the canal and to the flee markets.
space: It is an old renovated and charming apartment!
description: I am renting out my room while I am traveling, so you will find my personal belongings there. I think you will like my room! It is a nice and cozy, bright big 22 sq m  room in a big shared apartment for 3 people. You will share the apartment with other two girls. You can use the kitchen and two bathrooms. The house is on Reichenberger Straße, a pretty hip but still calm street in Kreuzberg, close to the canal and to the flee markets. It is an old renovated and charming apartment! You can use the common kitchen, a big bathroom and a small toilet. There is a backyard (Hinterhof) to park the bike. You will share the apartment with my two room mates. One of them has a cat, but it is always in her room. The cat is nice and shy, she won't bother you. Kreuzberg is a hip area close to the canal and plenty of bars. You'll find the stations Schönlein, Görlitzer Bahnhof and Cottbusser Tor within 10 Minutes walking distance. I would ask you to please clean the kitchen once a week (vacuum the floor
neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is a hip area close to the canal and plenty of bars.
notes: I would ask you to please clean the kitchen once a week (vacuum the floor and the surfaces - it is not much). It is my chore and since I will be away, there's no one else to do that chore.

host_about:
I love hiking and the mountains, and reading and dancing! Pretty adventurous, I'm (almost) always up for new experiences, eager to travel around the globe and happy to meet people from different cultures!

"Be the change you want to see in the world" -Gandhi
"Less is more"

name: Wohnen unterm Dach, gemütliches Loft im Grünen
summary: Willkommen im Loft unter dem Dach. Zu erreichen über eine Wendeltreppe (ungünstig für gehbehinderte Personen). Hier findest du alles was du brauchst: eine kleine Schlafkammer, MiniBad (WC & Badewanne) und großem Wohn-Ess-Bereich inkl. kleiner Küche mit Bartresen. Du bist nur ca. 8-10 Gehminuten von der nächsten S+U Station entfernt. Es gibt ein neues Duschbad exklusiv für die Gäste des Loft eine Etage tiefer! Badeschuhe und Bademäntel stehen zur Verfügung.
space: Das Apartment ist hell und freundlich geschnitten. Die kleine offene Küchenzeile mit einem Bartresen gibt dem kleinen Loft seinen Charme.  Die Küche ist mit einer Nespresso Maschine ausgestattet. Die Kapseln können entweder selbst mitgebracht werden oder bei uns käuflich erworben werden.  Schlafgelegenheit auf einer wandelbaren Schlafcouch für max 2 Personen im Wohnbereich. Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind inkl. und werden nach Bedarf getauscht.

neighborhood_overview: In unmittelbarer Nähe ist alles vorhanden: Supermärkte, Getränkemarkt, Bio-Geschäfte, Restaurants,  Bäckerei, Cafe, Imbiss, Fitnessstudio, usw.
notes: Bitte beachte, dass das Mitbringen oder Halten von Haustieren nicht gestattet ist. Es gibt eine Katze im Haus.
transit: unser Haus ist in Berlin-Wittenau, ruhig gelegen und trotzdem nah am Zentrum.. Zur U-Bahn sind es 9 min, zur S-Bahn 6min und zum Bus 2 min. zu Fuß.  z.B. BUS 120 direkt vom Hauptbahnhof zu uns:.....35min! Zur Mitte (Brandenburger Tor/ Potsdamer Platz) mit der S-BAHN..... 25min. Nach Kreuzberg mit der U-Bahn.....25min.

name: Beautiful rooftop apartment with view over Berlin
summary: The apartment is beautiful and spacious,  I normally only rent out one room in it: https://www.airbnb.de/rooms/3321618 But since we are on vacation for a while in April it's available as a whole. The place is a two bedroom condo with big living room, nice terrace overlooking the "Samariter-Kiez" and an amazing view over entire Berlin (from the accessible roof). The apartment is on the 5th floor in an older refurbished building. There is no elevator though (!!)
space: Living room and terrace are especially nice during spring and summer. Enjoy bright sunshine all day.

It is known for its many bars, clubs, pubs, and cafes, concentrated in the vicinity of Simon-Dach-Straße and Boxhagener Platz.

access: It's completey yours :)
host_about:
Hi, my name is Tino. I am renting out a freshly renovated room in my dream apartment because its simply to big for me alone. Besides that room I am also renting out a gorgeous little apartment right around the corner. But that's mostly for long or mid term rentals.
 I pay much attention to interiour and living comfort. I am very social and enjoy the life in Berlin as much as I can. Working regular hours during the week I enjoy weekends by going out or outdoor activities. I am happily helping out as a tourist guide, at day or at night ;)
Any other questions, don't hesitate, ask me :)

Cheers and see you soon,
Tino

name: Lovely apartment in Berlin Neukölln
summary: In 2 Min. erreichst du die U7 und in 6 Min. die U8. Beliebte Restaurants und Bars sind um die Ecke. Meine Unterkunft eignet sich idealerweise für bis zu 2 Personen. Raucher sind willkommen! Die Couch ist ausziehbar, hier können 2 zusätzliche Personen schlafen.  You reach the U7 in 2 minutes and the U8 in 6 minutes. Lovely Bars and Restaurants are just around the corner. My one bedroom apartments fits 2 people perfectly. Smoker´s are welcome! If you want to add 1-2 guests just unfold the couch.

Groben Schmutz sowie mitgebrachte Artikel (ob Kleidung, Lebensmittel oder Müll) bitte entfernen. Danke! Please be kind and considerate with our neighbors and environment. Quiet time shall be from 12-6 am. If anything breaks just let me know. Obvious dirt and stuff you brought in shall be removed. Thanks!

name: Ferienapartment in Pankow, zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah
summary: 105 Quadratmeter großes, gemütliches Apartment mit Badezimmer, offener Küche, zwei Balkonen und drei Schlafzimmern. Das Wohnzimmer befindet sich auf der Südseite und ist dadurch immer schön hell, auch bei schlechtem Wetter. Im Haus befindet sich im Keller ein kleiner Fitnessraum, dazu gibt es eine große 200 Quadratmeter große Gemeinschaftsdachterrasse mit Saunaanbindung. In der Nähe befinden sich 2 S-Bahnhöfe und 1 U-Bahnhof. Stellplatz PKW in Tiefgarage, Wallbox für E-Autos vorhanden.

Mit dem Fahrrad kommt man ziemlich schnell aus Berlin raus oder rein.

name: Huge room with balcony in the heart of Berlin
summary: Schönes, modernes, gut eingerichtetes Zimmer in zentraler Lage näher Kurfürstendamm. Die Wohnung alles hat was man braucht!  Küche, Bad und ein schöner Balkon. Das Sofa von Sofa kann man aufklappen und es entsteht ein großes Bett! Beautiful, modern, well-furnished room next to Kurfürstendamm, which has everything you need! Kitchen, bathroom and a nice balcony. You can pull out the sofa and it becomes to big bed!

name: Stylish Apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Located in the heart of the trendy neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg, this fully equipped three-room apartment offers you everything you need for your stay. The apartment is located in the most beautiful and trendy district of the city. Discover the city's coolest bars, restaurants and cafes. Or take a walk inthe famous Mauerpark. Relax afterwards on your balcony or the dreamlike community terrace. You live in a side street of Schönhauser Allee. It could not be better!
space: The apartment boasts with a brand new kitchen. The friendly dining area invites you to joint dinner with friends or family. The kitchen is equipped with an new cooker oven and a large fridge-freezer. After work, you can relax on the beautiful couch and enjoy a movie on the 55 Inch Smart TV. Opposite the living area are the spacious bedrooms. This ensures a good night's sleep. The bed ends are equipped with a high quality mattress. On this all will sleep deeply and well. Each bedroom is equipped with a spacious wardrobe.

neighborhood_overview: You can also do your shopping with just a three-minute walk. Everything you could wish for you can be found in this area! The Mauerpark is a popular place to spend the evening in summer. A popular running track is this even in winter
transit: Traffic technically you are perfectly connected. The M1 is only a few meters away from the apartment and also the train stations Schönhauser Allee and Eberswalderstraße are within walking distance.
interaction: The minimum rental period is 3 months.

name: Spacious Room with Balcony
summary: Wonderful spacious Room with balcony in quiet and safe location, ideal for individual travellers or couples. There is a folding matress for a third person if needed, for example a child or teenager. You will have access to our fully equipped kitchen and the bathroom which you will share with us, a 52 year old writer and his 15 year old daughter. If you want to stay longer there are extended stay weekly rates. Enjoy an unforgettable time in one of the most vibrant and lovely districts of Berlin.
space: All the pictures where taken on a sunny day not long ago. we did some minor rearrangements. But all in all you get a pretty good idea about the room by looking at those pictures.
description: Wonderful spacious Room with balcony in quiet and safe location, ideal for individual travellers or couples. There is a folding matress for a third person if needed, for example a child or teenager. You will have access to our fully equipped kitchen and the bathroom which you will share with us, a 52 year old writer and his 15 year old daughter. If you want to stay longer there are extended stay weekly rates. Enjoy an unforgettable time in one of the most vibrant and lovely districts of Berlin. All the pictures where taken on a sunny day not long ago. we did some minor rearrangements. But all in all you get a pretty good idea about the room by looking at those pictures. Your will have total privacy in your room. The kitchen and the bathroom is opposite your room. Me and my daughter, we live in the back end of the flat where you won´t have access. Sometimes i work at home on my computer, sometimes i´m at my shared workspace in an office right around the corner. If i´m not at home in the
neighborhood_overview: Our flat is located in a quiet neighbourhood at a dead end road where once "The Wall" stood. That means that you have the illusion of being in a far more remote area while actually living in the midst of Prenzlauer Berg, just one street away of dozens of restaurants, cafés and the famous "Mauerpark". From your balcony on the 5th floor you have a great view of the area, next only to living in a penthouse or flying in a plane.
notes: Although it is a shared appartement, we place importance on your need of privacy and emphasize on respect and responsiveness.  If you will need any assistance while in the city i will gladly try to help as best as i can.
transit: It´s about a 5 min walk to "Schönhauser Allee". There you have access to S-Bahn, Subway and Tram to every possible location. If you go in the exact opposite direction (10 min walk) you will end up at "Gesundbrunnen"- Railway Station, an important transportation hub with connections to major european citys.
access: Your will have total privacy in your room. The kitchen and the bathroom is opposite your room. Me and my daughter, we live in the back end of the flat where you won´t have access.
interaction: Sometimes i work at home on my computer, sometimes i´m at my shared workspace in an office right around the corner. If i´m not at home in the evening at least my daughter will be. So there is a good chance that you won´t have any problems to ask us any questions you like any time.

name: Cosy apartment in the heart of Berlin
summary: Ruhe und Erholung in der Wohnung. Das blühende Leben, Kultur, Essen und Party nur wenige Minuten entfernt. Perfekt für einen kurzen erholsamen oder aufregenden Urlaub in der ambivalentesten Hauptstadt Europas.  ********** Rest and relaxation in the apartment. The blossoming life, culture, food and party only a few minutes away. Perfect for a short relaxing or exciting holiday in the most ambivalent capital of Europe.
space: Meine gemütliche Ein-Zimmerwohnung liegt an einer ruhigen Allee. Die Lage im dritten Stock lässt viel Licht in die Wohnung fallen. Mit einem geräumiges Bad, einer richtigen Küche, einem Balkon bietet sie alles was man für einen kurzen Urlaub in der Hauptstadt braucht. Die Wohnung liegt im dritten Stock – und es gibt einen Aufzug. ********** My comfortable one-room apartment is situated on a quiet avenue. The location on the third floor lets a lot of light fall into the apartment. With a spacious bathroom, a real kitchen, a balcony it offers everything you need for a short holiday in the capital. The apartment is on the third floor - and there is an elevator.

neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt an einer ruhigen Allee. In der Nachbarschaft befinden sich Zahlreiche Bars, Restaurants, Spätis und vieles mehr. Mit dem Boxhagender Platz und der Warschauerstraße liegen beliebte Ausgehviertel nur 15 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt.  Nur 5 Minuten entfernt ist die U5 mit der man in wenigen Minuten beim Alexanderplatz ist. Die S-Bahn-Stationen Stockower Straße und Frankfurter Allee liegen 8 Minuten entfernt. Von hier aus steht einem die ganze Stadt offen. ********** The apartment is situated on a quiet avenue. In the neighbourhood there are numerous bars, restaurants, kiosk and much more. With Boxhagender Platz and Warschauerstraße, popular nightlife areas are only 15 minutes walk away.  Only 5 minutes away is the U5 with which you can reach Alexanderplatz in a few minutes. The S-Bahn stations Stockower Straße and Frankfurter Allee are 8 minutes away. From here the whole city is open to you.
notes: Da es sich um meine private Wohnung und ich sie nur Vermiete, wenn ich nicht in Berlin bin, bitte ich darum meine Privatsphäre zu respektieren und nicht in den Schubladen herumzuwühlen. Die Wohnung ist eine Nichtraucher-Wohnung. Der Weg zum großen Balkon ist aber nicht weit ;) ********** Since this is my private apartment and I only rent it out when I'm not in Berlin, I ask you to respect my privacy and not to rummage around in the drawers. The apartment is a non-smoking apartment. The way to the big balcony is not far ;)
transit: U- und S-Bahn sind nur wenige Minuten entfernt. Man kann in der gesamten Straße mit dem Auto parken. ********** Underground and suburban trains are only a few minutes away. You can park in the whole street by car.
access: Gäste haben Zugang zur kompletten Wohnung. Balkon, WLAN, TV, Wasch- und Spülmaschine, sowie Herd und Kühlschrank. ********** Guests have access to the entire apartment. Balcony, WLAN, TV, washing machine, dishwasher, stove and refrigerator.
interaction: Ich Vermiete die Wohnung unter während ich im Urlaub bin. Sie haben die Wohnung für sich alleine. Ein guter Freund wird beim Ein- und Auschecken vor Ort sein und steht Ihnen auch sonst für Fragen und Tips zur Verfügung. ********** I'm renting the place out while I'm on vacation. You have the apartment to yourself. A good friend will be on site for check-in and check-out and will be available for any questions and tips you may have and want.
house_rules: Please respect my privacy, don't dig around in drawers and leave the apartment the way you found it.

name: Cosy bedroom in Wedding (good connections to city)
summary: Our flat has three rooms and is an Altbauwohnung in Berlin-Wedding, which is close to the center of Berlin and well connected (bus, S-Bahn, subway). The room we rent out has a sofabed (with a proper matress) and space to hang your clothes. In the time that we're away, you will be shareing the bathroom and kitchen with our lovely (Hidden by Airbnb)  from Chile and England. And of course they're there if you have any questions about the city ect.

name: Pearl at Angels Bassin * Kreuzberg
summary: Unique place made with love by a stylist & photographer who is travelling a lot herself. It is quiet AND close to the heart of Kreuzberg & the heart of Mitte. One room with open kitchen & generous shower. "Engelbecken" infront...
space: Styled and furnished with love. Lots of light and  a lovely view on the Michaelkirchplatz and very close to "Engelbecken" and Oranienplatz. You can enjoy the luxury of a well designed and very vell insulated place, having a peaceful and quiet time after exploring the city. The house has been recently build and so has been the apartment. Both Kitchen and Barthroom are very modern. A large supermarket, open until midnight and countless bars, cafes and restaurants within walking distance. Also the bus that brings you to the City West and the subway to Alex (3 stations) can be reached within a 10 minutes walk or less.

neighborhood_overview: Its an exciting area, with lots to explore. On the border from Kreuzberg to Mitte you are just in the middle of so many things.  A walk to the left leads you to Oranienplatz, via "Engelbecken" (Angel´s Bassin) an artificial pond surrounded by green and a very nice Café & Restaurant. But that´s just the beginning. Countless interesting and unconventional Bars, Cafés & Restaurants are waiting to be explored. Multi Cultural Kreuzberg has many more shops, boutiques and sights to offer. In direction to Mitte you can find Check Point Charlie, Unter den Linden etc etc etc The next supermarket is under ten minutes walking and open till midnight and a Bakery one block (under 5 min)
notes: The place is really high quality design and requires mindful and responsible treatment. No party, smoking only on the balcony. DOWNLOADING films, series, anything is FORBIDDEN!!! Thank you
transit: You are in the middle between two subway stations (Moritzplatz and Heinrich Heine Str), both U8, leading to Alexanderplatz within 3 stations. 10 minutes walking till Moritzplatz and just under to the bus M29 at ORANIENPLATZ (brings you to the CITY WEST and Kurfürstendamm) To explore Kreuzberg, you just walk along, it starts infront of the door
access: Kitchen with all accesories, bathroom, WiFi
interaction: You will be welcomed by our lovely Co-Host Emilie in the apartment and after that you will have it all by yourself, of course  :) Emilie can be reached out by phone/ (Hidden by Airbnb) and via the airbnb system in case of needs or questions.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment,  sorry, but there is a nice balcony with chair and ashtray. Excellent manners with the lovely neighbours and the interior
host_about:
A real Berliner, in love with the city and in love with life. We, my husband, our little son and I, love to have guests and like to connect with people from all over the world. We are both interested in creating a new consciousness and culture in this world, because we think it is high time and very much needed. My husband is a communication consultant and I am a health consultant. We speak German and English and I speak  Spanish, too.

When we are at home we rent out one of our bedrooms.
We mostly have vegan food, but are not dogmatic about it. So you will find things like ricemilk and soymilk, coconutoil and whole sugar etc and can give you good hints for the good shops to get vegan stuff.

transit: Bus 187 is 30 m far, Bus 246 is 50 m far, Bus 181 and M76 is 6 min. far from home, S-Bahn Friedenau 7 min. walk. Edeka Supermarkt 4 min. walk, Aldi or Netto Discounter 7 min. walk. Zoologischer Garten City-West with bus and subway reachable in 15 min. Next Shoppingmile in Steglitz in the Schlosstrasse famous for a lots of Shopping Malls is by feet 12 min. far or 5 min. walk to bus-station and then 2 stations with bus. Bus 187 ist nur 30 m entfernt, Bus 246 nur 50 m, Bus 181 und M76 sind in nur 5 Min. erreichbar, S-Bahn Friedenau 7 min Fußweg. Edeka 4 Min. und Aldi und Netto in 7 Min. entfernt. Der Weg zum Zoologischen Garten also City-West beträgt mit Bus/Bahn etwa 15 min. Die nächste Shoppingmeile befindet sich in Steglitz in der Schloßstr und ist zu Fuß in 10 min. erreichbar. Mit den Öffentlichen sind es 2 Stationen mit dem Bus und 5 min Fußweg zum Bus oder etwa 12 min Fussweg von zu Hause zur Schloßstr..

interaction: You can always contact me via E-mail, by mobile only if i am in Germany and not abroad. Ich bin jederzeit per Email, sollte ich nicht grade im Ausland sein, auch telefonsich für Fragen erreichbar.

ich bin gebürtige Berlinerin und sobald mein Konto was hergibt, buche ich einen Flug und erlebe die Welt.

Mein Wissen darüber, wo man in Berlin was unternehmen kann oder lecker essen geht, teile ich gerne.

name: "Atelier Boardinghouse Birken 2"
summary: Completely refurbished, situated in an excellent location in one of the best areas in Berlin(the new Mitte), this is now one of the most fashionable district in Berlin.
space: This comfortable and exquisitely decorated two bedroom '"Atelier Boardinghouse  2" ensures you all the comfort necessary for your stay in Berlin. Perfect for a family or two couples. Exposed brick, and contemporary furnishings adorn this apartment. The"Atelier Boardinghouse2 " has two bedrooms very (Website hidden by Airbnb) of the bedrooms is very large and decorated in modern style, with a king-size bed, 2 bedside tables with lamps, a relaxing lounge with a very comfortable sofa, a two-door wardrobe, a chest of drawers, plasma screen TV, a desk, PC and two armchairs. The second bedroom is very comfy. It has a double queen-size double-bed, a chest of drawers and several lamps.The big long kitchen is extremely well equipped with an oven, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, coffeemaker, toaster, microwaves, pots and pans and also a big long table with 10 comfortable chairs.  The" Atelier Boardinghouse2" has been recently refurbished preserving the inner structure and utilizes designer materials

The second bedroom is very comfy. It has a double queen-size double-bed, a chest of drawers and several lamps.The big long kitchen is extremely well equipped with an oven, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, coffeemaker, toaster, microwaves, pots and pans and al
neighborhood_overview: Fascinating, excellent quality apartment in the heart of Berlin, just 2 km from Brandenburger Tor and Reichstag . Housed within a beautiful historic building, in typical Berlin "Altbau" style dating back to the early 1900s, with a themed ornamental façade, it truly encompasses all expectations of apartments from that period. Completely refurbished, situated in an excellent location in one of the best areas in Berlin(the new Mitte), this is now one of the most fashionable district in Berlin. In Tiergarten, behind the façades of many of the stucco-clad buildings, are hidden inner courtyards with delightful and extraordinarily beautiful gardens. The area is very well connected via public transport, with two underground stops close by, U9 Birkenstrasse , which give you access to Berlin's attractions and most memorable spots. Just a 10 minute walk away is the Tiergarten park,and the Hauptbahnhof
host_about:
I ´m Italian and my girlfriend Patricia she is Croatian.
We  love travelling, and to meet foreigners. We know very well  Berlin,Sardinia, and Versilia area in Tuscany. We love it ! We can advice you some good restaurants, and cafés, for any any prices (from 3 stars to the good basic!! ) and great things to do , not in the tourist books! 
We speak Italian,English, Spanish ,German and Croatian and you could get more informations checking our smart-appart

Ciao

name: Don't miss this perfectly located clean cosy room!
summary: My flat is in the Center of Kreuzberg-a vibrant and young artistic area with:  -hundreds of bars and restaurants from vintage/alternative to fancy that offer a-a diverse mixture of ethnic food for a reasonable price -famous spots (Kotti, Admiralbrücke, Markthalle 9 etc) and areas (Görli, Schlesi, Bergmannkiez, Neukölln etc) right around the corner You will love the room because of: -spacious, clean private room -cosy flat with sunny terrace -helpful roomies.
description: My flat is in the Center of Kreuzberg-a vibrant and young artistic area with:  -hundreds of bars and restaurants from vintage/alternative to fancy that offer a-a diverse mixture of ethnic food for a reasonable price -famous spots (Kotti, Admiralbrücke, Markthalle 9 etc) and areas (Görli, Schlesi, Bergmannkiez, Neukölln etc) right around the corner You will love the room because of: -spacious, clean private room -cosy flat with sunny terrace -helpful roomies. You have a spacious private room and access to the two bathrooms, the kitchen as well as the terrace. You can use the equipment of the kitchen for cooking or making yourself a coffee in the morning. I'm very responsive to messages and calls and I'm always ready to help or act if something needs to be fixed. I take care of my guests. Due to my job, I'm often traveling or in different cities in Germany and not able to do all the check-ins on my own. But my girlfriend or rommates will be happy to help. some recommendations... Kreuzber
neighborhood_overview: some recommendations... Kreuzberg:  ---check out oranienstr/Adalbert str for bars and food (maroush has best schwarma, kottiwood best dürüm)  --- Art for free: Kunstraum Kreuzberg/ Bethanien ---cool bars: Lugosi, Mano Cafe, Hotel Bar,  ---Görlitzer Park (recently biggest drug dealing palce in GER), a lot of bars around ---Schlesisches Tor (check out Club der Visionäre, Badeschiff) Neukölln: - Must: Klunkerkranich (Rooftop Open air location) - Weserstraße (street with many cool bars) Bergmannkiez: - check out Bergmannstraße (with Markthalle) and sroundings if your hungry (best in the evening) - DONT GO TO Mustafas Gemüse Kebap !!! Dont be stupid tourists ;) - Zoologischer Garten and surroundings:  --Must: Monkey Bar, Gedächtniskirche -- Schwarzes Cafe famous for Breakfast after partying ;) - Must: Branderburger Tor, Reichstag, Holocoust Memorial, Postdamer Platz (with Dali Salvado exh), Topographie des terrors - nice rooftop bar close by : Solar Bar Must: Teufelsberg: Day trip but worth
notes: So far its not possible to lock the door of the private room, since I never had a key for it. But the whole flat is very safe and none of my roomies will ever go into the room for sure. I live with my roomies in this flat for my many years and trust them very much.  You will get a locker for your valuable things to lock them into. But actually, its not necessary. But some of you will  feel better with it ;)

name: Large, central apartment in historical building
summary: Wonderful large Maisonette Studio apartment (66 m2) next to Sbahn/ subway and bus station.  It’s located in a historical building, the only Le Corbusier Building outside of France. The apartment has been newly renovated though still maintaining the characteristics from Corbusier.  It comes with all necessary amenities and fits easily 4 people. The surrounding is very green though w supermarkets, etc nearby - Berlin main station is roughly 15 minutes away  w subway.

name: Extremely central room in Berlin!
summary: Mitte is a great choice for travelers interested in history, museums, architecture and night life. My place is close to Alexanderplatz, Berliner Fernsehturm (TV tower), Museum Island, Berliner Dom, Red city Hall,  the Hackeschen Höfe, lots of bars, cafes and clubs beside other touristic attractions.  You’ll love my place because of the extremely central location. You will hardly require public transportation tickets.   My place is perfect for couples and solo travelers.
space: The room is spacious and has a very comfortable bed that is suitable for couples along with a wardrobe, a chair and small tables. You have access also to the house's Wifi.
description: Mitte is a great choice for travelers interested in history, museums, architecture and night life. My place is close to Alexanderplatz, Berliner Fernsehturm (TV tower), Museum Island, Berliner Dom, Red city Hall,  the Hackeschen Höfe, lots of bars, cafes and clubs beside other touristic attractions.  You’ll love my place because of the extremely central location. You will hardly require public transportation tickets.   My place is perfect for couples and solo travelers. The room is spacious and has a very comfortable bed that is suitable for couples along with a wardrobe, a chair and small tables. You have access also to the house's Wifi. You can normally use the bathroom (Shared), the kitchen (shared) and the living room (shared).  The sharing is done with me as I am living in the flat. I spend most of my time anyway outside! I am a working engineer and I am currently living in this flat in a separate room. I will be the person interacting with guests and I can give them nice tips abo
neighborhood_overview: The residence is centrally located in Berlin, just a 10-minute walk from Alexanderplatz and the TV Tower. Rosenthaler Platz is also reachable in 10 mins walk. The nearest supermarket is 300 m. A large variety of restaurants, cafés and bars can be found within a 5-minute walking distance of the accommodation. Museum Island, where many of Berlin’s museums and galleries are situated, is a 15-minute walk from the apartment. Berlin Zoo is 6 km away, and the East Side Gallery can be reached in 20-minutes using public transport. Mitte is the guests' favorite part of Berlin, according to independent reviews!
notes: You are totally welcome, please feel at home!
transit: It is 400 m to U Weinmeisterstr. Underground station, 400 m to  Hackescher Markt S-bahn station. The residence is close to  Ubahn U8, U5, Sbahn S5, Sbahn S7, Sbahn S75, Sbahn S1, Sbahn S2, Sbahn S25, tram M5, M6, M4, and M1 lines.  Alexanderplatz station is reachable in 7 mins walking!  The location can't be more central!

name: Quiet room in Friedrichshain
summary: The room has everything you need, a double bed, a big desk if you need to work and I will let you some space in the wardrobe if needed. In front of the flat there it's a little park, so this is what you will see through the window. The street is quiet and there is a supermarket just on the corner.

In front of the flat there it's a little park, so this is what you will see through the window. The street is quiet and there is a supermarket just on the corner. Friedrichshain is one of the bests neighborhoods in Berlin. You can reach a lot of clubs just by walk or bike super easy. The whole area it's plenty of bars, restaurants and very interesting shops. You have also good connections with public transport (Frankfurter Allee and Ostkreuz). And on Sunday there is a nice Flohmarkt at Boxhagener Platz. Tram it's 3 min by walk, Frankfuer Allee S-bahn and U-bahn just 7 min, and Ostkreuz 12.

name: Casa Pop
summary: Diese kleine Wohnung ist helle und kann bis 2 Gäste empfangen.
space: The apartment is bright, recently renovated and equipped with everything you need to stay also longer. It is located on the 6th floor (with elevator) and 20 meters from the subway station U7 Siemensdamm.
description: The apartment is bright, recently renovated and equipped with everything you need to stay also longer. It is located on the 6th floor (with elevator) and 20 meters from the subway station U7 Siemensdamm. Guests have exclusive access to the entire apartment. Is provided the wifi signal. Bikes on request, surcharge to be agreed, subject to availability. In the neighborhood there are supermarkets, banks, a park with a small lake (Volkpark Jungfernheide). A part of the neighborhood was designed and built by the architects of the Bauhaus. The U-bahn U7 cuts diagonally from northwest to southeast across the city and intersects with the main lines. For the laws of Berlin, this apartment can not be rented for less than 2 months. Guests staying in Berlin have to pay the "Übernachtungsteuer" - city tax - 5% of the stay. Are exempted those who come to Berlin to study or work, presenting a certification. At the arrival you have to give a deposit of € 100.00 (till 2 weeks) or €250.00 (from 3 weeks)

name: Ruhige naturgelegene Zimmer in EFH, 20 min Zentrum
summary: Das große Zimmer befindet sich in einem Einfamilien Haus in Souterrain. Das Zimmer ist mit drei Einzelbetten und eine Zustellbett, Leder Couch und Sessel, ein Tisch mit Stühlen, Kleider Schrank, Regal und Kühlschrank ausgestatet. Das Badezimmer befindet sich gleich neben an, ausgestatet mit große Dusche und Toilette. Kleine Küche ermöglicht vorbereitung von einfachen Mahlzeiten.

name: NICE APARTMENT with LOFT BEDS IN NEUKOELLN
summary: Fresh renowed and bright 3-room flat located at the groundfloor of an old building in one of the district of Neukoelln around Tempelhof area, which get remarkably attention after the closure of the airport in 2008. The flat has 3 bedrooms with loftbed, kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is equipped with all things that are necessary for cooking and eating, fridge / freezer, gas stove with 2 plates and oven. The building of the flat is located on the border between Kornerkiez and Schillerkiez.

name: Helles Studio am Wasser in Köpenick - Apt. no. 8
summary: Dieses wunderschöne Studio befindet sich im idyllischen Köpenick und zeichnet sich durch seine hellen, lichtdurchfluteten Räume und die Nähe zum Wasser aus. Im Studio befindet sich ein komfortables Boxspringbett (180x200), eine voll ausgestattete Küche und ein Badezimmer mit Waschmaschine und Dusche. Ein großer Supermarkt ist 2 Gehminuten, die nächste Tram (M62) ist ca. 3 Gehminuten und das Wasser 1 Gehminute entfernt.

(seit 2010 gilt in Prenzlauer Berg  eine Parkraumbewirtschaftung), 300 Meter entfernt vom Apartment können Sie zur Zeit noch kostenlos parken. * vom Flughafen Tegel nehmen Sie den Bus TXL bis zum S-Bahnhof Beusselstrasse und wechsekn dort in die S-Bahn (Ringbahn)  und fahren bis zur Station Schönhauser Allee ( ca. 21 min. Fahrtzeit) + Vom Flughafen Schönefeld fahren Sie mit der S9 direkt zum S-Bahnhof Schönhauser Allee ( ca. 40 min Fahrzeit). + Vom Hauptbahnhof einfach die S-Bahn bis zum Alexanderplatz nehmen und in die U2 Richtung Pankow wechseln. An der Schönhauser Allee raus.  Oder die Tram M10 vom Hauptbahnhof bis Eberswalder Strasse nehmen und dann noch eine Station mit der U2 bis Schönhauser Allee.

name: Mitten in der Stadt 5min Fußweg zum Hauptbahnhof
summary: Ich stelle dir ein großes bequemes Bett zur Verfügung sowie auch einen kleinen leeren Kleiderschrank für deine Anziehsachen.  Für mich habe ich den Minimalismus entdeckt und dieser spiegelt sich nun auch in meiner Wohnung wieder. Ich hoffe dir gefällt genauso mein minimalistischer und gemütlicher Einrichtungsstil. Das Gute daran ist, Somit hast du gut Platz dich auszubreiten und zu relaxen.  An einem schönen Tag  kannst du dich gerne auf meinem Balkon in einen Liegestuhl zum relaxen legen.
space: Ich biete dir einen großen Raum und einen tollen Balkon zur Entspannung. Von hier aus lässt sich Berlin sehr leicht entdecken.  Ob du mal das Berliner Nachtleben oder die vielzähligen Sehenswürdigkeiten erkunden möchtes, geht von hier aus ganz easy.  Ich habe eine schönen geräumige Küche, hier können wir auch mal gerne zusammen kochen und lecker Essen.  Wenn du keinen Lust auf kochen hast hier in der Nähe gibt es ein paar tolle Restaurants und eine ganz tolle Döner Bude.

neighborhood_overview: Mitte in Berlin. Von hier aus ist man überall ganz schnell ob  Alexanderplatz Brandenburgertor Potsdamerplatz
notes: Wenn ihr Fragen habt oder irgendetwas unklar ist schreib mich einfach an da lässt sich bestimmt eine Lösung für finden.  Oder fragt meine Mitbewohnerin. Eine von uns beiden ist immer da für euch.
transit: Mit dem Auto ist direkt vor der Tür oder in der näheren Umgebung immer ein kostenloser Partkplatz zur Verfügung.  Die Straßebahn (M10 M5 und M8) halten direkt vor meiner Haustüre. Wenn du mit der DB kommst steigst du am besten am Hauptbahnhof aus entweder machst du einen Spaziergang von 5min oder du setzt dich in die Straßenbahn und bist direkt bei mir.
interaction: Ganz wie ihr mögt. Ich gebe dir gerne Tipps wo man etwas schönes Erleben kann oder wo etwas sehenswert ist.  Wenn irgend welche Fragen aufkommen könnt ihr mich jederzeit per Telefon oder (Hidden by Airbnb) erreichen.  Ihr könnt die Berliner City alleine erkunden. Oder ich kann euch gerne begleiten wie ihr mögt.

name: Bright Penthouse Room in Neukölln
summary: Penthouse living in Neukölln. This bright, top floor shared apartment features a comfortable living room, spacious kitchen and bathroom and a large terrace. We have lots of plants and a cute cat. My room is light-filled even on dark winter days, has a comfy double bed and a large desk. The apartment is one minute walk to the U8 and S-bahn trains and there are plenty of bars, cafés and shops close by as well has the historic Tempelhofer Feld.

name: New loft-like living space in center of Berlin.
summary: Enjoy your stay in the heart of Berlin in a new and stylish furnished flat. It is located at the top and provides a great view over Berlin and its sights. You can see the German parliament and the Alex. It is next to the central station. Hence the apartment is the ideal starting point to discover Berlin. Moreover you do not depend on the plenty of shops in the central station, as the building complex of the flat offers a supermarket, a drugstore, a coffee shop and an Italian restaurant.
space: The 109 sm big apartment awaits you due to the high ceilings and the tasteful decoration with a pleasant atmosphere. The flat provides a high-quality kitchen unit, a washing machine, a dryer, a clothes horse, a iron and a ironing board. Therefore it is perfectly equipped for long term stays. Moreover there is a balcony to the calm courtyard.

The flat provides a high-quality kitchen unit, a washing machine, a dryer, a clothes horse, a iron and a ironing board. Therefore it is perfectly equipped for long term stays. Moreover there is a balcony to the calm courtyard. In the immediate surrounding there are 3 museums (Futurium, Naturkunde Museum, Hamburger Bahnhof (museum of modern arts)). The Brandenburger Gate is just a 10-15 mi
notes: In the immediate surrounding there are 3 museums (Futurium, Naturkunde Museum, Hamburger Bahnhof (museum of modern arts)). The Brandenburger Gate is just a 10-15 minute walk and it is just a 8 minute bike ride to the Hackeschen Höfe. There are also plenty of cafes, shops and restaurants.
transit: Auf Anfrage kann gegen einen Aufpreis ein Tiefgaragenstellplatz gemietet werden.

name: Komfort Apartment
summary: Unser Clipper City Home Berlin ist in der Nähe vom Gendarmenmarkt und fußläufig zur Straße "Unter den Linden". Das Komfort Apartment mit Kitchenette bietet auf bis zu 47 qm viel Platz und Komfort und eignet sich für Geschäftsreisende sowie für Paare, die einen kurzen Trip nach Berlin planen.  In den großzügigen serviced Apartments könnt ihr euch über angenehme Privatsphäre freuen – ohne dabei auf den Komfort und die Annehmlichkeiten eines Hotels verzichten zu müssen.
space: Die Kitchenette im Komfort Apartment ist mit einer Mikrowelle, Nespresso-Maschine inklusive Nespresso-Kapseln Starter-Set, Tea-Making-Facilities, Toaster und einem kleinen Kühlschrank ausgestattet. Es steht euch ein Esstisch oder Tresen für zwei Personen zur Verfügung.  Im Badezimmer findet ihr eine Regenschauer-Dusche, Schminkspiegel und einen Haartrockner vor.  WLAN steht euch im Clipper City Home kostenfrei zur Verfügung. Die Sky Kanäle Sport und Movie empfangt ihr ebenfalls kostenlos über den Flatscreen TV in Ihrem Serviced Apartment.

neighborhood_overview: Die zentrale Lage nahe am Gendarmenmarkt, die direkte Nachbarschaft zu beliebten Highlights wie der Staatsoper Unter den Linden, dem Konzerthaus Berlin, dem Französischen Dom, der Humboldt-Universität und die fußläufige Nähe zur Straße „Unter den Linden“ mit ihren berühmten Adressen und Sehenswürdigkeiten der Berliner Geschichte machen die Lage des Clipper City Home zu einem idealen Ausgangspunkt für jeden Aufenthalt in der Bundeshauptstadt.
notes: Öffnungszeiten Rezeption: Mo - Fr 7:00 bis 22:00 Uhr Wochenende und feiertags 8:00 bis 18:00 Uhr Wenn ihr außerhalb unserer Öffnungszeiten anreist erhaltet ihr die Apartmentkarte über einen Check-In Automat. AKTUELLER HINWEIS:  Aufgrund von Umbauarbeiten im unmittelbar angrenzenden Gebäude müsst ihr ab dem 15.10.2018 leider mit Lärmbelästigung von Montag bis Freitag zwischen 09.00 und 18.00 Uhr rechnen.
transit: Unser Clipper City Home befindet sich fußläufig zur S-Bahn Station "Friedrichstraße" sowie zur U-Bahn Station "Französische Straße". Gerne bieten wir vor Ort auch einen Garagenstellplatz für dein Auto an, zum Preis von zusätzlich 23,00 Euro pro Nacht.
host_about: „…less but more than a hotel“ – ist das Prinzip der Clipper Boardinghouses. Überzeugt euch von der besonderen Atmosphäre im Clipper City Home in zentraler Lage in Berlin. Ob für Kurztrips, Familienurlaub, Geschäftsreise oder Projektaufenthalt, bei uns findet ihr die idealen Bedingungen, sich nach Herzenslust auszubreiten. Unsere Serviced Apartments bieten mehr Platz als ein Standard Hotelzimmer. Wir freuen uns auf euren Besuch.

name: Boutique Apartment Friedrichshain
summary: We offer a temporary home base combining the comfort of an apartment with the service of a hotel. At STAYERY you can do everything you’d do at home as well and more. After a day of discovering the neighborhood you can chill in your supersize bed or have a beer in the lounge hanging out with your neighbors. Cook your favorite meal at your kitchenette or relax with a round of Mario Kart in the loft. Just like home. You're very, very welcome.
space: The modern apartment offers you anything you need. A 1,60 m Supersize-bed toto stretch out in, a kitchenette with 2 induction hobs, a fridge, cooking utensils, a living chaise to sit, work and relax, a bathroom with rain shower and care products, a smart TV and of course complimentary WiFi.
description: We offer a temporary home base combining the comfort of an apartment with the service of a hotel. At STAYERY you can do everything you’d do at home as well and more. After a day of discovering the neighborhood you can chill in your supersize bed or have a beer in the lounge hanging out with your neighbors. Cook your favorite meal at your kitchenette or relax with a round of Mario Kart in the loft. Just like home. You're very, very welcome. The modern apartment offers you anything you need. A 1,60 m Supersize-bed toto stretch out in, a kitchenette with 2 induction hobs, a fridge, cooking utensils, a living chaise to sit, work and relax, a bathroom with rain shower and care products, a smart TV and of course complimentary WiFi. Next to your apartment with private bathroom you also have access to our common areas on the ground floor, our loft. Our loft offers a coworking area, self-service kiosk and a lounge. Feel free to just chill, watch Pulp Fiction or enjoy an after-work beer with you
neighborhood_overview: Our serviced apartments are centrally located in the trendy neighborhood Berlin Friedrichshain. Pop up galleries, bars, restaurants, graffitis, some music, open air cinemas and techno. Just some of the ingredients that make, Berlin’s district Friedrichshain, right next door to Kreuzberg and Prenzlberg, so cool and groovy.
notes: Please note, that the city of Berlin charges a city tax on non-business stays. Due to that we are obliged to charge the city tax of 5% of the room price of the first 21 days for any private stays. The payment is settled on property without involvement of Airbnb. The city tax is omitted when there is proof of a business stay.
transit: Thanks to our well-connected location you can move around Berlin easily. Directly in front of the hotel you have access to the tram lines 21 and M13. Within 10 minutes by foot you reach Ostkreuz with connections to local train service, the S-Bahn and Ringbahn. We offer a few parking spots closeby, which can be rented for 5€ per night. Let us know beforehand as we reserve them “first come, first serve”.
access: Next to your apartment with private bathroom you also have access to our common areas on the ground floor, our loft. Our loft offers a coworking area, self-service kiosk and a lounge. Feel free to just chill, watch Pulp Fiction or enjoy an after-work beer with your neighbors. Our washing salon is equipped with washers, a dryer, iron and ironing board and is accessible around the clock. During summer you can relax on our terrace in the inner courtyard of the building.
interaction: Our staff – we call them hosts – help you with any questions or requests during the week from 7.00am until 10.00pm and on the weekends from 9.00am and 6.00pm. If you arrive outside of our opening hours, that’s not a problem. Just let us know and make use of our 24/7 check-in.
house_rules: Keine Übernachtungsgäste
host_about:
Es gibt Hotels. Und Boardinghouses. Und die STAYERY. Genau genommen sind wir auch ein Boardinghouse, klar. Denn wir bieten eine Home Base auf Zeit. Für zwei Tage, eine Woche oder ein Jahr. Aber wir sind anders. Und zwar very, very. Die STAYERY verbindet den Komfort einer Wohnung mit dem Service eines Hotels. Very good, oder?

Bei uns kann man alles machen, was man zu Hause auch macht und noch mehr: STAYERY heißt, Teil der Stadt zu sein. Zu wissen, wo es die besten Drinks gibt. Echte Nachbarn statt nur Tür an Tür, stylish designte möblierte Apartments, professionelle Vibes und viele Extras. Short but sweet: Wer zu uns kommt, bleibt länger. You’re very, very welcome.

name: Pure Motion Studio, 47 qm
summary: Die Loggia für Sundowner oder Frühstückskaffee und das bodentiefe Eckfenster mit Rundumsicht ins Grüne und auf die pulsierende Invalidenstraße sind weitere Vorzüge der kompakten Wohnungen. Der großzügige, offene Wohn- und Schlafbereich, das elegante Badezimmer und die vollwertige Küche lassen keine Wünsche offen – alles in klaren Formen und ansprechenden Farben gehalten sowie in erstklassiger Ausstattung.

neighborhood_overview: Wohl an kaum einem anderen Ort in Berlin verbinden sich authentisches Kiezleben, die Historie der einst geteilten Stadt und der pulsierende, weltoffene Spirit so anziehend wie im Bezirk Mitte rund um die Invalidenstraße. Kulturelle Highlights von Weltrang wie die Museumsinsel oder das Naturkunde-Museum sind ebenso schnell erreichbar wie die zahlreichen Theater- und Opernhäuser. Die Gedenkstätte Berliner Mauer liegt quasi vor der Haustür. Entdecken Sie in der unmittelbaren Umgebung zudem eine Vielzahl an Bars, Restaurants und Frühstücksmöglichkeiten. Als beliebte Anziehungspunkte in Laufweite gelten die Torstraße, die Oranienburger Straße, der Rosenthaler Platz oder der Hackesche Markt. Zahlreiche Ministerien, Konzerne, Agenturen und Einrichtungen befinden sich in diesem dynamischen Umfeld, ebenso wie der Campus der Charité.

name: BERLIN NEUKOELLN FROM DUSK TILL DAWN APARTMENT
summary: Quite and sunny apartment, freshly renovated, with 2 bedrooms located at the groundfloor in a building from the beginning of the century. Hobrechtstrasse it self is a quiet side street, with old buildings in a Wilhelminian style typical of Berlin. The apartment is furnished & decorated with taste and plenty of nice details, fitted with parquet flooring using genuine wood. The living room is funrnished with a double bed, sofa, chest of drawers, table and 2 chairs. The kitchen is fully furnished.

name: Große DG-Wohnung in bester Kiezlage
summary: In unserer schönen Wohnung können Sie Berlin richtig erleben! Unser Zuhause hat genug Platz und liegt super zentral. Direkt im Kiez mit vielen Cafes, Restos und Shops. Genießen Sie die tolle Küche und Terrasse. Zum S+U-Bahn Warschauer Str. und Ostkreuz sind es jeweils 10 min. zu Fuß.
space: Wunderschöne 4-Zimmer - Wohnung mitten im charmanten Friedrichshain nahe "Simon-Dach- Kiez". Die Wohnung hat eine große Wohnküche, ein Schlafzimmer, ein Kinderzimmer (mit einem fullsize Bett für Erwachsene) und ein Wohnzimmer mit Schlafcouch für zwei Personen.  Die große und gut ausgestattete Küche und das Wohnzimmer sind offen geplant. TV und DVD Player mit vielen Filmen (auch für Kinder). Das Badezimmer hat eine Badewanne und eine extra Dusche. Ein Gäste WC ist außerdem vorhanden. Die Terrasse mit Sonne ab ca. 10 Uhr bietet einem schönen Blick über den Dächern von Friedrichshain. Das sollte man sich im Sommer nicht entgehen lassen.  Dies ist eine voll ausgestattete und schöne Wohnung in einem der schönsten Viertel Berlins. Nicht verpassen! Nur wenige Minuten entfernt befindet sich der berühmte Boxhagener Platz, wo es jeden Samstag einen Wochenmmarkt und am Sonntag einen Flohmarkt gibt. Es gibt auch viele Kinderspielplätze im Kiez sowie Kinder-Cafés (für Regentage).

neighborhood_overview: Ein wirklich gutes Frühstück : "Datscha" Lebensmittel mit einem russischen Touch. Wunderbare Blinis ! Intimes Ein klassisches Restaurant hier in Friedrichshain. Einige gute Restaurants in der Wühlischstr.: "Schiller Burger" (Burger) "Spätzle & Knödel" (deutsch) und vieles mehr. Die beste Pizza (Wühlischstr.): "Il Ritrovo" Große Restaurants für Essen im Kiez: "Schwarzer Hahn" Gourmet Abendessen, aber nicht so teuer ! "Schneeweiss" Österreicher . Wahrscheinlich das beste in Friedrichshain, aber immer noch erschwinglich. "Transit" Asian Tapas. Fun! "Vineria Fraschetta" Anti Pasti sind super, italienisch. Beste Café (und Sonntagsbrunch ! ) "Tante Benny" Viel besser als alle anderen Brunch-Buffets  Simon-Dach-Straße Die beste Bar für gute Drinks : "Booze Bar" Beste Kindercafé (für Kinder und ihre Eltern) im Kiez: "Kinderwirtschaft" und "Knilchbar". Wirklich schönes Café mit indoor Spielzimmer. Die schönsten Spielplatz "Drachenspielplatz" Schreinerstrasse Verpassen Sie nicht! Den Wochenmarkt
transit: S-und U-Bhf. Warschauer Str. (5 min. zu Fuß). Von diesem großen Verkehrsknotenpunkt kommen Sie so ziemlich überall hin.  Straßenbahn/Tram M10 ab Warschauer Str. Genannt die "Partytram", die durch alle drei beliebtesten Stadtviertel Kreuzberg, Friedrichshain und Prenzlauer Berg geht. Genau wie der Name schon sagt, gibt es wahrscheinlich eine Menge von Partygängern in der Nacht an Board. U -Bahn U5 vom Frankfurter Tor bzw. Samariterstr. Dadurch kommen Sie in ca. 7 Minuten zum Alexanderplatz, der größte Verkehrsknotenpunkt von Berlin. Vom Alexanderplatz können Sie den Rest von Berlin bequem erreichen. Ring-Bahn mit der S41/42 von der Frankfurter Allee oder S-Bhf. Ostkreuz. Die Ringbahn" fährt einmal um Berlin, wenn Sie zu Stadtteilen wollen, die nicht  im Zentrum der Stadt liegen. Es gibt eine Menge anderer Alternativen in der Nähe, aber die oben genannten sind die wichtigsten. Sie werden andere Straßenbahnen finden. S -Bahnen und Busse ebenfalls.
access: Wir haben eine große, offene, sehr gut ausgestattete Küche mit Blick auf die Terrasse. Ein Bad mit Dusche und natürlich eine Badewanne. Ein Kinderzimmer voller Spielzeug. Waschmaschine, schnelles W-LAN Internet und einen Fernseher mit DVD Player mit vielen Filmen für groß und klein.
interaction: Wenn Sie Fragen haben. Wir beantworten alle Fragen in kurzer Zeit , per Mail oder Telefon.
house_rules: Dies ist unsere Private Wohnung. Deshalb möchten wir das unsere Gäste unsere Wohnung mit Rücksicht und Respekt behandeln. Haustiere sind nicht erlaubt. Rauchen bitte nur auf der Terrasse.
host_about: Ich liebe meine Stadt und möchte diese gerne mit euch teilen.

name: Ruhige Wohnung mit Gartenzugang
summary: Die Wohnung ist hell und zum ruhigen Garten gelegen. Von dem großen Wohn/Esszimmer mit offener Küche hat man einen wunderbaren Blick ins Grün. Die Wohnung ist über einen eigenen Wohnungseingang zu erreichen. Sie ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man im Urlaub braucht. Auf der großen 40 qm Südterrasse kann man wunderbar schon am Morgen in der Sonne Frühstücken oder nach den Ausflügen entspannen.
space: Das Haus aus dem Jahr 1906 liegt inmitten der Villenkolonie Lichterfelde West, die Ende des 19. Jahrhunderts gegründet wurde. Die Straßen sind gesäumt von alten Bäumen und hübschen Gaslaternen, wie sie in Berlin leider immer seltener anzufinden sind. In unmittelbarer Umgebung findet sich ein Spielplatz für Kinder und ein Sportplatz, der für Jedermann zugänglich ist. Von der Bushaltestelle erreicht man die beiden S-Bahnhöfe Lichterfelde West und Lichterfelde Ost von denen man in 15 Minuten in Berlin Mitte sein kann. In wenigen Gehminuten erreicht man den malerischen Karlsplatz oder das kleine Zentrum von Lichterfelde West mit dem Bahnhof und etlichen Cafes und Geschäften. Nur 800 Metern entfernt liegt das Freibad "Spucki Lichterfelde".

name: Downtown Berlin 60sqm cozy flat
summary: 1 big oversize doublebed in a big separate bedroom, 1 additional sofabed for 2 persons in the studio, wardrobes, fully equiped kitchen, big table sitting 6 persons, open kitchen, spacious bathroom, WIFI, TV, etc. - and all this downtown ! Have a look
space: Classical, comfortable, cute... everything you wish for and everything you need if you like to feel all ‘homely’ in a foreign city. A spacious bedroom; and in front of that a dining area in the open spacious kitchen where up to 6 can comfortably round off the day. The apartment is completely renovated and new furnished. My highlight in this apartment is the "golden" bathroom. WiFi is available in the flat, (free of charge). Otherwise, you’ll also find various herbs and spices as well as oil and vinegar. I’d hate to think that every guest has to go and buy these products for themselves all over again! Just help yourself. All my apartments lie in central Berlin, in the district of Schöneberg.

name: Beautiful home in Neukoelln for one or two people
summary: This lovely flat is in the heart of Neukoelln, at the edge of Berlin's Bohemian Village. A light-filled bedroom, comfortable sitting room and snazzy bathroom cater to your every need. The flat has a large south-facing balcony and a spacious kitchen.
space: This flat is the perfect space for a couple, or three people, wanting to explore the city of Berlin. The high ceilings and original decoration make it a beautiful place to hang out, or to use as a base to explore the city further
description: This lovely flat is in the heart of Neukoelln, at the edge of Berlin's Bohemian Village. A light-filled bedroom, comfortable sitting room and snazzy bathroom cater to your every need. The flat has a large south-facing balcony and a spacious kitchen. This flat is the perfect space for a couple, or three people, wanting to explore the city of Berlin. The high ceilings and original decoration make it a beautiful place to hang out, or to use as a base to explore the city further There is a fully-fitted kitchen, complete with washing machine; a bathroom with a large bath; separate shower cabinet and double-sink fitting; lots of interesting books and dvds; a bike is available on request. Neukoelln is THE up and coming area in Berlin. The Weserstrasse, just a short walk away, has some of Berlin's best up and coming bars. The canal, at the end of the road, is a great place to walk, with lovely cafes on the way for breakfast or Kaffee and Kuchen. Easy access to the airport on the U7 and close l
neighborhood_overview: Neukoelln is THE up and coming area in Berlin. The Weserstrasse, just a short walk away, has some of Berlin's best up and coming bars. The canal, at the end of the road, is a great place to walk, with lovely cafes on the way for breakfast or Kaffee and Kuchen. Easy access to the airport on the U7 and close local supermarkets.
transit: M41 bus takes you directly to Hauptbahnhof; U7 takes you East or West. Neukoelln S-Bahn (15 minutes walk or 1 UBahn Stop) takes you quickly to other areas of the city.
access: There is a fully-fitted kitchen, complete with washing machine; a bathroom with a large bath; separate shower cabinet and double-sink fitting; lots of interesting books and dvds; a bike is available on request.
house_rules: Please feel at home in my flat but treat it as you would your own. Please report any breakages (you would be surprised how many people don't!) Please don't smoke inside, but feel free to use the balcony. Please remember to double-lock doors when you go in and out. Please have a nice time!
host_about: Ich komme aus England und arbeite seit als freie Theaterregisseurin in Deutschland.

name: Möbliertes Zimmer in sanierter Altbau-Wohnung
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich im heiss begehrten Prenzlauer - Berg zur Grenze Friedrichshain. Die nächstliegende S - Bahnstation ist die Landsbergeralle. Der wunderschöne Volkspark Friedrichshain mit Freiluftkino, Spielplatz, Sportanlagen usw. liegt unmittelbar auf der gegenüber liegenden Strasse. Ebenso das SEZ mit vielen Sportangeboten, sowie ein Hallenbad und das Velodrom sind in wenigen Gehminuten erreichbar. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten wie Netto, Lidl, Rewe sind ebenfalls fussläufig erreichbar.
space: Das Zimmer ist 13m2 groß, frisch Saniert mit abgeschliffene Dielen und einem kleinen begehbaren Balkon. Das Zimmer ist sehr hell und freundlich eingerichtet und ist voll ausgestattet. Die Wohnung liegt in einem sanierten Gartenhaus im 1. Obergeschoss. Durch bodentiefe Fenster ist die Wohnung sehr hell. Zur Wohnung gehören, ein Wannenbad mit Waschmaschine, Küche voll ausgestattet mit Einbauküche, Induktionsherd, Geschirrspülmaschine, Kaffe Vollautomat etc. Sowie ein großes Wohnzimmer mit Essbereich.

name: Cozy studio apartment in central West-Berlin
summary: I'm happy sublet my cozy little apartment in central West-Berlin whenever I decide to follow my wanderlust and hope I can thus make people feel right at home in the city I have chosen to spend most of my life in.
space: Though compact, my apartment offers everything that is needed for a comfortable stay. From Netflix, a Nintendo Wii, a modern washing machine to a stereo system with a turntable, all will be available for you to use! Needles to say, WiFi is also included.
description: I'm happy sublet my cozy little apartment in central West-Berlin whenever I decide to follow my wanderlust and hope I can thus make people feel right at home in the city I have chosen to spend most of my life in. Though compact, my apartment offers everything that is needed for a comfortable stay. From Netflix, a Nintendo Wii, a modern washing machine to a stereo system with a turntable, all will be available for you to use! Needles to say, WiFi is also included. The whole apartment will be yours and only yours. If you have any inquiries, feel free to contact me at any time - in case of acute problems I will send my brother/ a friend to assisst you. It is located only two minutes walking distance from the subway station Fehrbelliner Platz, where you have the option between two subway lines and numerous buses. By public transport you can for example reach the Ku'damm as well as the Zoo station in less than 15 minutes, the Brandenburg Gate in about 25 minutes. The closest supermarket and
transit: It is located only two minutes walking distance from the subway station Fehrbelliner Platz, where you have the option between two subway lines and numerous buses. By public transport you can for example reach the Ku'damm as well as the Zoo station in less than 15 minutes, the Brandenburg Gate in about 25 minutes. The closest supermarket and also a drug store are both within 5 minutes of walking range.
access: The whole apartment will be yours and only yours.
interaction: If you have any inquiries, feel free to contact me at any time - in case of acute problems I will send my brother/ a friend to assisst you.
host_about:
Ich bin Jacky, 24 Jahre alte Wahlberlinerin und Azubine im Bereich Raumdesign.
Reisen ist neben exzessivem Teekonsum eine meiner liebsten Freizeitaktivitäten, manchmal nehme ich auch mal meine Gitarre in die Hand um meine Nachbarn in den Wahnsinn zu treiben. Wer '1984' von George Orwell noch nicht gelesen hat, sollte sich eine Tasse Tee machen und dem schleunigst nachgehen!

Hey, I'm Jacky, a 24 year-old Berliner by choice and soon-to-be interior designer.
Next to excessive tea-drinking, travelling is up high on my list of favourite activities. I may also make use of my guitar occasionally when I feel like annoying my neighbours. In case you haven't read George Orwell's '1984' yet, I urge you to make a cuppa and  get right on it!

name: Cozy room in a trendy neighborhood
summary: The room is situated in an apartment in a quiet street, in one of Berlin´s trendiest neighbourhoods, Friedrichshain. One the most turbulent party zones is only 15 minutes walking away, moreover some of the most well known clubs in Berlin.
space: Cozy apartment in a quiet, but trendy neighbourhood. The apartment is 60 sqm. Your room very cozy (approx. 15 sqm) and is perfect for a short to mid term stay in the center of Berlin.
description: The room is situated in an apartment in a quiet street, in one of Berlin´s trendiest neighbourhoods, Friedrichshain. One the most turbulent party zones is only 15 minutes walking away, moreover some of the most well known clubs in Berlin. Cozy apartment in a quiet, but trendy neighbourhood. The apartment is 60 sqm. Your room very cozy (approx. 15 sqm) and is perfect for a short to mid term stay in the center of Berlin. You will be able to use the kitchen and the bathroom, which are fully equipped.  Also, there is a washing machine, an oven and a fridge. I work full time and do sports in the evenings. One or two days during the week I am at home in the evening and we can have a drink in the kitchen and chat about our lives and other fun stuff :). From April, you will be living with a very friendly Jazz pianist from Austria who is a good friend of mine, while I am traveling. Everything you need is nearby: 5 gocery stores, lots of night shops with lots of beer :). If you like parties, a 1
neighborhood_overview: Everything you need is nearby: 5 gocery stores, lots of night shops with lots of beer :). If you like parties, a 10 minutes walk away is one of the most turbulent party scenes in Berlin (Friedrichshain, Simon-Dach-Strasse, Warschauer Strasse). If you walk a bit further, you will find some of the most well known club and discos in Berlin, including the infamous "Berghain". The best about the location: althogh it's very close to night life, the neighborhood is very quiet.
transit: The most important transportation means are nearby. You have U-Bahn U5, station Samariterstrasse, 10 min. ride to Alexanderplatz and S-Bahn Frankfurter Allee and Storkower Strasse. All under 10 minutes walking away.
access: You will be able to use the kitchen and the bathroom, which are fully equipped.  Also, there is a washing machine, an oven and a fridge.
interaction: I work full time and do sports in the evenings. One or two days during the week I am at home in the evening and we can have a drink in the kitchen and chat about our lives and other fun stuff :). From April, you will be living with a very friendly Jazz pianist from Austria who is a good friend of mine, while I am traveling.
house_rules: Keep it clean and neat. That's about it...
host_about: Open minded an easy going person. I have traveled a lot and have lived with many people over the years. I know 6 languages and have friends all over the world. I am good with people (work as a coach and in sales) and like social activities.

name: Cozy, Modern, and Fully Equipped Apartment
summary: Comfortable and modern fully equipped one-bedroom apartment located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, one of Berlin's most popular and vibrant districts. The apartment is perfect for tourists, those that plan to stay in Berlin for an extended trip, or those that have just moved to Berlin, and need a temporary place to set up their new life in this exciting city. The apartment is located within walking distance or within public transportation of everything you'll need to enjoy Berlin.
space: The apartment is fully modernized and renovated but still has elements of a classic Berlin feel. For music lovers, it comes with a fully functioning Yamaha electric piano, and a Pioneer speaker system that works with your smart phone or MP3 player. For entertainment, there's also a Sony flat screen Tv with Netflix and a DVD player with a large selection of DVDs. There's a shower setup and bathtub, so that you can relax after either a long day of sight seeing or working, as well as a clothes washer and dryer.  For those that like to cook, you will find plenty of kitchen appliances and cooking utenstils for either a quick meal at home or a more elaborate dinner. There is also a garden terrace only for your use, where you can have a coffee if the weather permits, or enjoy a drink at sunset.  The bedroom is quite spacious and sleeps two people very comfortably, but a third or fourth person can easily sleep on the couch or an air matrress we're happy to provide.  The apartment is on the gro

The apartment is perfect for tourists, those that plan to stay in Berlin for an extended trip, or those that have just moved to Berlin, and need a temporary place to set up their new life in this exciting city. The apartment is located within walking distance or within public transportation of everything you'll need to enjoy Berlin. For music lovers, it comes with a fully functioning Yamaha electric piano, and a Pioneer speaker system that works with your smart phone or MP3 player. There's a shower setup and bathtub, so that you can relax after either a long day of sight seeing or working, as well as a clothes washer and dryer
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is often considered one of Berlin's "Prettiest neighborhoods" with something for everyone. From nightlife and 100's of different cafes, bars, restaurants, and shops, to shopping malls and flea and farmer's markets, young professionals, and senior citizens, you can find both partiers from the previous night, and business men, grabbing their coffee at the same cafes in the mornings.  The apartment is a 5 minute walk from grocery stores, banks, pharmacies, a shopping mall, and convenience stores (spati's). It's also a 10 minute walk to the famous Mauer Park, Kulturbrauerei, and though it's on a quiet residential street,  a 3- 5 minute walk in any direction will get you to a unique cafe, bar, or restaurant.
transit: The U2 U-Bahn (subway) line and S-bhan (ring bahn) line, which run through and around the heart of the city, are both a 5 -8 minute walk from the apartment. The M10, M1, and M12 trams are about a 6-8 minute walk. There is also paid public parking on the street directly in front of the apartment.
access: The whole apartment is yours to enjoy.

name: Mittendrin! und Park vor der Tür...
summary: in einem herrschaftlichen Altbau gelegen kannst Du von hier aus die Stadt erkunden! U-Bahn und Busse findest Du vor der Tür. Wenn Du lieber joggen möchtest: dann wartet der schöne Park am Gleisdreieck auf Dich!
description: in einem herrschaftlichen Altbau gelegen kannst Du von hier aus die Stadt erkunden! U-Bahn und Busse findest Du vor der Tür. Wenn Du lieber joggen möchtest: dann wartet der schöne Park am Gleisdreieck auf Dich! Wenn Du Raucher bist, ist es sicher gut in einer Umgebung zu wohnen in der Du ungestört rauchen kannst. Hier ist das NICHT möglich und auch NICHT gewünscht! Auch wenn Du vor Deinem Zimmer den schönen sonnigen Balkon hast: die gesamte Wohnung und der Balkon sind NICHTRAUCHERZONE! Vielen Dank für Dein Verständnis!
notes: Wenn Du Raucher bist, ist es sicher gut in einer Umgebung zu wohnen in der Du ungestört rauchen kannst. Hier ist das NICHT möglich und auch NICHT gewünscht! Auch wenn Du vor Deinem Zimmer den schönen sonnigen Balkon hast: die gesamte Wohnung und der Balkon sind NICHTRAUCHERZONE! Vielen Dank für Dein Verständnis!
host_about:
Die wahren Optimisten sind nicht überzeugt, daß alles gut gehen wird, aber sie sind überzeugt, daß nicht alles schief gehen kann! Getreu diesem Motto stehe ich mit beiden Beinen im Leben und freu mich Leute aus aller Welt zu treffen! Wer hier zu Gast sein möchte, sollte kein Problem mit Tigern haben, davon wohnen hier gleich drei! Sie können Dich in Ruhe lassen, sind aber auch an neuen Bekanntschaften interessiert. Alle drei sind entspannt und sanfte Gemüter, es kann sein, daß Du sie garnicht mitbekommst. Wenn Du aber selbst Katzenliebhaber bist, werden Sie das sicher bemerken und gern in Deiner Nähe sein!
Ich wohne und arbeite hier, bin also meist ganz gut erreichbar. Als Heilpraktikerin und Ayurveda Therapeutin arbeite ich mit gesundem Sein, aber keine Sorge, Ihr müsst hier nicht im Jute Sack anreisen! Ich bin ein ziemlich normaler Mensch, glaub ich zumindest. Wenn Ihr also das normale Leben mögt: herzlich Willkommen!

Es erwarten Dich Altbaucharme mit hohen Decken und ein helles, sonniges Zimmer...
