name: primeflats - Former Old Bakery, New Remise 15
summary: Just a walk away from central station and Brandenburg Gate. The perfect spot in the very heart of Berlin. Free wifi. Diese sanierte Remise ist eine ehemalige Bäckerei und befindet sich fußläufig zum Hauptbahnhof und Brandenburger Tor. Eine tolle Wohnung um Berlin zu entdecken. Kostenloses WLAN
space: The former bakery with its arched ceilings offers plenty of room for 6 people and is therefore ideal for families with kids and travel groups. The garden apartment in a quite and separated courtyard has a green area with playground that can be explored worry free by our younger guests.  The open and spacious living area with open kitchen offers two comfortable pull out couches for two people each, large dining table, fully equipped kitchen, a sofa, flat screen TV, DVD, plenty of books, and stereo system. The hallway leads to a bathroom with shower, and two separate bedrooms with a full size and a queen size bed. The apartment has wifi and is always professionally cleaned with fresh sheets and towels. Die Wohnung liegt direkt im Zentrum und ist fußläufig zum Hauptbahnhof, Regierungsviertel und dem Brandenburger Tor. Die Werftstr. ist eine typische Berliner Spielstraße mit Alt und Neubauten gemischt. In der unmittelbaren Umgebung befinden sich schöne Restaurants, Cafes, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten ein Bäcker und alles was für den alltäglichen Bedarf notwendig ist.

name: Dreamy apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: A 40 sqm. second floor apartment on a leafy street between U-Bahn Eberswalderstr. and charming Helmholtzplatz.  There is a large main room with a double bed, a separate small kitchen and separate bathroom.
space: The space has a particular hideout charm: on a lively street with bars and restaurants but completely peaceful inside, looking over a green back yard.
description: A 40 sqm. second floor apartment on a leafy street between U-Bahn Eberswalderstr. and charming Helmholtzplatz.  There is a large main room with a double bed, a separate small kitchen and separate bathroom. The space has a particular hideout charm: on a lively street with bars and restaurants but completely peaceful inside, looking over a green back yard. The flat is in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. On the one hand, it is an excellent base to explore the rest of the city. On the other hand, you will be tempted to stay within 15 minute walk from the apartment! Countless bars, restaurants, cinemas, shops, Kulturbrauerei and Mauerpark are all within immediate reach. U2 Eberswalder Strasse is 3 miute walk away, as well as tram lines M10, M1 and M12 There are usual signs of wear and tear in the flat, but everything works well and is kept clean. This is a legal listing: the flat has the official permission from the district authority to be rented out short term for part of the year. This requ
neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. On the one hand, it is an excellent base to explore the rest of the city. On the other hand, you will be tempted to stay within 15 minute walk from the apartment! Countless bars, restaurants, cinemas, shops, Kulturbrauerei and Mauerpark are all within immediate reach.
notes: There are usual signs of wear and tear in the flat, but everything works well and is kept clean. This is a legal listing: the flat has the official permission from the district authority to be rented out short term for part of the year. This requires keeping a hotel-style guest book where guests are asked to confirm their name, dates of stay, address and date of birth. The information is used for the sole purpose of fulling the requirement of the district authority.
transit: U2 Eberswalder Strasse is 3 miute walk away, as well as tram lines M10, M1 and M12
house_rules: Please no smoking in the apartment. Check-in / Check-out times: adjusted to individual guests, unless there is a clash because of same day changeover. In those cases you might be asked to check in after 16:00 and/or check out by 11:00

name: Huge Design Apartment *Central City* NEW
summary: In the heart of Berlin city our newly build design apartment awaits you in a quiet side street of the famous lively Boxhagener street area with its colorful nightlife of bars, restaurants and markets. All major sights can be reached in a short time. It has: 2 common areas, 2 kitchen, 2 smart TV, 4 separate bedrooms with double beds, 2 plateaus with double beds, 4 bathrooms, free wifi. Everything is newly build and made from natural materials like wood and leather and all our LOVE :)
space: With all our love (and own hands) we have just recently re-build our huge apartment and transformed it into an oasis of luxury. We put special emphasis on design and comfort, as well as on the selection of natural materials such as wood and leather. The result is a beautiful, very bright, ground floor apartment of 120 sqm with a private entrance. It has two separate large common areas with dining table and smart TVs, as well as two fully equipped kitchen (stove, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, kettle, fridge, dishwasher, etc.). There are four separate bedrooms, each with a queen size double bed (160 x 200). The rooms are comfortable and have a beautiful lighting concept (lots of daytime sun, as well as colorful LEDs for the evening). In addition, there are two separate second level above the two communal areas, which are accessed via staircases. Here you will find plenty of space and another two queen size double beds (160 x 200). Although these level have an open concept, they offer

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a quiet little street in a typical Berlin Wilhelminian style building. Just a 2 min walk is a large supermarket (diagonally opposite).  Only a few meters walk (about 5 minutes) away is the famous Boxhagener Street, which is known for its lively bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries and shops to explore the creative and colorful side of Berlin.
notes: You will find a small booklet  in the apartment  in which I give  information about the neighborhood, restaurant recommendations, etc. and a collection of my very personal tips for Berlin
transit: You are located directly in the very city center. The main transport hub "Ostkreuz" with various bus and train connections is within walking distance and brings you within minutes in Berlin's center and to all major attractions. Just as close is the subway station "Frankfurter Allee". There are also several bus stops nearby. The parking around the apartment is chargeable, as it is located in the city center. About 10 minutes away (in Hirschbergerstrasse) there is free parking.
interaction: If you have questions, I can be reached via Mail, Whats App and Fon.
house_rules: Zusätzliche Regeln We love to host you and appreciate that you accept our house rules: With respect to our neighbors this is a no party flat at all.  Especially from 10 PM until 9 AM we ask you to behave quiet and respectful. When you step outside our door you´ll find a vibrant nightlife area you can party 24/7/365 ;) Smoking inside is not allowed. Please do not throw hygienic products into the toilet and use the waste bin. If we should have to assign a company due to a pipe clogging during their stay, we reserve the right  to charge the costs from the security deposit given to airbnb. Following costs will be charged from the security deposit  Key loss = 70 Late check out = 50 euro Smoke in apartment = 100 euro Thank you and have lots of fun in Berlin!
host_about: I am from Berlin, living in and loving that vibrant and creative city. I am traveling a lot myself and always enjoy to stay in Airbnb locations. Pleased to offer my beloved own apartments to guests from all over the world. Welcome!

name: Top floor appt. + sunny balcony!
summary: The sunny apartment is on the top floor of the building, approx. 60qm right at the border of Friedrichshain, Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. Full of light (8am-3pm on the balcony) with an wide view down the street. You can almost see till Alexanderplatz.
space: The sunny apartment is on the top floor of the building, right at the border of Friedrichshain, Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. Full of light (8am-3pm on the balcony) with an wide view down the street. You can almost see till Alexanderplatz. The living room (with the balcony) is towards the big street, but the rest of the rooms are to the quiet back. So the bedroom is quiet! As we just moved in here ourselves, the apartment is not fully decorated, but fully furnished with all you need for your stay in Berlin! There is a 1,80m wide mattress with no bedframe yet in the bedroom, but the mattress is really comfortable. In the living room is a sleeping couch, that is 1,35m wide. The bathroom has a window (rather rare in Berlin ;-) ) and a bathtub. The kitchen is rather small, but has everything including an espresso machine to wake you up after a long night out in the city! There is a wireless internet you can use during your stay. The area offers a lot of nice restaurants, cafés, bakeries and s
description: The sunny apartment is on the top floor of the building, approx. 60qm right at the border of Friedrichshain, Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. Full of light (8am-3pm on the balcony) with an wide view down the street. You can almost see till Alexanderplatz.
transit: The building is 2 minutes from the corner Danzigerstr./Greifswalderstr. where you can take the tram lines M10 (15min to S/U Warschauerstr, 6min to U Eberswalderstr.) and M4 (8 min to Alexanderplatz, 2min to Ringbahn S Greifwalderstr.). The M10 runs the whole night even during the week, so there is always a way to get home other then cabs.  35 min to Tegel Airport or 46 min to Schönefeld Airport.
access: You will have the apartment for yourselves, but there will be someone there, if needed. Check -in is only possible before 10 am or after 7:30pm due to work!
house_rules: No gatherings or extra guests. We accept a maximum of 3 people, as the sleeping couch is rather small. We usually talk, cook and play moderately loud music in the living space, but no loud sounds are tolerated in general. NO SMOKING in the apartment or the stairway, please use the balcony.

name: Sunny Cosy Prenzlauer Berg Berlin
space: What we have to offer you, and even a small family, is a lovely spacious 20 sq. m., south-facing room in a 160 sq. metre Berlin apartment in the well-known Kollwitzplatz area in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin.  The bedroom has two single beds, each 90 x 200. These can be used separately or put together. The room adjoins a private breakfast area, which faces south-east and has large French windows. There is WiFi and we supply towels and blankets and will try our best to fulfill any other wishes. Please ask. The apartment building is located on the fourth floor of a building built in the 1870s and refurbished in 2002. Hanno + Zaki moved in right after. Their daughter Suraya joined them more than 12 years ago. Suraya is a well-travelled teenager and is very used to being a host herself. The kitchen separates the guest area from the family area. You are more than welcome to enjoy our very relaxing bathtub-room, cook in our well-equipped kitchen, use the washing machine and dryer, and all other am

HaZaSu is Hanno, Zaki and Suraya. We, Hanno and Zaki, are media professionals. We both teach media and develop our own projects, very often with our 12-year-old daughter Suraya. 

We love to travel for work and to visit friends elsewhere on this earth. Suraya has been on the move since she was six months, accompanying us when we are researching and working. 

It has been a wonderful experience getting to know so many people from around the world. We are good at figuring out how much privacy or support our guests wish for.

name: Lucky Room in private Flat with View over Berlin.
summary: I am offering a room in our amazing flat while I am on holidays myself. During your stay you share the flat with a super nice flatmate. The whole flat is modern, bright and cozy. The kitchen is well equipped. We have a great balcony and a rooftop with superb view over berlin. The flat lies is in the middle of trendy Friedrichshain but is itself super calm, and well isolated. It is also great for exploring the city- since the next stops, Ostkreuz and Warschauer Straße are very well connected.
space: Since we are working ourselves, we are looking to rent to folks who are fine to be quiet after 22pm. The flat therefore also cannot be used for parties or for inviting friends.

name: Großes, ruhiges Zimmer, Blick auf Goldfischteich
summary: Hochwertiges und ruhiges 24 qm Komfortzimmer im modernen Townhouse am Park in Spreenähe, ausgestattet mit  Sat.-TV, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Espresso-Kapselmaschine, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Geschirr. - 10 Min. bis Alexanderplatz per S-Bahn - kostenloser Parkplatz - Friedrichshain nahe S Ostkreuz/S Rummelsburg - Blick in den idyllischen Park - nur 250 Meter zur Spree Unser Tipp: Ideales Komfortzimmer in ruhiger, citynaher Lage für 1 bis 2 Gäste, Nahe East-Side Mall und Eastside Gallery
space: I CARE FOR MY GUESTS FEELING COMFORTABLE IN THE ROOM AND HAVING A GOOD BERLIN-EXPERIENCE.  BEFORE BOOKING PLEASE READ CAREFULLY  HOUSERULES AND THE END OF THIS CHAPTER, SO THAT YOU ARE INFORMED ABOUT EXPECTATIONS AND CONDITIONS. YOU ARE BETTER ABLE TO DECIDE, IF THIS ROOM SUITS FOR YOU. THANK YOU. Ort: Friedrichshain nahe S Ostkreuz / S Rummelsburg Das 24 qm große Zimmer im 1. Obergeschoss liegt idyllisch am Park in einem hochwertigen Wohngebiet mit Gartenblick auf den Goldfischteich. Vom S-Bahnhof Ostkreuz fährt die S-Bahn alle 3 Minuten in nur 10 Minuten bis zum Hackeschen Markt und Alexanderplatz. Besonders gerne gebucht wird dieses Zimmer von Berlin-Besuchern wegen der Nähe zu interessanten Stadtteilen, Praktikanten aus Bundesbehörden wegen der guten Erreichbarkeit, von der Start-Up/IT und Musikszene (Funkhaus Nalepastr. Berghain, About Blank, Kit Kat) und von Sprachschülern, weil die Kommunikation in Deutsch, Englisch und Französisch erfolgen kann, viele Sprachschulen sind in weni
description: Hochwertiges und ruhiges 24 qm Komfortzimmer im modernen Townhouse am Park in Spreenähe, ausgestattet mit  Sat.-TV, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Espresso-Kapselmaschine, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Geschirr. - 10 Min. bis Alexanderplatz per S-Bahn - kostenloser Parkplatz - Friedrichshain nahe S Ostkreuz/S Rummelsburg - Blick in den idyllischen Park - nur 250 Meter zur Spree Unser Tipp: Ideales Komfortzimmer in ruhiger, citynaher Lage für 1 bis 2 Gäste, Nahe East-Side Mall und Eastside Gallery I CARE FOR MY GUESTS FEELING COMFORTABLE IN THE ROOM AND HAVING A GOOD BERLIN-EXPERIENCE.  BEFORE BOOKING PLEASE READ CAREFULLY  HOUSERULES AND THE END OF THIS CHAPTER, SO THAT YOU ARE INFORMED ABOUT EXPECTATIONS AND CONDITIONS. YOU ARE BETTER ABLE TO DECIDE, IF THIS ROOM SUITS FOR YOU. THANK YOU. Ort: Friedrichshain nahe S Ostkreuz / S Rummelsburg Das 24 qm große Zimmer im 1. Obergeschoss liegt idyllisch am Park in einem hochwertigen Wohngebiet mit Gartenblick auf den Goldfischteich. Vom S-Bahnhof
neighborhood_overview: Das Spreeufer mit seinen Wanderwegen und der Promenade erreichen Sie mit einem 5-Minütigen Spaziergang quer durch den Park. Das grüne Wohngebiet am Wasser ist ruhig gelegen mit wenig Verkehr in der 30 km/h Zone. Freuen Sie sich, das anspruchsvolle Wohnumfeld mit Auszeichnung "Deutscher Städtepreis" zu genießen. Hier sind die Bewohner sehr aktiv und bieten Einiges für die Nachbarschaft und Gäste. Ob Segelunterricht zu günstigen Preisen oder Leckereien in der Creperia Crepes süß & herzhaft. Auch Yoga und Massagen (Hausbesuch) werden angeboten. Die Nachbarschaft hat Spaß an der Gemeinschaft. Hier wohnen Schauspieler, Künstler, Architekten neben Selbstständigen aus der Medien-und IT-Branche und ganz "normalen" Berufstätigen. Diese Mischung hat zur Folge, dass die Bewohner in diesem Stadtteil sehr offen, tolerant und freundlich sind. Probieren Sie es aus! Nur 3 Minuten per S-Bahn benötigen Sie zum neuen Stadtviertel entlang S Warschauer Straße. - Mercedes Benz Arena mit vielen Veranstaltung
notes: Übernachtungen in Berlin sind Citytaxpflichtig. Die Citytax in Höhe von  5 % auf den Übernachtungspreis sind bei Ankunft direkt vor Ort zu zahlen.  - Wifi/WLAN wird für Smartphones gratis angeboten, ist jedoch nicht   Vertragsbestandteil, d. h. es besteht keine Haftung für Unterbrechung - Aufenthalt nur für gebuchte Gäste, keine Besucher! Kurzfristiger weiterer und vom Gastgeber genehmigter Übernachtungsgast: 20 Euro  pro Nacht - Kaution: 90 Euro Kaution ist gesondert bei Schlüsselübergabe zu zahlen und wird nach Abreise auf das Bankkonto zurück überwiesen.  Handtücher und Bettwäsche werden kostenlos gestellt. Ich biete ein gepflegtes, sauberes Zimmer an. Das Gemeinschaftsbad wird in der Regel von nur 1 bis 2 weiteren Personen genutzt, somit ist die Verfügbarkeit gut. Das Gemeinschaftsbad wird regelmäßig gesäubert und desinfiziert.  Als Gastgeber in meinem privaten Haus erwarte ich, dass meine Gäste sich vorsehen. Für die meisten Gäste ist es selbstverständlich, das Badezimmer so verla
transit: Der Nahverkehr: Fußläufig erreichen Sie die Tramhaltestelle (200 Meter) mit der Tramlinie 21 und die S-Bahnhöfe Ostkreuz, Nöldnerplatz und Rummelsburg. Auch mit dem Ausflugsschiff können Sie die Anlegestelle Friedrichstraße direkt vom Wohngebiet erreichen. Die S-Bahnen der Linien 3, 5, 7, 75  fahren z.B. vom S-Bahnhof Ostkreuz alle 3 Minuten bis weit nach Mitternacht. Am Wochenende fahren die S-Bahnen die ganze Nacht durch im 15-Minuten-Takt. Werktags fahren im Anschluss die Nachtbusse alle 15 - 30 Minuten. Ihre Fahrzeiten per S-Bahn: - 10 Min. bis Alexanderplatz - 11 Min. bis Hackescher Markt - 13 Min. bis Friedrichstraße - 15 Min. bis Hauptbahnhof
access: - gebuchtes Zimmer - Gemeinschaftsbad - Vorgarten - Tischtennisplatte und Park
interaction: Wie gewünscht
house_rules: Ich möchte meinen Gästen ein sauberes, komfortables und ruhiges Zimmer anbieten, um dieses zu gewährleisten, sind auch von Dir als Gast Regeln einzuhalten. So kannst Du und auch andere Gäste sicher sein, einen tollen, entspannten Aufenthalt zu haben. Daher folgende Regeln: - Rauchen vor dem Haus möglich - Straßenschuhe bitte im Haus ausziehen - Keine Haustiere - Zutritt nur für gebuchte Gäste - Preis pro nachträglich gebuchten Extragast: 20 € pro Nacht -  Keine Parties. Ich bevorzuge eher rücksichtsvolle, ruhigere Gäste. - Sauberkeit, insbesondere im Gemeinschaftsbad erwartet - aus Rücksichtnahme zu    dem anderen Gast bitte das Badezimmer so hinterlassen, wie es vorgefunden wurde. - Haustür auch tagsüber abschließen - Internet wird gerne kostenlos angeboten. Es ist jedoch nicht Vertragsbestandteil. Es wird nicht für Ausfall oder Unterbrechung gehaftet. Kaution in bar: 90 € bei Ankunft in bar zu zahlen, Citytax 5% des Übernachtungspreises  (Website hidden by Airbnb) H: - Check in time:

49 Jahre, interessiert an Architektur, Garten und Kultur.

Ich liebe meine Wahlheimat Berlin mit vielen Events und tollen Locations.

Ich reise gerne innerhalb Europas. Lieblingsurlaubsländer sind die USA und Südafrika.

name: Bright and Spacious 2-Room Flat in Kreuzberg
summary: The spacious 2-room apartment (80 square meters) is located on a beautiful tree-lined street in the heart of Berlin. The area, known as Kreuzberg, is lively and filled with culture, cafes & restaurants. The apartment is bright and charming, with wooden floorboards and high ceiling. A quiet and cozy place for a good rest in a big city.
space: The apartment is fully equipped, including fast and reliable WiFi, a washing machine, a TV screen + Netflix. In the kitchen you'll find: dishwashing machine, blender, kettle and a wide range of moka pots (coffee percolators). The bathroom has a bathtub. The bedroom has a very comfortable king size bed (1,80m x 2m), ideal for couples.  Please respect that the apartment is smoke-free and pet-free.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly located in the most beautiful area of Berlin-Kreuzberg, the so called "Graefekiez". It's a great neighbourhood to stroll around. You will find a wide choice of local coffee shops, delicious restaurants, little boutiques as well as market places. There is a pretty park nearby, and people also enjoy the  promenade next to the canal.
notes: Please understand: no party people, no smoking and no pets.  The booking should be a min. of 3 nights. Please be informed that there will be a Berlin City Tax of 5 % due, payable in cash upon arrival. Thank you.
transit: The subway (U8 / Schönleinstraße) and bus stations are just around the corner. Easy access to all parts of Berlin!

name: Riverfront marvel, amazing location, Wifi
summary: In the center of the centers (Est and West Berlin), An apartment in a dream location at Tiergarten lush nature in the heart of the city, in a magnificent building from 1865, furnished equipped in a "real life" perspective. A stone's throw away from the metro, wifi, linen and end cleaning included...
space: This our family holiday apartment in Berlin that we rent occasionally to help us pay the charges. Each time we go there, we improve the the comfort a little more and, especially if you travel with children, you will appreciate "real life" comfort of this apartment. Also, we have a legal authorization to rent this apartment. Located in one of the most central and sought areas of Berlin, in a quiet area with the Spree in the front and Tiergarten in the back ! It is on a  ground floor with no stairs or obstacles to get in the apartment in a "Kaiserbau" building from 1865 designed by architect Hugo Maaß, with a brick façade with sculpted moulds it offers a space of 36 sqm.  It is 3 minutes walk away S-Bahn Bellevue (with a direct line to Wansee, Zoologicer Garten or Friedrichstraße) and 5 to10 minutes walk to U-Bahn Turmstraße or Hansaplatz. Also, many busses are available among which the TXL with an access to Tegel airport within minutes. It has 2 rooms, a living room with an open kitchen

Each time we go there, we improve the the comfort a little more and, especially if you travel with children, you will appreciate "real life" comfort of this apartment. Also, we have a legal authorization to rent this apartment. Located in one of the most central and sought areas of Berlin, in a quiet area with the Spree in the front and Tiergarten in the back ! It is on a  ground floor with no stairs or obstacles to get in the apartment in a "Kaiserbau" building from 1865 designed by architect Hugo Maaß, with a brick façade with sculpted moulds it offers a space of 36 sqm.  It is 3 minutes walk
neighborhood_overview: Among the things I love in this area : The Berlin style cafés (café mamas across the Moabiter Bridge) but there are many others The really cheap and yet delicious Sushi "joint" under the Bellevue SBahn The Currywurst joint at the same place (apparently it is famous!) The Hidden Biergarten in the back of the church at the end of Kirschstrasse The Patio restaurant : magnificent barge on the river Spree The Sönmez Baklava place on Turmstrasse : probably among the best Baklavas in Europe Simit Evi : Turkish Bagels in Turmstrasse also ideal for breafasts Enlglisher Garten in Tiergarten The Kunst Akademie The Sbahn so near allowing you to get to the main places in no time and even to Potsdam, or Wansee The area in itself Bicycling towards the city center just following the Spree is unforgettable ! Countless playgrounds for children  I realize I could go on like this forever.... Since it was divided, Berlin is one of the rare cities in the world to have two centers : One that would be around
notes: In compliance with the regulations, a 5% city tax will be asked upon arrival (for a 300€ rental it represents 15€ ) unless you are on a business trip in which case we will provide you the forms to fill. We make these declarations and payments on a monthly basis.
transit: There are so many bus stops that I don't know them all so but here are the basics Sbahn Bellevue the nearest station. A simple search and you will figure that this is a main Ouest/East line Ubahn 9 Turmstrasse or U Bahn 9 Hansaplatz this one makes the North / South Axis TXL Bus when coming from Tegel tou arrive to U Turmstrasse bus stop in 10 minutes !
access: After you made your booking, I will need your arrival AND departure details ie landing in Berlin at Schoenefeld airport at 15.45 at a given date / Taking off from Berlin at 14.35 at Tegel
interaction: Our concierge service offers optionally bike rental, airport transfer and other services for 30% to 70% cheaper than market prices.
host_about:
Nous sommes une famille de culture française qui aime vadrouiller à travers le monde et découvrir les richesses propres à chaque pays ou région.

Je suis également hôte sur Airbnb.

name: 65 m2 flat in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain
summary: Lovely 65 m2 apartment for 2-3 people in Berlin lively Friedrichshain. Very well connected to public transport with S-Bahn and U-Bahn nearby. The neighborhood is known for its bars, clubs and restaurants. All necessary utensils and amenities provided.
space: The apartment consists of a kitchen, a bedroom, a living room and a bathroom. It also comes with a lovely balcony. All rooms can be used and are well equipped with all things necessary for an enjoyable stay. In the kitchen you can find utensils like cutlery, pots & pans, a microwave, oven and stove, a washing machine and a dishwasher. Big fridge, no freezer. Towels are provided in the bathroom which comes with a bath tub. The bedroom has a double bed that fits two people, the living room comes with an extra sofa that can be used for a third person.
description: The flat is located in
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in
transit: With a short 5min walk you can reach overground station S-Bahnhof Ostkreuz, one of the main stations in East Berlin. It's connected to the Ringbahn or circle line which guarantees short commutes to each direction. U-Bahnhof Warschauer Straße is just one stop away; so are plenty of tram stations and busses.

name: Chilly Bears Berlin II / Splendor Loft / 80 qm
summary: chillybearsloft.berlin liegt im Zentrum Berlins und im Herzen von Allem, was die Stadt so besonders macht.  Galerien, Museen, Mode, urbanes Leben auf den Straßen, sowie eine Vielfalt an Restaurants, Cafés und Bars sind nah. Our generous artist's loft, can host up to 7 people. It is located in the centre of everything that makes Berlin so great and special. Next to art galleries, museums, fashion, authentic urban street life as well as cosy and fancy areas with any kind of gastronomy.
space: For english version please scroll down: Unser großzügiges Loftapartment,  liegt im Zentrum Berlins und im Herzen von Allem, was die Stadt so besonders macht.  Galerien, Museen, Mode, urbanes Leben auf den Straßen, sowie eine Vielfalt an Restaurants, Cafés und Bars, befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe. Die Gegend ist multikulturell, multiethnisch, multi-alles. Es gibt innovative High-End-Mode und Kunst umgeben von unverfälschtem Straßenleben. Der Mix aus verschiedenen Lebensmodellen macht sie lebendig und aufregend. In der Nähe des Potsdamer Platzes und im Herzen des alten Westteils der Stadt, mit berühmten Kaufhäusern wie dem KDW am Kurfürstendamm, können Sie genussvoll Ihr Geld ausgeben, oder Sie entspannen sich in dem großartigen, neuen und unlängst mit wichtigen Preisen ausgezeichneten Gleisdreieck-Park oder im Tiergarten, dem größten und ältesten Park Berlins. Direkt vor der Tür befindet sich der Eingang zum U-Bahnhof Kurfürstenstraße und wenige Schritte weiter gibt es fünf verschi

name: Central quiet and cozy room in shared apartment
summary: BOOKING BETWEEN 20th and 21th of decembre  Hello :) I'm offering my private room in an apartment I share with another kind man.  My room has a cozy bed, an armchair, a writing desk and a relaxation place.  The open kitchen has everything necessary. The private rooms are separated by another small room, which is just used for hanging laundry and accessing the  balcony. The bath has a bath tub, shower included. Place is right in between M10/8/6/5 and Circle S-Train.  Regards, Vicky
space: Wer unsere Wohnung beleben wird, erfährt Außen den Scharm der 90er, während es Innen eine gemütliche Junggesell_innen-Wohnung mit viel Liebe zum Detail zu erleben gibt. Die Wohnung ist ruhig gelegen. Durch den 5. Stock, erlebt sich der Sonnenuntergang besonders schön bei weitem Blick. Besonders hervorzuheben ist die offene Küche zum gemütlichen Wohnzimmer.
description: BOOKING BETWEEN 20th and 21th of decembre  Hello :) I'm offering my private room in an apartment I share with another kind man. name: Large room in Neukölln's loveliest neighbourhood
summary: Quiet and sunny room in a beautiful 100 year old Berlin-style flat. Located close next to Böhmischer Platz and Richardplatz, two wonderful squares in our lovely Richardkiez, Neukölln's most beautiful nieghbourhood. You will be sharing the flat with my two (Hidden by Airbnb) Sophia and Pauline.
description: Quiet and sunny room in a beautiful 100 year old Berlin-style flat. Located close next to Böhmischer Platz and Richardplatz, two wonderful squares in our lovely Richardkiez, Neukölln's most beautiful nieghbourhood. You will be sharing the flat with my two (Hidden by Airbnb) Sophia and Pauline. There's a bakery in our house. A sunny square called 'Böhmischer Platz' is right around the corner where you can find cafés and bars. 10 minutes walk to Tempelhofer Feld. SBahn-Station Sonnenallee is 1 min from our door, UBahn-Station Karl-Marx-Straße around 7 minutes. Bus M41 (1 min) takes you directly to Herrmannplatz, Potsdamer Platz and the main station.

name: Bright and quiet, family-friendly flat in Neukölln
summary: 100qm maisonette flat ideal for families in one of the most exciting and multicultural neighbourhoods in Berlin.
space: We rent out our private 100qm maisonette flat with a huge dining room, a kids room with a bunk bed  and a sleeping armchair and plenty of toys as also a kitchen and bathroom in the 1st floor. In the 2nd floor you find a bedroom for two and a open living room with a sleeping sofa for two. The flat is well connected to public transportation but real quite, since it is in the rear building. Fully equiped kitchen, W-lan, 42" 3D-TV, Cable-TV, WII U. Just recently four cute love birds moved in with their huge cage.

neighborhood_overview: You will be in the centre of a colorful, vibrant, multicultural (160 nations!) neighborhood. Good-value restaurants, cafés and bars, shopping of all kind are around the corner and also it is very green: you can walk along the canal through Görlitzer Park to Kreuzberg, Hasenheide (huge Park) and Tempelhofer Feld are close by. We love it here!

summary: Appartment with sleeping room.  Modern living room with open kitchen.  Lift  50 metres from the theatre Schaubühne  Close to transports (Bus / Underground /Trains)  and shops.  The appartment is specially to rent for business- people or students, who have to stay for a longer period in Berlin
space: The apartment is the perfect home for your discovery of whole Berlin!  It is situated on the famous Kurfürstendamm Boulevard in Berlin-Charlottenburg (West Berlin), next to the theatre Schaubühne and Adenauerplatz,  Busses, Underground and trains are in few minutes walking to reach.  Direct connections to the airports Tegel and Schönefeld as well as to the Central Station (Hauptbahnhof) are available.  Supermarkets, individual shops, designer shop and art galleries, coffee shops, bars , restaurants etc. are located just around the corner. A nice park as well as several playgrounds are in walking distance.  The apartment is situated on the fourth floor (with an elevator) in a building, which was completed by the well-known architect Erich Mendelssohn in 1928. The building is kept under historic preservation.  The apartment is very calm, and has a very nice view with trees and green.  The apartment has been completely renovated  in 2014. name: Urban Loft in Vibrant Kreuzkölln *9 Beds* (160m²)
summary: The bright industrial Loft used to be an old Piano factory. We turned it into a cozy Holiday Home for groups and families, as well as an Co-Working/Co-Living and Event - Space for companies. The space is 160sqm, has 3 seperate bedrooms and one big  group space that also includes a kitchen, a living room area to relax and a dinette with a big table to eat and work. In the kitchen area you will also find our Espresso-Machine with plenty of Coffee Pads to start your day right.
space: The location offers perfect conditions for storing goods and preparing for fairs and conventions. Outside you find a big garden space (140sqm) with 2 Caravans where you can sleep, a table corner for breakfast in the sun and  a hammock to relax.  *If you are a group with more than 12 People, some of the guests will have to sleep in one of the two Caravans in the garden, which are really comfortable and have proper beds inside and electronic heaters. If for any reason you don`t want that, please contact us and we will arrange another place inside with matresses if possible.* The spacious bathroom has 5 shower cubicles and 4 toilets. *NO PARTIES* Please read the House Rules!

In the kitchen area you will also find our Espresso-Machine with plenty of Coffee Pads to start your day right. The location offers perfect conditions for storing goods and preparing for fairs and conventions. Outside you find a big garden space (140sqm) with 2 Caravans where you can sleep, a table corner for breakfast in the sun and  a hammock to relax.  *If you are a group with more than 12 People, some of the guests will have to sleep in one of the two Caravans in the garden, which are really comfortable and have proper beds inside and electronic heaters. If for any reason you don`t want that, please contact us and we will
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the very popular and lively district between Neukölln and Kreuzberg. In the immediate vicinity you will find a variety of hip bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets and everything else you need. In just 5 minutes you are on foot by the water. The area around the canal offers anything from the Turkish market to flea markets to anything your heart desires and is also an oasis to relax.
transit: Public transport: Hermannplatz: 5min Trains :U8, U7 Direct bus line to Airport Schoenefeld Berlin offers car and scooter sharing services like Drivenow, Car2go, Miles, Coup, Voi, and also bicycle sharing in the likes of Mobike, Donkeybike, etc. The area around the canal is perfect to travel by bike or just strolling if you want to avoid traffic.
interaction: My private apartment is located in the side building of the house. So I will be available for emergencies at any time

(For example: 30€ for Blankets, 20€ for sheets, 10€ for Towels)  - If you stay at home in a group in the evening, please close all windows facing the inner courtyard, since the neighbors can clearly hear every word in the evening. name: Romantic old horse barn
summary: Charming former barn with bedroom, living room with kitchen area, toilet/shower, queen size bed, french double bed, sofa - space for 5 people. good public transport links, free parking, usage of bicycles possible
space: The former stables consists of 2 rooms on 60 sqm with bathroom and cooking area. The barn offers accommodation in one bedroom for up to 5 people with a kingsize bed of 180x200 cm, one french bed 140x200 cm and a bed sofa 100x200 cm. The Apartment is particularly suitable for those who like it cozy and also don't mind to sleep with together in one room or share beds.  You spend your days in Berlin in a very unusual and rustique setting. The feed troughs, the chains and traces of the wall are visible evidence of the history of this place. If you want to see how Berlin looked before the Wall fell, this is the place to do it. In the surroundings you will find an interesting mix of typical local neighborhood life with many bars, restaurants and cafés, East Berlin flair, landmarked district and forgotten roads. You are cordially invited to be our guests. In the front house live Carmen, Paula, Carl, the dog Janosch and Einstein the cat. Here you can get in touch and become part of some Berlin

In the surroundings you will find an interesting mix of typical local neighborhood life with many bars, restaurants and cafés, East Berlin flair, landmarked
neighborhood_overview: I live in the front house. The property is located in a city commercial area, with no other inhabitants in the street but two car repair shops and some storage properties as neighbours.  A side railway line is close by the house and traffic rolls with irregular, slow freight and passenger trains. Great for trainspotting - not recommendable for countryside people used to complete silence.  The surrounding looks the same like East Germany 30 years ago, the buildings are quite raw, unfinished and old. Many street artists have left their marks on the walls in this area. Still it is a safe and especially on weekends at night a lively area, due to several music clubs close by. If you are looking for a fancy, refurbished area - this is not the place for you. Then I recommend Prenzlauer Berg or Mitte.  If you know Berlin already, if you are open minded and curious, if you want to get deeper into the Berlin feeling, feel and see the raw unfinished and not yet gentrified past - if you are lookin
notes: Regular check-out time is 11:00 a.m. and check-in possible after 4 p.m. -  Arrival and departing time can also be agreed upon individually. Please let me know after your booking, when you plan to come and to leave. Please read the information carefully and make sure you get a clear picture about the facilities over here. I want you to feel comfortable - but what is great for me, might be unbearable for you. I am doing my best to ensure you to have a good time, but please don't forget: I am not a hotel. I am dependent on your feedback and your positive response. I really want people here, who like the place - and not just to rent a cheap accommodation. So please make sure you are well informed about the place before coming - I am looking for happy guests and also being rated highest.
transit: The connections are excellent. A 10 minute walk each to the stations S-Bahn Ostkreuz and S-Bahn (above ground) and U-Bahn (underground) Frankfurter Allee - 10 minutes by U- or S-Bahn to Alexanderplatz - direct connection from Schönefeld by S9 or Tegel airport via bus TXL and the ring train S41, each 30 minutes away (except walking distance). For detailed walking route from train station to house please search on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps.
access: The yard with its offers is open to all guests. Hammocks, beach chair and swing invite you to linger.  In the cold fall and winter evenings you could spend the evenings in front of the cosy warm fireplace.
interaction: We live in the front house: Carmen, Susy and Carl, Janosch (the dog) and Einstein (the cat).  As your host I am mostly around, taking care of your questions, needs, concerns - and also offering you well experienced information regarding this great city.
house_rules: I am happily sharing my property with you. To make your stay a happy experience for you and for us, please follow the house rules: Please inform us about your estimated arrival time at the house. Regular check-out time is 11:00 a.m.,  check-in possible after 4 p.m. -  Arrival and departing time can also be agreed upon individually. Please let me know after your booking, when you plan to arrive in Berlin and to come to the house and also to leave. You can drop your luggage before regular check in or leave it here after check out and pick up later, if necessary. Please treat the place like your home, with care and respect.  No parties in the rooms please, Berlin offers enough facilities for that.  No loud music in- or outside the apartment, especially not after 10 pm. Out of respect for other guests and inhabitants please be aware that we practice quiet hours between 10 pm and 7 am. Please be decent during your stay, when arriving or leaving late at night.  When going out, please turn th
host_about:
Host to the world. Every and each person on this planet is unique and has something special to give, that is why I am so happy and grateful to have the opportunity to welcome guests from so many different countries to my home.

It is a pleasure to share time with my guests - some I might never meet again, and others I welcome back.  Each and every one of my guests has something to leave with me. A gift of some kind, perhaps a thought, a feeling, an idea, a story, a laugh, a hug - sharing our experience of being connected in this time and space. We are, for a limited time on this planet - so let's be conscious of that, enjoy and be inspired by the beauty that surrounds us.

I am a curious, open-minded person, I enjoy my family and having other caring people around me. I love my home and Berlin. I  embrace new experiences and life. I like to travel and know how satisfying it is to be welcomed in a strange place and to be in good hands.  I hope this is what my guests experience  when staying at my home.

name: Bright & cosy room in Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Welcome to Berlin! This is what I can offer in a nutshell: - A central location in trendy neighbourhood “Prenzlauer Berg” with tons of lovely cafes, a variety of restaurants & supermarkets in walking distance - Tram station in front of house - Quiet flat in the rear building overlooking the neighbourhood - A very bright room with cosy bed and views towards Berlin’s TV Tower  - Washing machine & bathtub at your disposal - I speak English, German, Spanish, French PLEASE READ NOTE ON CATS BELOW
space: The flat ...  .... is centrally located in neighbourhood "Prenzlauer Berg" in the Eastern part of the city. Though located in a lively neighbourhood the flat is extremely quiet. It is located in the rear building (“Hinterhaus”). There’s a lift available that conveniently lifts you up to the 4th floor.  Your room ...  … is pretty spacious (roughly 15 square meters). It has a giant wardrobe. Your bed is a queen size one (1.60m wide) with a high quality mattress. The room is very bright (provided the sun is shining) and has a lovely view towards Alexanderplatz - overlooking the neighbouring houses during the day and towards the illuminated TV Tower at night. There is a cosy floor heating for cold winter days. Kitchen and bathroom … …. we will both share. The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, fridge, dishwasher. There also is a small table for breakfast/lunch/dinner or for whatever yummy meal you would like to prepare. The bathroom has natural light, a bathtub and washing machine that y

Please only apply if you wish to do so. Thank you.
access: - Kitchen and bathroom (towels available) - Free Wifi Access
interaction: I am happy to help with anything you may need or having a chat over a cup of coffee. Also if you want to rest quietly in your room that's fine too of course.
house_rules: My current job requires quite a bit of traveling  (usually Monday through Thursday) , so I can only accept guests who would volunteer to take care of my 2 cats during the week (feed, check cat litter, let them go for a walk on the terrace & they also like to be caressed once in a while) . Please only send a request if you wish to do so. Thank you.
host_about:
Hello! I am originally from Southern Germany but have lived in many different places. After living & working for almost 10 years in Barcelona, Spain, I moved to Berlin in 2017 to try something new. I love the diversity and international atmosphere of the city. I am still in “exploring mode” myself and would be happy to share ideas of places to visit. 

I have used airbnb quite a few times as a traveller and having had great hosts inspired me to become one myself. Looking forward to it! 

What else? Whenever I travel I love to go on challenging hiking trips in the mountains. Apart from that I like meeting and eating out with friends, running in the morning, exploring the city or just relaxing on my cosy sofa.

name: Wunderschönes Zimmer in Berlin Treptow
summary: Das Zimmer ist groß (ca. 20qm) für 2 Personen und befindet sich in einer 2-Raumw. im 2.OG (es gibt keinen Aufzug). Es verfügt über ein Schlafsofa, ein Regal, einen Esstisch, ein altes Vintage- Sofa, ein Klavier und viele schöne Pflanzen. Wlan ist vorhanden.Außerdem gehören zur Wohnung: eine voll eingerichtete Küche mit Geschirrspüler& ein Bad mit Waschmaschine. Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind inkl. ACHTUNG. IM FEB/MÄRZ BIN ICH VERREIST. DIE WOHNUNG STEHT KOMPLETT ZUR FREIEN VERFÜGUNG.
space: Die Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße, ganz in der Nähe vom Bahnhof Baumschulenweg(1 Minute entfernt). Von dort aus kommt man direkt (ohne Umsteigen) ins Zentrum von Berlin oder auch in Richtung Ostkreuz/Wedding etc.  In der Nähe gibt es fußläufig einige Supermärkte und Spätis. name: Sunny, spacious and central 97 sqm
summary: Our cool and comfortable 97 sqm one bedroom with exposed brick, hardwood floor, and high ceilings has a true loft feeling! Located just a block away from cafés/shops/restaurants, and Nollendorfplatz u-bahn for easy access to all major subway lines.
description: Our cool and comfortable 97 sqm one bedroom with exposed brick, hardwood floor, and high ceilings has a true loft feeling! Located just a block away from cafés/shops/restaurants, and Nollendorfplatz u-bahn for easy access to all major subway lines. The entire house.  Just a short walk or 1 metro station from Kadewe and shop-filled Kudamm avenue. 2 metro stations from Zoologischer Garten, and 4 stations from mythical Potsdamer Platz (Brandenburg Gate and the Jewish Memorial).  And don't miss one of the best open air markets in town! Just 2 blocks away from our apartment every Saturday on Winterfeldtplatz.  Nollendorfplatz u-bahn station (directly connected to subway lines U1, U3 and U4) and easily connect to all major subway lines. 15-20 from Tegel airport, 20-25 minutes from Schonefeld airport.

name: Spacious apartment with balcony
summary: Relax in this apartment with balcony in Berlin's Neukölln neighbourhood, with various public transportation a few minutes walk away. Welcome!
space: The bedroom is the bigger of the two rooms in the apartment, and has a balcony. The smaller walk-through room has a couch which turns into a single bed. You will be staying with Potato and Goobie, our sweet and friendly cats who will need feeding and cat toilet cleaning daily. There is a kitchen with all necessary amenities including fridge, stove oven and washing machine. Perfect for couples, a group of friends or a small family. There is a baby crib 0-6 months, stroller and bottle sterilizer in the kitchen.  Hot water is temporarily out of order due to a heater malfunction.

notes: We have two little sweet young cats. They are very friendly and will want to cuddle with you if you let them. All we ask is that you feed them daily and clean their toilet every so often. Supplies are provided. You can let them come in and out of your room every so often, and use the balcony to get some fresh air.

name: Nice place, trendy Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Recently renovated, spacious apartment with balcony in a fully renovated Art Nouveau building in Senefelderstrasse, a quiet street in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg - East Berlin´s trendy bohemian quarter. Cafés, bars and pretty little shops nearby.
space: Wonderful furnished apartment with 3,80 meters high ceilings and original stucco in a beautifully renovated building in quiet Senefelderstrasse in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. The apartment was fully renovated in 2012. On more than 70 square meters, the apartment offers a comfortable living room with 2 leather sofas, a bedroom towards the very quiet interior courtyear with a comfortable double bed (140 cm), a spacious bathroom with shower and bathtub, and a large kitchen with a table that easily seats 4 persons.  The cosy balcony is accessible from the living room and faces the quiet Senefelderstrasse. The living room offers a large 52-inch Sony flatscreen TV, a Samsung bluray player and a Denon stereo system. There are two black leather Sofas. Fast Wifi and cable TV are included. The kitchen is fully equipped, including microwave oven, coffee machine, blending machine. All rooms are spacious and bright with modern, large windows. The balcony holds a small table and 2 chairs, offering

Cafés, bars and pretty little shops nearby. Wonderful furnished apartment with 3,80 meters high ceilings and original stucco in a beautifully renovated building in quiet Senefelderstrasse in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. The apartment was fully renovated in 2012. On more than 70 square meters, the apartment offers a comfortable living room with 2 leather sofas, a bedroom towards the very quiet interior courtyear with a comfortable double bed (140 cm), a spacious bathroom with shower and bathtub, and a large kitchen with a table that easily seats 4 persons.  The cosy balcony is accessible from the living room and faces the quiet Senefelderstrasse. The living room offers a large 52-inch Sony flatscreen TV, a Samsung bluray player and a Denon stereo system. There are two black leather Sof
neighborhood_overview: Senefelderstrasse is in the heart of trendy Prenzlauer Berg, where you can find an abundance of popular restaurants, cafés and bars (and kids playgrounds!). Yet it is a quiet street with little through-traffic. Famous Helmholtzplatz is right around the corner.  You can visit artistic boutiques and shops or just stroll through the beautiful neighbourhood. neighbourhood. The area is a food-lover´s heaven with some of Berlin's best restaurants, bars and cafes right outside the door. Mauerpark with the famous Sunday flea market and Monster Ronson's Sunday afternoon Karaoke is only a few minutes away by foot.  It is the perfect place to discover Berlin from on foot, by bike or public transportation or to simply spend an day on the balcony. Surrounding area:  Mauerpark & flea market (every Sunday) Local market on Kollwitzstrasse (Kollwitzmarkt, every Saturday) Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn-Sportpark and Max-Schmeling-Halle Arkona Platz flea market (every Sunday)
transit: Public transport is readily available.  S-Bahnhof Prenzlauer Allee is 5 minutes away by foot. The S41 and S42 "Ringbahn" (ring train) takes you right round Berlin  clock and anti-clock-wise.  Tram stops of M2 (to Alexanderplatz) and M10 (to main train station and to Warschauer Strasse/Friedrichhain Kreuzberg) are only 300 meters away. The U-Bahn (subway) station Eberswalder Strasse is a 500 meters walk and provides access to U2, which takes you north to Pankow and southwest to Spandau via bustling Alexanderplatz with its famous Fernsehturm (TV tower) and Nollendorfplatz in the heart of Schoeneberg.
house_rules: Price includes linen and towels.  No smoking in the apartment. Smoking is possible on the balcony. Please note cancellation policy: 50% refund up until one week prior to arrival, except fees. Deposit is 500 EUR.
host_about: I like sports, arts and - obviously - traveling.

name: Charming Altbau flat in Neukölln
summary: Wunderschöne Altbauwohnung, der perfekte Ort um Berlin zu entdecken. Sie besteht aus 2 Zimmern mit Dielenboden einen Balkon zum abends Füße hochlegen sowie Küche & Bad mit allem was dazugehört. Kreuzkölln ist einer der schönsten Kieze in Berlin.
space: Unsere helle typisch Berliner Altbauwohnungen bietet genug Platz, damit 3 Leute entspannt schlafen können. Schlafzimmer und Wohnzimmer sind getrennt, also kein Durchgangszimmer. Vom kleinen Balkon aus kann man das bunte Treiben beobachten. Die Straße ist nicht stark befahren, somit hat man hier einen ganz enspannten Schlaf.

name: AT HOME IN THE FOREIGN
summary: ATTENTION! Due to the Berlin legislation, the minimum rental period is 2 months! The cozy 2 bedroom apartment, each with 2 double-beds (width 1,60 and 1,40 cm) is situated in the secure and nice Berlin suburb of Charlottenburg-WESTEND, near the ICC fair + Olympic stadium. In the living room there is another coach, which can be used as double bed (width 1,60 cm). Public transport, many shops on the doorstep. Fast internet is available. ONLY LONGTERM RENT!
space: The three room apartment with two sleeping rooms in green, quiet and safe Berlin CHARLOTTENBURG-WESTEND is located near the exhibition and congresscenter ICC and Olympia stadium and decorated with modern and some beautiful antique furniture. In the living room there is another comfortable sleeping coach. Little lakes and the forest for nice walks are also close by and its not far to the famous Kurfürstendamm or Berlin-Mitte via underground. The approximately 72 square meters apartment has been renovated and is centrally located on the Reichsstrasse. Nevertheless, it is very quiet, as the apartment is located in the rear side of the house. The apartment is on the first floor and is modern and equipped with all comforts. A washing machine, dish washer, microwave, hairdryer, iron, iron board, flatscreen-tv (with international programs) - everything is there. neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Westend is an old and safe area of Berlin. There are many villas and old houses in the area. You find nice little shops and restaurants in Reichsstraße, which you can reach within walking distance. Every week there is a nice market just one road away.
notes: In dem Haus leben vorwiegend ältere Menschen, von denen Sie möglicherweise angesprochen werden. Bitte erzählen Sie einfach, dass Sie Gäste bei uns sind.
transit: Busstation and underground are in walking distance and just across the road. You don't need a car to travel around, but if you come by car, there are many parking spots close by.
access: Guests can use the full apartment.
interaction: Either my husband Michael or me or my son will be available, if you need help or have questions.
house_rules: BITTE IN DER WOHNUNG NICHT RAUCHEN!  Da die Wohnung komplett saniert wurde, möchten wir Sie bitten, Ihre Schuhe auszuziehen. Bitte nehmen Sie Rücksicht auf die Nachbarn und halten Sie die Ruhezeiten ein (22 - 6 Uhr und 13-15 Uhr). Das Appartement darf nicht für gewerbliche Zwecke genutzt werden.  Internet: Es ist verboten, Internetseiten mit strafrechtlich relevanten Inhalten oder Share bzw. Filehosting Websites aufzurufen oder kostenpflichtige Leistungen (wie z.B. Musik und Filme) illegal herunter zu laden, zu tauschen und/oder weiterzugeben. Zuwiderhandlungen werden umgehend der Polizei gemeldet und zur Anzeige gebracht. Bei Verlassen der Wohnung bitte sämtliche elektronische Geräte ausschalten. Bei Anreise bitten wir Sie, Ihren Ausweis vorzuzeigen. Vielen Dank im Voraus. PLEASE DON'T SMOKE IN THE APARTMENT!  Since the apartment has been newly renovated, we would kindly ask you to remove your shoes. In order not to disturb the neighbors, we kindly ask you not to play loud music. Any
host_about:
Ich bin in Deutschland geboren und aufgewachsen und lebe seit etwa 40 Jahren in Berlin. Ich bin verheiratet und habe zwei Kinder. Als Journalistin war ich bei diversen TV-Sendern, u.a. RIAS TV, Deutsche Welle TV, n-tv tätig. Jetzt arbeite ich als Pressesprecherin bei einer internationalen Hilfsorganisation. Ich reise gern und hierbei faszinieren mich besonders die asiatischen und afrikanischen Länder. Lesen macht mir Spaß und hierbei fesselt mich ein guter Krimi genauso wie Sachbücher über politische Themen, ausländische Kulturen und Menschen. Im Fernsehen schaue ich mir am liebsten Dokumentationen über fremde Länder und Kulturen an. Aber auch ein guter Spielfilm bereitet mir Vergnügen. 
Mir ist es wichtig, dass meine Gäste sich wie zu Hause fühlen. Wenn es Probleme gibt oder irgendwas fehlt - ein Anruf genügt. In meiner Abwesenheit kümmert sich mein Mann Michael um alles. 
Ich selbst habe bereits mehrfach über Airbnb gebucht und ich finde, es ist eine einmalige Gelegenheit, Land und Leute kennen zu lernen. Kein Hotel dieser Welt bietet solch eine Gelegenheit. 
Herzlichst Silvia 
ENGLISH
I was born in Germany and I'm living in Berlin for about 40 years now. I am married and have two children. As a journalist, I worked for various TV channels, e.g. RIAS TV, Deutsche Welle TV, n-tv news-channel. Now I'm working as a press officer for an international charityorganization. I love traveling and I'm fascinated particularly from Asian and African countries and their people. Reading a book is fun and I'm either fascinated by a good thriller as well as non-fiction books on political issues, foreign cultures and people. On television I mostly watch documentaries about foreign countries and cultures. But a good movie enjoys me as well.
I find it important that my guests feel at home. If there are problems or something is missing - just call. In my absence, my husband Michael takes care of everything. I also booked accommodations via airbnb and it is a fantastic possibility to get in good contact with people and their town. No hotel can offer this possibility.
Warm regards and you are very welcome. Silvia

name: Boutique Apartment in Friedrichshain
summary: We offer a temporary home base combining the comfort of an apartment with the service of a hotel. At STAYERY you can do everything you’d do at home as well and more. After a day of discovering the neighborhood you can chill in your supersize bed or have a beer in the lounge hanging out with your neighbors. Cook your favorite meal at your kitchenette or relax with a round of Mario Kart in the loft. Just like home. You're very, very welcome.
space: The modern apartment offers you anything you need. A 1,60 m Supersize-bed toto stretch out in, a kitchenette with 2 induction hobs, a fridge, cooking utensils, a living chaise to sit, work and relax, a bathroom with rain shower and care products, a smart TV and of course complimentary WiFi.
description: We offer a temporary home base combining the comfort of an apartment with the service of a hotel. At STAYERY you can do everything you’d do at home as well and more. After a day of discovering the neighborhood you can chill in your supersize bed or have a beer in the lounge hanging out with your neighbors. Cook your favorite meal at your kitchenette or relax with a round of Mario Kart in the loft. Just like home. You're very, very welcome. The modern apartment offers you anything you need. A 1,60 m Supersize-bed toto stretch out in, a kitchenette with 2 induction hobs, a fridge, cooking utensils, a living chaise to sit, work and relax, a bathroom with rain shower and care products, a smart TV and of course complimentary WiFi. Next to your apartment with private bathroom you also have access to our common areas on the ground floor, our loft. Our loft offers a coworking area, self-service kiosk and a lounge. Feel free to just chill, watch Pulp Fiction or enjoy an after-work beer with you
neighborhood_overview: Our serviced apartments are centrally located in the trendy neighborhood Berlin Friedrichshain. Pop up galleries, bars, restaurants, graffitis, some music, open air cinemas and techno. Just some of the ingredients that make, Berlin’s district Friedrichshain, right next door to Kreuzberg and Prenzlberg, so cool and groovy.
notes: Please note, that the city of Berlin charges a city tax on non-business stays. Due to that we are obliged to charge the city tax of 5% of the room price of the first 21 days for any private stays. The payment is settled on property without involvement of Airbnb. The city tax is omitted when there is proof of a business stay.
transit: Thanks to our well-connected location you can move around Berlin easily. Directly in front of the hotel you have access to the tram lines 21 and M13. Within 10 minutes by foot you reach Ostkreuz with connections to local train service, the S-Bahn and Ringbahn. We offer a few parking spots closeby, which can be rented for 5€ per night. Let us know beforehand as we reserve them “first come, first serve”.
access: Next to your apartment with private bathroom you also have access to our common areas on the ground floor, our loft. Our loft offers a coworking area, self-service kiosk and a lounge. Feel free to just chill, watch Pulp Fiction or enjoy an after-work beer with your neighbors. Our washing salon is equipped with washers, a dryer, iron and ironing board and is accessible around the clock. During summer you can relax on our terrace in the inner courtyard of the building.
interaction: Our staff – we call them hosts – help you with any questions or requests during the week from 7.00am until 10.00pm and on the weekends from 9.00am and 6.00pm. If you arrive outside of our opening hours, that’s not a problem. Just let us know and make use of our 24/7 check-in.
house_rules: Keine Übernachtungsgäste
host_about:
Es gibt Hotels. Und Boardinghouses. Und die STAYERY. Genau genommen sind wir auch ein Boardinghouse, klar. Denn wir bieten eine Home Base auf Zeit. Für zwei Tage, eine Woche oder ein Jahr. Aber wir sind anders. Und zwar very, very. Die STAYERY verbindet den Komfort einer Wohnung mit dem Service eines Hotels. Very good, oder?

Bei uns kann man alles machen, was man zu Hause auch macht und noch mehr: STAYERY heißt, Teil der Stadt zu sein. Zu wissen, wo es die besten Drinks gibt. Echte Nachbarn statt nur Tür an Tür, stylish designte möblierte Apartments, professionelle Vibes und viele Extras. Short but sweet: Wer zu uns kommt, bleibt länger. You’re very, very welcome.

name: Supernice room in lovely Wedding
summary: Hallo ihr Lieben, hiermit biete ich euch mein schönes Zimmer für ein paar schöne Tage in Berlin an. Es ist bestens dafür geeignet, wenn ihr es allein nutzen wollt, aber auch zu zweit ist genügend Platz. Feel's like home! :-)
description: Hallo ihr Lieben, hiermit biete ich euch mein schönes Zimmer für ein paar schöne Tage in Berlin an. Es ist bestens dafür geeignet, wenn ihr es allein nutzen wollt, aber auch zu zweit ist genügend Platz. Feel's like home! :-) Küche und Bad könnt ihr natürlich mitbenutzen. Während eures Aufenthalts werde ich nicht da sein, aber meine herzallerliebste Mitbewohnerin steht euch gerne mit Rat und Tat zur Seite. Der Wedding ist im Kommen, so heißt es zumindest schon seit ein paar Jahren. Und ja, so langsam wird's... ;-) Der Wedding ist sehr bodenständig und auch ein bisschen Szene. Multi-Kulti garantiert und bitte habt keine Berührungsängste. Der Wedding liegt im Norden von Berlin (Nähe Gesundbrunnen). Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind zu Fuß in ca. 7 Min. zu erreichen. Die U8, U9 und die Ringbahn sind am nächsten dran. In ca. 15 Minuten seid ihr am Alexanderplatz und in 20-30 Minuten in Friedrichshain oder Kreuzberg.

house_rules: Ich erwarte von euch, dass ihr mein zu Hause genau so sorgsam behandelt, wie euer eigenes. Rauchen ist erlaubt (in Maßen), Haustiere leider nicht.
host_about:
Ich arbeite als Einzelfallbetreuerin für das Jugendamt und verbringe viel Zeit mit körperlich als auch geistig behinderten Kindern. Eine sehr schöne, z.T. aber auch anstrengende Tätigkeit. 
In liebe die Menschen, die mir nahe stehen, gutes Essen und gute Serien... und draußen bin auch auch ganz gern.

name: Miniloft Kreuzberg Apartment Hotel: Einfach Plus
summary: Our Einfach Plus Minilofts are studio apartments ideal for up to 2 people + 1 baby. They feature one open space with around 32 sqm. In the sleeping area there is a queen sized bed (160 x 200cm), then there is an open kitchenette with a large wooden table for eating or working, and finally, an ensuite bathroom with a shower. All Einfach Plus Minilofts have large windows which make the space look really open. They also feature a mini balcony which opens up the space further.
space: Miniloft Kreuzberg is the brand new second Berlin location of architecture-award-winning Miniloft Mitte Apartment Hotel. The architects and owners, Britta and Matthew, designed its apartments following the already established Miniloft philosophy: the feeling of a home away from home, with the advantages of a design boutique hotel. Thus, you have your independence as well as professional services and amenities, such wi-fi, towels and bedding, luggage room, office/reception, check-in and check-out systems, complimentary or booked cleaning sessions, parking spaces as well as personalized services.  Our Apartment Hotel features a total of fourteen carefully designed apartments, organized in 4 types which range from studios (open concept rooms), ideal for 1 or 2 guests, to apartments with up to 2 separate bedrooms, accommodating up to 6 guests. Choose between our "Einfach", "Zweifach", "Dreifach" and "Vielfach" apartment types, according to your preference. We have some apartments with spec
description: Our Einfach Plus Minilofts are studio apartments ideal for up to 2 people + 1 baby. They feature one open space with around 32 sqm. In the sleeping area there is a queen sized bed (160 x 200cm), then there is an open kitchenette with a large wooden table for eating or working, and finally, an ensuite bathroom with a shower. All Einfach Plus Minilofts have large windows which make the space look really open. They also feature a mini balcony which opens up the space further. Miniloft Kreuzberg is the brand new second Berlin location of architecture-award-winning Miniloft Mitte Apartment Hotel. The architects and owners, Britta and Matthew, designed its apartments following the already established Miniloft philosophy: the feeling of a home away from home, with the advantages of a design boutique hotel. Thus, you have your independence as well as professional services and amenities, such wi-fi, towels and bedding, luggage room, office/reception, check-in and check-out systems, complimentar
neighborhood_overview: Located on the southern end of Friedrichstraße, we are just 3 minutes walk from Checkpoint Charlie, but in quiet surroundings in front of Besselpark. The main points of interest in Berlin like the Brandenburg Gate, Reichstag and Kanzleramt, are just a few train stops away, and the vibrant districts of Kreuzberg and Bergmannkiez are right at your doorstep. Looking over the city from inside Miniloft Kreuzberg, guests have an overview of some architectural history of 20th-century Berlin: The apartment blocks from the 60s and 70s and the post-modern buildings of the Berlin IBA in 1987 including the standout residential tower by John Hejduk, the Rocket-Tower by Sauerbruch/Hutton with the "pillbox" on the east side of the building, the apartment blocks on Leipziger Strasse and the sparkling Axel Springer skyscraper. You can even see the iconic tv tower of Alexanderplatz. The location of Miniloft Kreuzberg is a bermuda triangle for architect buffs!
notes: At the moment there is some construction going on around this newly-redeveloped area, although the apartments are well insulated, it may be possible that during the day some audible sound disturbances might occur.
transit: Public transport: subway - line U6 to "U Kochstraße".
access: The apartment includes bedding and towels, and is equipped with all the essentials to cook: pots, pans, utensils, plates, cutlery, cups, etc.  There is a self-service laundry room in our basement where guests can use the coin-operated washing machine and the dryer. Guests staying with babies and toddlers will receive a baby cot, baby bathtub, potty, high-chair and plastic crockery... Guests are welcome to use our shared roof terrace to gaze upon the city skyline, on the top floor.
interaction: Feel free to contact us from Monday to Friday, between 9:00-13:00 and 14:00-18:00 via email (Email hidden by Airbnb) Our office is unavailable on weekends but we usually check the emails during the morning, so a delay in answer is expected. Cafe Nullpunkt, our own cafe and restaurant located on the ground floor, has wonderful organic food and a lot of vegan and gluten-free options as well. Miniloft Guests can enjoy a 10% discount!
house_rules: Guests are required to inform us if there are any pets staying (20EUR fee), as well as if they are bringing children that are 2 years old or younger. Guests are also required to book their stay for the total amount of guests staying - additional guests differing from the amount on the reservation are not accepted.
host_about: Ich freue mich über Ihren Besuch und wünsche Ihnen einen unvergesslichen Urlaub! Ich stehe Ihnen jederzeit gerne mit Tipps und Informationen zur Verfügung.

name: Beautiful room in the heart of Berlin.
summary: Modern and quiet 95 sqm apartment in the heart of Berlin. Close to basically everything: design shops, restaurants, bars, public transport (Rosa Luxemburg and Senefelder Platz). Lot of light and spacious. Ideal for short or medium term stay. My roommate and I are traveling quite a bit so we'd like to share our prime location with people that are interested to explore Berlin.
space: A lot of space, big common living room with open kitchen and balcony.
description: Modern and quiet 95 sqm apartment in the heart of Berlin. Close to basically everything: design shops, restaurants, bars, public transport (Rosa Luxemburg and Senefelder Platz). Lot of light and spacious. Ideal for short or medium term stay. My roommate and I are traveling quite a bit so we'd like to share our prime location with people that are interested to explore Berlin. A lot of space, big common living room with open kitchen and balcony. Guests have access to their own bathroom, the open kitchen/living room area and the balcony. Key handover will be discussed individually. If I’m not traveling for work I’m happy to show you some nice restaurant and bars. Always up for a Glas of wine. The apartment is at the edge of Prenzlauer Berg an Mitte.  The apartment is located on top of a supermarket which is opened till 10pm every day. 3 min to U-Bahn Rosa-Luxenburg Platz and Senefelder Platz. Walking distance to Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt.

I'm Jenny, 32 years old, from Germany, currently living and working in Berlin. I'm an open-minded person, I love traveling, all kinds of sport, good wine, good music and I'm always looking for new challenges. 

My motto:
“Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.” (Jules Renard)

name: MODERN FAMILY STUDIO (New!!!)
summary: A beautiful, fully renovated and newly furnished studio in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg! Very good transport connections (3 minutes walk to suburban train, tram or taxi rank) and close to restaurants, cafés and shops.
space: The studio apartment is centrally located, only a few minutes from Prenzlauer Allee station. The apartment has a modern fitted kitchen with induction stove with oven, microwave, coffee machine, large fridge with freezer and much more. ! The apartment is very suitable for guests who want to experience Berlin up close and personal!  Young guests are also well looked after! Toys, coloring books and story books are at the ready! There are also plenty of playgrounds in the immediate vicinity!   Smoking, pets and parties are strictly forbidden in our apartment!

The many boutiques, small neighborhood stores, galleries and markets make the area particularly attractive. In the immediate vicinity there are several supermarkets and organic produce stores! There are also several late-night stores nearby.
notes: Check in before 8 pm;  check in from 8 pm to 11 pm - 50 euros payable in cash on arrival;  Check-in not possible after 11 pm
transit: Prenzlauer Allee station, tram and taxi rank are all reachable within 3 minutes' walk!
access: The apartment has free Wi-Fi. Bed linen, towels and hairdryer are also provided free of charge. A cot and high chair can also be provided for an extra charge of 20 euro (by prior arrangement).
interaction: We receive all our guests personally at the apartment.  In order to ensure a smooth check-in, it is necessary for you to phone us about an hour before you arrive! Please note! Check-ins between 9 pm and midnight are subject to an extra charge of 25 euro, which is payable in cash upon arrival. After midnight check-in is no longer possible!
house_rules: Es sind keine Haustiere erlaubt ! Es besteht absolutes Rauchverbot in der gesamten Wohnung ! Keine Partys und Einhaltung der Nachtruhe ab 22 Uhr ! - Spät Check-in von 20.00 bis 23.00 Uhr + € 50 Gebühr - Kein Check-in nach 23.00 Uhr möglich Eine Hausordnung liegt in der Wohnung aus, welche bitte auch gelesen werden sollte !
host_about:
Ich lebe  und arbeite seit 2001 in Berlin und habe in und mit dieser Stadt vieles erleben dürfen. Berlin ist in den Jahren meine Heimat geworden. 
Ich arbeite seit 14 Jahren in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg! Die Arbeit  macht  mir richtig Spaß!  Ich manage und  betreue mehrere  Ferienwohnungen   in Berlin!  Ich mag reisen  und neue Menschen kennenlernen. Deswegen  für  mich soo wichtig  das je Gast  fühlt sich bei uns  wie Zuhause!!!

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

N. Pohl

name: Studio in trendy Samariter kiez, Friedrichshain
summary: A newly renovated 41 sqm cozy flat with all the amenities you will need to feel at home. The flat is in a classic Berlin Altbau building which still retains the feel of edgy East Berlin. The flat is in a lively courtyard where the voices of neighbors and daily life make you feel you are in the 'Berlin' scene. The studio is in a fantastic location with bars, cafes, restaurants in the immediate vicinity and a ten minute walk will take you to the bustle of the famous Boxhagenerplatz.
space: A bright kitchen open hallway greets you. Spacious bathroom with bathtub / shower. A large bedroom/ living room tastefully decorated will complete your stay.

neighborhood_overview: This is a special area going through gentrification but still has the edginess of proper "East Berlin". Supermarkets/restaurants/boutique/vintage  shops within walking distance. Schreinerstrasse is a beautiful and famous street with a deep history once a Jewish and communist district in the 1930s. Next door a wine bar/theatre to enjoy and relax after a great day in Berlin.
transit: Multiple transportation links within walking distance from the flat: Samariter strasse   (U bahn) is only 7 minutes walk: a few stops by U5 takes you to the famous Alexanderplatz square, Stokower strasse station (S bahn) is 9 minutes walk. Frankfurter allee station is 12 minutes. The tram line M10 is 10 minutes away. Schreiner strasse is limited parking zone.
access: The entire space is at the guest disposal.
interaction: I am available for questions by phone, text or email.
house_rules: The tenants receive a free Wifi connection. As your renting request is granted you agree to not to use it for illegal activities. This also applies to all visitors to whome the password is passed. The provision of the Copyright Act and other relevant regulations must be strictly observed. It is prohibited by law to Download copyrighted works, such as Music, files and movies, to provide images or films without the express permission of the copyright holder or to make accessible to third parties. The download or upload of copyrighted works must, therefore, be avoided. This applies also to Internet sharing files.
host_about:
I'm freelance translator and a yoga teacher. I have moved over the past 30 years  between many countries From Syria to Nigeria to Switzerland toTurkey and now l live with my husband in Germany
I enjoy hosting people from around the world and can say that Berlin is one of the greatest places to come and relax and appreciate its many cultural choices.

summary: Our apartment is located in the center of Berlin, very close to Kreuzberg and the nice areas of Schöneberg. It is also a good place to hang out and enjoy a nice view over Berlin.  We live on the 5th floor and we don't have an elevator.

host_about:
Hi, 
I am a very joyful person, I love traveling, good food, cooking, music, meeting my friends and making new friends from all over the world. 

Me and my boyfriend are living in a nice apartment in Berlin Schöneberg. It is a two bedroom apartment with a big livingroom, a balcony, a kitchen and one bathroom. 

It's situated in Schöneberg, close to the "Bergmann Kiez" in Kreuzberg where you can do all sorts of shoppings and it's full with bars and restaurants. Only 5 minutes walk to busses and subways (Station Yorkstr). It is also very close to the well known "Akazien-Kiez" in Schöneberg.

STAY INCLUDE:
towels and bed linen
Hairdryer
Wireless internet high speed connection.
Kitchen/fridge accessibility -feel free to use the kitchen

No pets allowed as I am allergic. 

Feel free to contact me.

name: Waldiges Zimmer mit Balkon in 3er-WG
summary: Ich wohne in einer 3er-WG mit Jule und Sophia (die beiden sind super unkompliziert) in einer 110qm großen Wohnung. Es gibt eine große Küche, Bad und extra Toilette! Mein (bzw. dein) Zimmer ist ca 24qm groß (schätzungsweise, einen genauen Bauplan haben wir leider nicht). Einen Schreibtisch, einen Massagestuhl und ein 1,60m-Bett, sowie angrenzenden Balkon gehören mit dazu. Wundere dich nicht über den Kratzbaum: meine Katzen sind gerade selbst im Urlaub. Fühl dich wie zu Hause!
space: Wundere dich nicht über den Kratzbaum: meine Katzen sind gerade selbst im Urlaub.  Ich kann dir gerne einen Teil meines Schrankes freiräumen für deine persönlichen Sachen.
description: Ich wohne in einer 3er-WG mit Jule und Sophia (die beiden sind super unkompliziert) in einer 110qm großen Wohnung. Es gibt eine große Küche, Bad und extra Toilette! Fühl dich wie zu Hause! Wundere dich nicht über den Kratzbaum: meine Katzen sind gerade selbst im Urlaub.  Ich kann dir gerne einen Teil meines Schrankes freiräumen für deine persönlichen Sachen. Du kannst mein Zimmer, Küche, Bad und Toilette nutzen. Die Zimmer von Jule und Sophia sind für dich selbstverständlich nicht zugänglich. Ich bin selbst unterwegs zu der Zeit und nur über mein Handy erreichbar. Du kannst dich aber jederzeit an Jule oder Sophia als deine Ansprechpartner wenden. Hier in Steglitz gibt es Familien, ältere Leute, Freak
neighborhood_overview: Hier in Steglitz gibt es Familien, ältere Leute, Freaks und 'ne Menge Studenten. Direkt hier im Hindenburgdamm gibt es nicht besonders viel Spektakuläres. Allerdings kannst du hier alles Essen worauf du Lust hast: von Gemüsedöner über Indisch bis hin zu Italienisch und Thai. Rewe und Lidl sind auch in unmittelbarer Nähe und wie es sich für Berlin gehört, haben wir hier auch einen Späti.
notes: Mir ist eins sehr wichtig: bitte hinterlasse mein Zimmer SO, wie du es vorgefunden hast!
transit: 2min zu Fuß von hier entfernt hast du eine Bushaltestelle, von der dich drei Buslinien zum Rathaus Steglitz bringen. Von dort kommst du mit Bus, S- und U-Bahn wirklich überall hin.  In der Regel bekommt man auch immer irgendwo einen Parkplatz der maximal 5min Fußweg entfernt ist. Das Gute ist, dass man durch den Hintereingang auch ins Haus kommt und somit die Marschnerstraße auch nach Parkplätzen abgrasen kann, ohne große Umwege machen zu müssen.
access: Du kannst mein Zimmer, Küche, Bad und Toilette nutzen. Die Zimmer von Jule und Sophia sind für dich selbstverständlich nicht zugänglich.

host_about: Hi, ich bin Lena, 22, wohne in Berlin Steglitz in einer 3er-WG und studiere die wundervolle Welt der Tiermedizin.
