name: Super-Central Kreuzberg Homestay
summary: Relax in a friendly local household with two blokes and a dog.
space: This guestroom offers a a simple, comfortable place to rest between your adventures and features: - Double bed (140x200 cm)suitable for 1 or 2 guests - Hi-speed wireless internet  - Laptop-friendly desk and chair  - Private wardrobe for storage - Towels, bathrobe, hair dryer, full-length mirror - Newly-added light-blocking curtains
description: Relax in a friendly local household with two blokes and a dog. This guestroom offers a a simple, comfortable place to rest between your adventures and features: - Double bed (140x200 cm)suitable for 1 or 2 guests - Hi-speed wireless internet  - Laptop-friendly desk and chair  - Private wardrobe for storage - Towels, bathrobe, hair dryer, full-length mirror - Newly-added light-blocking curtains You're always welcome and encouraged to hang out in all the common areas featured in the photos; when we're home the house tends to have a relaxed sociable vibe. At all times, you have: - Use of kitchen, with complimentary coffee and tea - A small, shared bathroom, with private storage space for toiletries - Washing machine and drying rack are also available for your use. - Don't feel like going out? Check out the board game collection, over 20 options About your hosts - my husband Isaac and I have lived in Kreuzberg for years and are happy to provide guidance on exploring some of Berlin's hidden
neighborhood_overview: We're in an old, rambling building situated in the heart of Kreuzberg's very lively, multicultural, and gay friendly Wrangelkiez. Just steps out of the door you have a wide range of cafes, food markets, and budget-friendly restaurants. By day, you have within a short walk a choice of swimming pools and saunas, free art galleries, the longest remaining section of the Berlin Wall, scenic walks along the river Spree and tree-lined Landwehr Canal, and Görlitzer Park, where Berlin's alternative subcultures converge. By night, you can easily hop between hundreds of bars and clubs open until sunrise and beyond.   This is the real Berlin, unpolished and full of surprises.
notes: When you request to book, please let us know a bit about yourself and your plans for your trip. We like to know who we'll be sharing our home with, and we strive to create a Berlin experience that's uniquely suited to each new friend that comes our way. Also, be sure to mention that you've read the listing and know: this is a room in a shared flat, with a dog present.
transit: We're just steps away from the nearest U-Bahn station, making all of Berlin's terrific public transport network instantly accessible. Bikes and mopeds are available to rent on apps, traditional bike rental agencies are walking distance, and Berlin's extensive network of dedicated bike lanes and scenic cycle trails offers the best way to explore the city. We can also assist you in organizing unique bike, boat, or walking tours.
access: You're always welcome and encouraged to hang out in all the common areas featured in the photos; when we're home the house tends to have a relaxed sociable vibe. At all times, you have: - Use of kitchen, with complimentary coffee and tea - A small, shared bathroom, with private storage space for toiletries - Washing machine and drying rack are also available for your use. - Don't feel like going out? Check out the board game collection, over 20 options
interaction: About your hosts - my husband Isaac and I have lived in Kreuzberg for years and are happy to provide guidance on exploring some of Berlin's hidden treasures, to get the most out of your time in Berlin. Our co-host is a quiet, very friendly old dog (see photos) who is happy to lead tours of the neighborhood parks. We've been known to take visitors out for urban adventures, bar crawls, and family dinners when schedules permit, and guests are always welcome to hang out in the shared lounge area. But you are free to come and go at any hours and enjoy your guestroom privately as you please.
house_rules: Hi, thank you for your interest in our home! In your request message, please tell us a little bit about your travel plans, and confirm that you have read the rules below and are aware that your guestroom will be in a shared apartment, with a dog on site.  - Tobacco smoking is not permitted anywhere in the building; to smoke, one must descend 2 flights of stairs and exit to the street. - Only the guests named and registered in the original reservation are permitted to enter the building. No additional visitors are allowed. - Parties of 2, please be aware that we are only able to furnish one set of keys. A claim will be made on the deposit for any keys not returned at checkout. - Downloading or uploading of copyrighted materials using our internet connection is not permitted. - Check-ins before 2 PM and check-outs after 12 PM are not always possible, and subject to the presence of other guests and the hosts' availability. Please inquire before booking if you need special accommodations i
host_about:
I'm a San Francisco transplant who's been living in Kreuzberg since 2008 with my British partner . 

We're relaxed, peacefully hedonistic wanderers, who enjoy nothing more than getting lost in new places and the thrill of meeting new people with unique perspectives from everywhere. But when not on the road, we love hosting visitors from all over, and sharing the playful and experimental facets of Berlin that don't tend to reveal themselves to tourists.

name: MODERN APARTMENT IN CITY CENTER
summary: Bei diesem Apartment handelt es sich um eine Neubauwohnung mit 42m2. Eingerichtet ist es sehr einfach, sagen wir Minimalistisch. Die komplette Wohnung ist ausgestattet mit Fußbodenheizung. Wohn -und Schlafzimmer haben große Bodentiefe Fenster. Das Boxspringbett so wie das Schlafsofa sind sehr komfortabel. Das moderne Bad ist schwarz gefliest und sehr geräumig. Die Waschmaschine ist ebenfalls Brandneu. An jedem Fenster befinden sich elektronische Jalousien.
space: Der Smart TV im Wohnzimmer ist ausgestattet mit Netflix. Es gibt einen Balkon zur ruhigen Straße raus. Haushaltsgegenstände wie Staubsauger, Wäscheständer, Leiter und co. sind vorhanden.
description: Bei diesem Apartment handelt es sich um eine Neubauwohnung mit 42m2. Eingerichtet ist es sehr einfach, sagen wir Minimalistisch. Die komplette Wohnung ist ausgestattet mit Fußbodenheizung. Wohn -und Schlafzimmer haben große Bodentiefe Fenster. Das Boxspringbett so wie das Schlafsofa sind sehr komfortabel. Das moderne Bad ist schwarz gefliest und sehr geräumig. Die Waschmaschine ist ebenfalls Brandneu. An jedem Fenster befinden sich elektronische Jalousien. Der Smart TV im Wohnzimmer ist ausgestattet mit Netflix. Es gibt einen Balkon zur ruhigen Straße raus. Haushaltsgegenstände wie Staubsauger, Wäscheständer, Leiter und co. sind vorhanden. Während des Aufenthalts erreichen Sie mich gerne über Airbnb oder telefonisch ab 12Uhr Vormittags. Ich selbst befinde mich leider nicht in Berlin, für Notfälle ist jedoch doch ein Kontakt Vorort. Im Gebäudekomplex befindet sich ein Supermarkt, Bäcker so wie ein Fitnessstudio (ab März). Zu Fuß erreichen Sie schnell Restaurants so wie viele kleine Cafe
neighborhood_overview: Im Gebäudekomplex befindet sich ein Supermarkt, Bäcker so wie ein Fitnessstudio (ab März). Zu Fuß erreichen Sie schnell Restaurants so wie viele kleine Cafes. Auch die riesige neue Parkanlage, mit Sportplätzen und anderen Freizeitgestaltungsmöglichkeiten, ist nur 3 Gehminuten entfernt.
transit: Es gibt eine super Anbindung mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln, unmittelbar vor der Tür findet man 3 Sbahnlinien, die U7 sowie den Bus M19. Zu Orten wie dem Potsdamer Platz, Kudamm oder Alexanderplatz dauert es maximal 15 Minuten.
interaction: Während des Aufenthalts erreichen Sie mich gerne über Airbnb oder telefonisch ab 12Uhr Vormittags. Ich selbst befinde mich leider nicht in Berlin, für Notfälle ist jedoch doch ein Kontakt Vorort.

name: Liebevolles, helles Apartment am Arkonaplatz
summary: Liebevoll eingerichtete und helle 56 qm Wohnung genau zwischen den Stadtteilen Mitte/Prenzlauerberg. Der offene Küchen-, Ess- und Wohnbereich bietet perfekten Blick auf den Arkonaplatz an dem Freitags ein Wochenmarkt und Sonntags ein wunderschöner Flohmarkt stattfindet. In Fußnähe befinden sich eine menge netter Kaffees, Restaurants und Bars - in wenigen Minuten erreicht man den Mauerpark oder die Hackeschen Höfe.
space: Die Wohnung bietet neben einem Doppelbett, einer Gästematratze und einer Couch (eher kleiner) alle Annehmlichkeiten wie Juicer, Fön, Kochutensilien, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine etc.

name: Cosy apartment in Berlin Neukölln
summary: My sunny apartment is located in a nice neighbourhood next to a beautiful garden in trendy (they say!) Neukölln. Many shops and bars at street side. Between two S- and U-bahn stations, so you´ll be in any part of the city in maximum 20 minutes!
space: Hello everybody! I'm travelling away for almost two months and I'm looking for a person to rent my room in Berlin Neukölln. My apartment is very sunny, on the fourth floor. Apart from the bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom there is also a living room and a balcony. I have a housemate, Joachim, you'll be living  with during your stay. He's very friendly, and you can rely on him for any thing you might need. He also doesn't stay at home much, and sleeps most of the days at his girlfriend's place. So, in the end, you'll have most of the time the whole flat for you only! I would prefer to have a person for the whole period; also two people, each for a month more or less, could be ok. Hope to hear from you guys!

neighborhood_overview: You should have a look at the Körnerpark, a public garden just 20 meters from my apartment and not very known even by Berliner. And at 10 minutes walk is the Tempelhofer Feld, a huge park where once was the first airport of Berlin, which urban gardens and people cycling, skateboarding or just grilling!
notes: Please note that I have a futon bed (140cm) which might feel hard if you're not used to. But I'm sure you can make it! :)
transit: Public transport is super convenient! Short ride from Schönefeld airport
house_rules: I ask you to be respectful with objects and furniture, and not to be too loud at night. Please don't lose the keys! Making keys in Germany is very expensive and annoying, so I will have to ask for 50 euros in case you lose them. Illegal downloading of music and films is not allowed, as it is subject to high fines in Germany!
host_about: I'm an italian guy frequently travelling around the world and with a passion for street photography. Hope to meet you soon!

name: Charming apartment in the heart of Schöneberg
summary: Welcome to the capital city! Since I’m traveling myself, I’m renting out my charming apartment in Berlin-Schöneberg in the meantime. Schöneberg city hall as well as supermarkets, restaurants, bars and the park Schöneberg-Wilmersdorf can be found in the near vicinity. My modern apartment is located in an old building and thus features grand windows, a beautiful wooden floor and high ceilings. It’s the ideal accommodation both for tourists and business travelers.
space: My lovely apartment is located directly in the hip district of Schöneberg and thus the perfect place to stay both for tourists and business travelers! The whole apartment is friendly and charming due to the high ceilings which are decorated with stucco, the high windows and the beautiful wooden floor.  In the living room you can relax on the sofa and enjoy the local TV program. Furthermore, you can execute your work both with and without a laptop at the big desk if you’re a business traveler. From the living room you can step onto the sunny balcony where you can enjoy your morningly breakfast perfectly.  The bedroom offers you a double bed (1,40mx2m) which will be waiting for you with fresh linen. The dressing table next to the bed can be used to get ready for a day in the capital.  In the kitchen you’ll find all the utensils you’ll need to prepare a homecooked meal which can be enjoyed at the small table next to the window. neighborhood_overview: In the near vicinity you will find many supermarkets, restaurants, cafés and bars. Schöneberg city hall as well as the Schöneberg-Wilmersdorf park can be reached by foot as well. At night you can find some great places on Goltzstraße.
notes: Smoking is allowed on the balcony.
transit: The metro station "Eisenacher Straße" can be reached in 6 minutes by foot. From „Albertstraße“ you can take the M48 to Alexanderplatz or the M85 to the main station as well as other buses. In 10 minutes you can reach the suburban station „Schöneberg“ where you can catch the circular railway among others.
access: During your stay, you'll have the whole apartment to yourself & access to all rooms.
interaction: Since I’ll be traveling myself during your stay, my friends at Airgreets will take care of your booking and help you with any questions you might have. Feel free to reach out to them at any time via the messenger, they are always happy to help :)
house_rules: - Most importantly, please have a respectful attitude towards the apartment and neighbors. Please treat my furniture and personal belongings with care and respect the neighbors by keeping noise levels down. I expect to find the apartment in the same condition it was when it was handed over to you. And please respect the non-smoking policy inside the entire building. No guests, pets or parties allowed! - Due to organizational reasons, we can only give you one set of keys. - German law on illegal downloads, streaming and file sharing activities is extremely strict, and enforced very effectively. It is therefore forbidden to engage in any such activities using our internet connection during your stay. We will ask you to cover any legal costs that might arise, should you ignore this rule. Therefore, please use the Wifi carefully on legal sites only and do not stream! Upon arrival, you will need to sign an internet agreement specifying the above-mentioned information, as well as a registrat

house_rules: Although smoking is allowed, I would kindly ask you do to so on the balcony.
host_about:
Hey,

I´m Birte, my friends call me Bibi, I´m 26 years old, born and raised in Berlin, Germany. I study Political Science. I did my Bachelors in Vienna, after that I moved to Amsterdam for some time, before returning back to Berlin. I now study in Paris. As you can see, I love moving around, get to know new people, new cities and new environments/cultures. I love traveling, as much as I do moving around. 

I am an easy going person, taking care of other persons' belingings. What I love about airbnb is to get a better sight into the city and its way of living. Staying at someones house is a nice and better way than staying in a clear hotel room.

Hope to meet you soon

Bibi

name: 1-Raum Apartment im grünen Spandau (A2)
summary: Im schönen Spandauer Ortsteil Wilhelmstadt, wohnt unsere Familie, mehrere Generationen unter dem Dach unseres 2-Familienhauses. 2018 haben wir Räume im Souterrain  und Erdgeschoss umgebaut zu 4 Apartments – klein, aber mit allem ausgestattet, was der Mensch braucht um sich geborgen zu fühlen. 99 Meter zur Busstation 135, 338 und 638 – 500 Meter zum Bus M49 (fährt auch nachts) und X49.
space: Jedes Apartment ist zentralbeheizt, bietet Warm- und Kaltwasser und ist wie folgt ausgestattet: Eigenes Badezimmer mit rutschhemmenden Bodenfliesen, Fußbodenheizung, bodengleiche Dusche, Intimdusche warm und kalt, WC, Handwaschbecken, großer Spiegel, Haartrockner, Toilettenpapier, flüssige Seife, Duschgel, Mülleimer. Doppelbett 160x200cm, Schrank mit Kleiderbügeln, Smart-Fernseher – Empfang über Zimmer-Antenne, Küchenzeile mit Spüle und Spülmittel sowie Schwamm, Mikrowelle, Kochplatte, Kühlschrank, Kaffemaschine; Teller, Schüsseln, Tassen, Töpfe, Pfanne, Besteck, Wassergläser, Gläser für Sekt und Wein, Feuerlöschdecke, Mülleimer. Bettwäsche und Handtücher werden gestellt,   WLAN ist kostenlos
description: Im schönen Spandauer Ortsteil Wilhelmstadt, wohnt unsere Familie, mehrere Generationen unter dem Dach unseres 2-Familienhauses. 2018 haben wir Räume im Souterrain  und Erdgeschoss umgebaut zu 4 Apartments – klein, aber mit allem ausgestattet, was der Mensch braucht um sich geborgen zu fühlen. 99 Meter zur Busstation 135, 338 und 638 – 500 Meter zum Bus M49 (fährt auch nachts) und X49. Jedes Apartment ist zentralbeheizt, bietet Warm- und Kaltwasser und ist wie folgt ausgestattet: Eigenes Badezimmer mit rutschhemmenden Bodenfliesen, Fußbodenheizung, bodengleiche Dusche, Intimdusche warm und kalt, WC, Handwaschbecken, großer Spiegel, Haartrockner, Toilettenpapier, flüssige Seife, Duschgel, Mülleimer. Doppelbett 160x200cm, Schrank mit Kleiderbügeln, Smart-Fernseher – Empfang über Zimmer-Antenne, Küchenzeile mit Spüle und Spülmittel sowie Schwamm, Mikrowelle, Kochplatte, Kühlschrank, Kaffemaschine; Teller, Schüsseln, Tassen, Töpfe, Pfanne, Besteck, Wassergläser, Gläser für Sekt und Wein, Fe
neighborhood_overview: Die Zitadelle ist das Wahrzeichen des Bezirks Spandau. In der von einem Wassergraben umgebenen Festungsanlage bekommt man einen Eindruck davon, wie sich die Menschen im 16. Jahrhundert vor Feinden schützten. Hochhäuser und Fachwerkhäuser, Kirchen und Industrie: Der Ortsteil Spandau versprüht gleichzeitig kleinstädtisches, großstädtisches und mittelalterliches Flair. Der Ortsteil Kladow ganz im Südwesten Berlins versprüht dörflichen Charme in Havelnähe. Prächtige Villen wechseln sich mit Einfamilienhäusern ab, dazwischen gibt es viel Grün. In unmittelbarer Nähe der Unterkunft befindet die Ruine des Fort Hahneberg. Diese  ist nicht nur bei Besuchern auf zwei Beinen beliebt. Das Fort ist Winterquartier für mehrere Fledermausarten. Auch die Flora und Fauna rund um die Ruine sind beachtenswert. Im Laubwald rund um das Fort wurden 30 gefährdete Pflanzenarten nachgewiesen. Das Fort, die Fledermäuse, Zugbrücke und Wälder können sich Besucher in verschiedenen thematischen Führungen näher bringe
notes: Alle Apartments sind Nichtraucher-Apartments. Aschenbecher werden von uns vor der Eingangstür zur Verfügung gestellt.
transit: Parken im Steinmeisterweg und in der Rodensteinstr. - nach Absprache auch auf unserem Grundstück. Bushaltestellen für den öffentlichen Personen-Nah-Verkehr (ÖPNV) sind in 99 m Entfernung.
interaction: Unsere Gäste empfangen wir zwar gern persönlich, aber Check-In ist bei uns auch zu später Stunde möglich - am Anreisetag bitte nicht vor 15 Uhr, Check-Out am Abreisetag bitte bis 11 Uhr. Übliche Bürozeit: Montag bis Freitag von 9-17:30 Uhr (meist auch noch später) Der Vermieter wohnt mit im Haus.

description: Das Haus zählt mit der Hufeisensiedlung zu einem von dem Architekten Bruno Taut entworfenen Häusern. Typisch dafür sind die Farben, die runde Fasade und der große Garten. Zur Küche und Balkon, zum Badezimmer und natürlich dem Gästeschlafzimmer. Normalerweise bin ich da. In der Nachbarschaft gibt es alles was das Herz begehrt, tolle Restaurants, Cafés und Bars. Auf der Sonnenallee fahren viele Busse, zu Fuß ist man schnell an der U-Bahnstation Rathaus Neukölln (U7). Ausserdem habe ich ein extra Fahrrad, das ausgeliehen werden kann. host_about:
Ich, Claudio K. N. (geb. 1954) bin in Schwerin geboren, aber lebe seit meinem 1. Lebensjahr in Berlin (West). Ich habe Sport und Musik für das Lehramt studiert und bin nun auch Lehrer für Musik und Sport an einer Grundschule in Spandau. Nebenberuflich bin ich Flamenco-Musiker. Dies war mein erster Beruf, den ich vorher 10 Jahre lang sehr gern und mit viel Leidenschaft ausgeübt hatte. Daher spreche ich außer Englisch und ein bisschen Französisch auch ganz gut Spanisch.
Außerdem habe ich innerhalb meiner Schultätigkeit eine 90-stündige Fortbildung als Mediator (2012) erfolgreich absolviert. Ich bin auch ausgebildet in klassische Massagen, in Ying-Yang- und auch Tantra-Massagen (1999).
Während meines Sportstudium abolvierte ich eine Ausbildung als Skilehrer (1978) und fahre jedes Jahr als Skilehrer auf eine Skifahrt mit der Schule (ins Allgäu) und dem Berliner Skiverein "Berliner Schneehasen" (nach Brixen, Italien auf die Plose, wo wir alle für 8 Tage in 2500m über dem Meeresspiegel, auf dem Gipfel wohnen).
Zu meinen Hobbies zählen Flamencomusik ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) & Sport machen: Volleyball, Skifahren, Tischtennis, Federball, Radfahren, Schach, weiterhin: 
schöne Zeit mit meiner Freundin in Spandau verbringen: Sauna, Massagen, Tischtennis, Federball, schöne Gespräche, Reisen. 
Ich habe mich viel mit Selbsterfahrung beschäftigt z.B. bei Art Reade, Burkhard Kiegeland, Tantra bei Andro, Familienaufstellungen bei Marlies Grzymik-Laule, weiterhin: Paul Lowe, Advaita Maria Bach (Tantra), Thomas Hübl.
Als in der Wohnung lebender Wohnungs-Eigentümer leite ich die WG und habe mit allen meinen WG-Mitgliedern ein Einverständnis zur Anbietung der Zimmer für Gäste erreicht, wobei 
a) einige WG-Mitglieder auch ihr Zimmer anbieten und
b) alle WG-Mitglieder an den Einnahmen auch beteiligt werden.

Was sind die 5 Dinge, ohne die ich nicht mehr leben kann:
1.) Luft zum Atmen, möglichst gern möglichst saubere Luft;
2.) Trinken, ungern Alkohol, weil er mich nicht lustig, sondern müde macht;
3.) Essen, möglichst gern unvergiftetes Essen, möglichst kein  
     Genmanipuliertes Essen, möglichst Bio, gern Vegetarisches, 
     lecker gewürzt;
4.) friedfertige, liebevolle Menschen;
5.) Fällt mir jetzt gerade nicht ein, vielleicht später.

Meine Lieblingsreiseziele waren jahrzehntelang Spanien, vor allem Andalusien, hauptsächlich wegen des Studiums der Flamencomusik.
Aber ich bin auch gern zum Skifahren in Süd-Deutschland (Allgäu), Österreich, Frankreich und vor allem Italien.
Das Meer liebe ich auch und war deshalb schon oft in Norddeutschland (Nordsee und vor allem sehr oft an der Ostsee) und Europa an vielen Küsten.

Mit den Delphinen und Fischen schwimmen war ich auf der Karibik-Insel Bimini, auf der Insel Zanzibar und auf den Seychellen. 

Auf der Insel Zanzibar kann ich das Hotel Spice Island Hotel & Resort an der Ostküste empfehlen, welches im Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis zu den besten Hotels der Insel zählt. Mit den Delphinen schwimmen kann man am besten am Südostzipfel der Insel, in Kizim Kazi. Leider währt die Begegnung mit den Delphinen nicht so lang wie z.B. auf Bimini, weil die Bootsfahrer ziemlich respektlos gegenüber den Delphinen sind. Wenn ein Bootsfahrer Delphine gesichtet hat,  dann gibt er es den Kollegen bekannt und dann sind binnen 30 Sekunden 3-5 weitere Boote mit laut aufheulenden Motor ebenfalls an der Stelle. Die Delphine tauchen dann häufig sofort ab.

Als Gast bin ich ziemlich anspruchslos und flexibel und vor allem respektvoll, daher für den Gastgeber höchst unkompliziert.

Als Gastgeber bin ich freundlich, flexibel und hilfsbereit. Dies ist aus den Bewertungen auch herauslesbar.

Als Lebensmottos fallen mir ein:
Leben und leben lassen! Und
Helfen und helfen lassen!

name: Spacious&cosy room close to Mitte!
summary: Hello fellow guests!  We're offering a big room in our shared flat! We are three people living in the apartment but usually one of us isn't in the city - your chance to stay in trendy Wedding!  There's one big bed&a sofa - enough space for 4 people in the room! We love to cook all sorts of food - so we have a very well equipped kitchen you're welcome to use. Closeby you'l find a lot of places to buy fresh food.  Public transport is around the corner- you'll reach every spot in the city quickly.
description: Hello fellow guests!  We're offering a big room in our shared flat! We are three people living in the apartment but usually one of us isn't in the city - your chance to stay in trendy Wedding!  There's one big bed&a sofa - enough space for 4 people in the room! We love to cook all sorts of food - so we have a very well equipped kitchen you're welcome to use. Closeby you'l find a lot of places to buy fresh food.  Public transport is around the corner- you'll reach every spot in the city quickly. You'll be able to use our well equipped kitchen including a coffee machine, dishwasher, spices and everything else you might need to prepare a nice meal!  Of course you can use the bathroom - we having a washing machine which you're welcome to use as well. Whenever you arrive at least one of us will be at home to welcome you and answer all the questions you might help.  During the day we are all quite busy but always able to answer your questions or give you more information about the city. Don'
neighborhood_overview: Wedding is the new Neukölln - that's what the people say...but it is still very authentic and (Website hidden by Airbnb) be prepared to encounter an intresting mixture in this part of Berlin! There are a lot of Turkish supermarkets, bakeries, shops and restaurants just around the corner. Heading more into the center of wedding you'll also find some well-hidden, trendy cafes and bars where you can perfectly sit down to watch the bustling street life.  There is a beautiful urban-gardening project around the corner - let us know if you're intrested in visiting!  In summer you might enjoy the close by parks and lakes: Humboldhain is just a short walk away and the bigger Volkspark Rehberger including an open air cinema is easily reachable by metro. For all the food lovers: there is a famous vegan Döner restaurant around the corner! You might also enjoy restaurants in closeby Sprengelkiez and the still authentic turkish and arabic restaurants around Leopoldplatz. A organic bakery is just acr
transit: You are in walking distance within the Subway ( U6 and U9 ), the Sbahn 41/42 and several buses.  So you'll easily reach every spot in the city without trouble.
access: You'll be able to use our well equipped kitchen including a coffee machine, dishwasher, spices and everything else you might need to prepare a nice meal!  Of course you can use the bathroom - we having a washing machine which you're welcome to use as well.
interaction: Whenever you arrive at least one of us will be at home to welcome you and answer all the questions you might help.  During the day we are all quite busy but always able to answer your questions or give you more information about the city. Don't hesistate to let us know what we could do to make your stay even nicer!
host_about:
Definitely traveling addicted, Yogi, most of the time vegan but always curious to try new food, using every moment left to be in the nature, love to have a good discussion and a good coffee and learn new languages. 

I travelled a lot in America Latina and definitely fell in love with continent& the People :) 

I'm now Berlin based but  usually travelling for some weeks each year.

host_about:
Hi Guys, 

my name is Dirk and I am a typical Berliner who is living here his entire life. For over 30 years I have experience in hosting guests and running restaurants and will be happy to welcome you all in my 4 apartments + 4 rooms in this unique boutique apartment house in downtown berlin. Its small but very comfortable. The apartments are unique and the 4 rooms dedicated for budget travellers.

As I am myself living outside Berlin on the country side half of the week with my family I hired a befriended management company to help me out, they are called GreatStay. Once you book one of my places they will contact you and arrange a smooth check in and respond to all of your questions. 

Happy to host you all:)
Dirk

name: Lovely studio apartment in the Heart of Wedding**
summary: A stylish 36 sqm studio one bedroom apartment that was re-designed to reflect the emerging, creative, and alternative neighborhood in the heart of hip Wedding, conveniently located on Leopoldplatz, connecting you to any corner in the city
space: A stylish re-designed 36 m2 studio apartment reflecting emerging, creative, and alternative neighborhood in the heart of hip Wedding.   The apartment is located on the fourth floor within the first courtyard of the building. The newly renovated Altbau apartment showcases the best of new and old as it retains the characteristic, charm and proportion of an Altbau flat with updated elements where needed.  It was transformed into a light, airy and calm space through careful manipulation of surfaces and natural light. Through the retention of original wooden flooring and by exposing the brick structural inner walls of the building the architectural integrity of the building is highlighted and re-interpreted using contemporary white washed finishes to create a unique contemporary lofty character for such a compact space.   What is seemingly sparsely furnished is secretly packed full of the hidden design solutions required for modern living. Hidden storage solutions and multi-functional furni

name: Whole flat in the alternative Berlin !
summary: Nice flat north of Karl-Marx Allee, a part of Friedrichshain which still be in some way alternative. The flat is 65 m², enough to feel comfortable. It has a balcony, a bathtub and enough space to work.
space: The flat is 65 m² big (about 700 sq ft !). The room is 22qm (about 230 sq ft). It has a balcony, a bathtub, a brand new washing machine and is simple furnished. Strong WiFi, a desk and a screen allow some work.
description: Nice flat north of Karl-Marx Allee, a part of Friedrichshain which still be in some way alternative. The flat is 65 m², enough to feel comfortable. It has a balcony, a bathtub and enough space to work. The flat is 65 m² big (about 700 sq ft !). The room is 22qm (about 230 sq ft). It has a balcony, a bathtub, a brand new washing machine and is simple furnished. Strong WiFi, a desk and a screen allow some work. You will have access to the whole flat for you alone. We will be away. The room has a double bed. Please check my recommendations on my profile guidebook. You will get the keys over HoardSpot, a service that allows you to check in at the corner convenience store (Späti). The area has an alternative tradition. There are still house projects to be found around. These spaces have a common vision and mostly a space for drinks and concerts. The idealism can result in people getting louder, better see it as fun. South Friedrichshain is home to tourist and students bars, the biggest club
neighborhood_overview: The area has an alternative tradition. There are still house projects to be found around. These spaces have a common vision and mostly a space for drinks and concerts. The idealism can result in people getting louder, better see it as fun. South Friedrichshain is home to tourist and students bars, the biggest clubs in town (including Berghain) some galleries, the wall and the Spree river.  The Karl Marx Allee, a huge heritage monumental avenue, is near. Frankfurter Tor is especially remarkable with twin towers framing the TV tower. It is also a convenient transportation hub. There is a fair park around the corner. Behind it there is a high-tech olympic swimming pool.
transit: Frankfurter Tor has the subway U5 and tram M10. Down with the tram you are in Turkish and creative Kreuzberg, up with it in the hip Prenzlauerberg. Ever heard of the giant karaoke at Mauerpark, take the M10. It ends at Berlin main train station. Ride U5 10 min to reach Alexander Platz. It is a shopping and transport hub. It is also the start of Unter den Linden, the museum avenue. Just behind the Volksbühne Theater you'll find the Rosenthaler Platz area with all the cutting edge galleries. S41 (ring) trains at Storkower Str. are a short walk away and easily connects you to Neukölln, the hipster mecca, in less than 30 min. From there S9 runs directly to SXF airport in 1 hour. S42 (ring) go to Beussel Str. where you can connect to the TXL bus.
access: You will have access to the whole flat for you alone. We will be away. The room has a double bed.
interaction: Please check my recommendations on my profile guidebook. You will get the keys over HoardSpot, a service that allows you to check in at the corner convenience store (Späti).
house_rules: Please don't mess up my life while I am away. I am vegetarian. Only ID verified guests, reviews preferred. No animals (even dead), no party and no shoes inside.  No arrogance toward the neighbors, especially the leftist kids. No pictures of the left house projects, it irritates them. Please give water to the indoor plants (only if earth is dry). Too much heating makes more vulnerable to winter diseases. Give some fresh air from time to time.
host_about:
I am a free lance architect and I like to travel.
Adventure might be risky, routine is more.
Hiking through Hampi temples, getting lost in Fes, staying in a favella in Rio de Janeiro, wondering at fairy chimneys in Capadocia were great travel experiences. I seek for more. 
I am vegetarian and smoker but I adapt easily and am respectful of others lifestyle : I have no problem to smoke outside and I can share a meal with a carnivore.
Music, books, movies :
Hermann Hesse, Hemingway, Conrad, Vian, Nabokov, Dostoievski, Kafka, Tournier, Paul Auster, Orwell, H.G. Wells, Tolkien, Moebius, Sfar, Trondheim
Hendrix, Hancock, Doors, Plastikman, Beck, Trentemöller, Holy Fuck,...
The Rope, Papillon, 2001 Space Odissey, Citizen Kane, Metropolis, Modern Times, Avatar, Blade Runner, Brazil, Indiana Jones, Solaris

space: -1 bedrooms and 1 huge living room  -unique furnitures and design.   - Cute and fully equipped kitchen with the most beautiful tiles!  - I have a dryer, but the washing machine doesn't work at the moment. - bathroom with a large bathtub. - flowering balconies with an amazing sky and rooftops view. In the meanwhile, I will answer every email as soon as I can.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is very young and hype. It is not exactly the center of Berlin, but it has a lot of other advantages, like food, bars and parks which I will happily share with you.
notes: Note that the apartment is at the 4th floor- it means that you get a beautiful view but you pay for it by having to fly 4 floors up! THIS ISN'T AN HOLIDAY APARTMENT! It's my home, I live here. I only rent it out when I am away because I feel bad to leave it empty. That's means that my own personal stuff will be hanging around. Please do feel yourself at home.  Another important thing to mention is that I don't have bed frame for the double bed, but I  guarantee that the bed is super comfortable nevertheless! Before you make a reservation please read the following 'house rules' and make sure you agree to follow up on the rules: 1. Please treat the place and my personal belonging with respect. Do not touch anything that is in close drawers. 2. Parties, and especially late nate parties are not welcome. By parties I mean every event with more than the 4 of you. **In any case, you shouldn't be loud after 10pm, even during the weekend, in respect to the neighbors above us who go to bed early
transit: Bus M41/ M20 - 2 minutes walk U8 and U7, Hermannplatz station- bring you to the city center within 12 minutes.  Hasenheide Park, Treptow Park, Tempelhof airport and Görlizer park within a short walk!

Teresa

space: The flat is fully equipped, really big spaces and nice huge living room as sharing space. You will feel in a typical old school Berlin flat with a touch of ethnic taste. A Big maroccan door is the central piece of the big living room, many spotlight and candles they make the space really cosy at night.

neighborhood_overview: Facing the amazing Viktoria park. 5 minutes walking from the famous and caratteristic Bergmannstr. In front of the main entrance you will find the Bustation 140,  7  minutes from the Ubhan station : Yorkstrasse, Meringdahmm , Platz Der Luftbrucke. ( U6-U7 ) and 10 minutes from Tempelhofer-feld by bus 104. In the block there are many nice bars and restaurant , 3 really closed supermarket and a gas-station open 24h. The Kiez ( neighbourhood ) is really nice and elegant , after 19:30 there will be almost no cars passing in the street cause is a really calm and residential part of Kreuzberg.  Is a perfect place to stay for families with kids , in the beautifull Viktoria park facing the flat there is a really nice kindergarten and a big playgruound safe for kids.
notes: The atmosfere of the appartment is really the tipical Berlin old school style mixed with a bohemien and romantic touch.
transit: Exactly in front of the main entrance you will find the Bus station 140 ( both directions ) who brings in 5 minutes to Meringdamm ( U6-U7 ) or to Tempelohff in 10 minutes ( U6-ringbahn and Sbahn ). name: Big, bright and cosy room in a great location :)
summary: Come stay with me and my Irish flatmate Andrew in our lovely bright Friedrichshain apartment. You'll be within walking distance of the East Side Gallery as well as loads of fantastic cafes, restaurants and clubs. Check out the market at Boxhagener Platz on the weekend! You're also a seven minute walk away from Ostkreuz, a station that takes you almost anywhere you need to go. You can even get to a lake within 30 minutes from our front door!
space: The space is a lovely big bright room with high ceilings and wooden floors. It is furnished with a sofa, double bed, desk and cupboard. The room even has its own small balcony looking down onto Boxhagener Straße.
description: Come stay with me and my Irish flatmate Andrew in our lovely bright Friedrichshain apartment. You'll be within walking distance of the East Side Gallery as well as loads of fantastic cafes, restaurants and clubs. Check out the market at Boxhagener Platz on the weekend! You're also a seven minute walk away from Ostkreuz, a station that takes you almost anywhere you need to go. You can even get to a lake within 30 minutes from our front door! The space is a lovely big bright room with high ceilings and wooden floors. It is furnished with a sofa, double bed, desk and cupboard. The room even has its own small balcony looking down onto Boxhagener Straße. You're free to use the shared kitchen and bathroom as much as you need. I'm happy to advise you and help you out, but due to work and my own personal life I can't promise to be there for you at all times. Not that I'm not open to hang out if it fits! The area is called Friedrichshain and there's a lot going on around there but it's pretty a
neighborhood_overview: The area is called Friedrichshain and there's a lot going on around there but it's pretty and clean and not too loud or busy. There are many restaurants and cafes for all types of tastes (Cheap Döner? Vegan Burger? Sushi? You name it). Apart from that the apartment is close to Boxhagener Platz, a small park that people like to hang out in and there's a market there on the weekend.  If you're excited to explore Berlin's nightlife then this is the place for you, there are plenty of bars all around and the apartment is close to so many of Berlin's famous clubs. About Blank, Berghain, Renate, Suicide Circus, Kosmonaut and many more all within walking distance. If you're more into nature then not to worry, it's a particularly leafy part of town and within 30-40 minute you can be at any number of lakes. Rummelsburg is a really nice place for a walk around the corner and you can get there by foot in just 20 minutes
transit: The apartment is very close to Ostkreuz station (7 minute walk) which will probably be your main transport link for getting around Berlin. Otherwise you can walk 15 minutes (or get the tram for 5) to Warschauer Straße which is another central hub and good transport link, or walk 15 minutes to Samariterstraße from which you can take the U-Bahn to Alexanderplatz.
access: You're free to use the shared kitchen and bathroom as much as you need.
interaction: I'm happy to advise you and help you out, but due to work and my own personal life I can't promise to be there for you at all times. Not that I'm not open to hang out if it fits!
host_about:
I'm Elana, 25, born in Sweden, grew up in London and have lived in several countries including Spain, Australia and Israel. At the moment I'm living and working in Berlin and it's definitely home to me now.

Interests include (in no particular order) programming, design, art, travel, languages, dancing through the night to techno, cycling, photography etc etc 

Come stay in my shared apartment to get a feel for what it's really like living in Berlin. I know the city very will and I'm sure I'll be able to help you with  recommendations regardless of your tastes.

summary: We let our great 95m2 apartment in Prenzlauer Berg near Mauerpark from June 25th to July 16th for max. four adults and two kids! Located in one of the last charming not refurbished old buildings in Berlin. PLEASE NOTE: minimum stay 5 nights!!!
space: 5 minutes on foot to S-Bahn Schönhauser Allee, U2 (metro) and tram. 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt. Well equipped kitchen with gas stove and oven and everything you need to cook! Bathroom with bath tub, washing machine and tumbler.  You will get towels and bed linen from us. We have one bedroom with a 180cm bed and optionally child´s bed (see pictures). One living-dining room with two child´s chairs if you need. And a children's room with a single bed or optional another double bed and nice toys. Children and dogs are very welcome!

name: Apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: Our large apartment is based in the heart of Kreuzberg at the Paul-Lincke-Ufer.
description: Our large apartment is based in the heart of Kreuzberg at the Paul-Lincke-Ufer.
neighborhood_overview: Kreuzberg is known for its colorful vibrant mix of influences clashing in its most beautiful form. I'm happy to share my most favorite places just around the corner: Markthalle Neun (Eisenbahnstraße 42/43) Earthly pleasures meet cosmopolitan delicacies.  Café Valentin (Sanderstraße 13) Smorgasbord of Scandinavian delights  Ban Ban (Hermannstraße 205) Korean Street Food in a Shack  Two and two (Pannierstraße 6) French pastries & Japanese stationery  Roamers (Pannierstraße 64) Homemade loveliness  Voo Store (Oranienstraße 24) Zeitgeist in a Kreuzberg Courtyard Katz Orange (Bergstraße 22) A culinary treasure in a beautiful courtyard
transit: The metro line U8 will bring you straight to Berlin Mitte. Busses and trams complete the picture.
house_rules: Feel yourself at home and treat it like this. No smoking and no pets.
host_about: I am a cultural explorer, globe trotter, diversity seeker, flea market lover and wellness-admirer. Sunshine, adventures and sparkling conversations put a huge smile on my face.

name: Cosy altbau studio flat in central Berlin
summary: Lovingly restored 'Altbau' studio flat located in Berlin Mitte, just north of Friedrichstraße, between the Museum of Modern Art and the Wall Museum. The apartment is a 5 minute tram ride from the central station. The apartment retains its original wooden floors and is furnished with wooden furniture.The apartment is bright with high ceilings and a window looking out to the courtyard side of the house.
space: The apartment has solid wood flooring throughout. It has a WC room and separate shower and sink and is equipped with a washing machine. There is a 90x200cm bed on the ground floor and a double mattress 140x200cm on the mezzanine level. The flat is equipped with an iron, ironing board, clothes dryer, hair dryer and towels. The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge-freezer, kettle, coffee machine, toaster, two plate hob and all the necessary utensils for cooking and preparing food.  We can provide a baby cot and bedding on request for a 30 euro fee which can be paid in cash.

neighborhood_overview: The U-Bahn station Naturkundemuseum (U6) is 150 meters away from the apartment. All central/historic attractions (Friedrichstraße, the main shopping street in Berlin, Museum Island, Brandenburger Tor, Check Point Charlie and Hamburger Bahnhof for Contemporary Art) are situated 10 minutes away.
notes: We do not allow smoking in the apartment or anywhere in the house including the staircase. The second bed is situtated up a flight of stairs and thus not suitable for toddlers or anyone with walking difficulties.  Access to the apartment on the third floor is by stairs, there is no lift.
transit: From Tegel Airport: 20 minutes taxi ride (20€) or 35 minutes by Bus TXL (3€ per person). From main train station (Berlin HBF): 5 minutes tram journey. We offer underground parking beneath the house at 15€ per day.
interaction: I am always available by phone if there are any problems throughout your stay.

name: Comfy bedroom on Tempelhofer Feld
summary: Welcome to my pretty flat! This cozy nest is located in a green and calm street of Berlin, just by the infamous Tempelhofer Feld! In my room, you’ll be able to chill in a king size extra comfortable bed or read in my beautiful red couch by the French Balcony.  We love to cook! So the kitchen is fully equipped and the dinner table is sized for feasts and guests. Please feel at home!
space: The bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are free to use.
description: Welcome to my pretty flat! This cozy nest is located in a green and calm street of Berlin, just by the infamous Tempelhofer Feld! In my room, you’ll be able to chill in a king size extra comfortable bed or read in my beautiful red couch by the French Balcony.  We love to cook! So the kitchen is fully equipped and the dinner table is sized for feasts and guests. Please feel at home! The bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are free to use. You’ll have to share the Kitchen and Bathroom with my flatmate Inga!  She’s German and has been living in Berlin for years so feel free to ask her anything! I won’t be in town during your stay but feel free to reach out by text and I will be happy to answer any of your questions! Our flat is located in Schillerkiez, in Neukölln - the best district in the city if you ask me.  It is right at the entrance of Tempelhofer Feld, a former airport now giant city park, cherished by all Berliners. On sunny days, you’ll see it get crowed with people coming for a drink
neighborhood_overview: Our flat is located in Schillerkiez, in Neukölln - the best district in the city if you ask me.  It is right at the entrance of Tempelhofer Feld, a former airport now giant city park, cherished by all Berliners. On sunny days, you’ll see it get crowed with people coming for a drink on the grass or a barbecue between friends. ADVISE: you can see there some breathtaking sunset!  North of the flat is Herrfurtstraße, it’s church, many restaurants and coffee places. On Saturdays you’ll find there a great organic food market with some of the best products you could find in the city. Restaurants: La Pecora Nera, Caligari, Gordons, Han West Coffee/Tea/Cake: Engels, Selig Bars: Frollein Langner, Daffke Clubs: Griessmühle, Sameheads, Arkaoda
transit: Leinestraße: U8 Hermannstraße: U (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: You’ll have to share the Kitchen and Bathroom with my flatmate Inga!  She’s German and has been living in Berlin for years so feel free to ask her anything!
interaction: I won’t be in town during your stay but feel free to reach out by text and I will be happy to answer any of your questions!
host_about: Hi, my name is Marie. I am a 25 years old French woman living in Berlin.

name: 柏林火车站黛德丽老公寓
summary: 独具十九世纪柏林特色的老公寓黛德丽,位于拥有众多世界遗产遗址､博物馆､纪念馆和现代画廊､咖啡厅的米特区｡公寓距离柏林火车总站750米,勃兰登堡门2公里,柏林泰格尔机场7公里;毗邻施普雷河,距离德国国会大厦步行20分钟,波茨坦广场25分钟;30分钟乘车可直达博物馆岛､亚历山大广场和历史悠久的尼古拉街区｡ 公寓总面积75平米,房高3.6米,位于经典的五层公寓第三层｡明亮宽敞的公寓以现代风格装饰,卧房兼起居室三面窗户,1.8X2米国王尺寸大床;单独一间办公室适合商务人士｡公寓配备了一个舒适的超级厨房(包括洗碗机,炉/烤箱,冰箱､洗衣机等);卫生间一个超型三角浴缸为您解除旅行的疲惫｡前面200米有平价超市ALDI,客人可以自己做饭或者在公寓里招待朋友｡ 为了您有一个完美的柏林之旅:-),在黛德丽公寓享受古老的文化氛围,体验柏林迷人的风情,我们很乐意随时分享建议,让也可提供中文订票和导游服务｡

name: Famous WATERTOWER in Berlin
space: If you visit Berlin, don`t stay anywhere! Sleep in the original Watertower. It was builded up in 1877 and is the symbol for Prenzlauer Berg. Here you feel like home as a VIP Guest of this city. Sometimes we are out for holiday, so these are rare chances to stay in our charming flat, which is not rentable usually.  The price is 85 € per night and you will find 1 quiet bedroom, 1 huge living room with wifi , a fully equipt kitchen with washing machine and dishwasher, bathroom and seperated wc. ;-) and the Flat is a non-smoking area (Sorry smokers !) I hire the rooms only for at least 3 nights. Near the apartment is the Kollwitz Platz with a wonderful weekly market (probably Berlin's best weekly market). You live in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg with a lot oft shops and restaurants around.  For further informations contact me!

name: Cosy flat in very quiet area, Alt-Treptow
summary: Very cosy, typical early 20th century Berlin style flat with high stucco ceiling and balkony. Large bed (140x200cm) with bed sheets and pillows for two persons. The area is perfectly quiet (no noisy neighbours/tourists/cars) and at the same time very close to the nicest parts of Berlin, such as Görlitzer Park (5 min walking distance), Kreuzberg (5 min) and Neukölln (10 min).  This is a privately used flat, rented out only occasionally for short periods of time, when I am on vacation.

name: Berlin gemütliches Zimmer mit Balkon
summary: Schönes Zimmer mit Balkon in ruhiger Wohnung im pulsierenden Zentrum Berlins.
space: Dein Zimmer ist das kleinere (18qm) von zwei Zimmern unserer 75qm Wohung, in dem anderen wohnen wir, mein Freund Jan und ich. Dein Zimmer hat einen direkten Zugang zu einem kleinen Balkon, wo Du im Sommer schön in der Sonne frühstücken kannst. Im Zimmer gibt es ein 140cm-Bett.
description: Schönes Zimmer mit Balkon in ruhiger Wohnung im pulsierenden Zentrum Berlins. Dein Zimmer ist das kleinere (18qm) von zwei Zimmern unserer 75qm Wohung, in dem anderen wohnen wir, mein Freund Jan und ich. Dein Zimmer hat einen direkten Zugang zu einem kleinen Balkon, wo Du im Sommer schön in der Sonne frühstücken kannst. Im Zimmer gibt es ein 140cm-Bett. Neben Deinem Zimmer und dem angrenzenden Balkon hast Du Zugang zu der mit uns gemeinsam genutzten Küche und Bad. Wir freuen uns über Gäste und geben gerne Tipps zur Nachbarschaft und Stadt. Es gibt nicht viel, was es in der Nachbarschaft nicht gibt. An der Grenze von Kreuzberg und Neukölln bist Du mitten drin in Berlins spannenden Leben: kaum aus der Haustür laden unzählige ausgefallene Cafés,  szenige Vintage-Läden und Restaurants aus aller Herren Länder zu kleinen und großen Entdeckungstouren ein. Die Anbindung ist sehr gut: 4 Minuten bis zur U-Bahn Haltestelle "Hermannplatz" (U7 und U8) und zu diversen Bussen.

description: Meine Unterkunft liegt im Sprengelkiez, sehr zentral gelegen und trotzdem ruhig. 5 Minuten zu U-Bahn und 10 Minuten zu S-Bahn. Supermarkt und Bars ums Eck. summary: Hallo Ihr Lieben, die Wohnung ist mitten in Kreuzberg! Zum Alex, Brandenburger Tor , Hbf...sind es ca. 10 min. Die Wohnung hat 90qm. 2 Zimmer+Küche.  Das Zimmer ist 30qm groß.  Du/Ihr übernachtet auf einem 1,4x2,00 Air Bed (keine gewöhnliche Luftmatratze, eher mit einer normalem Bett zu vergleichen;50cm hoch) was wirklich ziemlich komfortabel ist :) Das Zimmer verfügt einen großen Schreibtisch und ein gemütliches Sofa. Ihr könnt die komplette Wohnung nutzen (außer mein Schlafzimmer).

name: Minimalistic Artsy Double room 5 min to Neukolln
summary: We offer the living room a few days a month for Neukolln guests :)     You will be staying in a 20 qm spacious room with balcony, sharing with two other (Hidden by Airbnb) . Superb location, It's 5 minutes walk to well connected Neukölln (S+U7) station and 7 mins to Hermannstrasse (S+U8). The flat is located in the quieter part of Neukölln, right next to two beautiful parks, many tasteful bars and cafe as well as big super markets and functional shop like postoffice and dm etc.
space: You will not be disappointed with the renovated flat in an old building. High-ish ceiling and real wooden flooring are the reason I took the contract. The room is north facing so you will get lots of sunlight.

name: Apartment next to the centre Mitte, lake and park
summary: Schönes Zimmer in berliner Altbauwohnung im historischen Stadtteil Wedding nähe Mitte.
space: Klein, aber fein mit Stil und allem was das Herz begehrt, auch in direkter Nähe der Wohnung.
description: Schönes Zimmer in berliner Altbauwohnung im historischen Stadtteil Wedding nähe Mitte. Klein, aber fein mit Stil und allem was das Herz begehrt, auch in direkter Nähe der Wohnung. Mein Zimmer und alle Gemeinschaftsräume (Bad und Küche) sind für dich zugänglich. Wenn ich mein Zimmer zur Verfügung stelle, bin ich nicht da, jedoch habe ich zwei sehr nette Mitbewohnerinnen und bin jederzeit erreichbar. Die Transvaalstr. liegt im Afrikanischem Viertel, der wunderschöne und große Volkspark Rehberge ist in unter 5 Minuten fußläufig zu erreichen, wie auch der Plötzensee. Des Weiteren ist von der nächstgelegenen U Bahnstation Rehberge das Stadtzentrum in 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Die nahegelegene Müllerstraße, wie auch ihre umliegenden Straßen bieten zu dem viel kulinarische Auswahl. Von der nächstgelegenen U Bahnstation Rehberge ist das Stadtzentrum in 10 Minuten zu erreichen, außerdem kann direkt vom Hauptbahnhof aus die Wohnung mit dem Bus 120 angefahren werden und mit den Bussen 221 und 128

name: Big sunny room in East Berlin, 3min to train!
summary: Hi,  My name is Malek and I am studying  in Berlin.  I love photograpy, street art, theater, music. Sometimes I am visiting friends or my family, so I rent my room while I am out. In fact i really like the idea AirBnB is based on and i want to be part of it :)  I am sharing the flat with my friend Oscar who you will definetly like. My room is very spaciours and it has a private cute balcony with a hammock to chill in ;). I'll do my best to make you feel at home Feel welcome and discover Berlin!
space: The flat (this includes bathroom and kitchen) is shared with my wonderful roommate. The kitchen is fully equipped (including a dishwasher) and in the bathroom you can use the washing machine.

From Ostkreuz you
transit: The flat is located in Friedrichshain right at the Ostkreuz (S-Bahn 3 minutes walking distance) and close to Simon-Dach Straße, Boxhagener Platz and many nice bars, cafés, parks, restaurants etc..  From Ostkreuz you can reach Alexander Platz in 15 minutes, Kreuzberg in 10 minutes and pretty much most important places in less than 30 minutes.  From the airport (Schönefeld) you can take a direct train (S9 direction Pankow) and within 15 min you’re at Ostkreuz which means at home!

name: Double bedroom - 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz
summary: 15 minutes from City Centre. Direct connections to Alexanderplatz and Gesundbrunnen Train station. A very nice and fully furnished apartment with a beautiful backyard. The room has a window to the backyard. The apartment is next to the underground U8 Residenzstrasse. Also there is a bus stop in front of the house. You can get direct connections to the airport from both.
space: The living room with a 65inches OLED TV (with Netflix and PrimeVideo and German TV ofcourse) with a stereo sound bar and PlayStation 4 pro can be used during my presence in the apartment
description: 15 minutes from City Centre. Direct connections to Alexanderplatz and Gesundbrunnen Train station. A very nice and fully furnished apartment with a beautiful backyard. The room has a window to the backyard. The apartment is next to the underground U8 Residenzstrasse. Also there is a bus stop in front of the house. You can get direct connections to the airport from both. The living room with a 65inches OLED TV (with Netflix and PrimeVideo and German TV ofcourse) with a stereo sound bar and PlayStation 4 pro can be used during my presence in the apartment The backyard has a big lawn with a table tennis table and big beautiful trees.  Guests can use it as well. I have rackets for table tennis that I will be happy to lend  I would love to help you with information about getting around the cities.  I can also tell you some hidden spots in Berlin that many tourists won’t know.  I have also added pictures of some of those places nearby that I took during my stay in Berlin. I like photography
neighborhood_overview: There is a very nice cafe next to it. There is also a very beautiful lake called Schäfersee 400 meters away. The backyard of the building has a private lawn with big beautiful trees and a table tennis table. Guests can use it and I would be happy to lend the rackets too.  Post office and ATM is less than 20 meters away. And Internet cafe and many restaurants are at a walking distance. Many grocery stores for fresh fruits, meat and other stuff like Edeka, Rewe, Netto, Penny, Rossman and a big Turkish store Bolu are within 500 meters distance radius. Many clothing stores like Woolworth, Zeeman and Ernstings are also close.
notes: It’s an Alcohol free, drugs free and pet free apartment. Please do not get home drunk and do not be loud after 22:00. I like tidy and clean people. There will be some general house rules regarding usage of shared amenities that I will hand you over once you arrive. And I will be happy to assist you with anything I can about moving around in the city.
transit: Berlin Tegel airport is about 6 kilometers away. 10 minutes by taxi and less than 30 minutes by public transport.  Underground station Residenzstrasse for U8 is literally 10 meters away. Buss stop for N8 and 327 is right in front of the building door and buses 122 and 125 are also few meters away. You can get to the big train station of Gesundbrunnen and the big shopping center in 7 minutes in underground U8 And Alexanderplatz in less than 15 minutes.
access: The backyard has a big lawn with a table tennis table and big beautiful trees.  Guests can use it as well. I have rackets for table tennis that I will be happy to lend
interaction: I would love to help you with information about getting around the cities.  I can also tell you some hidden spots in Berlin that many tourists won’t know.  I have also added pictures of some of those places nearby that I took during my stay in Berlin. I like photography :) Feel free to ask me anything you need.
house_rules: *Important* For stays longer than 2 weeks, an additional cleaning fee of 10 euro per week will be charged.(for cleaning of your room and fresh linens) - I can not give anything for Anmeldung/    registration in the city for the visa    purposes. So, please don’t ask for it. - If you plan to cancel/change the booking     after checking in (earlier checkout or less     guests than booked for), please know that,     there will not be refunds! - Please don’t ask for discounts. - Quiet Hours: from 22:00 - 08:00 - No overnight stays by other persons - No parties  - Not being drunk in the apartment - In case of losing the keys:    1 - Apartment Key: a charge of 50€ euros will have to be paid    2 - Building Key: This is very serious and you might have to end up paying for replacing the whole buildings lock, as it’s shared with every one in the building.

name: Two rooms in shared apartment with friendly dog
summary: This listing is for two private bedrooms in our 3-bedroomed apartment where we also live with our friendly dog (see photos).  Enjoy your stay in our beautiful apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg (see https://www.airbnb.com/locations/berlin/prenzlauer-berg). Located within 5 minutes of Schönhauser Allee S/U metro station, tram stop, shopping centre, bars, and restaurants, and less than 10 minutes by metro to Alexanderplatz, the apartment is the perfect base for you to discover Berlin.
space: Both rooms come with a key for your own security and peace of mind. The apartment building was completed in 2012 with modern fixtures and fittings, underfloor heating for the cold parts of the year, and floor to ceiling windows, providing lots of natural light.
description: This listing is for two private bedrooms in our 3-bedroomed apartment where we also live with our friendly dog (see photos).  Enjoy your stay in our beautiful apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg (see https://www.airbnb.com/locations/berlin/prenzlauer-berg). Located within 5 minutes of Schönhauser Allee S/U metro station, tram stop, shopping centre, bars, and restaurants, and less than 10 minutes by metro to Alexanderplatz, the apartment is the perfect base for you to discover Berlin. Both rooms come with a key for your own security and peace of mind. The apartment building was completed in 2012 with modern fixtures and fittings, underfloor heating for the cold parts of the year, and floor to ceiling windows, providing lots of natural light. In the first bedroom you have a queen size double bed, bedside cabinets, a spacious wardrobe, full length mirror, small fridge, and blackout blinds. The second bedroom comes with a double bed, wardrobe, chest of drawers, and blackout blinds. Y
neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg (https://www.airbnb.com/locations/berlin/prenzlauer-berg) is north-east of the centre of Berlin. The neighbourhood is friendly with a variety of bars, restaurants, cafés, and shops. It is one of the safest neighbourhoods in Berlin, suitable for both groups and solo travellers.
notes: We recently adopted a lovely husky/border collie mix. He’s friendly with everyone, quiet, and well behaved. We take him out several times per day and during the week he accompanies Sergio to work or is with a dog sitter most days, so he should be no bother for you during your stay. A cleaner comes before all guests arrive to prepare the apartment. Having a dog means that some dog hair will be around the apartment sometimes. The price for the listing includes the 5% city tax charged for short-term rentals in Berlin, you therefore will not be charged any extra.
transit: The apartment is in a great location for getting around the city. It is not in the very centre, nor surrounded by loud bars and nightclubs, however, due to the close proximity of both the S and U Bahn stations, the M1 & M12 tram lines, and the ease of getting to both airports, it’s the perfect base for your trip.
access: In the first bedroom you have a queen size double bed, bedside cabinets, a spacious wardrobe, full length mirror, small fridge, and blackout blinds. The second bedroom comes with a double bed, wardrobe, chest of drawers, and blackout blinds. You also have access to the main bathroom, with bathtub and shower (with both normal and rain dance shower heads), an additional washroom with toilet and washbasin, a spacious living, dining, and kitchen area which you are welcome to use. There’s also a south-facing balcony, the perfect place to have your morning coffee or an evening drink to rest your legs after a long day’s walk. In addition, guests can also use the washing machine and dryer should they need to at no added cost.
interaction: Our aim is for you to have an amazing time in Berlin. We’re available to answer any questions before you arrive, have prepared information which we send via email before arrival about the apartment and Berlin, and can be contacted at any point during your stay.
house_rules: Smoking only permitted on the balcony. You understand and accept that you are sharing the apartment with the two of us and our dog.
host_about:
Hi! We're Chris & Sergio, a British/Mexican couple in our thirties. I, Chris, have been living in Berlin since 2008 whereas Sergio moved here in 2016 after having lived in 7 other countries.

We're easy going, happy, and positive, love to interact, share stories, and help others to discover this amazing city that captured our hearts and minds. 

If you decide to stay in our flat, we're happy to answer any questions before or during your stay and to give tips based on what you want to do to make it as positive an experience as possible.

Wir sprechen auch Deutsch!
¡También hablamos español!
On parle français aussi !

We're looking forward to meeting you!

name: Room for 2 in a friendly commune
summary: My room (15qm) is part of a 4-people commune which is located in the centre of Schöneberg. In less than 10 minutes you can go to Kreuzberg, Kurfürstendamm and many beautiful parks. 4 different train lines and several busses let you reach any interesting spot of whole Berlin in less than 30 minutes. Atmospheric restaurants and bars, multicultural food opportunities and four different supermarkets in the immediate surroundings do not allow supply to be desired. Welcome in our cozy commune!

summary: This apartment is a newly refurbished self contained apartment in Schöneberg. Weekly cleaning of the apartment along with fresh bedding and towels are included within the price.

All shopping amenities are within 1 block radius 3 organic food shops, a major food supermarket, the best restaurants. All within an international crowd mixed in with Berliner's. This neighborhood is well connected through it's multiple public transport stations all within 5 min walking distance &  beautiful parks.
space: Each bedroom has a comfortable bed, the larger bedroom has a queen mattress, the smaller bedroom has a comfortable sofa bed- a double. All linens & towels are included. The amenities are not luxurious but available within the apartment for a comfortable stay. Please send me a message with a few lines about yourself & the purpose of your visit before you make a booking. Same day bookings cannot be considered. Thank You.

Это чудом сохранившаяся часть старого Берлина, ставшая одним из самых приятных для жизни и отдыха районов. Здесь можно найти старинные дома, узкие брусчатые улочки, маленькие площади, фонари из позапрошлого века.
notes: Мы просим вас уважать закон принимающей страны.  Дом для некурящих, шумные мероприятия запрещены.  Только ответственное использование интернет-данных, загружать информацию с легальных сайтов, чтобы не было в последствии судебного разбирательства и факта незаконной загрузки.  Звоните нашему контактному лицу за один час до прибытия и отъезда.  В случае утери ключей, гость будет вынужден компенсировать стоимость утраты в размере 50 евро за набор ключей. name: Kiez Box 1 All
summary: In einer der zentralsten und lebendigsten Gegenden von Berlin, vermiete ich 5 gemütliche, schöne Schlafzimmer in meiner frisch erneuerten Wohnung an.
space: Das Appartement ist mit allem ausgestattet, was Sie für einen schönen Aufenthalt in Berlin benötigen. Ich biete meinen Gästen 5 private Schlafzimmer, eine offene Komplett eingerichtete Küche für alle Gäste, einen Essbereich (auch im Schlafzimmer möglich), eine Behinderten gerechte Toilette, eine weitere Toilette und eine Dusche an. Neben Bettwäsche und kostenlosen Handtüchern stehen in jedem Zimmer, Fernseher, Arbeitstisch, ein Kleiderschrank mit Safe und im Gemeinschaftsbereich eine voll ausgestattete Küche aber auch kostenloses W-LAN zur Verfügung.
description: In einer der zentralsten und lebendigsten Gegenden von Berlin, vermiete ich 5 gemütliche, schöne Schlafzimmer in meiner frisch erneuerten Wohnung an. Ich biete meinen Gästen 5 private Schlafzimmer, eine offene Komplett eingerichtete Küche für alle Gäste, einen Essbereich (auch im Schlafzimmer möglich), eine Behinderten gerechte Toilette, eine weitere Toilette und eine Dusche an. Neben Bettwäsche und kostenlosen Handtüchern stehen in jedem Zimmer, Fernseher, Arbeitstisch, ein Kleiderschrank mit Safe und im Gemeinschaftsbereich eine voll ausgestattete Küche aber auch kostenloses W-LAN zur Verfügung. Küche, Essbereich und Hygiene Räume. Nur zum Check- In/ Out Die Berliner Party Maile ist einer der Wahrzeichen unserer Wohnung, wir sind mittendrin statt nur dabei. In der Nachbarschaft wirst du viele Cafés,  Bar´s, Kneipen  und Bäcker finden wo für jeden was dabei ist, darüber hinaus bist du
neighborhood_overview: Die Berliner Party Maile ist einer der Wahrzeichen unserer Wohnung, wir sind mittendrin statt nur dabei. In der Nachbarschaft wirst du viele Cafés,  Bar´s, Kneipen  und Bäcker finden wo für jeden was dabei ist, darüber hinaus bist du in weniger als 10 Minuten Fußweg entfernt, von der East Side Gallery ( Berliner Mauer) und der legendären Oberbaumbrücke.  Über die Simon Dach Straße, kommst du in nur weniger als 5 Minuten Fußweg, auf das RAW Gelände in der Revaler Str.  wo du  Clubs/ Bar´s und Kneipen  wie zum Beispiel, das Cassiopeia  entdecken kannst.   Die Museuminsel, der Gendarmen Markt und der Alexanderplatz sind weniger als 5 km entfernt und mit den Öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln schnell zu erreichen.
notes: Der Komfort,  die Bequem eingerichteten Schlafzimmer,  werden meinen Gästen gefallen.
transit: Die Tram Linie M10 ist in nur weniger als 1 Minute vor der Tür. Die U- Bahn Linie U5 Frankfurter Tor ebenso. In 5 Minuten zu Fuß erreichst du, den S-Bahnhof Warschauer Str.

interaction: Nur zum Check- In/ Out
house_rules: Bitte beachten Sie folgende Regeln um zusätzliche Kosten zu Vermeiden: -Keine Partys, laute Musik oder Sit- Ins geduldet. -Keine unregistrierten Gäste gestattet anderenfalls berechnen wir  Pro Person und Nacht:  50 - 150 €. Tarif abhängig -Keine Drogen oder Betäubungsmittel im oder Vor dem Haus gestattet. -Keine Alkohol Exzesse gestattet bitte nutzen Sie die Bar´s, Clubs oder Veranstaltungsorte in der Nachbarschaft. -Geschirr abwaschen. Spülmaschine. -Zimmer und Gemeinschaftsräume Sauber halten. -21:00 bis 7:00 Uhr Ruhezeit  -Nicht Raucher Wohnung für das Rauchen in der Wohnung berechnen wir eine Gebühr von 200 €  -Betreten des Gartens ist verboten, kein Gemeinschafts Ort nur im Notfall gestattet       (Notausgang). -W- LAN Nutzung,  nur für das Surfen im  Internet geeignet, keine Verbotenen Seiten wie zum Beispiel von Kinder Pornos, Terror Organisationen oder ähnliches runterladen oder besuchen. - Schlüssel Verlust wird mit 100 € berechnet. -Reinigung und Beschädigung der Unterkunft;

name: Cozy room in Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Located next to the former inner-german border and not far from the major Berlin attractions. Nice neighbourhood with little cafes and shops. You will be living with 2 roommates. The room has a bed for 2, a couch and a bar. Kitchen is well equipped.
space: The room is about 25m² has white walls and bright wooden furniture. A large window faces the yard which is very quiet especially at night. The bed is big enough for two people. The room also has a couch and an armchair, a large TV with cable access and a well equipped home bar which has its own small fridge for your personal use only.

You will find loads of nice cafes, restaurants and supermarkets within 10 minutes walking distance. The appartment is located next to the former inner-german border checkpoint "Bornholmer Straße" and is located in a typical 5-storey-building from the 1920s.
transit: Close connection to S+U-Bahn stations "Bornholmer Straße" and "Schönhauser Alee". Several tram lines are running in the neighbourhood. Intercity station Gesundbrunnen is only 20 Minutes away, central station is about 30 minutes. Direct connection to Alexanderplatz (20 Min.) and Potsdamer Platz (25 Min.).
access: In addition to the bedroom you are going to have access to the flats bathroom and kitchen. The bathroom has a shower and a washing machine. In the kitchen you will find everything to cook your own dinner or have a long breakfast: Gas oven, large fridge, dish washer, microwave, toaster, coffee maker and a lot of cuttlery, glasses and china.

name: Cozy room in Charlottenburg. Near Town center.
summary: Angenehme und gemütliche Wohngemeinschaft. Hier erwartet dich ein gemütliches Zimmer zum wohlfühlen. Küche und Bäder stehen zur gemeinsamen Nutzung bereit. In der näheren Umgebung hat Charlottenburg viel zu bieten, das Schloss ist ca. 30 Gehminuten entfernt, alternativ auch mit dem Bus zu erreichen, der schöne Lietzensee, direkt vor der Tür, lädt zu einem Spaziergang oder zu einer Joggingrunde ein. We all speak English. If you have any questions feel free to ask.
space: Es handelt sich um eine gemütliche grosse 4-Raum Gemeinschaftswohnung, in der du ein kleines, gemütliches Zimmer beziehen darfst. Hier kannst du deine absolute Ruhe haben aber auch mit meinen Mitbewohnern in der Küche gemeinsam essen oder einen Tee trinken. Meine Mitbewohner sind berufstätig beziehungsweise studieren noch und haben auch nur begrenzt Zeit.

neighborhood_overview: Die Restaurantauswahl fällt hier sehr groß aus, es gibt zahlreiche Restaurants und für alle Geschmäcker dürfte da etwas dabei sein, vom klassischen Italiener, nur 10 Gehminuten entfernt, oder wenn man Lust auf indisch hat, sind es nur 5 Minuten Fußweg.
notes: Bitte vor der Buchung eine Anfrage stellen um die Ankunftszeit zu klären, da wir nicht immer zu Hause sind und euch reinlassen können.
transit: Direkt vor dem Haus befindet sich eine Bushaltestelle die zum Zoo fährt. Zur Ringbahn (S41, S42, S46) braucht man ca. 6 Minuten zu Fuß und der Busbahnhof liegt ca. 8 Minuten Fußweg entfernt. Der Charlottenburg Bahnhof ist mit dem Bus zu erreichen oder alternativ zu Fuß in ca. 10 Minuten.
access: Die Küche und die Bäder stehen zur gemeinsamen Nutzung zur Verfügung.
interaction: Ich bin nicht anwesend aber bei Fragen stehen meine Mitbewohner gerne zur Verfügung. Per Mail stehe ich zur Verfügung und kann noch anfallende Fragen beantworten.

host_about:
Hello 
we are Ema & Ben, a half italian half german couple living in Berlin with our two little sons.
We love where we live and therefor we like to share our wonderful hometown with you!
Something more about us:
Benjamin is a graphic designer and hobby artist,  I´m graduated in Italian Literature and worked as a italian teacher in Berlin. Now my time is almost entirely dedicated to the education of my children and to host nice people from all over the world.
We have 5 very nice flats recently renovated all located in Kreuzberg and in north Neukölln (border with Kreuzberg)  where you can  find everything you need for your time in Berlin .... we also live in this wonderful area.....

WE HOPE TO HOST YOU SOON IN ONE OF OUR FLATS!

Emanuela and Benjamin

name: Holiday apartment No. 334452 in Berlin Wannsee
summary: Our 1,5 room Berlin holiday apartment is ideally located on the ground floor of one of Bismarckstrasse’s lovely old German landhouses and offers everything for the discerning visitor. The landhouse was build 1906 as an coachman house and offers today after several modernization a modern and well equipped apartment. The beautiful tree-lindes avenue of bismarckstrasse is one of Wannsee´s most exclusive residential roads, lined with grand and imposing villas. In walking distance you reach the leafy woodland and lake where you can either have a little stroll or hike along the beautiful lakes up to Potsdam´s impressing sceneries. You may walk, take a steamer, bicycle, Kajak or canoe to discover and enjoy the beautiful nature and heritage prussian (if you wish organized or with audioguide). After visiting the hotspots in and arround Berlin just relaxe in the neighbourhood of your Berlin holiday apartment. Equipment: -Dish washer -Micro wave -Fridge/freezer -Iron and ironing board -Oven & hob

Eigener Hauseingang. Einfach, aber funktionell. Der Lange See ist gleich gegenüber, wir bieten Wasserzugang für unsere Gäste (mit Strand). Nach Absprache können wir mindestens zwei, manchmal auch drei Fahrräder anbieten. Registriernummer beim Bezirksamt Treptow-Köpenick: 09/Z/AZ/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Wir haben zwei Kinder im Alter von 4 und 2 Jahren, die auch im Garten rumrennen werden. name: Rooftop Apartment in Friedrichshain
summary: The apartment is large, bright, very calm, has two levels (maisonette), three rooms, large balcony, one large & one small bathroom, large kitchen, large bed, very good connection to public transport, in Samariterkiez, Berlin-Friedrichshain.
space: The flat has about 100 square meters. As a roof-top apartment it is bright and very quiet. It is a maisonette with two levels and two entrances. There are two living rooms and one sleeping room with a large bed (2 x 2 m). Moreover the apartment has one large and one small bathroom and a large kitchen (with everything you need to cook).  The flat is located in the nice Samariterkietz in Berlin-Friedrichshain. It is perfect for couples and families who are searching for a cozy and calm place nearby the city to discover Berlin. As needed we can provide an additional air-bed (1,5 x 2 m). There is free internet via wlan.

Especially the nearby Simon-Dach-Kiez is known for its nighlife, bars and c
neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Friedrichshain is a very popular discrict in Berlin. Especially the nearby Simon-Dach-Kiez is known for its nighlife, bars and clubs but also for its fleamarket every Sunday. The Samariterviertel is very relaxed with a lot of nice cafés, small shops and restaurants. You will find here a lot of young families, artists, students and also some punk culture. There are a lot of shopping facilities nearby. Moreover the Volkspark Friedrichshain and the Eastside Gallery are not far away.
notes: Minimum of 5 nights.
transit: The transport connection is very good. There are S- and U-bahn and tram stations (S-Bahnhof Frankfurter Allee (Ringbahn: S41, S42, train to airport Schönefeld), U-Bahnhof Samariterstraße (U5: train to Alexanderplatz), M10) on walking distance (about 10 min.) which will take you everywhere in Berlin.
house_rules: 1. Regel: Bitte seid nett zu unserem Zuhause und fühlt Euch zuhause. :) 2. Regel: Rauchen bitte nur auf dem Balkon. 3. Keine Haustiere. 1.Rule: Be nice to our home and feel at home. 2.Rule: Smoking is only on the balcony allowed. 3.Rule: No pets allowed.
host_about: Me, myself and I.

name: Edgy urban flat in Mitte
summary: You'll love this place because of its style and location! It has One-of-a-kind design with exposed concrete walls and smoked oak flooring, spacious 2 rooms with balcony access from both rooms. You'll be able to use the whole place, enjoy a coffee whenever you feel like or cook exactly how you are used to doing at home. Located at the energetic and lively Rosenthaler Platz and just a few steps away from the U-Bahn and the Tram stop.
space: Tucked away in the quiet rear building on the courtyard, you won't be bothered by any street noise at any time. The place has been renovated a few months ago and its furnished with original mid-century modern design furniture. Spacious living/dining room with a sofa and dining table for 3. The kitchen has plenty of amenities for your use, you will be able to cook everything and fell exactly like at home. There is as well a Nespresso coffee machine with an Aerocino (you can make cappuccino with it) including plenty of different coffees. If you're not a fan of coffee you'll find some tea as well. The bedroom has one double bed (140x200), a hanger for your use and a vintage teak sideboard for your use as well.
