neighborhood_overview: The apartment it's located at Rosenthaler Platz, one of the most lively and energetic spots in Berlin Mitte, where a lot of young people meet for a coffee or a veg lunch. You'll have plenty of amazing restaurants and art galleries around!
transit: The U-Bahn U8 stop of Rosenthaler Platz it's located just a few steps away from the flat. Alexander Platz it's located at 3 minutes with the U-Bahn U8. The central station it's located at 12 minutes with the tram M8. Friedrichstraße it's located at 10 minutes with the tram M1. You can explore as well the whole city center by feet, most the major attractions are reaching with a short/medium walk.
access: Access to the whole place, except the wardrobe located in the entrance area where I will be keeping my private stuff. You'll have plenty of room to place your clothes in the bedroom: one hanging bar with plenty of hangers and one drawer. You will be able to use everything that's in the kitchen, including the spices, coffee, tea ecc. The washing machine can be used at any time and I will provide as well the detergents. Bed lining and bathrobes are provided and included.
interaction: If we are lucky enough, I will be able to check you in and give you a quick brief of the flat and the area surrounding it face-to-face. If I'm not in town, you'll be checked-in by one of my trusted friends. I will be traveling abroad but you can reach me at any time over my phone, email or messages on the platform. If you have any issue, I will do my best to solve it as soon as possible!
house_rules: - It's absolutely forbidden to smoke inside the flat. - Avoid walking around with shoes on. - Please be respectful of my lovely neighbors and don't play loud music after 11pm. - Do not download illegally any movies of music. Copyright laws in Germany are enforced with fines starting from 300€ till 1.000€.
host_about:
Designer and consultant, artist when the creativity really hits.
Photographer in the free time, always looking to find unusual perspectives, something uncommon.
Hard techno listener during most of my day.
Really passionate in what I do, I like to relate with people and share opinions about everything, getting hints and vice versa.
Currently living in Berlin where I’ll stay for a while, I feel like I belong to this amazing city!
Let's not forget I'm also a foodie!

name: Nice Room in Berlin-Friedrichshain
summary: Nice room to rent in Berlin- Friedrichshain (2 rooms apartment to share with a student). The room is furnished, there´s WIFI. One of the best locations in Berlin, where you can find a lot of bars, restaurants, night clubs and flea markets. Very good connections to the U-Bahn Samariter Str., S-Bahn Warschauer Str, Storkower Str.
space: The 2 br apartment is to share with a student. There is a big room available with a double bed, kitchen with balcony and a bathroom.
description: Nice room to rent in Berlin- Friedrichshain (2 rooms apartment to share with a student). The room is furnished, there´s WIFI. One of the best locations in Berlin, where you can find a lot of bars, restaurants, night clubs and flea markets. Very good connections to the U-Bahn Samariter Str., S-Bahn Warschauer Str, Storkower Str. The 2 br apartment is to share with a student. There is a big room available with a double bed, kitchen with balcony and a bathroom. Friedrichshain is one of the trendy districts of Berlin, located on the Spree River. There are a lot of bars, cafes and restaurants. Here you can find the famoust Berlin clubs like Panorama Bar, Berghain, Club der Visionäre, Kater Holzig. There are very good connections to Berlin-Mitte, Kreuzberg, Prenzlauer Berg, Neuköln. NO PARTY apartment;)

name: Tageslichtdurchflutete Wohnung zum Wohlfühlen.
summary: Wunderschöne, helle, loftartige, modernisierte Altbauwohnung mit Sonnenbalkon. Auf 74qm habt ihr genug Platz euch auszubreiten und rundum wohl zu fühlen.  Das gemütliche Schlafzimmer lädt zu ruhigen Nächten ein, in der Küche findet ihr alles was ihr braucht, sei es Kaffe, Gewürze, Müsli, Tee oder Nudeln. Das helle Bad steht euch mit einer großen Dusche zur Verfügung und auf dem Balkon könnt ihr euch von 12.30 - 17uhr sonnen.
space: Unsere Wohnung ähnelt mit der großen offenen Wohnküche und den vielen großen Fenstern einem Loft.
description: Wunderschöne, helle, loftartige, modernisierte Altbauwohnung mit Sonnenbalkon. Auf 74qm habt ihr genug Platz euch auszubreiten und rundum wohl zu fühlen. Eine große,offene Wohnküche mit Tisch, Eckcouch auf der es sich auch ganz hervorragend schlafen lässt und Balkon, sowie zu eurem 9qm großem Schlafzimmer mit 1,40 x 2,00m Doppelbett. Ein Flur und Badezimmer mit Fensterglasdusche sind auch dabei. Wir stehen während eures Aufenthaltes für alle Fragen zur Verfügung. Wir haben hier eine sehr enge Bindung zu unseren Nachbarn im Haus.
neighborhood_overview: Wir haben hier eine sehr enge Bindung zu unseren Nachbarn im Haus.  Direkt über die Straße wartet der idyllische Schäfersee auf einen Spaziergang, einen abendlichen Blick auf den Sonnenuntergang oder ihr genießt das köstliche Essen und den Ausblick auf den See im Café Mavera, mit köstlichen türkischen Spezialitäten.
transit: Direkt um die Ecke (3Gehminuten) bringt euch die U8 in 12min zum Alexanderplatz bishin nach Neukölln zur Hermannstraße.

name: Room in charming neighbourhood
summary: 1 small, but bright room, double bed(140cm), 16 minutes with public transportation to downtown Berlin,  walking distance to FU (Freie Universität Dahlem Campus). Lichterfelde West is a very safe, green but lively neighbourhood,  busses 24hrs, liitle cafés and shops around, and in our house there is a restaurant (open 8am to about 11 pm) downstairs
space: Come stay and enjoy sincere hospitality! Having hosted as a family many visitors, friends and au pairs from around the world, I will now be happy to welcome you in our former "family apartment". We have two rooms available,  adjoining a comfortable living room with a fireplace. Two bathrooms, one with a small bathtub, the other with a shower are shared and I will enjoy offering you a typical "German breakfast" with Muesli, fruit and fresh rolls from our baker right across the street at an extra charge. But you can also use the kitchen and the fridge and serve yourself. There is a nice restaurant downstairs and several others in the neighbourhood. And I will be happy to assist with getting around in our exiting city :)

notes: I speak English fluently since lived in the US for 8 years, some French and a bit of Spanish (but we do have very nice Spanish neighbours - just in case :) )
transit: 3 minutes from our apartement door to the S-Bahn, which runs every 10 minutes and takes 16 minutes to get downtown to Potsdamer Platz. Several busses to connect with the Underground or get home late at night (24 hours).
access: WLAN, telephone flat for Germany
interaction: I will be very happy to have a chat and help with information about the city :)
house_rules: Musik ist immer gerne gehört (es gibt ein gestimmtes Klavier), Rauchen allerdings bitte nur draußen. Hinter dem Haus gibt es einen Tisch und  Stühle und die Kellner/Innen freuen sich sicherlich über einen "Chat".
host_about:
Meine Mitbewohner und ich bewohnen eine große 6-Zimmer-Wohnung. Da meine Söhne beide studieren sind Zimmer frei für nette Gäste. 
Ich habe selbst sehr schöne Erfahrungen mit kostenlosen "Surfing"-Aufenthalten. Airbnb finde ich ist eine gute Weiterentwicklung, denn in einem "richtigen, gebuchten" Bett schläft es sich noch ein wenig besser und der persönliche Austausch ist dennoch da.
Ich unterhalte mich sehr gerne und lerne Neues kennen - und ich tanze gerne und viel, z.Zt. vorallem Tango.

summary: I am renting my light - flooded room in a Berlin Altbau Apartment. The Apartment is located right next to the S and Ubahn Station Tempelhof. The abandoned old Tempelhof airport field is only a 4 minute walk from my doorstep and will offer you a wide variety of sport and leasure time activities like an bbq area and a social garden.

name: Above the roofs of Berlin Neukölln!
summary: A bright welcoming resort, with panoramic sunrise view over the roofs of Berlin´s  most upcoming district. located in its old historic centre...where neukölln began...Enjoy the mixture of upliftig night life nearby and downscaling relaxation inside
space: Bright, cosy, cute flat to rent!!! Especially for families, lovers or good friends!! We have one big and sunny "living & sleeping" room, with an antique sofa, huge wooden table and optionally equipped with it´s own bed ( as you need for one or for two). This rooms opens a wide wooden door to the balcony with sunrise view and fresh herbs! lots of sun and daylight! You can also rent a second big bedroom with another comfortable bed for two- situated right next to the window that opens to a huge old chestnut tree in the silent backyard. In case you are many or you travel with kids, you can additionally rent a very silent third sleeping room with another double bed, hammock to relax and if needed- extra baby/childrens bed. And then there is a cosy kitchen fully equipped for all needs, bathroom with big bathtub - and for families: diper changing table. We also have a lot of nice playing stuff and children's books for young kids! Nearby you have everything you might need- shopping, turkish m
description: A bright welcoming resort, with panoramic sunrise view over the roofs of Berlin´s  most upcoming district. located in its old historic centre...where neukölln began...Enjoy the mixture of upliftig night life nearby and downscaling relaxation inside Bright, cosy, cute flat to rent!!! Especially for families, lovers or good friends!! We have one big and sunny "living & sleeping" room, with an antique sofa, huge wooden table and optionally equipped with it´s own bed ( as you need for one or for two). This rooms opens a wide wooden door to the balcony with sunrise view and fresh herbs! lots of sun and daylight! You can also rent a second big bedroom with another comfortable bed for two- situated right next to the window that opens to a huge old chestnut tree in the silent backyard. In case you are many or you travel with kids, you can additionally rent a very silent third sleeping room with another double bed, hammock to relax and if needed- extra baby/childrens bed. And then there is a co
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is the old historic center of Berlin´s most upcoming district, Neukölln, here you can enjoy multicultural food and living as the world mingles in this district in a special manner. There´s hipster nightlife, turkish and arab food and music oportunities, as well as familiy athmosphere on the nearby food and flee markets on the weekends. The abandoned airport Tempelhof, with its huge inner city leasure area is just two  stops by train away
notes: There is a baby bed as well as a childrens bed, if needed! Just ask!
transit: You´ll be perfectly connected with train and bus service, that brings you quickly to the centre with its main touristic atractions, as well as to Schönefeld or Tegel Airport.
access: You can use the long hallway, the living room, the sleeping room(s) that we prepared for you, the sunny balcony, bathroom with washing machine and kitchen. In the kitchen you can feel free to use all the kitchen items, fridge, etc. as suiting your fancy, furthermore there´s plenty of teas you can enjoy.
interaction: We really live in that flat- it´s our family´s home and not just an airbnb apartment!  It´s not at all a party place - nor can we tolerate any kind of trouble for the neighbors. Please respect this while booking!  The flat has three rooms in total. Just ask if they are all available.
house_rules: We love guests, that respect our place with ALL its furniture and stuff..;) - We really LIVE in that home- so please take care of it..!! we absolutely do not tolerate any kind of partying in our home, we want to keep living there- please do not bother our lovely neighbours and landlords!! - anyway the best partys in Berlin are found somewhere underground ;) ! We both and our baby are non- smokers, so it would be nice if you don´t smoke inside the flat. You can smoke on the balcony. We also prefer guests that know how to behave in the staircase of the house, as there are many families with small children living. So please don´t be noisy there at any time, especially at night time.
host_about:
We work as a photographer and as a author for radio features and we have two little sons, who keeps us busy and also very happy at any time! 
What else do we love? A good conversation, a nice summer evening at the lake, a little dance under the open sky, music, theatre, arts and gardens!

name: Möblierte Zimmer mit Blick auf den Treptower Park
summary: Die Wohnung mit zwei freien Zimmern liegt direkt am Park. Sie ist mit allem ausgestattet was man zum Leben benötigt und hat zusätzlich den Treptower Park mit Karpfenteich direkt vor der Haustüre, sozusagen unser "Garten"
space: Biete mein möbliertes Zimmer zur Zwischenmiete an.  Das Zimmer ist ausgestattet mit einem Bett, einer schöner Anlage, Schreibtisch und einem tollen Blick auf den Park :)
description: Die Wohnung mit zwei freien Zimmern liegt direkt am Park. Sie ist mit allem ausgestattet was man zum Leben benötigt und hat zusätzlich den Treptower Park mit Karpfenteich direkt vor der Haustüre, sozusagen unser "Garten" Biete mein möbliertes Zimmer zur Zwischenmiete an.  Das Zimmer ist ausgestattet mit einem Bett, einer schöner Anlage, Schreibtisch und einem tollen Blick auf den Park :) Die große WG bietet darüber hinaus noch ein sonniges Wohnzimmer, eine Küche und sowie zwei Balkone. Es gibt WLAN. (inklusive) Aber die Mitbewohner, zwei offene, sympathische berufstätige Menschen (Erzieherin und Lehrer) stehen helfend zur Seite. Der Treptower Park liegt direkt am Haus. Der Karpfenteich zum entspannen ist sichtbar. Die Wohnung ist super angebunden. Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg und Neukölln sind schnell zu erreichen. Verkehrsmittel S Treptower Park und S Plänterwald sind in 10 per Fuß erreichbar. Buslienien 166, 256 und 165 direkt vor der Haustür. Viel Spaß in Berlin! :)

name: Jung und gemütlich wohnen in Ostberliner Kiez
summary: Das Zimmer befindet sich in einer 2 Zimmer Wohnung, in der mein Bruder und ich zusammen leben. Da die Wohnung im 3. Stock ist, haben wir viel Tageslicht und wenn sie scheint, auch Sonne!  Die Küche verfügt über eine große Kühl-/Gefrierkombi, Spülmaschine, Herd, Backofen und über die meisten gängigen Küchengeräte. Unser Badezimmer ist sehr großzügig und verfügt über eine Badewanne sowie eine Dusche! Hier gibts Morgensonne! Supermärkte, Spätis und Restaurants sind fußläufig zu erreichen!

name: Helles, großes Zimmer in WG
summary: Die Wohnung befindet sich mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln ca. 10 Minuten vom Alexanderplatz entfernt. Wir leben in einer ruhigen Gegend mit Kindergärten und Schulen im Umkreis. Wir sind 3 sehr gute Freunde und leben gerne und vor allem gemeinsam (Mahlzeiten werden gemeinsam eingenommen, hier ist auch jeder gern willkommen!) in unserer hellen, 83 qm Wohnung nahe des Volksparks Friedrichshain.
space: Gemeinschaftlich genutzt werden das Bad, die Küche mit Balkon und der Flur.

Gemeinschaftlich genutzt werden das Bad, die Küche mit Balkon und der Flur. Die Tramstation ,Platz der Vereinten Nationen’ befindet sich 3 Gehminuten entfernt, die U5 Straußberger Platz 5 Gehminuten.  Es gibt in der Straße kostenlose Parkplätze, allerdings muss man Glück haben und eventuell auch einige Meter zu Fuß zurücklegen.

name: Great Kreuzberg location
space: !NOTE: this is a smoking and feline household! This smallish but comfy room has everything you need - comfortable double bed, wardrobe for clothing storage, desk, wi-fi (or cabled) Internet, maps and guide books for use while you're here. Ideal for single person, but accommodates two as long as you like each other a lot. :-) The apartment itself is classic pre-war Berlin. High ceilings, wood floors, light & bright, double doors etc. The apartment is ideally located in "Kreuzberg 61" near the Hallesches Tor subway stop. Two blocks to the canal and floating cafés, 3 blocks to the Bergmannstr. with its indoor market, cafés and thrift stores, 10 minute walk to the Jewish Museum. Very close to masses of public transportation ... 3 different subway lines + buses. Full disclosure: I smoke, and since I work at home, I smoke in the apartment quite a bit. I also have 2 cats. So if you're allergic, this is not the place for you. The apartment is also located on a fairly busy intersection, so if y

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is relaxed, Turkish, artists, students, full of cafés, fun fast and medium-speed food (from falafel to Nepali to Sushi), 5 minutes to a great indoor market (Marheineke Markthalle) and the Bergmannstrasse, etc.
access: Guest shares apartment with the host - full bath w/ separate shower and tub (and hair dryer), and additional separate WC, living/dining room, and fully-equipped kitchen, with a dishwasher to do the dirty work.  Guest has use of washing machine. Guest has use of a hair dryer.  I provide bed linens & towels. I provide complimentary coffee & tea (with milk & sugar if needed). Flat rate landline, so guest can make unlimited phone calls from the house phone to *landlines* in Europe and *any phone* in N. America or Oceania.
interaction: Your host is an older, long-term expat American. I am not looking for a new best friend, but I'll be happy to answer any questions you might have about my adopted hometown. I work at home, so I am around most of the time.
house_rules: No big, noisy parties. No hard drugs. No illegal downloading. If you come home late, please be quiet in the stairwell so as not to disturb the neighbors. Otherwise, I expect my guests to make themselves at home :-)
host_about: A native New Yorker who transplanted to Berlin 20 years ago.

name: 70sq apartment in heart of Prenzlauer Berg
summary: Located on Oderbergerstrasse, just a ten minute walk from the city centre (Mitte). The area has plenty of cafes, bars and restaurants and both tram and train lines. Mauer park is also just a few minutes walk away.
space: The apartment is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg at Eberswalder/Schönhauser Alee, right next door to the Stadtbad Prenzlauer Berg (pool and sauna available for a fee), and just a few minutes from Berlin Mitte. The apartment is well-lit, quiet and spacious. It features: - High ceilings - Floorboards - Comfy king-sized bed - Plenty of towels and bedsheets - Storage cupboard and room - Washing machine - Double sofa (also sofa bed) and two leather single-seaters - Dining table - Kitchen with dishwasher and everything you need for cooking - Coffee machine - 40 inch television with Apple TV - CD/MP3 Player with speakers - French balcony

Around the corner is the shopping district of Kastanienallee, which hosts a selection of b
neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars. Around the corner is the shopping district of Kastanienallee, which hosts a selection of boutique clothing stores, among others. Mauer Park is a block away, offering outdoor karaoke and a flea market when the weather allows.
transit: Hackescher Markt is a few tram stops away, and Alexander Platz is 3 train stops away. The M10, M1 and 12 Trams are a short walk away, as is the U2 train line.
house_rules: No shoes in house
host_about:
I get a sense of regeneration from travelling. Being on the move calms me, yet staying in one place for a decent amount of time gives me a great chance to actually feel the place, not just see it.

I write books for a living and like nothing more than exposing myself to different personalities and cultures. The people you know, help you to grow!

name: Modern loft / family flat in Berlin
summary: Beautiful new, light and spacious flat in Berlin Kreuzberg. 2nd floor with lift and it has a great, huge garden. Opposite former airfield Tempelhof now Berlin's biggest park. Many nice shops, restaurant and bars in the neighborhood. 5 min. from metro.  This is our private flat which we live in with our kids. We we rent it out when we are away. So don't expect a sterile holiday flat.
space: Very spacious open kitchen/ living room loft. The living-room faces south with a glass front. It has a big balcony looking over the 4000 sqm garden. There is a bedroom with a double bed and a children's room with a kids bed and a double bed mattress. There is an extra office room.
description: Beautiful new, light and spacious flat in Berlin Kreuzberg. 2nd floor with lift and it has a great, huge garden. Opposite former airfield Tempelhof now Berlin's biggest park. Many nice shops, restaurant and bars in the neighborhood. 5 min. from metro.  This is our private flat which we live in with our kids. We we rent it out when we are away. So don't expect a sterile holiday flat. Very spacious open kitchen/ living room loft. The living-room faces south with a glass front. It has a big balcony looking over the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sqm garden. There is a bedroom with a double bed and a children's room with a kids bed and a double bed mattress. host_about:
Hanna and me, we both work in film. Hanna works for the Berlinale and I am a documentary filmmaker and a week-end doctor in a hospital in Berlin Kreuzberg. We have a  two year old daughter, Sasha.
We live in a very special house with lot's of friends and families, who are very helpful and welcoming.
Kreuzberg, where we live, is for me most interesting part in Berlin. Since centuries an immigration neighborhood, it became in the 80s the center for squatters, students and artist. Till today Keuzberg attracts people from around the world to come and stay.

name: Calm & Vibrant w/Breakfast + Balcony in Neukölln!
summary: Colorful, organic and creative atmosphere with tons of light coming from all angles. Amidst trees, birds singing in the morning/afternoon and the sun shining (when there is sun at least! hehe). Located in the district of Neukölln (our favorite neighborhood!): charming, raw and the less touristic part of Berlin where you'll see various walks of life.
space: The room comes with a balcony next to trees and a nice view of our calm street :)
description: Colorful, organic and creative atmosphere with tons of light coming from all angles. Amidst trees, birds singing in the morning/afternoon and the sun shining (when there is sun at least! hehe). Located in the district of Neukölln (our favorite neighborhood!): charming, raw and the less touristic part of Berlin where you'll see various walks of life. The room comes with a balcony next to trees and a nice view of our calm street :) Well David Bowie lived in Neukölln and made a song about it so there's that ;) But also the parks!! Neukölln hands down has the best parks of Berlin! Körnerpark is our favorite - definitely a must go to for a chill ~ only 10min walking from the Haus. Loads of great Turkish food, 5min walking to the U and S-Bahns, Lidl grocery store literally 10 seconds away (directly next door), Templehofer Feld 20min walk, Treptower Park 25min on Ubahn, Tegel Airport 45min/Schönefeld Airport 35min by public transport, Eastside Gallery 30min, Checkpoint Charlie 20min, within 1
neighborhood_overview: Well David Bowie lived in Neukölln and made a song about it so there's that ;) But also the parks!! Neukölln hands down has the best parks of Berlin! Körnerpark is our favorite - definitely a must go to for a chill ~ only 10min walking from the Haus. Loads of great Turkish food, 5min walking to the U and S-Bahns, Lidl grocery store literally 10 seconds away (directly next door), Templehofer Feld 20min walk, Treptower Park 25min on Ubahn, Tegel Airport 45min/Schönefeld Airport 35min by public transport, Eastside Gallery 30min, Checkpoint Charlie 20min, within 15-30min to multiple different night clubs including Berghain, about blank and griessmuehle, basically we're pretty close to a lot of things you might have on your list of things to see/do :)
transit: 5min walking to the bus, U-Bahn (U8) and S-Bahn -- both great to go to Mitte, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain (home of many famous Berlin clubs) -- also great for when you're coming home late and don't want to take a bunch of different forms of transport! 5min walking to the bus, U-Bahn (U8) and S-Bahn -- both great to go to Mitte, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain (home of many famous Berlin clubs) -- also great for when you're coming home late and don't want to take a bunch of different forms of transport!
house_rules: No shoes in the house :)  Smoke on the balcony
host_about:
Hi everyone, my name is Adrian and I'm 28 years old, musician and interior designer, who loves to travel around the globe discover spaces, cultures, food, styles of living, meet people simple and pleasant.

I am a very curious person, always interested in cultures, languages and the universe.

I consider myself a simple, humble and friendly person, who has music and traveling as fundamental parts of his life.

I work as a freelancer with marketing and social media, so I work abroad, which permits me to travel while I'm working.

I discovered Yoga and Meditation a few years ago, and I do not have words that decipher the positive change they have made in my life.

PHILOSOPHY

Be kind, share cultures, share knowledge, share experiences, provide all my values for those that I meet around!

“We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.”

Interests
Make music, Djing, Yoga and meditation, I love to cook, meet people, see places, make friends, go out and enjoy, live life to the fullest.

name: Convenient, bright flat in Kreuzkölln
summary: Welcome to our conveniently located, cosy flat in Berlin's trendiest neighbourhood, Kreuzkölln. The two-bedroom apartment is on the first floor, a 4-minute walk to the nearest train station, and you can see the Landwehrkanal from the balcony. Tuesdays, Fridays, and Saturdays host the Neukölln market around the corner, where you'll also find several coffee shops and restaurants.
space: The apartment itself has a fully-furnished kitchen with coffee makers, an oven, stove, and dish washer. There is a washing machine and detergent in the bathroom and a shower/bathtub. Some closet and shelf space is available in the bedroom. Linens, bath and hand towels are provided.
description: Welcome to our conveniently located, cosy flat in Berlin's trendiest neighbourhood, Kreuzkölln. name: Comfy and centrally located flat in Wedding
summary: Nice and comfy apartment with everything you need, centrally located 15 minutes from city center, in a small and quiet side street, yet 1 minute to metro (U-Bahn), city train (S-Bahn) and bus stop. Supermarkets, cafés with different cuisines and bars are in close vicinity.
space: The apartment is located on the third floor, in the house, there is an elevator (but a few steps have to be walked). There is one big room with a sofa-bed, dinner table, desk and shelves. You have a big balcony, kitchen with all necessary devices, and a bathroom with tub.
description: Nice and comfy apartment with everything you need, centrally located 15 minutes from city center, in a small and quiet side street, yet 1 minute to metro (U-Bahn), city train (S-Bahn) and bus stop. Supermarkets, cafés with different cuisines and bars are in close vicinity. The apartment is located on the third floor, in the house, there is an elevator (but a few steps have to be walked). There is one big room with a sofa-bed, dinner table, desk and shelves. You have a big balcony, kitchen with all necessary devices, and a bathroom with tub. You have the apartment to yourself, so you can use all the rooms freely. There is no private parking, but always enough free parking spaces on the street. We will rent our apartment while we are on vacation. Of course, we will be available through telephone and e-mail and will help to answer any question you might have. The flat is located in the multicultural district Wedding, north of the city center. We live right at the S-Bahn ring, which makes
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in the multicultural district Wedding, north of the city center. We live right at the S-Bahn ring, which makes it super easy to go anywhere in a short time. If you want to explore Wedding, there is a lovely canal, some parks, an old bunker, many shops and nice restaurants and food places close by.
transit: From the flat, you can reach Tegel Airport in 20 minutes with public transport, the main train station in 10 minutes and the Central Bus Station (ZOB) in less then 20 minutes.
access: You have the apartment to yourself, so you can use all the rooms freely. There is no private parking, but always enough free parking spaces on the street.
interaction: We will rent our apartment while we are on vacation. Of course, we will be available through telephone and e-mail and will help to answer any question you might have.
host_about: I’m a city dweller but nature and outdoors lover who likes to explore new places. I‘m into hiking, biking and running. The occasional city jungle and cultural input make for a good diversion.

name: Light, centrally located, good public transport
summary: Private room in recently renovated NO-SMOKING flat (English-speaking household) with wide view, double bed, sofa, small writing desk and smart TV; private guest toilet with shower. On demand, use of washer/dryer (in a separate bathroom). Use for breakfast of new, separate kitchen with small dining area. NOTE: Use of kitchen for lunch and dinner, within reason, BUT SHOULD BE AGREED IN ADVANCE. The access to building and courtyard is video surveilled. Public transport is very good.
space: View over Kreuzberg/Friedrichshain on one side, and to Potsdamer Platz on the other. This is a NO-SMOKING accommodation.
description: Private room in recently renovated NO-SMOKING flat (English-speaking household) with wide view, double bed, sofa, small writing desk and smart TV; private guest toilet with shower. On demand, use of washer/dryer (in a separate bathroom). Use for breakfast of new, separate kitchen with small dining area. View over Kreuzberg/Friedrichshain on one side, and to Potsdamer Platz on the other. This is a NO-SMOKING accommodation. As described above: English-speaking household. Private room and small, private bathroom with shower. Use for breakfast of new, separate kitchen with small dining area. NOTE: Use of the kitchen for lunch and dinner is possible a lot of the time, but should be agreed in advance to avoid "double booking". On demand, use of washing/dryer machine in "master" bathroom. Check-in and check-out time
neighborhood_overview: Just a few steps from Jewish Museum (same busstop on bus 248), walking distance to Checkpoint Charlie, U-Bahn Kochstraße, Mehringplatz, Friedrichstraße, Gendarmenmarkt, Unter den Linden, Museum Island, U-Bahn Spittelmarkt, Alexanderplatz, Landwehrkanal, Anhalter Bahnhof,  Tempodrom, and Potsdamer Platz. Bus M29 also close by. There is a small café in the ground floor.
notes: A list of further instructions and guidelines, including wifi key, nearest ATM machine, and supermarkets within walking distance is available in the room. Access to the building and courtyard is camera surveilled.
transit: Nearest U-Bahn Stations are Kochstraße, Spittelmarkt, Hallesches Tor. Bus 248 almost outside the door goes to Alexanderplatz and beyond in one direction and to Südkreuz via Bergmannkiez and Tempelhofer Feld in the other. Bus M29 a five-minute walk away - goes from Neukölln to Kurfürstendamm and beyond. Mercedes Arena and Arena Berlin also within easy reach by public transport.
access: As described above: English-speaking household. Private room and small, private bathroom with shower. Use for breakfast of new, separate kitchen with small dining area. NOTE: Use of the kitchen for lunch and dinner is possible a lot of the time, but should be agreed in advance to avoid "double booking". On demand, use of washing/dryer machine in "master" bathroom. Check-in and check-out times are in most cases flexible and attempt to accommodate the needs of both arriving and departing guests BUT BOTH MUST BE PRE-AGREED IN EACH INDIVIDUAL CASE AT THE TIME OF BOOKING.
interaction: Depending on circumstance, I will be there to let guests in or hire a co-host if I am unavailable. In some cases I will be in the flat, in others I will be away. I am available in person or by text messages to answer basic questions about nearest public transport etc., but cannot act as a tour guide (however, there is plenty of literature about Berlin available in the room), and since I am obviously not from Germany and have only lived here for a short time, I also cannot act as a consultant on how to find a flat, student visas etc.
house_rules: I expect normal adult behaviour, that guests treat my home as they would their own, and the German rules about "quiet time" apply. Climate-change deniers need not inquire.
host_about: Retired. Freelance proofreader, translator, stress counsellor. Trying to learn photography.

name: Ruhiges, energievolles Zimmer in Mitte Berlins
summary: Ein gemütliches, voll ausgestattetes Zimmer in einer ruhigen Strasse, ganz nah zum gelebten Berlin!   Die Wohnung hat eine besondere Atmosphäre, von positiver Energie und Kunst geprägt. Mit nur wenigen Minuten zu Fuss sind die meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten erreichbar, der Mauer Park mit seinem Flohmarkt, das Wall Museum, die Hackeschen Höfen, Friedrich Strasse oder die Museumsinsel. W-Lan inklusive, kein Movie Download erlaubt, da in Deutschland illegal. City Tax Berlin wird beim check-in erhoben.

name: Wohnung mit Terrasse & Garten, Hansaviertel Berlin
summary: Wir verbringen unsere Elternzeit in Frankreich und vermieten deshalb unsere 3 ½-Zimmer große Wohnung mit großer Terrasse und Garten im Hansaviertel. Das Gebäude wurde von Paul Schneider-Esleben entworfen und wie fast alle Gebäude im Hansaviertel für die IBA 1957 gebaut. Die Wohnung geht über zwei Stockwerke. Unten befindet sich das Wohn- und Esszimmer und die Küche, im 1. Stock das Schlafzimmer, Badezimmer, ein Gäste- oder Kinderzimmer und eine kleine Bibliothek mit Arbeitsplatz.
space: Wir verbringen unsere Elternzeit für drei Monate in Frankreich und vermieten deshalb unsere 3 ½-Zimmer große Wohnung mit großer Terrasse und Garten im Hansaviertel. Das Gebäude wurde von Paul Schneider-Esleben entworfen und wie fast alle Gebäude im Hansaviertel für die IBA 1957 gebaut. Die Wohnung geht über zwei Stockwerke. Unten befindet sich das Wohn- und Esszimmer und die Küche, im 1. Stock das Schlafzimmer, Badezimmer, ein Gäste- oder Kinderzimmer und eine kleine Bibliothek mit Arbeitsplatz (halbes Zimmer). Die Wohnung wurde von den Vermietern, einer Architektin und einem Künstler, individuelle gestaltet. Sie hat eine besondere Aura, wir fühlen uns sehr wohl. Man ist mitten im Grünen und trotzdem mitten in der Stadt. Die Nachbarn sind sehr nett.

Unten befindet sich das Wohn- und Esszimmer und die Küche, im 1. Stock das Schlafzimmer, Badezimmer, ein Gäste- oder Kinderzimmer und eine kleine Bibliothek mit Arbeitsplatz. Wir verbringen unsere Elternzeit für drei Monate in Frankreich und vermieten deshalb unsere 3 ½-Zimmer große Wohnung mit großer Terrasse und Garten im Hansaviertel. Das Gebäude wurde von Paul Schneider-Esleben entworfen und wie fast alle Gebäude im Hansaviertel für die IBA 1957 gebaut. Die Wohnung geht über zwei Stockwerke. Unten befindet sich das Wohn- und Esszimmer und die Küche, im 1. Stock das Schlafzimmer, Badezimmer, ein Gäste- oder Kinderzimmer und eine kleine Bibliothek mit Arbeitsplatz (halbes Zimmer)
neighborhood_overview: "Die Zielvorstellung für das Südliche Hansaviertel war also: aufgelockerte Baustrukturen statt der geschlossenen Blockrandbebauung der Vorkriegszeit; viel Grün zwischen den Bauwerken – der Tiergarten sollte gewissermaßen von seinen Rändern aus durch das Viertel hindurchfließen." (Wikipedia)
transit: Wenige Minuten ist die S-Bahn-Station Tiergarten (S 3, S 5, S 7) entfernt. Noch näher ist die U9, Station Hansaplatz. Außerdem fährt ein Bus (106) vom Hansaplatz. Die andere Seite der guten Anbindung ist, dass man die Bahnen auch in der Wohnung hört. Uns stört das nicht, sehr geräuschempfindlichen Menschen würden wir aber eher von der Wohnung abraten. Jeden Freitag findet auf dem Hansaplatz ein kleiner aber feiner Bio-Markt statt.
interaction: Telefonisch und per E-Mail
host_about: I am a an attorney and a musician. I am interested in art, literature, food and people.

name: Cosy 56m2 maisonette next to Spree
summary: Centrally located 2-room maisonette (4th and 5th floor) in Alt-Moabit; the flat is being offered on AirBnB for the first time (therefore no comments or evaluations so far). Ideal for couples.
space: Besides offering a quiet and beautiful environment (river Spree can be reached within a 2min walk) the apartment’s central location and well connected infrastructure in Alt-Moabit enables visitors to easily reach Berlin’s major sights. Overview: spacious and bright maisonette (4th and 5th floor) with approx. 56m2; 1 bedroom including desk, 1 kitchen, 1 living room, 1 restroom and 1 bathroom Bedroom (5th floor): 1 very comfortable king size bed; bedsheets, -clothes and –spreads will be provided; thanks to the window in the roof slope above the bed, the night sky can be watched while falling asleep. Feel free to use the desk which includes a Wi-Fi printer as your workplace.  Living room (4th floor): nice bright and open room with 1 big couch for three people (can also be used smoothly as thrid sleeping accomodation), 1 extensive wardrope of which you will get one half to stow your clothes and belongings, 1 big SmartTV (DVB-T) with a HDMI cable (TV to Mac). Living room (4th floor): nice bright and open room with 1 big couch for three people (can also be used smoothly as thrid sleep
neighborhood_overview: Central neighborhood inside of Berlin’s circular ring, young spirit, multi-cultural. Within a 5min walking distance a variety of grocery and food stores (Edeka, Kaisers, Penny, bakeries)  as well as restaurants (Turkish, Arabic, Vietnamese, Chinese, Indian, Italian, Spanish, Greek and Polish cuisine) can be found. You will also encounter a variety of nice bars just around the corner. My tip for you: have a beer at „Mauerwerk“ in Zwinglistraße.  Only 2min away by foot is the Spree – the river that flows through Berlin. It’s a great place to sit, have a walk or run. If you stroll along the river directing into the city centre you will pass by Bellevue (the residence of the German president) and the German parliament building.  If you don’t want to walk you can also take a boat ride and discover Berlin from the water. Closest stop is Hansabrücke (12min by foot).  Berlin’s largest park – Tiergarten – is reachable within a 15min walk. From there you can make your way straight to the Brandeb
notes: Internet will be provided (Wi-Fi). If you need any tips for your stay, or are unsure what to do in Berlin we can figure out the best places for you to head to - if its partying, pub'ing, relaxing, shopping or sightseeing - or maybe thrill seeking?
transit: Alt-Moabit is a quiet but also central area to stay in Berlin. The flat is well connected, all major sights can be reached easily by public transport: You can go by: Bus: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) (in front of the building)  Airport Shuttle Tegel: TXL (5min by foot)   Metro (Website hidden by Airbnb) U9 Turmstraße (5min by foot) Railway (Website hidden by Airbnb) S-Tiergarten (10min by foot) Bicycle rent (Website hidden by Airbnb) Velophil (around the corner, approx. 10€/bike/day) Your car (Website hidden by Airbnb) There is free parking right in front of the building You can reach within (minutes): Ku’Damm (Kurfürstendamm): 15 Main train station: 15 Airport Tegel: 15 (cab approx. 15€) Tiergarten park: 15 Bellevue (President’s Palace): 20 Zoologischer Garten: 20 Brandenburg Gate/Reichstag: 20 Alexanderplatz: 25 Check Point Charly: 25 Bernauer Straße: 30 International Congress Centre (ICC): 30 Berghain: 35 East Side Gallery/Warschauer Straße: 40
access: You will have the entire apartment for yourself/yourselves (including up to two sets of keys if needed)
interaction: As I most likely will not be in Belrin myself when I rent out the flat, there will be two options that should make you feel comfortable and supported. (1) I will be able to answer your questions on phone or via email. (2) You will be given a closy-by contact person (neighbour) who takes care if physical presence is needed. Furthermore, I will leave you an information kit that easily helps you to find your way around Berlin.
host_about: Originally from Augsburg. After working on board of a cruise-liner for two years, enjoying a  seaside view on life, I am now a PR-consultant in the tourism industry. I find travelling the most enriching and positive element. Getting to know different cultures and cities is great, but it's even better to experience them with the eyes of locals.

name: Bright and cozy appartment in Kreuzberg
summary: The appartment is located in the very heart of beautiful Kreuzberg with many nice cafés, cool bars and lovely restaurants in walking distance. The next subway station is also only a 7 minute walk away. The flat is in the rear house so it is very quiet and you will be able to rest easy after a nice and busy day in Berlin.
space: The appartment itself is around 26 m2 big has one comfortable bed and a nice view in the backyard. The kitchen is equipped with what you need to cook yourself a nice dinner or breakfast and can of course be fully used. It also contains a washing maschine, which guests are more than welcome to use as well.  There is also a small bathroom and shower.  Thanks to the two big windows the appartment is light throughout the day. When getting up at the right time, you can even enjoy the sun while laying in bed

The art centre Kunstquatier Bethanien with it’s lovely café and exhibitions is only a three minute walk away. In summer you can also enjoy a movie in the open air cinema in the park around Bethanien. Heading in the other direction you can reach Markthalle 9 in four minutes by foot. In general there are a lot of nice cafés, bars and restaurants in the area along with the Görlitzer Park, which is also very close.

name: BRIGHT TOP FLOOR APARTMENT WITH TERRACE & VIEW
summary: Enjoy the silence in a cozy and bright top floor apartment with a sunny terrace and  a great view in Friedrichshain.  Perfect for one or two guests who don't mind the stairs up to the 5th floor.  The flat is in a quiet and relaxed neighborhood but very close  to the lively areas of Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg.  The apartment is very well located for all directions with public transport.
space: I'm renting out my very bright and calm 52 m² topf floor apartment on the 5th floor (no elevator!) with living/dining room, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and a sunny terrace in the center of Berlin on few occasions when travelling.  I assume you'll make use of your common sense and respect my belongings. - Living & dinining room with a big sofa and dining table - Kitchen is fully equipped including a dish washer, oven and freezer - Bathroom with shower and washing machine - Bedroom with a 140x200 bed. I can free parts of the wardrobe, if required. - NON Smoker flat - you can smoke on the terracce - Terrace with a small table, 2 chairs, hammock for 2 people, sunrise and sunset included if weather allows - 5th floor WITHOUT elevator but 105 healthy stairs instead :), an amazing view and calm. - WLAN - Bed linen and towels are being provided

name: Quiet & cosy room in Friedrichshain next to a park
summary: Hey! We will welcome you in our 4 room apartment in trendy Friedrichshain (130 sqm). U-S-Tram stops Warschauer Str. is 2-4 minutes away. We’re in the hot spot - grocery shopping, restaurants, cafés, markets, bars all around.  1 quiet and cosy room = 18sqm, facing a seldom used street the room is very quiet.  We speak German, French and English
space: Hey! My son, our cats and I are welcoming you in our huge 4 room "Altbau" apartment in the 1st floor of a 19s century house with high seelings in Friedrichshain (130 sqm). We have a big kitchen 30sqm with a table and a sofa which you may use.  The guestroom is 18sqm, facing a seldom used street the room is very quiet. The room is rented out furnished (a comfortable bed, a big table, 2 chairs, wardrobe, commode). You will find everything you need for a comfortable stay: sheets and towels, washer, iron, hair dryer etc. There is a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances and a dishwasher.

There´s a park in front of the house and another park close
neighborhood_overview: U-S-Tram stops Warschauer Str. is 2-4 minutes away. Friedrichshain is a nice neighbourhood with a bohemian young feel. This part of Friedrichshain is very peaceful, a quiet block sheltered from the bustle, but just two blocks away the fun begins. There are plenty of grocery shops (Aldi, Rewe, Getränke Hoffmann, Veganz), shops and boutiques of young designers around. There are lot's of cafés and restaurants nearby on the lively Simon Dach Strasse, and quite a few good clubs in 5 mins walk including the world famous club: Berghain. On saturdays there is a lovely market nearby and on sundays a flew market
notes: No smoking, no drugs, no cheap-o music. If you plan to be loud, this is not the place to be.
transit: The Revaler Str. tram stop (M10) is 5 mins walk, and Warschauer Str S and Ubahn stations are 5 mins walk - which takes you into Alexanderplatz in 7 minutes. It is also very close to Ostbanhof which is great for fast airport access.
access: There´s a park in front of the house and another park close by.
interaction: If you wish we are there to give you tips for sight seeing and restaurants.
house_rules: You need to leave an official document at airbnb.

I love to travel and I love to welcome people in my city.
I work in the film industry and I am interested to meet new people.
J´adore voyager et recevoir des gens chez moi.
Je travaille dans le monde du film et des nouvelles rencontres m´intéressent.

summary: Beautiful and well-sized appartment in the centre of west Berlin in Charlottenburg. Your room offers a cozy bed, clothing racks for your stuff and a desk. 2 modern bathrooms with bathtub and shower, a big kitchen with micro wave, oven and dish washer. Train station Charlottenburg and "Charlottenburg Palace" are reachable in 10 minutes by feet. S-Zoologischer Bahnhof just 3 metro minutes away. Wilmersdorfer Straße just 2 minutes by feet and is waiting for you with a lot of shops.
space: Appartement is freshly renovated and has a luxury furnishing, that will give your stay the special extra.

neighborhood_overview: Neighbours are friendly and welcoming, everyone around here seems to be open-minded and will greet you with a smile.
notes: The neighbourhood is rather bürgerlich and quite, with a plethora of amazing places to eat, no matter whether you desire a shawarma, an authentic Pho, or some fancy Italian. It is only a short walk to Kurfürstendamm and Savignyplatz, from where you can easily make your way to Berlin's city centre.
transit: Bus, metro, and S-Bahn is no more than a few minutes away, but of course you can always grab on of the many cheap rental bikes or scooters standing around.

name: Family friendly host
summary: My flat is conveniently located in the heart of Friedrichshain close to major transport hubs (Warschauer Strasse S/U Bahn, Bus and Tram). There is a major supermarket across the road.  The area is known for its restaurants and bars. The flat is on a high floor in a typical berlin old style building complete with exposed brickwork, high ceilings, wooden floors and all the comforts of home.
space: My daugther 5 and me are looking for a guest eventually with other kids in the same age. My daugther has her own room in the flat and would be happy to share it with someone. We all are speaking English and German.  We are not looking for party people as we have a regular life during the day. My daughter is at my place 3 times a week. The other days she is with her mum but can change her schedule.

summary: Welcome to my chic home! The apartment has a modern style with a warm atmosphere as natural light fills the living space. You will be able to start and end your day on my inviting balcony! Enjoy the tranquility of the neighborhood and go for a stroll around the lake in the nearby Park am Weißen See. The closest bus stop is just 1 minute away, this will connect you with the rest of the city! I hope you have a great stay and enjoy Berlin as much as I do!
space: As my guest you will be able to enjoy of the following: 1. Flexible personal check-in with a warm welcome from my friends at Airgreets. 2. Hotel quality bed linen, towels, and basic toiletries (shampoo, soap and lotion). 3. Key amenities available: Wi-Fi, TV, elevator, washing machine, balcony, public parking, coffee machine, hair dryer, electric kettle, iron. At your disposal you will also have:  1. Beds and their sizes: 1 Double bed (140x200cm) / 1 Sofa (80x200cm)  2. Bathrooms: 1 full bathroom with a shower. Some other details about the apartment: Bedroom: A cozy bedroom with 1 double bed (140x200cm) and a TV. Living space/dining area: Light-filled, spacious living room with 1 Sofa (80x200cm). Kitchen: Feel free to use my kitchen equipment to cook and prepare delicious meals. Bathroom: A bathroom with a shower in which you can get ready for your day. Balcony: Enjoy your morning coffee on the balcony.

access: During your stay, you'll have access to the whole apartment. In addition, you will have your own personal key for the apartment and the main entrance to make sure that your stay goes well. Please note that BBQ or grilling is not allowed. The main entrance and exit of the apartment are common among all the residents.
interaction: Since I’ll be traveling myself during your stay, my friends at Airgreets will take care of your booking and help you with any questions you might have. Feel free to reach out to them at any time via the messenger, they are always happy to help :)
house_rules: - Am wichtigsten ist, dass Du gegenüber der Wohnung und den Nachbarn eine rücksichtsvolle und respektvolle Haltung einnimmst. Bitte gehe sorgfältig mit meinen Möbeln und persönlichen Gegenständen um und respektiere die Nachbarn, indem du den Lärmpegel auf ein Minimum hältst. Ich erwarte, dass sich die Wohnung im gleichen Zustand befindet wie bei der Übergabe an dich. Und bitte beachte die Nichtraucherrichtlinie im gesamten Gebäude. Es sind keinerlei externen Gäste, Haustiere oder Partys erlaubt!		 - Aus organisatorischen Gründen können wir nur einen Schlüsselset zur Verfügung stellen.		 - Das deutsche Gesetz über illegale Downloads, Streaming und File-Sharing-Aktivitäten ist äußerst strikt und wird sehr effektiv umgesetzt. Es ist daher untersagt, während deines Aufenthalts über meine Internetverbindung an solchen Aktivitäten teilzunehmen. Bei Nichteinhaltung dieser Regel müssen alle anfallenden Gerichtskosten übernommen werden. Benutze das Wifi daher bitte sorgfältig nur auf legalen Se

name: Private room with en-suite in penthouse apartment
summary: You will sleep in a large queen size bed and built in wardrobes. You will have your own private big en suite bathroom, incl. bath tub and 2 washbasins. You room is on the bottom level of a spacious duplex apartment located at the top floor of the building.
space: The living room is flooded with light thanks to large windows on two walls, decorated lovingly with designer furniture, walls garnished with artwork, plants galore, and candles in every corner. You can enjoy a unique view above the roofs of Berlin since our building is slightly higher than all others around. We have one balcony furnished with an outdoor couch, hanging lights, tibetan prayer flags, and plants and herbs with a courtyard view. The other balcony has a dining table,  designer furniture and a view over the rooftops of Berlin. Accessible via stair, you reach a private rooftop area with direct view onto iconic Alexanderplatz radio tower.

Our roommate Tatjana
neighborhood_overview: Located 1 min away from Berlin's oldest public park opened in 1848 (one of the city's largest parks as well). The neighborhood features plenty of relaxed cafés and restaurants (Vegan, Breakfast/Brunch, German, Italian, Austrian, Japanese, Thai, Portuguese, and more within 5 mins walking).  Neighborhood is quiet at night. Bus station 1 min, tram station 7 min away.
transit: We are located centrally and well connected to all the hip and important places in Berlin.  By Foot: Other areas of Prenzlauer Berg, Friedrichshain: 10 minutes walking. Heart of Mitte, Kreuzberg, Alexanderplatz: 15-20 minutes walking. By Bus:  1 min from the door there is a bus which takes you to Alexanderplatz and Mitte within 5 minutes! 7 minutes walking you find a Tram station that brings you to Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg within  5-10 minutes.
interaction: We are on holidays during that time but you can reach us via phone. Our roommate Tatjana will be here to help you in case you need assistance.
host_about: Berlin based and travel enthusiast

name: Cozy Apartment in Central Berlin
summary: The house is in the 3rd floor of an Altbau Berliner Apartment,It has a self contained Bathroom,Kitchen, sleeping area with a cozy bed and a writing desk.  There is a washing machine, refrigerator, fast WLAN internet connection Smoking is not allowed.
space: The apartment is almost in the centre of Berlin, 2 train stops to Potsdamer Platz and Direct train to Friedrichtraße. Branderburger Tor and all the shopping complexes are also closeby. The alternative Districts of Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Friedrichschain are but a few train stops away. The house is also close to the beautiful and popular Gleisdreieck Park.

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is quite unique, a quiet street but yet very close to the many attraction in central Berlin, Check point charlie, Brandenburger Tor,Potsdamer Platz are all under 10 minutes away. the street is well connected with the underground metro stations and the Sbahn train services that connects you to all the areas of the city and the major airports.
notes: PLEASE,DO NOT LOSE THE KEYS.  A mandatory non-negotiable/non-refundable charge of 150 euros per key shall be charged to replace the keys.
transit: Getting around around is quite easy, be it on foot, bike, bus or even the metro train services.
access: Basically all the parts of the house apart from the closet where I store some of my personal belonging. But the beds are not in the same room so couples can still enjoy the privacy that they need.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment but feel free to smoke on the balcony. A late check-in after 7pm, shall be charged an additional 30 euros. cash payment. This has been a problem with some guests checking in late and causing disturbance to the neighbours and inconveniencing the host, who also has a life. :)

name: Luxury Big APARTMENT in the HEART of BERLIN-MITTE
summary: This high class apartment is located in the most central point of Berlin Mitte near Friedrichstraße.  The apartment is very big (102 sqm) and has one bedroom, a spacious living room and a nice dining room with a excellent view over the Torstraße and the Berlin TV tower. A fully equipped kitchen and a nice bathroom are also included. The apartment is in the 2nd floor of a nice authentic old building (Altbau), beautiful from outside and inside.

A fully equipped kitchen and a nice bathroom are also included. The apartment is in the 2nd floor of a nice authentic old building (Altbau), beautiful from outside and inside. There is a big double bed in the bed room. The couch in the living room can't be used for sleeping.  This apartment is available for long term lettings. If you're searching for a place for 3 month and more, please let me know. I'm sure we'll find a nice place for you! The prices depends to the length of your stay. neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect for a visit and stay in Berlin as it is centrally located in Mitte, therefore close to all attractions but also to the bohemian city life of Berlin, so you can really blend in. Shops, cafes, restaurants and trendy bars are around and public transport is very accessible. Late night kiosk and 24 hours pharmacy is less then 10 minutes away.
notes: On a request for a rental period less then 6 month we add 7% VAT to the monthly rent. On a long term rental we also sign a lease with the guests.
transit: Walking Distances - Trains: U-Bahn Oranienburger Tor - 6 min walk U-Bahn + S-Bahn Friedrichstrasse - 10 min walk U-Bahn Rosenthalerplatz - 6 min walk Taxi stand 24 hours: 6 min walk
house_rules: Dear guests, Please pay attention to the house rules. First of all smoking is not allowed. Please take your shoes off when you come in. Be also very respectful with your neighbors. This is not a hostel. This is a inhabited house full of people, which always lives here. They don't want to be disturbed by noise or loud music, especially at night. After 10 pm you have to behave yourself quiet. Please treat the people around you in the same way, you would expect it from your neighbors at home. Last but not least please treat the apartment and the furniture also with respect and leave the apartment in clean conditions.
host_about: Hello Guys, welcome in Berlin. I love travelling around the world. In combination to meet new peoples from all over makes Airbnb very interesting for me. I hope to see you soon in my apartment and would like also to visit yours.

name: Centre apartment with 2floors, balcony and terrace
summary: Luxury apartment in the very centre of Berlin. The apartment consists of 2 floors. On the first floor there is a spacious kitchen with a dining table, a bedroom with 2 beds, a toilet with a shower and a balcony. On the second floor there is a second bedroom with 2 beds, a living room with a sofa, a spacious bathroom with a bathtub and a nice terrace. The apartment is very sunny and spacious.
space: We rent our beautiful apartment, while we go travelling. It is situated in the very centre of Mitte, a best turistic area in Berlin, opposite to metro station Bernauer Strasse. The 2 floors apartment is situated on the 3-rd and 4-th floor of a building, looking in the nice quiet yard. There is no elevator. Right in the yard there is a beautiful sand playground with outdoor toys. And for children we have also lots of toys of our daughter.

neighborhood_overview: It is a very centre of Berlin, with lots of delicious restaurants, bars and cafes on each street. Famous Mauerpark is just around the corner, as well as touristic sights. Nightlife is booming on Rosenthaler platz, just 5 minutes away from apartment.
house_rules: We ask to be quiet after 22.00, especially on the balcony and on the terrace. No smoking inside the apartment - smoking is allowed only on the balcony and on the terrace.
host_about: Hello! I am born in Saint-Petersburg, Russia, studied in Berlin and move a lot between these 2 cities. I speak 4 languages and enjoy travelling a lot. I share the places, where i live in the period of time when i'm not there - with people from all over the world, who would like to enjoy staying in these beautiful cities.

space: The pension is located in a ground floor apartment in front of a partly restored tenement house in a quiet side street. neighborhood_overview: In der nahen Umgebung befinden sich die für Friedrichshain typischen Szene-Kneipen, kleine Läden mit Getränken und Lebensmitteln, Trödelwaren, Läden für Gothic und Punk. Beim Bäcker um die Ecke kann man ab 6 Uhr frühstücken, Samstags ab 7 Uhr und Sonntags ab 8 Uhr. Das Ring-Center in der nahen Frankfurter Allee und viel weitere Geschäfte laden zum Einkaufsbummel ein. Wem das nicht reicht, fährt mit der U-Bahn Linie 5 nur 6 Stationen zum Alexanderplatz mit seinen vielen Einkaufscentern oder von dort mit der S-Bahn weiter zum Bahnhof Zoo, wo man auf dem Kurfürstendamm mit dem Kaufhaus des Westens und vielen anderen Einkaufspalästen dem Kaufrausch verfallen kann.
notes: Seit dem 01.06.2014 gehört die Müggelstr. zur Parkzone 50, das heißt es muss eine Parkgebühr gezahlt werden, wenn man nicht vorher sich eine Gästevignette beim Bezirksamt Friedrichshain/Kreuzberg besorgt hat (per Email an (EMAIL HIDDEN) Zum schriftlichen formlosen Antrag bitte eine Kopie des Fahrzeugscheines und des Personalausweises des Gastes beifügen. Wenn Sie mir mindestens eine Woche vor Anreise die Kopie des Scheines schicken, würde ich auch die Vignette für Sie einholen und die Gebühr verauslagen. Bearbeitungskosten: bis 3 Tage 10,20 € bis eine Woche 13,00 € bis 2 Woche 15,00 €
transit: Die am nächsten gelegene Station von U- und S-Bahn ist Frankfurter Allee, nur etwa 4 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt. Kostenfrei parken kann man etwa 500 m entfernt außerhalb des S-Bahn Ringes oder gegen ein Entgelt von 3 € pro Tag im Parkhaus im Ring-Center, das allerdings zwischen 22 und 8 Uhr geschlossen ist.
access: Die Gästewohnung hat insgesamt drei Zimmer (Zimmer 1, Zimmer 2 und Zimmer 3), die an verschiedene Gäste vermietet werden. Die beiden Duschbäder auf dem Flur werden von allen Gästen genutzt.
interaction: Nach der Schlüsselübergabe, die ich fast immer persönlich erledigen möchte,  bin ich telefonisch oder per Nachricht leicht zu erreichen und komme bei Bedarf sofort zu Ihnen, da ich nur knapp 100 m entfernt wohne
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus aller Welt und hoffe, dass sie sich bei mir wohlfühlen.

Nachdem ich mit dem Beginn meines Rentenalters meinen größeren Vermietungsservice verkaufte, habe ich nur eine schöne Wohnung ganz nahe meiner eigenen Wohnung zum Vermieten behalten.
Hier kann ich mich persönlich um alles in der Gästewohnung kümmern und die ankommenden Gäste direkt vor der Haustür begrüßen.

Leider spreche ich nicht besonders gut Englisch, aber bisher hat eine Verständigung doch immer noch funktioniert, am besten ist es per Email möglich, da habe ich Zeit zum übersetzen.^^

name: Wohnen in Berlin Friedrichshain

name: Big Bright & Cozy Private Room
summary: Very bright and comfortable 26m² private room in an old fashion typical "berliner" building (Altbau) in Berlin Schöneberg. From here you have perfect connection to the transportation network!
space: The bright and comfortable 26m² room is part of our three room shared flat. In your bedroom you will find a super cozy 2m x 1,40m doublebed as well as a wardrobe and a couch which use can use as a second bed. Due to the big windows you have a lot of light in the room during the day. Of course there is free Wifi throughout the appartement which you can use.
description: Very bright and comfortable 26m² private room in an old fashion typical "berliner" building (Altbau) in Berlin Schöneberg. From here you have perfect connection to the transportation network! The bright and comfortable 26m² room is part of our three room shared flat. In your bedroom you will find a super cozy 2m x 1,40m doublebed as well as a wardrobe and a couch which use can use as a second bed. Due to the big windows you have a lot of light in the room during the day. Of course there is free Wifi throughout the appartement which you can use. Feel free to use our bathroom including a washing machine and our fully equipped kitchen. Be aware that this is a shared flat and not a hotel, so it's possible that someone might have used the kitchen or the bathroom directly before you and thus it might sometimes not be perfectly clean. But in general we try to leave everything as clean as possible. We are two students who live here and of course it would be a pleasure to give you good tips tha
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is placed in the beautiful, calm district of Schöneberg. There is a supermarket on the other side of the street and many kebabs, bakeries and little asian bistros in the immediate surronding.  Nearby you find Akazienstrasse with a lot of nice shops, cafes, delicious restaurants and vintage shops.
transit: The apartment is just a 2 min walk away from the S-Bahnstation Schöneberg. From there you can take the S1 or Ringbahn (S41, S42) and reach Friedrichstrasse in 10min, Alexanderplatz in 19 min, Zoologischer Garten in 12 min and 15 min to the Exhibition Ground. The abandonded airport "Tempelhof" is just a 5min drive away. Also there are 5 busses in a 3 min walking distance from the apartment which take you to different places throughout the city.
access: Feel free to use our bathroom including a washing machine and our fully equipped kitchen. Be aware that this is a shared flat and not a hotel, so it's possible that someone might have used the kitchen or the bathroom directly before you and thus it might sometimes not be perfectly clean. But in general we try to leave everything as clean as possible.
interaction: We are two students who live here and of course it would be a pleasure to give you good tips that will make your trip as enjoyable as possible. You will have your own keys, so you can come to and leave the apartment whenever you want.  Before you arrive we will give you a very detailed description how to reach the flat if you need it.
house_rules: As we said before, you can use the kitchen and the bathroom but we expect you to clean up after using them.
host_about: student from berlin, happy to welcome people from all over the world

name: ♦ großes Zimmer mit Tiny Kitchenette ♦
summary: Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe vom Schlesischen Tor an dem es viel Street Art gibt und der Oberbaumbrücke die Friedrichshain mit Kreuzberg verbindet. Die East Side Gallery und der Landwehrkanal sind um die Ecke. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der hohen Decken, der tollen Tiny Kitchen, den Flügeltüren den schönen Möbeln und dem gemütlichen Flair. Das Zimmer hat ein großes Doppelbett 180x200 für die Herrschaften.
space: Sehr toll und geschmackvoll eingerichtete Wohnung im Wrangelkiez. Mittendrin aber trotzdem ruhig. Kleine Teeküche im Zimmer. In dem Schlafzimmer ist ein großes Bett, eine offene Kleiderstange ein Tischchen, ein großer Spiegel und alles was sonst noch benötigt wird. Die Möbel sind zumeist  antik und es hängen Bilder in der Wohnung, die von meinem Urgroßvater, Opa und Oma gemalt worden sind. Die Wohnung hat hohe Decken und Stuck und die Türen sind große Flügeltüren.

name: Quiet vacation apartment in Kreuzberg
summary: It is a quiet 2-room apartment (66 sq. m) for max. 4+2 people, in a typical Berlin prewar building from 1873. The apartment includes a large kitchen, a bath with toilet and shower, and 2 rooms with loft beds. 2 U-Bahn lines and many buses - 1 minute away.
space: An inner courtyard with benches and tables for lingering outside - only until 10:00 PM due to nighttime quite hours - and a garden belong to the building. The use of a washing machine is likewise possible. Ideal shopping; many fashion, object, and jewelry designers; restaurants; cafés; cultural institutions; movie theaters; theaters; and very good connection to public transit characterize this central location. 2 U-Bahn lines and many buses (day and night) are quickly reachable. Nearby are, for example, the former Tempelhof Airport; Potsdamer Platz; the Jewish, Transit, and Jazz Museums; and the Kreuzberg with the monument for the Napoleonic Wars in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

neighborhood_overview: We are just steps away from the Bergmannkiez, and in the further area (1 km) there are many small, special stores, cafés, restaurants, movie theaters, theaters, museums (the Jewish/Jazz/Transit/Coffee), the former Tempelhof Airport, 15 minutes to Potsdamer Platz, the Kreuzberg, and much more...
notes: The apartment is on the side of the building and is therefore quiet and protected from street noise. There are loft beds in the rooms, but there is also a fold-out sleeper couch in each as well. 1 travel crib is likewise available. The electric outlets are equipped with child protection.
transit: Directly in front of the building, the Metrobus M19 (day + night) has its final stop; there is also the 140 as well as the night bus N4 and both U-Bahn lines U6 + U7 (3-minute walk)
access: The whole 2-room apartment, located on the right wing on the second floor, is available for you. It has a separate entry.
interaction: We live and work in the same building (fashion industry - our own label). Guests receive 20% off when purchasing!
house_rules: Es handelt sich um ein normales Wohnhaus, so dass unsere Gäste ab 22.00 Uhr die Nachtruhe einhalten müssen. Daher können auch keine Partys gefeiert werden. Das Küchen- und Badfenster muss auch ab 22.00 Uhr geschlossen sein, wenn sich Gäste dort aufhalten, da der Schall im Hofbereich sehr laut ist. Die Nachtruhe muss strikt von 22.00 - 7.00 eingehalten werden. Bei Verstößen wird eine Vertragsstrafe von 200,-- € vereinbart. Gäste können jederzeit an- oder abreisen, solange keine Gäste am gleichen Tag abreisen, bzw. anreisen.

name: Blacksmith Workshop Apartment ##Nov. Dec. 2019 construction in backyard##
summary: Maisonette Loft in Historical Old Forge Building close to the main train station in Berlin Mitte
space: ##Nov. Dec. there will be construction in backyard## The old Blacksmith building is located in a quite courtyard environment in the center destrict of Berlin in the Perleberger Street 16, close to the new Berlin main train station and the Fritz-Schloß park.  The name of the apartment is derived from historical function of the 100 year old building as a service work-shop for the near Ulanen barracks which had 1200 horses.  The apartment is suitable for a group of 4 (max. 6 quests). It has 2 bedrooms. All bedrooms have Queen Size beds and there is an additional sofa bed.  The whole apartment offers a comfortable basis for your activities right in the the city centre of Berlin, close to the new main trainstation.  The 2 bedrooms are in first floor. An indoor wooden stair will give you acces to this floor. There two bathrooms one with bath tub one with shower close to the bedrooms.  The main living room with live-in high quality kitchen has wooden table.

name: Leben in Bauhaus-Wohnung in Neukölln
summary: - with a fully equipped kitchen -  a sleepingroom with bed (140x200) - a balcony overlooking a green garden. - Non-smoking environment -  a washing machine and a dishwashing machine.  - All linen and towels needed are included - Tea, Coffee and basics in the kitchen
space: Fühl dich wie zu Hause in meiner Bauhaus-Wohnung. Die Wohnung ist etwa 55 m2 groß. Der Grundriss ist typisch für das Bauhaus - es wird kein Platz verschenkt.  Es gibt eine geräumige Wohnküche mit allem, was du brauchst, sogar mit Geschirrspülmaschine. Das Badezimmer hat eine Badewanne.  Das Wohnzimmer hat eine Arbeitsecke und genügend Sitzmöglichkeiten, um es sich gemütlich zu machen. Von hier kannst du den Balkon gehen, der in originalen Farben gehalten ist. Das Schlafzimmer hat ein Doppelbett (140x200). Einen kleinen Kleiderschrank gibt es auch, damit du deine Sachen unterbringen kannst.
description: - with a fully equipped kitchen -  a sleepingroom with bed (140x200) - a balcony overlooking a green garden. - Non-smoking environment -  a washing machine and a dishwashing machine.  - All linen and towels needed are included - Tea, Coffee and basics in the kitchen Achtung - es werden nur noch Buchungen, die bis zum 1.8. eingehen, angenommen. Da bei dem Haus Sanierungsarbeiten anstehen bzw. schon ausgeführt werden, steht die Wohnung für 2019 nicht zur Verfügung. Wenn ihr Fragen dazu habt, gern melden.

name: COZY ROOM IN THE HEART OF KREUZBERG
summary: Cozy, 24m², bright and silent. It has a confy bed, a hammock, and a projector to watch movies! The flat has a fun decoration, a nice kitchen, bath with bathtub, is well equiped with washing machine and WIFI. 2min walk from Kottbusser Tor (U8/U12).
space: The room has 24m² and it belongs to a flat of 83m², in a building dated from 1857. Both flat and room and very cozy and well decorated. The room has a beautiful wooden floor, a brazilian hammock and a projector to watch movies on the wall. The bed is doble and confortable and an extra single matress is available.

The room has 24m² and it belongs to a flat of 83m², in a building dated from 1857. Both flat and room and very cozy and well decorated. The room has a beautiful wooden floor, a brazilian hammock and a projector to watch movies on the wall. The bed is doble and confortable and an extra single matress is available. The flat is located in the very heart of Kreuzberg, in the mythical "Kotti", just 2 minutes walk from the U8/U12 Kottbusser Tor. Even though the sorroundings are busy with great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops, the street is calm and the room is very silent. The guests will have all the necessary assistance during their stay. Just 2 minutes walk from Kottbusser Tor U-bahn station with the lines U8 and U12. A lot of access to buses

host_about: Hi, I'm a freelance photographer from Porto Alegre, the southernmost brazilian capital. I have been living and working in Berlin since 4 years and I love this city for its free spirit and ever-changing cultural scene.  I'm a portrait artist and I love people and the relations we are set to bound. I have recently found a passion for cooking and I take great excitement finding and experiencing gastronomic spots wherever I am. Music (specially brazilian) is an older love. Arts, literature and movies (I'm graduated in film school) are part of my everyday life and my seeking interests. Traveling around has been my great goal since teenage years - there's no greater inspiration.

space: The room is located in an old building in the green and quiet Schöneau district Friedenau. The apartment is bright and also quiet, it has wooden floors with modernized bathroom / kitchen. There are bakeries, groceries and everything else. The shopping mile Schlossstr. Is a metro station, but can be run well.

interaction: The result is
house_rules: - du kannst in deinem Zimmer essen - dein dreckiges Geschirr stellst du bitte gleich in den Geschirrspüler, nicht einfach in der Küche abstellen - hier ist ab 22 Uhr Nachtruhe  - wenn du weitere Leute mitbringen möchtest, sprich das mit mir vorher ab  - täglich solltest du mind. 15 Minuten lüften - bitte nutze das Zimmer als deinen Hauptaufenthaltsort, nicht die Küche  - die Wachmaschine kann genutzt werden, die Wäsche dann auf einem Wäscheständer im eigenen Zimmer getrocknet werden - Kinder und Haustiere sind willkommen, bitte vorher mit mir absprechen, ob es gerade möglich ist - ab 22 Uhr ist Nachtruhe - Check-In bitte mit mir absprechen, da ich nicht immer zu Hause bin - 2 Personen sind möglich, dieses aber bitte mit mir vorher absprechen, falls ich selbst gerade Besuch habe
host_about:
Ich freue mich immer über Besuch. Von meinen 4 Zimmer gebe ich gern das größte ab : )  Ich arbeite freiberuflich zu Hause. Außerdem bin ich sehr sportlich … das am liebsten draußen, daher bin ich auch viel unterwegs.

Ich kann nicht mehr leben ohne:
1. meine Musik
2. meinen Espressokocher
3. mein Fahrrad
4. meinen Computer 
5. meine Bücher

Da ich sehr gern Kekse backe, findet jeder Gast welche in seinem Zimmer. 
Gern habe ich das Motto: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving. Albert Einstein.

name: Ferienbungalow  an der Müggelspree B2 "Yellow Sun"
summary: Unser Ferienbungalow B2 liegt mit einem weiteren Bungalow (B1) auf einem großen Grundstück am Ufer der Müggelspree. Er ist komfortabel ausgestattet und bietet viele Möglichkeiten für Entspannung und sportliche Betätigung. Parkmöglichkeiten sind reichlich vorhanden. Bikes und Paddelboote können kostenlos genutzt werden. Die reizvolle Umgebung und die aufregende City von Berlin laden zu Erkundungen ein. Der Standort liegt in einem Erholungsgebiet und garantiert daher viel Ruhe und  Entspannung.
space: Unsere Gäste wohnen in einem neuen und geschmackvoll ausgestatteten Bungalow mit 60 qm Grundfläche. Zusätzlich steht für Kinder ein reizvoller Schlafboden zur Verfügung. Ein Kamin, TV, Radio,  DVD-Player und diverse Spiele sorgen für gemütliche Stunden. Bei schönem Wetter kann der Wohnraum um  die anschließende Terrasse erweitert werden. Sitzgelegenheiten sind innen und außen zahlreich vorhanden.

Dem Gast steht der komplette Bungalow allein zur Verfügung. Neben mir kümmert sich Ekki persönlich um
neighborhood_overview: Nahe der Unterkunft befindet sich das denkmalgeschützte Alte Fischerdorf mit der Dorfkirche und der Anlegestelle einer Fähre. Daselbst bietet der einheimische Fischer an den Wochenenden der Saison leckeren Fischimbiss. Ebenfalls sehenswert in der Nähe ist die Kanallandschaft von Neu Venedig. Dies gilt auch für den Stadtteil Friedrichshagen und die Altstadt von Köpenick, die bequem mit der Tram 61 erreicht werden können. Gern besuchen unsere Gäste auch die Highlights von Brandenburg wie Bad Saarow, den Spreewald oder Tropical Islands. Gern geben wir weitere Tipps für die Programmgestaltung unserer Gäste..
notes: Unseren Gästen steht auch das angrenzende Wassergrundstück mit Bootshafen und Carport zur Verfügung. Der benachbarte Bungalow B1, hinsichtlich Bauweise und Ausstattung voll identisch, wird ebenfalls nur von Feriengästen genutzt, die einen erholsamen Urlaub verleben wollen.
transit: Die Erreichbarkeit der Unterkunft mit PKW, Fahrrad oder Boot ist sehr günstig. An den öffentlichen Nahverkehr ist sie durch die S-Bahn S3, den Bus 161 und die Tram 61 angebunden. Für eine Fahrt ins Berliner Zentrum per Bus und S-Bahn benötigt man rd. 1 Stunde,  mit PKW ca. 45 min. Der nächstgelegene Flughafen ist Berlin-Schönefeld  (ca.20 km). Berlin-Tegel ist ca. 45 km entfernt.
access: Dem Gast steht der komplette Bungalow allein zur Verfügung.
interaction: Neben mir kümmert sich Ekki persönlich um unsere Gäste.  Wir wohnen ganz in der Nähe und sind daher gut zu erreichen. Wir drängen uns nicht auf, sind aber immer da, wenn es nötig oder sinnvoll ist.
house_rules: Bitte die Ruhezeiten einhalten. Auf der Terrasse und im Außenbereich ist das Rauchen erlaubt. Das Mitbringen eines Haustieres muss dem Vermieter vorher angekündigt werden.
