name: Charming Studio Apartment
summary: My apartment is a cute, cozy shelter with charming illumination close to the heart of Berlin. The atmosphere of the apartment is great, you will definitely feel at home. If you want to experience the real Berlin, you are in the right place.
space: The apartment is cozy but you have everything you need. The space is colorful, homelike and full of light.  My apartment is in a real Altbau building, in one of the coolest neighborhoods, Prenzaulerberg. The building is unique because it reflects to the essential style of the neighborhood. The entrance gate is colorful so you won't miss it for sure.
description: My apartment is a cute, cozy shelter with charming illumination close to the heart of Berlin. The atmosphere of the apartment is great, you will definitely feel at home. If you want to experience the real Berlin, you are in the right place. The apartment is cozy but you have everything you need. The space is colorful, homelike and full of light.  My apartment is in a real Altbau building, in one of the coolest neighborhoods, Prenzaulerberg. The building is unique because it reflects to the essential style of the neighborhood. The entrance gate is colorful so you won't miss it for sure. You'll be able to access all parts of the apartment, although I will kindly ask you to respect my things - such as books, clothes, flowers etc... - and take care of them, this is my only home :) If you need anything, I'm always available on my phone and if personally not me, some of my friends will be able to help you. The neighborhood is full of cafes, bars, great restaurants and the apartment is 10 min
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is full of cafes, bars, great restaurants and the apartment is 10 minute walk from Berlin's famous Mauerpark. There is a lovely Café - called Gula - right by the entrance gate, they make great coffee, delicious cakes and amazing Argentinian food in the lunchtime. If you appreciate outdoor activities, the Humboldthain Park and the Volkspark Friedrichshain are also only a few tram stops away. You will be in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg but if you feel like discovering the other neighbourhoods, it takes 2 stops with the S-bahn to reach Alexanderplatz and a couple of tram stops to be in the heart of Friedrichsain and Kreuzberg. You won't be bored here for sure.
transit: The closest S-bahn station is Eberswalderstrasse - 5 minutes walk - and the closest tram station is Husemannstrasse - 1 minute walk. I advice you to get a bike, because this is the best way to get around in Berlin. Trust me ;)
access: You'll be able to access all parts of the apartment, although I will kindly ask you to respect my things - such as books, clothes, flowers etc... - and take care of them, this is my only home :)
interaction: If you need anything, I'm always available on my phone and if personally not me, some of my friends will be able to help you.
house_rules: -Please don't download anything from torrent pages - movies, music, e-books, etc... - because it comes with a huge fine from the German state. - Please don't smoke in the apartment - Please don't walk with shoes inside - it is forbidden to organize a party or invite other people to the apartment - Please keep the bathroom door open when you don't use it, so the air doesn't get stuffy inside - Please take care of the apartment, like it was your own.
host_about: I love coffee, movies and music. I also like flamingos and sundays.

access: You will be renting one room of the apartment. The kitchen and bathroom is shared with either me, or (max two) other guests. I am out working most of the day.  In the evenings I like to cook a nice dinner and sit with a glass of wine and some chilled music.  I am very easy going, like to read, write, meditate and do yoga.
interaction: For any questions or requests you can reach me through (Hidden by Airbnb) call / message or E-Mail.
house_rules: Everything has to be given back as found. Please wash the dishes you use and seperate the garbic.  And please be aware of the other people living with you in the building! Sure, we are in Berlin and not on the countryside. So being quite has different qualities here.. ;-) But please also be aware, that there might be people getting up early when you just come home from a long party night/day..
host_about:
I`d describe myself as an open hearted, curious person wich likes to thrive. I always seek to learn new things about the world that surrounds me. I am interested in the spiritual, old wisdom & psychologie.

I love to dance and enjoy outdoor activities like biking, hiking, climbing & swimming.

Spending time in nature and exploring the world around me plays in important role in my life. 

I also really enjoy cooking & having dinner with friends. Or sitting around a campfire & jam to some acoustic folk music from all over the world. I am always happy to learn about new cultures and meet like minded people.

Other than that, I am self employed, working as a carpenter on creating alternative living spaces like TinyHouses & Yurts.

name: Sunny Flat (78m²) in Vibrant Kiez
summary: Beautiful 2-Room "alt-bau” (old build) apt. (78m²), located in the heart of Kreuzberg between the bustling Bergmannstr and Landwehr-Canal. 1 bed-, 1 living room, both well-lit, fully furnished (king-size bed, large sofa, dining area), fully-equipped kitchen with gas cooker.  It is very close to various modes of transport - ubahn line u7 and bus lines 248 and M41.
space: The flat is located on the second floor of an old building very typical for Berlin (high ceilings, parquet floors). It is very well-lit with a lovely bay window overlooking the street, with lots of trees opposite.  It is fully furnished with everything you need for your stay: You can prepare your own food with a variety of kitchen utensils, eat your dinner at the wooden dinner table in the living room or simply relax on the huge sofa. You can also use the coffee machine and grinder in the kitchen if you are familiar with the machinery.  Please mind that we have changed the setting a little since the pictures were taken.
description: Beautiful 2-Room "alt-bau” (old build) apt. (78m²), located in the heart of Kreuzberg between the bustling Bergmannstr and Landwehr-Canal. 1 bed-, 1 living room, both well-lit, fully furnished (king-size bed, large sofa, dining area), fully-equipped kitchen with gas cooker.  It is very close to various modes of transport - ubahn line u7 and bus lines 248 and M41. neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in a quiet, beautiful street in walking distance to the buzzling Bergmannstrasse with lots of nice cafés, small shops and boutiques and access to the large Viktoria Park where you can take a look over Berlin once you have climbed its top.  There is a market hall where you can buy fresh cheese, fruit & vegetables as well as German bread or just a cup of coffee.  Supermarkets, greengrocers and bakeries are really close by. All kinds of different (international) restaurants are just a five minute walk away. You can reach the famous canal and the amazing Tempelhofer Feld in walking distance.
transit: The major line U7 is 7 minutes away, there is a bus just across the street which runs 24/7, leaving for Central Station, Potsdamer Platz and Neukölln. The 248 bus runs from Zossenerstrasse (few mins walk away) and goes to Alexanderplatz via the Jüdisches Museum and various other attractions.
access: You'll rent the whole flat including one bedroom, one living room, a kitchen and a bathroom.
house_rules: Please leave the flat as you found it.  Animals as well as smoking is not permitted.  Please respect our neighbours by trying to keep the noise down. Thank you!
host_about: I am a pastry chef, born and raised in Berlin. And yes, I love to cook and bake, I enjoy going for a walk on food markets, experiencing with ingredients and getting to know new tastes. As much as I love to travel to close and far away places to get to know new people, different cultures and new recipes, I also love my hometown! And I'd be pleased to welcome  guests at my apt and offer them tips to enjoy the city!

The apartment is situated in Schöneberg at Nollendorfplatz, a central area close to Kudamm, Berlin`s famous shopping and lounging mile 2-room apartment (47 sqm) with generous living space, american kitchen and friendly bedroom plus balcony with fascinating view. A comfortable futon bed /140 x 200), a large extendable sleep couch (160 x 205) including sufficient bed clothes and towels. Full equipped kitchen with electric stove, fridge, dishes from wine glass to frying pan, cutlery, coffee machine, toaster serves the fast breakfast as well as an extended dinner. Eating space for four people with fascinating view of Nollendorfplatz. TV, Midi-set, generous space for luggage and clothes.
neighborhood_overview: Numerous shopping opportunities close to the lively cultural-, scenic- and night life directly before the door. A large and beautiful market (Winterfeldmarkt) very near by, reputed as one of the most interesting markets in Berlin. You meet the typical mixture of antiques, countless cafe`s and a multitude of restaurants, art shops, galleries, antiquities and small businesses. Many small and medium shops close by entice to diversified shopping sprees. Numerous shopping opportunities close to the lively cultural-, scenic- and night life directly before the door. A large and beautiful market (Winterfeldmarkt) very near by, reputed as one of the most interesting markets in Berlin. You meet the typical mixture of antiques, countless cafes and a multitude of restaurants, art shops, galleries, antiquities and small businesses. Many small and medium shops close by entice to diversified shopping sprees.
notes: - Fairs and major events (IFA, ITB, ISTAF, Marathon, etc)  - Public Holidays (Easter, Christmas, German Unity Day, etc)  - Summer holiday  - New Year (27th Dec - 4th Jan) Please ask us about prices for stays of more than one week.
transit: In Berlin you find a very dense public transportation net. Many sights are directly and rapidly accessible. Because of the central location most guests leave their cars parked or do not even bring it along at all. The apartment lies directly at U-train station Nollendorfplatz in the western city near Kudamm and Zoological garden, the Zoo with the world`s highest number of species. Several underground lines, (night -) buses and a taxi stand are right in front of the door. The nearest motorway and will take you only a couple of minutes by car. It is called Innsbrucker Platz. From Tegel Airport: take the bus no. X9 up to underground station (U-Bahnhof) Ernst-Reuter-Platz, there you change into the line U2 in the direction of Pankow and get off at the U-station Nollendorfplatz (27 min.).  From Schönefeld airport: take the S9 (urban railway) to the station Warschauer Strasse, change into the underground line U1 in the direction of Uhlandstrasse and and get off at the station Nollendorfplatz
access: That's an unshared apartment with living room, bed room, floor, kitchen and bathroom only for your private use.
interaction: Feel free to get in touch if you have any other questions during the stay.

name: Downtown House Friedrichshain - quite, nice, city
summary: Nice apartment in the middle of Friedrichshain. Top location, in 10 minutes by subway to Alexanderplatz. The apartment is newly renovated and furnished and is suitable for up to 6 people. Location: ground floor, kitchen, 1 bathroom, and 3 bedrooms.
space: In the apartment there are 3 separate bedrooms with 2 double beds each 1,80 x 2 m and 2 single beds and a cot. 2 bedrooms have a TV and computer workstation. The kitchen is fully equipped with microwave, dishwasher, washing machine, coffee machine etc. The bathroom has a shower and a hair dryer.

name: ruhiges & gemütliches Zimmer im Zentrum von Berlin
summary: Meine Wohnung befindet sich im Zentrum Berlins, keine 10 Min vom Alexander Platz entfernt und ein Idealer Ausgangpunkt um die Stadt zu erkunden.  Für Ausgehbegeisterte liegen die Kieze Friedrichshain und Kreuzberg in direkter Nachbarschaft. Und für Shoppingbegeisterte befindet sich das Alexa (Center) gleich um die Ecke. Wer es mal etwas entspannter mag, kann sich auch auf den Süd-Balkon sonnen, oder in den 15 min entfernten Volkspark Freidrichshain gehen.
space: Die besondere Lage an einem Buddhistischen Meditationszentrum (Lotos Vihara e.V.) und umgeben vom Grün, machen dieses Zimmer trotz seiner zentralen Lage in Berlin-Mitte zu einem perfekten Startpunkt um die Stadt zu entdecken. Es bietet aber ebenso einen ruhigen Rückzugsort um seine Erlebnisse Revue passieren zulassen.

name: Quiet bright room with balcony near Kudamm !
summary: This spacious room is very bright and perfect for mid 20s and upward quiet couples or individuals. Its actually the living room of an apartment that you will share with your hosts, Mak and Hedviga from Croatia. You will have access to a cosy kitchen and bathroom, and we also provide bread, coffee, fruits, muesli and jam for breakfast. Our apartment is 1 min walk from the first subway station and 5 min walk from the famous KaDeWe and Kudam.
space: The room is very quiet and bright. There are no major roads nearby and usually you can hear birds singing, due to the buildings backyard. The bed itself is a comfortable folding sofa and its 200 x 140 cm or enough for two people. In the room itself there are shelves and hangers where you can organise your clothes. And you have access to a nice wooden floor balcony. In the kitchen you can use all the cooking utensils. There is an oven and a washing machine where you can wash your clothes. There is no dish washer so please clean everything by hand after using. Also there is a small fridge where you can cool your food.  Our apartment is on the 5. floor and there is no elevator, so it requires some walking up stairs.
description: This spacious room is very bright and perfect for mid 20s and upward quiet couples or individuals. Its actually the living room of an apartment that you will share with your hosts, Mak and Hedviga from Croatia. You will have access to a cosy kitchen and bathroom, and we also provide bread, coffee, fruits, muesli and jam for breakfast. Our apartment is 1 min walk from the first subway station and 5 min walk from the famous KaDeWe and Kudam. The room is very quiet and bright. There are no major roads nearby and usually you can hear birds singing, due to the buildings backyard. The bed itself is a comfortable folding sofa and its 200 x 140 cm or enough for two people. In the room itself there are shelves and hangers where you can organise your clothes. And you have access to a nice wooden floor balcony. In the kitchen you can use all the cooking utensils. There is an oven and a washing machine where you can wash your clothes. There is no dish washer so please clean everything by hand afte
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is literally 1 min away from the first subway (Augsburger Str.). Just around the corner is the first supermarket (2 min walk) and in 5 min you are in heart of Berlins shopping district and the famous Kudamm.
notes: We like guests that are quiet and will respect our privacy just like we will respect yours. This means that we will not disturb you by staying awake until 1 A.M and speaking loudly or listening to music so we also expect the same from you. Also we expect that you will take care of the room you are staying in, just like we will take care that you have a freshly cleaned room, tidy sheets and bathroom! We are grateful for your consideration ! :)
transit: The best way to visit Berlin from our apartment is definitely with a bicycle that you can rent for 8 EUR/day from a nearby shop. However the U3 line has an exit in our street so that is your closest public transport. Besides this in 10 min walk you can reach the Zoologische Garten subway and rail station. This is a major station in Berlin which can take you anywhere from Potsdam to Warschauer Str.
access: Guests can access the bathroom and kitchen, however these are shared.
interaction: Hedviga and me work during the day so you will see us in the evening and maybe in the morning.  We are happy to help you with tips to get around Berlin and make most of your stay.
house_rules: SENSITIVE NEIGHBORS: The walls are thin so please be quiet especially before 8 am & after 10 pm. Also be quiet while you walk up and down the stairway. If you have heavy luggage let me know and I will help you SECURITY: Always lock the doors when you leave the house. Do not enter the apartment garden. Make sure all appliances are switched OFF before leaving PRIVACY: Entry into bedroom not allowed. Also please do not eat our food (marked with red dot)  CLEANNESS:  Wash and dry the dishes after you use them. No shoes in the bathroom, kitchen and your room! Leave shoes in hallway on the flor or in white cupboard.   INTERNET: Downloading of torrents and any other prohibited content not allowed, high fines applied in Germany.   GUESTS: No guests AMENITIES: First clothes wash 9 am, last clothes wash 6 pm. If you need an iron, more clothes hangers etc. please just ask us
host_about: I am calm, friendly, positive and clean ! I am 190 cm so short beds do not work  best for me :) I come from Croatia (31) and I work in the field of renewable energy and climate change.

name: hip modern comfortabel - Berlin - the place to be
summary: Berlin Friedrichshain near by melting point Boxhagener Platz and Revaler Straße and RAW Area the appartement is modern and bright with all comfortable things you need with a nice big bathroom.
space: The place is next to a few hotspots, such as the Boxhagener Platz with it's variety on different food places from many different cultures. It's also very close to the RAW Area, where you can spend the evening in one of the small clubs or bars. Around the building are reataurants, shops and very specials clubs. The appartement what is on the ground floor  is a part of a modern community with international neighbours. The bedroom has one KingSize bed for 2 persons and a TV. The living room has one sofa - where one person can sleep and 2 matrazes. There is a TV too. You can wash and dry your clothes. The kitchen has any tools you need like  coffee machine, toaster, juicer and ... etc.

There's a bright room with a cozy couch, a big TV with Cable and a very comfortable bed. I'll hand over the keys and show you the apartment + how everything works.  You can also contact me anytime and I'll be glad to help you in case you have any questions. house_rules: Please take care of everything as if it was your own place. Berlin is the perfect city to go partying...but NOT in the apartment. German Laws are very strict when it comes to illegal downloads or streaming of copyrighted material. Please don't download or stream any illegal content. If you do you will have to assume the consequences. ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING INSIDE, we have a balcony for that. We have a very good relationship with the neighbours and want to keep it like that, so please avoid loud noises after 22:00.

name: 70m2 de confort et de calme à Checkpoint Charlie !
summary: Mon appartement, très calme, est situé en plein centre de Berlin juste à Checkpoint Charlie. La surface totale est de 85m2 avec 1 entrée, 1 salon-salle à manger, 1 cuisine entièrement équipée, 1 salle de bains avec douche et baignoire + WC, 1 chambre et 2 vestibules dont l’un contient une grande armoire partagée et l’autre dessert l’ouverture sur le balcon-terrasse donnant sur un parc. Je condamne 1 chambre de 15 m2 pour y loger des affaires personnelles et libérer de l’espace aux voyageurs.
space: Mon appartement se situe au 3ème étage avec ascenseur. Le salon donne sur la rue. Le reste sur un joli jardin très arboré. Double vitrage partout.

neighborhood_overview: Mon quartier est très prisé et touristique. C’est facile de se déplacer vers les endroits essentiels de la ville qui sont, pour la plupart, très proches. Nombreux bars et restaurants. On peut acheter de tout partout (bio, supermarchés etc.)
transit: La station de métro « Kochstrasse » est au pied de mon immeuble (U6) ainsi que l’arrêt du bus M29 (à impériale) qui dessert la ville d’Est en Ouest. J’habite juste à la « frontière » Kreuzberg/Mitte !!!

name: Cosy sunny room in Berlin
summary: Hello everyone,  I offer here our big bedroom for rent in nice and quite area , near S karlshost,  you need to the train station or the metro  about 12 min walking or you can just take the bus 4 min from our home,  You will enjoy your time here and you can go to the super market close to our home for supplies and I will also recommend nice places to go and help with the navigation  Wish you a nice visit and wait for all of you guys
space: Our bedroom is quite big about 15 m² and have a double bed and wardrobe and TV and the most of the things you need , you can use the bathroom and cook free in the kitchen and eat normally in the living room and smoking is allowed in the balcony

name: Provence Room near center - zero waste living
summary: Our room is located in a listed Wilhelminian style building which was built in 1878. It is located in Prenzlauer Berg (Kollwitzkiez) bordering Berlin downtown and is a great location to explore Berlin from. The room belongs to our private apartment, bathroom, toilet, and kitchen is shared with others. We are a zero waste household. Soaps, dish soap, washing powder for your sheets and towels are allergic friendly, home made and smell neutral. You will find quite some inspirations, if you want.
space: • quiet, window facing the backyard • at the entrance of the apartment • lovely furnished in provence style • queen size bed (160x200cm)  • memory foam matress and comfy duvet We look forward to meeting and hosting you!  Studio A.
description: Our room is located in a listed Wilhelminian style building which was built in 1878. It is located in Prenzlauer Berg (Kollwitzkiez) bordering Berlin downtown and is a great location to explore Berlin from. The room belongs to our private apartment, bathroom, toilet, and kitchen is shared with others. We are a zero waste household. Soaps, dish soap, washing powder for your sheets and towels are allergic friendly, home made and smell neutral. You will find quite some inspirations, if you want. • quiet, window facing the backyard • at the entrance of the apartment • lovely furnished in provence style • queen size bed (160x200cm)  • memory foam matress and comfy duvet We look forward to meeting and hosting you!  Studio A. • shared kitchen area • shared bathroom We´re available for any queries prior to and during your stay. The 'Kollwitzkiez' is one of the hippest districts Berlin has to offer. The streets in our neighborhood have the charm of Parisian boulevards and encompass a wide range
neighborhood_overview: The 'Kollwitzkiez' is one of the hippest districts Berlin has to offer. The streets in our neighborhood have the charm of Parisian boulevards and encompass a wide range of trendy bistros, bars, cafes, restaurants, and grocery stores. There are also other mod cons - pharmacy, bank, coffee shops, ATMs, post office, boutique stores, live music, cinemas etc - - all within easy walking distance (no more than 15 mins). Anything else you desire should be with a 20 minute radius if you take public transport.
notes: Berlin levies a 5% city tax. For more information please refer to the federal state of Berlin website.
transit: Tram M2: 1 minute walk Subway U2: 5 minutes walk Both will get you to Alexanderplatz in 5 minutes. Alexanderplatz is the closest hub and from here you have the S-Bahn, U-Bahn, Metro (tram) and Bus network to get you to where ever you wish to go.
access: • shared kitchen area • shared bathroom
interaction: We´re available for any queries prior to and during your stay.
house_rules: CHECKIN-OPTIONS • personal checkin: 6pm - 9pm with us. Please provide a 30 minutes time frame for your arrival • flexible self checkin: 10am - open end. We can book a keybox for you, please ask. OTHER REGULATIONS • CITY TAX: 5% of the total • CHECK OUT: 10am, luggage storage is possible till the next guests check in
host_about:
We are a young family of four and private hosts. We  love traveling a lot – and, of course, hosting travelers from all over the world in our home.

We are registered at the Berlin city council, so you can be save to rent a legal place.

name: "a room with a view"
summary: Ideally located in the quiet part of Kreuzberg's "Bergmannstraße-Kiez", my appartment offers
space: English: It is all about location. 150 metres away from the buzzing historic market hall ((website hidden)) and 150 metres away from the metro stop "Südstern", you will be right in the centre of the thriving Bohème Kreuzberg. Here, you will find plenty of great stores, restaurants and coffee places along Bergmannstraße or Gräfestraße. Also the iconic "Tempelhofer Feld" (former US airforce airport) is a five-minutes walk away. The appartment is located opposite a cemetery/park in a very calm and historic street. As I live here alone, the appartment is suited for singles or couples. The bed is appropriately sized to fit two people.  Deutsch: Es geht ja alles über die Lage. So auch hier! Die Wohnung liegt mitten im Bergmannkiez zwischen der historischen Markthalle ((website hidden)) und der U-Bahn Station Südstern. In der unmittelbaren Umgebung finden Sie hunderte tolle Café, Einkaufsgelegenheiten und Restaurants entlang der Bergmannstraße oder im Gräfekiez. Die Wohnung ist so ruhig, da s
description: Ideally located in the quiet part of Kreuzberg's "Bergmannstraße-Kiez", my appartment offers
neighborhood_overview: English: I move a lot in Berlin. I am 100% sure, I live in the best location! Deutsch: Ich bewege mich viel in Berlin und komme immer mehr zu dem Urteil. Diese Gegend ist die beste!
notes: Englisch: As I don't have neighbours opposite of my appartment, I don't have curtains. The early morning light in the bright appartment (south/western balcony) does not bother me anymore. There would be eye masks at your disposal.  Deutsch: Da ich gegenüber meines Süd/West-Balkons keine Nachbarn habe, habe ich auch keine Gardinen. Die frühe Sommersonne stört mich nicht mehr. Für Sie stehen Schlafbrillen zur Verfügung.
transit: English: U-7 (serving both airports), Busses (serving the main station and Südkreuz station) and bike-sharing stations just around the corner Deutsch: U-7 (für beide Flughäfen), Busse (zum HBF und zum Südkreuz) und eine DB Fahrradstation direkt vor der Haustür
access: English: I only rent out the appartment when I am not in Berlin. You will enjoy exclusive access to the premises.  Deutsch: Da ich in der Zeit nicht anwesend sein werde, habt ihr uneingeschränkten Zugang zu der Wohnung.
interaction: English: As I will not be here during your stay, there will be familiy members or close friends to your assistance. They all speak good English. I will try to be there for a first greeting.  Deutsch: Da ich während Ihres Aufenthalts nicht da bin, werden meistens Familienmitglieder oder enge Freunde für Sie da sein können. Ich werde mich bemühen, die Schlüsselübergabe zumindest persönlich zu gewährleisten.
house_rules: English: As I said, I live in this appartment myself and you will see from the pictures that I like to keep it as freshly rennovated as I took it. I hold other peoples' property in high regard and also did so as a AIRBNB guest. I hope you do the same. I will not take in party tourists.  Deutsch: Wie gesagt, lebe ich selber in dieser Wohnung und wie ihr auch den Bildern entnehmen könnt, versuche ich ordentlich und sorgfältig mit der Wohnung umzugehen. So habe ich es als AIRBNB Gast auch gehandhabt. Das Gleiche erwarte ich von euch. Berliner Party Touristen sind nicht erwünscht.
host_about: My name is Philipp, I am a 30 years old German from Berlin. I would describe myself as somebody who holds other peoples' property in high regard. I will always treat your belongings with due care. I speak German, English, French, Dutch and a bit of Russian. You can always call me to ameliorate your impression.
amenities: {TV,Internet,Wifi,Kitchen,"Buzzer/wireless intercom",Heating,Washer,Essentials}

name: 7 и более человек в квартире в центре Берлина.
summary: Привет! В моей 5-и комнатной квартире (103 кв.м) у вас есть возможность снять посуточно три комнаты. Одна из которых 25 кв.м. с балконом и две комнаты по 15 км.м с двухспальными кроватями. В общей сложности есть спальные места для максимум 7 человек! На полу можно организовать ночлег и для дополнительных гостей, но это по отдельной договорённости.  Квартира большая, просторная в интересном туристическом месте. В квартире есть дополнительный туалет.

neighborhood_overview: Квартира находится в трёх станциях метро от Александр Плац. Станция метро, как и остановка трамвая в трёх минутах ходьбы.
notes: Если вы как группа между 5 и 7 людей захотите у меня остановится, вам нужно будет соблюдать определённые правила. О них я напишу тебе уже подробно при нашем общении. Если вас всё устроит, вы сможете провести хорошее время у меня в квартире! Есть возможность снять квартиру за более дешовую цену! Для этого напиши мне в меседжере самой знаменитой социальной сети планеты. Там ты сможешь меня найти как: Taras Siakerka

name: Your cozy home in Berlin!
summary: After a whole day of sight seeing or a long night of party, my place will be your cozy chill out den. I only rent my place when I’m not in town so you will have the flat to yourself. It’s located near Volkspark Friedrichshain which is one of the best parks in the city. Well connected by M10 and M4 tram that takes you to city center, main station and warschauerstr. which is the nightlife hub and also hosts east side gallery. I recently moved to this place so have limited furnitures.
space: You can use the entire flat as I won’t be home. Feel free to make yourself a cup of coffee or cook a quick meal. Kindly clean up after you cook.
description: After a whole day of sight seeing or a long night of party, my place will be your cozy chill out den. I only rent my place when I’m not in town so you will have the flat to yourself. Well connected by M10 and M4 tram that takes you to city center, main station and warschauerstr. which is the nightlife hub and also hosts east side gallery. Close to the most popular kiez of Prenzlauerberg with lots if bars, restaurant. Also a 5 mins walk from Volkspark and a short tram ride from main station and Warschauerstr. where the nightlife begins. You will get tram M10 & M4 in front of the house. For S-bahn you can walk
neighborhood_overview: Close to the most popular kiez of Prenzlauerberg with lots if bars, restaurant. Also a 5 mins walk from Volkspark and a short tram ride from main station and Warschauerstr. where the nightlife begins.
notes: My building is under renovation. Although majority of the work is done, the staircase painting and tiling is going on currently. This shouldn’t block your access anyways. Also I don’t host travelers with kids. Sorry nothing against them but my first family hosting experience hasn’t been the best.
transit: You will get tram M10 & M4 in front of the house. For S-bahn you can walk to Griefswalderstr. (0.8 km), which is the ring line and takes you everywhere around Berlin.  There is no parking on the property. You have to look for paid street parking.
access: Entire apartment
interaction: I rent out my flat only when I’m traveling, but I can be reached via phone.
house_rules: There are 2 balconies in the flat. Smoking is only allowed there. I have neighbors so no loud music or parties after 10pm.
host_about: Traveller, cook, local drink and nightlife explorer. I can cook you a finger-licking Indian meal and can show you around the city.

name: Studio für Drei, zentral aber ruhig
summary: Ein gemütliches, ruhiges Studio im zentrum Berlin-Wilmersdorf mit dem Ausblick zum Garten. Es ist sehr ruhig, relaxing und liegt auf der ersten Etage das mit dem Aufzug zu erreichen ist. Das bequeme Apartment ist 28m 2 groß und besitzt eine Kochnische, einen kleinen Flur und ein Badezimmer. Zu den Schlafmäglichkeiten haben sie ein Einzelbett und  ein ausziehbares Sofa. Perfekt für eine kleine Familie mit einem Kind oder 2 Freunde.

Wir bedanken uns vielmals & freuen uns auf Ihre Anreise! :) Wenn fragen aufkommen sind wir gerne für Sie da!

name: Clean & neat room in the Bergmannkiez -Kreuzberg
summary: Hello,  i´m offering a nice 14 m² room in Kreuzberg. It is equipped with a bed, a closet and desk (see pictures). The apartment is located close to the underground station Gneisenaustr (3 min) on the corner to Bergmannstr - a vibrant street with plenty of different restaurants, cafes and bars. You are free to use all the rooms shown by the pictures. I am chilean and work as a teacher. Important: This is a non-smoke- (except balcony) and alcohol-free-apartment (except your room).  Saludos, Sol

name: room for 2 people in a shared flat
summary: The room has a big bed for 2 people, a nice couch, TV and desk. The flat is located close to Winterfeldplatz, where you will find many nice restaurants and bars and a beautiful food market on Wednesdays and Saturdays. The next metro-station (U1, U2, U3, U4) is just two minutes walk away and directly connects you to the city center (15 minutes), Kurfürstendamm (10 minutes) and Schlesisches Tor (20 minutes). Bathroom and kitchen are fully equipped and free to use! Feel free to ask!
